0001.en: Chapter 1: The Interview
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 第1章 面试

0001.en: "Are you there yet?"
0001.speaker: 母亲
0001.cn: “到了吗？”

0001.en: "Don't be nervous. Your grades are so good, you'll definitely pass."
0001.speaker: 母亲
0001.cn: “不要紧张，你成绩这么好，一定能过的。”

0001.en: "Don't worry about the surgery fee. Mom found a new part-time job and will definitely save up enough for you. Just focus on your interview."
0001.speaker: 母亲
0001.cn: “手术费的事情不用担心，妈找了个新兼职，一定会帮你凑齐的，你踏踏实实参加面试。”

0001.en: Looking at the messages from his mother on the screen, Zhang Yu quietly put his phone away, took a deep breath, closed his eyes, and waited silently.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 看着屏幕上母亲发来的消息，张羽默默收起手机，深吸一口气，闭上了眼睛，静静地等待着。

0001.en: After a long while, a number was called from the front.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 良久之后，前方传来一阵叫号声。

0001.en: "Candidate number 989, Zhang Yu."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “989号考生，张羽。”

0001.en: Zhang Yu stood up and walked into the interview room.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 张羽站了起来，走进了面试的教室内。

0001.en: He looked at the three interviewers and gave a polite smile he had practiced for a long time. "Hello, I am Zhang Yu from Dongyang Junior High."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 他看向三位面试官，露出了练习许久的礼貌笑容：“三位好，我是东阳初级中学的张羽。”

0001.en: The interviewer in the middle looked at him and asked flatly, "Why do you want to apply to our school?"
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 中间的面试官望着他，淡淡道：“你为什么要报考我们的学校？”

0001.en: Zhang Yu: "Your school has a long history, a deep cultural background, and rich educational resources. It has produced many outstanding talents for society..."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 张羽：“贵校悠久的历史，深厚的底蕴，丰富的教学资源，一直以来为社会培养出了许多杰出人才……”

0001.en: The interviewer frowned and interrupted him, "Don't give me those empty formalities."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 面试官皱了皱眉，打断道：“别说这些场面话。”

0001.en: Zhang Yu answered honestly, "I want to get into a top university, and Songyang High School has the highest university acceptance rate of all the schools I can apply to."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 张羽老实道：“我想考上名牌大学，嵩阳高中是我能报考的学校中，大学录取率最高的一个。”

0001.en: The interviewer smiled slightly, looked at the documents in his hand, and said, "Hmm, perfect scores in all subjects, first in the entire school? No wonder you were recommended."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 面试官微微一笑，看着手上的资料说道：“嗯，全科满分，全校第一？怪不得被推荐过来。”

0001.en: "Your grades are fine, but if you want to get into Songyang High School, your school exam scores are far from enough."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “你成绩没有问题，但想要进嵩阳高中，光靠校内考试成绩是远远不够的。”

0001.en: He thought for a moment and asked casually, "How long do you sleep every day?"
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 他想了想，随意问道：“你现在每天睡多久？”

0001.en: Zhang Yu: "Five hours."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 张羽：“五个小时。”

0001.en: The interviewer said with surprise, "Five hours?"
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 面试官意外道：“五小时？”

0001.en: "Students at our school, starting from elementary school, sleep for no more than two hours a day on average. And the top graduates from past years almost never sleep at all."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “我们学校的学生从小学开始，每天平均睡眠时长都不超过两个小时。而像历届的优秀毕业生基本上都是不睡觉的。”

0001.en: "You actually sleep for five hours a day? That means you study three hours less than others every day. Over nine years, that's a difference of almost ten thousand hours..."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “你每天竟然要睡五个小时，那就是每天要比别人少学三个小时，九年就差了近一万个小时……”

0001.en: Zhang Yu was stunned. He never thought that even though he considered himself very hardworking, there was still such a huge gap between him and others.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 张羽微微一愣，没想到本以为已经非常努力的自己，在努力上竟然还和他人有这么大的差距。

0001.en: Zhang Yu quickly said, "I will work hard to catch up with them."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 张羽连忙说道：“我会努力追赶上他们的。”

0001.en: The interviewer on the left asked, "How much of the high school curriculum have you studied?"
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 左边的面试官问道：“高中课程你学了多少？”

0001.en: Zhang Yu calmed down a little and said confidently, "I've already self-studied the entire first year of high school curriculum."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 张羽稍稍镇定下来，自信道：“我已经自学完了高一课程。”

0001.en: The person frowned slightly. "Only the first year? Don't you know that we assume all students have already finished the entire high school curriculum before they even start classes here?"
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 对方眉头微皱：“才高一？你不知道我们这上课的时候都默认学生已经学完了高中课程的吗？”

0001.en: Zhang Yu was shocked to hear this. This was more information he didn't know, and what he thought was an advantage had turned into a disadvantage in an instant.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 张羽闻言一呆，这又是他所不知道的情报，本以为的优势转眼成了劣势。

0001.en: Just as he was at a loss, the middle interviewer asked the next question.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 就在他不知所措时，中间的面试官又问出了下一个问题。

0001.en: "To improve learning efficiency and prevent early romance, our school requires all students to undergo a sterilization surgery to remove the relevant organs before enrollment, so they can focus on cultivation."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “本校为了提升学习效率，防止早恋，要求所有学生在入学前要完成把相关器官摘除的绝育手术，从此专心修行。”

0001.en: "Did you know about this?"
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “这个你知道吗？”

0001.en: Finally hearing something he knew, he quickly replied, "My family is already preparing for it. I will definitely complete the sterilization surgery before school starts to keep my hormone levels at the most suitable level for studying."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 终于听到一个自己知道的事，他连忙回道：“家里已经在准备了，开学之前我一定会完成绝育手术，将激素水平保持在最适宜上学的水平。”

0001.en: The interviewer nodded without comment. "Alright, that's all for today's interview. You can go out now."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 面试官不置可否地点了点头：“行了，今天的面试结束了，你先出去吧。”

0001.en: Zhang Yu walked out of the classroom, feeling uneasy. He felt that his interview had been shorter than the other students'.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 张羽惴惴不安地走出了教室，他感觉自己的面试时间似乎要短于其他学生。

0001.en: After he left, the middle interviewer shook his head. "He hasn't even been sterilized in junior high. This child's determination for the Dao is not strong enough."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 而在他走后，中间的面试官摇了摇头：“初中了都还没绝育，此子向道之心不够坚定啊。”

0001.en: The female interviewer on the side smiled. "It looks like he came here knowing nothing. He doesn't have any of the required test reports or extracurricular exam results. I can only say the quality of recommended students from these ordinary junior highs is getting worse every year. If it weren't for the support policy, he wouldn't even be qualified to see us."
0001.speaker: 女面试官
0001.cn: 一旁的女面试官笑了笑：“我看他什么都不知道就来了，该有的测试报告和课外考试成绩一个也没有，只能说下面这些普通初中的推荐生质量是一年不如一年，要不是有扶持政策，哪有资格见我们。”

0001.en: The middle interviewer nodded. "Sigh, I thought the poor would be more hardworking. Perhaps I expected too much of them."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 中间的面试官点了点头：“唉，我本以为穷人会更努力一点，也许是我对他们期望过高了。”

0001.en: "Let's put him on the waiting list for now."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “这个就暂时备选吧。”

0001.en: With that, he tossed Zhang Yu's resume into the wastebasket next to him, where it was squeezed in with hundreds of other resumes on the waiting list.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 说罢，他便将张羽的简历扔进了一旁的纸篓里，和另外几百份备选简历挤在了一起。

0001.en: Although Zhang Yu felt his interview hadn't gone well, he didn't have extra time to think about it. He had already started preparing for one interview after another, visiting many different high schools.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 虽然张羽感觉自己的这趟面试似乎不太成功，但没有多余的时间给他思考这些，他已经开始准备起了一趟又一趟的面试，来到了一个个不同的高中。

0001.en: "Student Zhang Yu, we understand that your family's financial situation may not be enough to afford the tuition here. However, we offer a preferential loan service for students from poor families. You just need to be willing to mortgage some of your unimportant organs..."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “张羽同学，我们了解到你的家庭情况恐怕不足以负担这边的学费。不过我们为贫困生提供了优惠的贷款服务，只要你愿意抵押一些不重要的器官就行……”

0001.en: "Don't worry, you've come to the right place. We know you are male, and although our school is an all-girls school, we never discriminate against males. As long as you complete gender reassignment surgery, not only can you enroll, but you will also be considered a promising student with a strong Dao Heart and have the opportunity to enter the key class to study the art of Yuan Yin Qi Refining..."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “放心，你没来错地方，我们知道你是男的，而我校虽是女校，但从来不歧视男性，只要你完成了性别转换手术，不但能够入学，更是会被认为道心坚毅的种子学生，有机会进入重点班学习元阴炼气之术……”

0001.en: "It's a pity, you're just a little short of our admission standard. However, to help poor students this year, we have introduced a special talent policy. If you are willing to give up your physical body, you can study in the principal's Myriad Soul Banner as a soul cultivation talent..."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “可惜了，你距离我们的入学标准还是差上了一点点。不过今年为了照顾贫困学生，我们推出了一个特长生政策。你如果愿意放弃肉身的话，可以凭借魂修特长生的身份，在校长的万魂幡里学习……”

0001.en: "Student, you've come to the right place. This is the most suitable high school for a common genius like you."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: “同学，你算是来对地方了，我们这就是最适合你这种平民天才的高中。

0001.en: "Let me introduce the benefits here. We add intelligence-promoting agents to the drinking water to ensure that students maintain a level-five state of concentration at all times."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 我来给你介绍介绍这里的福利吧，我们在饮用水中添加了促智剂，保证学生时刻维持在五级专注状态。

0001.en: "Every day, the head teacher will give you more than 900 grams of supplements specially for bull demons, ensuring your cultivation effect is more than ten times the original."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 每天班主任会发给你们900克以上牛妖专用的补剂，保证你们的修炼效果是原先的十倍以上。

0001.en: "Even the air circulation system is filled with nerve-stimulating fillers, so you no longer need to sleep, and all of this is free."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 就连空气循环系统中也充斥着神经兴奋填充剂，让你再也无需睡眠，而这些全都是免费的。

0001.en: "Of course, to withstand these performance-enhancing supplements, you must undergo modifications at our designated hospital."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 当然，想要承受这些功能增强补充药剂，你必须在我们指定的医院完成改造。

0001.en: "Don't worry, you just need to implant some small magical artifacts to enhance your metabolic capacity. Here is the specific price list..."
0001.speaker: 面试官
0001.cn: 放心，只要植入一些小小的法器来提升你的代谢能力，这是具体价目表……”

0001.en: One interview after another, one question after another.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 一次次的面试，一个又一个的问题。

0001.en: Either the requirements were impossibly high, leaving him with no hope.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 要么是高不可攀，让他完全看不到希望的门槛。

0001.en: Or the contracts were full of traps, making him feel like he would be swallowed whole.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 要么就是陷阱重重，让他感觉自己会被一口吞下的合同。

0001.en: All of this made Zhang Yu feel like he was suffocating under the pressure.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 这一切一切都让张羽感觉自己被压得喘不过气来。

0001.en: At this moment, he suddenly realized that despite being first in his school in a suburban junior high, he was worlds apart from the students in the city center.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 此刻的他骤然发现，在郊区普通初中有着全校第一成绩的他，和市中心的那些学生们比起来便早已经有了天壤之别。

0001.en: Even now, he only knew the tip of the iceberg about how large the gap between them really was.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 甚至直到此刻，他连双方的具体差距有多大……也只知道了冰山一角。

0001.en: All his years of hard study seemed like a joke.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 过去这些年的努力学习似乎都成了笑话。

0001.en: In the end, he was no different from his classmates who didn't study; he couldn't get into high school either.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 到头来他和那些不学无术的同学们并没有差别，同样也上不了高中。

0001.en: Back at home, Zhang Yu sat silently like a stone statue.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 回到家中，张羽如一尊石像般默默坐着。

0001.en: The phone on the table vibrated again and again.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 桌上的手机连连震动了起来。

0001.en: Mother: How was the interview this time?
0001.speaker: 母亲
0001.cn: 母亲：这次面试怎么样？

0001.en: Mother: I have to work overtime today. Remember to heat up the food in the fridge for yourself.
0001.speaker: 母亲
0001.cn: 母亲：今天要加班，冰箱里的饭菜你记得自己热了吃。

0001.en: A moment later, the phone vibrated again.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 片刻后，手机又震动了一下。

0001.en: Mother: Son, don't worry. Whether you choose sterilization or a sex change, Mom will definitely get the money for the surgery for you.
0001.speaker: 母亲
0001.cn: 母亲：儿子，你不要担心，不论你选绝育还是变性，手术的钱妈妈一定会帮你凑齐的。

0001.en: But Zhang Yu didn't look at the vibrating phone. He just stared blankly at the ceiling, trying to think about the future, but his mind felt empty, unable to squeeze out a single thought.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 但张羽并没有去看震动的手机，他只是呆呆地望着天花板，想要思考关于未来的事情，却又感觉到脑袋里像是空空如也，什么都挤不出来。

0001.en: Just then, the phone began to vibrate violently again.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 就在这时，手机再次剧烈震动了起来。

0001.en: Zhang Yu didn't want to answer it at first, but after the phone vibrated for over a minute, he couldn't help but pick it up, only to find that the other party had already hung up.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 张羽原本不想理会，但在手机足足震动了一分多钟后，他终于忍不住地将之拿了起来，却发现对方已经挂了电话。

0001.en: Then he received a message from them: Your five thousand reserve fund is ready and can be in your account in just ten seconds...
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 接着他收到了一条对方发来的消息：您的五千后备金已准备完毕，只需十秒即可到账……

0001.en: "A loan advertisement?"
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “小贷广告吗？”

0001.en: "Hmph."
0001.speaker: 张羽

0001.en: Zhang Yu thought that his interview information had probably been sold by one of the schools.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 张羽心想自己的面试资料恐怕是被哪个学校给卖了。

0001.en: But after putting the phone down for a moment, he picked it up again and reopened the message.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 但放下手机片刻之后，他又拿了起来，重新点开了那条消息。

0001.en: That night, when his mother came home from working overtime, she found that the once deathly pale Zhang Yu seemed to have recovered and was sitting at the desk reading a book.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 当天夜里，母亲加班回来之后，便发现原本面如死灰的张羽看上去似乎已恢复了过来，正端坐于桌前看书。

0001.en: "Mom, don't worry. I won't be defeated so easily."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “妈，你放心，我不会这么容易被打倒的。”

0001.en: "If I can't do it this year, I'll try again next year. I will definitely cultivate."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “今年不行，我就明年再考，我一定会修仙的。”

0001.en: "I'll go find a cram school tomorrow. I'm going to make up for everything I'm lacking, one by one."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “明天我就去找补习班，我要把我缺的东西一个个补上。”

0001.en: The next morning, Zhang Yu rushed out, and when he returned that night, his face was full of joy.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 第二天一大早，张羽就赶了出去，当天晚上回来时已是一脸喜色。

0001.en: "Mom, I found a cultivation cram school. The teachers there are all from top high schools. Studying with them, I'll definitely get into a good high school."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “妈，我找了一家仙道补习班，那里的老师都是从重点高中请来的，跟着他们学一定能考上高中。”

0001.en: "Don't worry about the tuition. They think I've had good grades since I was little and know my family isn't wealthy, so they've temporarily waived my tuition. As long as I can get into Songyang High School next year, I won't have to pay it back. It will be like an advertisement for them."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “学费的事情你不用担心，人家觉得我从小成绩就好，又知道我家庭不富裕，就暂时给我免了学费，只要我明年能进嵩阳高中，这学费就不用还了，就当是帮他们做广告了。”

0001.en: "Don't worry, they are a big company. They won't trick me."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “你放心吧，人家是大公司，不会骗人的。”

0001.en: His mother watched as Zhang Yu left for the cram school before dawn every day and studied until two or three in the morning after returning home late at night.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 母亲看着张羽每天天不亮就出门上补习班，每天深夜回到家后还要学到两三点钟。

0001.en: Seeing him constantly bring back textbooks for the second and third years of high school in subjects like language, math, and physics, and seeing his plan to finish all the general courses besides cultivation in one year, she felt gratified by her son's ambition.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 看着他不断带回来的高二高三的语文、数学、物理等等教材，看着他打算要在一年里把高中这些除了仙道之外的所有通识课程学完，她就为儿子的上进感到欣慰。

0001.en: But when she saw the boxes of medicine he brought back, a trace of doubt still arose in her heart.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 但当她看到那一盒盒拿回来的药品时，心中还是涌起了一丝疑惑。

0001.en: Zhang Yu explained with a smile, "Mom, since I was little, I've studied ten thousand hours less than those top students. If I don't work harder, I'll only fall further and further behind them."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 张羽笑着解释道：“妈，从小到大，我已经比那些学霸少学了一万个小时，再不努力的话只会被他们越甩越远。”

0001.en: "These nerve-stimulating fillers allow me to sleep only half an hour a day and improve my learning efficiency, so at least I won't fall further behind the students in the city."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “这些神经兴奋填充剂能让我每天只需要睡半个小时，提高我的学习效率，至少不被市里的那些学生继续拉开距离。”

0001.en: "Don't worry, these medicines don't cost anything."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “你放心，这些药都不花钱。”

0001.en: "The principal of our cram school really values me. He gave me all this medicine."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “我们补习班的校长特别看好我，这些药都是他送我的。”

0001.en: Hearing that the principal had given them to him, his mother was even happier that her son was being appreciated.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 听到是校长送的，母亲更为儿子受到赏识而高兴。

0001.en: Soon, Zhang Yu brought back more things.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 很快张羽就带了更多东西回来。

0001.en: In addition to various high school textbooks and nerve-stimulating fillers, there were also capsules to regulate hormone levels, supplements for demon beasts, and bottles of unlabeled medicinal powder.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 除了各种高中教材，神经兴奋填充剂之外，还有调节激素水平的胶囊，妖兽专用的补剂，还有一瓶瓶没有包装的药粉。

0001.en: Zhang Yu had many explanations, sometimes saying they were cheap goods bought from a part-time job, sometimes that a classmate gave them to him, and sometimes that they were rewards from the cram school...
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 张羽的解释也很多，有时候说是打工买的便宜货，有时候说是同学送的，有时候说是补习班奖励的……

0001.en: His mother was happy about her son's diligence, and even more pleased with his good relationships and excellent performance at the cram school.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 母亲为儿子的勤奋而开心，更为他在补习班的好人缘和优秀表现而感到高兴。

0001.en: She transferred 1000 yuan to Zhang Yu, telling him to remember to thank his classmates and teachers.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 她转了1000块钱给张羽，让张羽记得要谢谢同学和老师。

0001.en: But gradually, she noticed that Zhang Yu's mood began to change. Sometimes he would be happy before leaving in the morning, but when he came back at night, he would go straight to bed without saying a word.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 但渐渐的，她发现张羽的情绪开始变得不对劲，有时候早上出门前还高高兴兴的，晚上回来就一言不发直接睡觉了。

0001.en: Sometimes he would be eating happily, but after answering a phone call, his brow would furrow, and he couldn't eat another bite.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 有时候刚刚还在开开心心吃饭，接了个电话后就眉头紧锁，一口也吃不下了。

0001.en: She knew it must be the immense pressure of cultivation that was making Zhang Yu so tense.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 她知道一定是修仙的压力太大，让张羽精神紧绷。

0001.en: She could only buy more of his favorite foods and save more money for his tuition, hoping to relieve some of his pressure.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 她只能多买点他爱吃的东西，多为他存一些学费，只希望能帮他减缓一些压力。

0001.en: Gradually, she also noticed that Zhang Yu was particularly protective of his phone. Not only did he almost never part with it, but he also didn't allow anyone to touch it. Whenever he got a call, he would go into the bathroom and close the door to answer it.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 渐渐的，她又发现张羽特别在乎自己的手机，不止是平时几乎手机不离身，更是不准任何人随便碰他的手机，有电话也总是走进厕所关门再接。

0001.en: One time, she saw that his phone was out of battery and took it to charge it, but Zhang Yu got angry and scolded her for it.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 有一次她看到手机没电了拿去充电，竟然都被张羽生气地说了一顿。

0001.en: Understanding his pressure, she never dared to touch Zhang Yu's phone again, for fear of affecting her son's cultivation.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 明白对方的压力大，她便再也不敢碰张羽的手机，生怕影响了儿子修仙。

0001.en: Suddenly one day, Zhang Yu asked her for money for cram school fees, saying that the school had invited a senior who had been accepted into a top university to give a lecture, and this was the money for the senior.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 突然有一天，张羽问她要了补习费，说是补习班请了考上顶尖大学的前辈过来为他们讲课，这是要给前辈的钱。

0001.en: Then there was a recommendation fee for the high school admissions officer.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 然后是给高中招生老师的推荐费。

0001.en: A fee for a spiritual root test at the hospital.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 给医院的灵根检测费。

0001.en: And he needed to buy a civilian-grade children's flying sword with his cram school classmates.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 还有要和补习班的同学一起购买民用级的儿童飞剑。

0001.en: From two or three thousand to seven or eight thousand... the last time, he asked her to transfer twenty thousand yuan directly, saying it was the fee for renting a heavenly spiritual root.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 从两三千到七八千……最后一次让她直接打了两万块钱，张羽说是租借天灵根的费用。

0001.en: But good news finally came: Zhang Yu had successfully been admitted to Songyang High School.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 但好消息终于传来，张羽成功考进嵩阳高中了。

0001.en: His mother was overjoyed. She was proud of her son's hard work and talent and readily agreed to all of Zhang Yu's subsequent requests for tuition, miscellaneous fees, and medicine costs.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 母亲感到欣喜无比，她对儿子的努力和天赋感到自豪，对接下来张羽说的学费、学杂费、药剂费等等也都一口答应下来。

0001.en: But after school started, Zhang Yu began asking for more and more money, and the family's income could no longer cover the expenses.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 但开学以后，张羽开口要的钱越来越多，家中逐渐入不敷出。

0001.en: Finally, one afternoon, listening to the voice on the other end of the phone, her heart trembled.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 终于在某一天下午，听着电话另一头的声音，母亲心中一颤。

0001.en: "Hello? Is this Zhang Yu's mother?"
0001.speaker: 催债人
0001.cn: “喂？请问是张羽的母亲吗？”

0001.en: "Do you know that your son's loan is already 30 days overdue..."
0001.speaker: 催债人
0001.cn: “你知不知道你儿子的借款已经逾期30天了……”

0001.en: That night, Zhang Yu confessed everything to his mother.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 当天夜里，张羽向母亲坦白了一切。

0001.en: For the past year, the various expenses for his studies were not free, appreciated, or gifted as he had claimed... all the money came from loans he had taken out from major platforms.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 过去一年多来，在学习过程中的种种花费并没有他嘴上说的那些免费、赏识、馈赠……钱全都来自于他从各大平台的借贷。

0001.en: "Mom, I'm sorry."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “妈，对不起。”

0001.en: "But I really want to cultivate."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “但我真的想修仙啊。”

0001.en: "Even if I have to be in debt for the rest of my life, I want to cultivate..."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “哪怕欠上一辈子还不上欠债，我也想修仙……”

0001.en: After hearing all this, his mother silently sold all the valuable things in the house and then borrowed more money to pay off Zhang Yu's debts.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 听完这一切，母亲默默卖掉了家中所有值钱的东西，然后再借贷一部分钱为张羽还债。

0001.en: She thought that her son would be able to focus on cultivation after this.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 本以为接下来儿子能够安心修仙。

0001.en: But she soon discovered her son had new overdue loans.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 但她却很快又发现了儿子新的贷款逾期。

0001.en: Repay the loan... take out a loan... repay the loan... take out a loan...
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 还贷……借贷……还贷……借贷……

0001.en: His mother finally couldn't help but persuade Zhang Yu to spend less money.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 母亲终于忍不住劝说张羽少花点钱。

0001.en: "Mom, I can't stop this medicine. If I stop, my Dao Heart will regress, and all my previous efforts will be wasted..."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “妈，这个药不能停，停药后道心会倒退的，我就前功尽弃了……”

0001.en: "I have to rent the heavenly spiritual root. Without it, my mana can't keep up..."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “天灵根一定要租的，没有天灵根我法力跟不上……”

0001.en: "This cram school VIP card needs to be topped up, otherwise I won't be able to understand the techniques the school teacher talks about in class..."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “这张补习班的VIP卡要充钱了，不然我听不懂学校老师课上讲的功法……”

0001.en: Advanced cultivation technology allowed mortals without spiritual roots to walk the path of an immortal, but the price was to regularly undergo the most expensive learning and maintenance to continue on that path.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 发达的仙道技术让没有灵根的凡人也能踏上仙路，但代价则是定期进行最昂贵的学习和维护才能持续走下去。

0001.en: In the blink of an eye, three months of school had passed. Seeing the growing debt, to the point where they could no longer afford rent, water, and electricity... it all felt like a never-ending nightmare, and his mother could no longer bear it.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 转眼开学三个月的时间过去，看着欠债越来越多，到现在连家里的房租、水电都已经无力负担……这一切一切都好像是一场永无止境的噩梦，母亲终于再也无法承受了。

0001.en: So, when Zhang Yu came home from school another day, he never saw his mother again.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 于是当又一天放学回家时，张羽再也没有看到母亲的身影。

0001.en: He sat stunned for a long time after reading his mother's note, and finally walked silently up to the rooftop.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 他看了母亲的留言后呆坐良久，最终默默走上了天台。

0001.en: On the rooftop of the rental apartment.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 出租房的天台上。

0001.en: A sharp pain shot through the man's mind, gradually waking his chaotic consciousness from the darkness.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 一阵剧痛从男人的脑海中传来，将他那混沌的意识从黑暗中渐渐唤醒。

0001.en: He opened his eyes and looked forward, seeing a street not far away, bustling with people and overflowing with sewage.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 他睁开眼向前望去，便看前方不远处那一条人来人往，污水横流的街道。

0001.en: On both sides of the street, various advertising signs flickered with neon lights. Looking up, he saw dark buildings crowded together, as if trying to cover the entire sky.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 街道两侧闪烁着霓虹光芒的各色广告招牌，再往上看去则是一座座黑漆漆的楼房挤在一起，像是要将整片天空遮蔽。

0001.en: And the building under his feet was a dilapidated apartment. A video of a financial advertisement was being projected onto its mottled red brick wall, in which high-flying immortals were jointly recommending a cultivation loan with thirty days interest-free for new users.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 而脚下的楼房则是一处破旧的公寓，那斑驳的红砖墙上还在投影着理财广告的视频，广告中是一位位飞天遁地的仙人正一同推荐着新用户三十天免息的修仙贷。

0001.en: "Wasn't I just playing Black Myth: Wukong?"
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “我不是在玩黑吗喽吗？”

0001.en: "Where is this?"
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “这是哪？”

0001.en: Just as he was wondering what was going on, he turned his head and found that the rooftop was filled with candles.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 正想着怎么回事的时候，转过头的他就发现天台上摆满了蜡烛。

0001.en: Rows of candles flickering with a scarlet glow surrounded him and a worn-out doll.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 闪烁着猩红火光的一排排蜡烛，正环绕着他和一具破旧娃娃。

0001.en: It was a cloth doll with yellowed, faded fabric and crooked stitches, looking as if it could fall apart at any moment.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 那是一个布料泛黄褪色，缝线歪歪扭扭，仿佛随时会裂开的布娃娃。

0001.en: The strange scene seemed to stimulate his brain, causing fragmented memories to tumble and leap through his mind.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 诡异的场景似乎刺激到了他的大脑，让一股股破碎的记忆不断在他的脑海中来回翻滚跳跃。

0001.en: "This isn't China anymore... I've been sent to another world?"
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “这不是中国了……给我干到异世界来了？”

0001.en: He found it hard to accept that he had traveled to another world.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 他有些难以接受穿越的事情。

0001.en: But the real memories of cultivation technology in his head kept冲击ing his consciousness, merging him with the original body while constantly reminding him that he was now in another world.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 但脑袋里那些关于仙道技术的真实记忆却不断冲击着他的意识，让他与原身逐渐融合的同时，更不断提醒着他眼前已是另一个世界。

0001.en: This was Kunxu, a super-structure built like a pyramid on the earth, with thirty-six floors above ground and eighteen floors below.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 这里便是昆墟，以类似金字塔形矗立在大地上的超级建筑，共有地上三十六层以及地下十八层。

0001.en: Starting from the largest, continent-sized first floor, each floor was a new world.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 从面积最大，宛如一片大陆的第一层开始，每一层便都是一方新天地。

0001.en: As for what the world outside of Kunxu was like, Zhang Yu had no answer in his head.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 至于昆墟之外的世界是什么样子，张羽的脑袋里并没有答案。

0001.en: He only knew that within Kunxu, it was a world where the major cultivation sects were supreme.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 他只知道昆墟之内，是一个以仙道各大宗门为尊的世界。

0001.en: The major sects were high and mighty, and they had a near-monopoly on all industries such as food, energy, transportation, education, research, medicine, finance, and the internet. In front of the sect's law enforcement teams, the government and army were more like security guards.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 大宗门高高在上，也几乎垄断了粮食、能源、交通、教育、科研、医疗、金融、互联网等等各行各业，政府军队在宗门执法队前更像是看门的保安。

0001.en: But ordinary people could not enjoy most of the benefits brought by cultivation technology and were instead busy making a living every day.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 但普通人无福享受仙道技术带来的大部分福利，反而每日忙于生计之中。

0001.en: And he was a high school student named Zhang Yu, living on the first floor of Kunxu, who had recently been obsessed with some strange ritual...
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 而他便是生活在昆墟第一层，一名考进嵩阳高中名叫张羽的高中生，最近正沉迷于某种古怪仪式……

0001.en: "I have now become the Zhang Yu of another world."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “现在的我，已经成了另一个世界的张羽。”

0001.en: Just then, a sharp pain came from his palm, waking Zhang Yu from the shock of his memories.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 就在这时，一阵刺痛从掌心传来，将沉浸在记忆冲击中的张羽唤醒。

0001.en: He looked down and saw a transparent symbol appear in his palm, which was slowly turning black at an extremely slow speed.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 他低头望去，便看到一个透明符号出现在掌中，并在以一种极为缓慢的速度渐渐变黑。

0001.en: "What is this thing?"
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “这又是什么东西？”

0001.en: As the night wind blew, the surrounding scarlet candlelight flickered.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 伴随着夜风吹过，四周围的猩红烛光一阵摇曳。

0001.en: And the worn-out doll on the ground stared at him with empty eyes made of black buttons.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 而地上那具破旧娃娃瞪着一双黑色纽扣组成的空洞眼眸，正直挺挺地看向他。

0001.en: He wanted to remember what had happened, but the more he thought, the dizzier and more pained his head became.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 他想要回忆到底是怎么回事，但越想脑袋就越疼越晕。

0001.en: The atmosphere in the air became more and more gloomy and strange. Zhang Yu clutched his still-dizzy head, feeling the world spin around him.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 空气中的气氛越发阴森诡异，张羽捂着还在眩晕的脑袋，只觉得周围一片天旋地转。

0001.en: When he came to his senses, he found that he had dazedly left the rooftop and walked step by step back to his front door.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 当他回过神来时，便发现自己已经迷迷糊糊地离开了天台，一步步回到自己家门前。

0001.en: He glanced at the rent collection notice, stepped through the door, and all that greeted his eyes was a bed and a table.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 扫了一眼催缴房租的单子，跨入房门，映入张羽眼帘的只有一张床和一张桌子。

0001.en: "Is this my home?"
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “这就是我家吗？”

0001.en: Feeling his sticky skin soaked with sweat and the incredibly stuffy environment, Zhang Yu wanted to find the air conditioner remote, but then he remembered that there was no air conditioner in this house at all.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 感受自己被汗水浸透的黏腻皮肤，还有周围那无比闷热的环境，张羽想要找空调遥控器，却想起来这房子里根本没空调。

0001.en: He wanted to take a shower, but found that the water had been shut off.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 他又想要冲一冲水，却发现水已经给停了。

0001.en: Zhang Yu sat down on the bed, feeling helpless.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 张羽有些无奈地坐倒在床上。

0001.en: "What a dump."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “什么破地方。”

0001.en: "So what if there are real immortals? This life is worse than in a world without them."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “真有仙人又怎么样？这日子过得还不如没有仙人的世界。”

0001.en: Zhang Yu's gaze swept across the wall and found that the wall behind the desk was covered with award certificates from his childhood.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 张羽目光扫过墙面，发现桌子后面的墙壁上贴满了从小到大的奖状。

0001.en: First grade, second grade, third grade... all the way to the third year of junior high, the original Zhang Yu was almost always number one in his grade.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 一年级、二年级、三年级……一直到初三，原来的张羽几乎每年都是年级第一。

0001.en: Looking at these awards, various memories of receiving them flooded his mind: "The original Zhang Yu was a diligent and hardworking student who had excellent grades since he was a child."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 看着这些奖状，各种领奖的记忆也从张羽脑海中涌出：“原先的张羽是个勤学刻苦，从小就成绩优秀的学生。”

0001.en: "The Songyang High School I'm currently attending is also a key high school in the city."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “现在就读的嵩阳高中也是市里的重点高中。”

0001.en: "I'm a top student."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “老子是学霸啊。”

0001.en: Recalling the knowledge in his mind, Zhang Yu's eyes gradually brightened: "If I get into a top university, I can reach Foundation Establishment. If I join a major sect, I can form a golden core. I can also climb higher in Kunxu, leave this slum, and enjoy more of the benefits of cultivation technology. Living a few hundred more years won't be a problem then."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 回忆着脑海中的知识，张羽目光渐渐亮了起来：“考上名牌大学就能筑基，加入大宗门就能结丹，还能在昆墟往上爬，离开这个贫民窟，享受更多仙道技术的福利，到时候多活个几百年也没问题。”

0001.en: Thinking of this, Zhang Yu suddenly felt that coming to this world seemed to be a good thing after all.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 想到这里，张羽突然觉得来到这个世界似乎也是个不错的事情。

0001.en: Just as he was thinking this, his phone suddenly rang.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 就在他这么想着的时候，手机铃声突然响了起来。

0001.en: "Hello?"
0001.speaker: 张羽

0001.en: "Hello, Mr. Zhang Yu, your loan on our platform is already 3 days overdue..."
0001.speaker: 催债人
0001.cn: “张羽先生你好，您在我们平台的借款已经逾期3天了……”

0001.en: After hanging up, Zhang Yu scrolled through his text messages and found a dense collection of payment reminder messages, all overdue notices from the original body's loans on various platforms.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 挂了电话，张羽翻动着手机中的短信箱，便发现了密密麻麻的催款短信，都是原身在各大平台借贷逾期后的催缴。

0001.en: At the same time, related memories flooded his mind.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 与此同时，脑海中的相关记忆也涌了出来。

0001.en: "This guy started borrowing money for cram school before he even got into high school. After getting into Songyang High School, in order to keep up with everyone's grades, he had a bright idea and started borrowing more to pay off old loans to improve his grades, borrowing money from everywhere to take medicine and attend cram schools, forcibly stimulating his potential. In the end, not only did he borrow more and more money, but his potential was also gradually exhausted."
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: “这家伙进高中之前就开始借贷补课了，进嵩阳高中后为了跟上大家的成绩，于是他又灵机一动，开始为了提升成绩以贷养贷，四处借钱吃药补课，强行激发潜力，最终不但钱越借越多，潜力也被渐渐榨干。”

0001.en: "This guy is a fake cultivation genius, propped up by loans."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “这逼养的是一个靠着平台借贷伪装的修仙天才。”

0001.en: "Even his mom couldn't stand him and finally left him."
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: “甚至他妈都受不了他，最后一走了之了。”

0001.en: Calculating the total overdue loans, cold sweat immediately broke out on Zhang Yu's forehead.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 算了算一共逾期的借贷，张羽额头上立刻不断有冷汗冒了出来。

0001.en: It was because he discovered that with the interest rolling over, Zhang Yu already owed various platforms a total of more than seven hundred thousand yuan.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 只因为他发现利滚利下来，张羽已经欠了各大平台总共七十多万的钱。

0001.en: And looking at his account, he only had a little over fifty yuan left.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 而再看了看自己的账户，总共只剩下五十多块钱了。

0001.en: "I actually owe seven hundred thousand... Damn it!"
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “竟然欠了七十万……靠！”

0001.en: Zhang Yu slammed his fist on the bed and said angrily, "In this world... even for a top student graduating from high school, this is a huge debt."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: 张羽猛地一拳捶在床上，怒道：“这个世界里……就算对高中毕业的天之骄子来说，这也是一笔巨债啊。”

0001.en: "No wonder this guy was obsessed with some weird ritual... He's a hopeless loan addict."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “怪不得这家伙沉迷什么乱七八糟的仪式……这就是个人生无望的借贷狗。”

0001.en: "He had his fun, and now I'm the one who has to pay his debts?"
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “他自己爽够了，现在我来给他还债？”

0001.en: At the same time, the lights in the room suddenly went out.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 与此同时，房间中的灯光骤然熄灭。

0001.en: After flipping the switch several times and observing the situation of his neighbors, Zhang Yu confirmed one thing... his power had been cut off.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 张羽在反复按了几次开关，又观察了一下其他邻居们的状况后，确定了一件事情……他被断电了。

0001.en: "This stupid place..."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “这破地方……”

0001.en: "It would be great if I could just go back when I wake up tomorrow morning..."
0001.speaker: 张羽
0001.cn: “要是明天一早醒来就回去了，那就好了……”

0001.en: With all sorts of chaotic thoughts swirling in his mind, Zhang Yu eventually fell into a drowsy sleep on the bed.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 脑中翻涌着各种乱七八糟的想法，张羽最终还是在床上昏昏沉沉地睡了过去。

0001.en: And on his palm, the once-transparent symbol was now one-tenth filled with black.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 而他的掌心上，原本透明的符号已被黑色填充了十分之一。

0002.en: Chapter 2: School
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 第2章 学校

0002.en: The ticking of the clock echoed endlessly as Zhang Yu sat in the classroom, seriously working on the exam paper in front of him.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 嘀嗒嘀嗒的时钟声不断响起，教室内的张羽正一脸认真地做着眼前的试卷。

0002.en: But the exam paper seemed endless. No matter how hard he worked or how much he filled in, he could never finish it.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 但试卷就像是无穷无尽一样，不论他如何去做，如何去填，却总也没有完成的那一刻。

0002.en: His seat seemed to move further and further away from his classmates until he could no longer see them, as if he were being swallowed by the darkness behind him.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而他所坐位置也距离同学们越来越远，渐渐已经看不清前方的身影，就像是被身后的黑暗一点点吞没。

0002.en: Cold sweat dripped from his forehead and panic rose in his heart. The hand that had been writing nonstop grew weak and lost its strength.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 冷汗从头上冒了出来，恐慌从心中涌起，不断书写的手掌开始发软，开始用不上力。

0002.en: Just as he fell into a bottomless darkness along with countless books and exam papers, Zhang Yu suddenly woke up in his bed.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 直到他随着无数书本、试卷一同堕入那无底的黑暗之中，张羽才猛地从床上醒了过来。

0002.en: "Was I dreaming?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: “做梦了吗？”

0002.en: "It feels like these are all Zhang Yu's past memories."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: “好像都是些张羽过去的记忆。”

0002.en: He rubbed his head, feeling countless fragmented memories from the original owner of the body rising and falling in his mind.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 他揉了揉脑袋，感觉无数属于原身的破碎记忆在脑海中起起伏伏，变幻不定。

0002.en: Although the current Zhang Yu had control of this body, he hadn't fully integrated the original memories. He had to concentrate to recall many of the details.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 虽然此刻的张羽已经掌握了这具身体，但对于原来的记忆仍旧没有彻底融合，许多细节部分都需要专注去回忆才能想起来。

0002.en: Especially the memories of yesterday's strange ritual. Whenever Zhang Yu tried to think about it, he felt dizzy and couldn't remember what happened at all.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 特别是关于昨天那个诡异仪式的相关记忆，只要张羽稍稍回想便感觉到一阵晕眩，完全想不起来到底发生了什么。

0002.en: He checked his phone and saw it was only five in the morning. He wanted to go back to sleep, but his body wouldn't let him.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 此刻他看了看手机，发现才早上五点，本想倒头接着继续睡觉，却发现这具身体怎么也睡不着了。

0002.en: It was as if waking up at five every day for school had become an instinct for this body.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 就好像每天五点起床上学已经成为了这具身体的一种本能。

0002.en: "Why do I feel a sense of guilt just lying here?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: “怎么感觉继续躺下去有一种负罪感？”

0002.en: Zhang Yu sat up, thinking this was probably an effect of the original owner's memories.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 张羽坐了起来，心想这恐怕是原身记忆带给他的影响了。

0002.en: Feeling his empty stomach, Zhang Yu stood up. "Forget it, I'll just go to school. At least I can get a full meal there."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 摸了摸有些瘪的肚子，张羽干脆站了起来，心中想到：“算了，还是去学校吧，至少能混个饭饱。”

0002.en: He remembered that Songyang High School provided three meals a day, and this month's meal fees were already paid.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 他记得嵩阳高中应该是提供一日三餐的，这个月的伙食费也早就充进卡里了。

0002.en: Now, with a massive debt of 700,000 and only about fifty yuan to his name, he couldn't afford to eat out.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而现在身负70万巨债，浑身上下只有五十多块的他可没钱在外面吃饭了。

0002.en: So he left the stuffy apartment, walked through an alley filled with dirty water, and squeezed onto a bus with a crowd of people.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 于是离开闷热的公寓，穿过满是污水的小巷，张羽跟着一群人挤上了公交车。

0002.en: Packed in a bus filled with the mixed smells of sweat and food, the air conditioning felt useless. Zhang Yu felt like a deformed takeout box being jiggled towards the city center.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 挤在汗臭味、食物味混杂的车厢中，空调开了也像没开一样，张羽只觉得自己就像是一个被挤变形的外卖，正被一颠一颠地运往市中心方向。

0002.en: After an hour and a half and two bus transfers, a sweat-drenched Zhang Yu finally squeezed off the bus.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 花了一个半小时，换了两部车之后，满身是汗的张羽终于挤下公交车。

0002.en: Wiping the sweat from his forehead, Zhang Yu thought, "Why am I a day student, anyway?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 擦了擦头上的汗，张羽心道：“说起来为什么我要走读啊。”

0002.en: "Oh, right. It's because I couldn't afford the dorm fees."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: “哦，想起来了，是因为付不起住宿费。”

0002.en: Unlike the area where Zhang Yu lived, the place he got off was in the city center. All he could see were skyscrapers and clean, wide roads. Even the air felt much fresher.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 和张羽所居住的地方不同，此刻下车的地方位于市区，入目所见都是高楼大厦和干净整洁的宽阔马路，就连空气也清新了许多。

0002.en: The men and women on the streets were mostly well-dressed, looking like urban elites.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而路上行走的男男女女也大多衣冠楚楚，一副都市精英的模样。

0002.en: After a while, he finally reached the school gate and saw the large characters for "Songyang Advanced Cultivation High School" from a distance.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 一路走走停停，终于走到了校门前，张羽老远便看到了门口那嵩阳高级仙道中学的几个大字。

0002.en: On the electronic screen at the school gate, there was a list of the top ten students from all three high school grades for the previous month.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而在校门口的电子屏幕上竟然还有着一串成绩单，将高中三个年级的上月成绩前十都列在了上面。

0002.en: This showed that Songyang High School was a school that placed great importance on academic performance.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 从这其实就能看出嵩阳高中是一所非常重视学生成绩的学校。

0002.en: If Zhang Yu were to summarize it based on his memories, Songyang High School was a place where grades were everything. It was a world where everyone judged others based on their scores.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而若让张羽此刻一边回忆一边来总结的话，那便是嵩阳高中，成绩为尊，这是一个人人都唯成绩论的世界。

0002.en: Studying and taking exams were as natural as breathing here, and almost everyone had an extreme prejudice based on scores.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 学习和考试在这里便和呼吸一样自然，更是几乎人人都有着极端的分数歧视。

0002.en: "Your score is so low, no wonder it takes you so long to queue in the cafeteria." "Your score is so low, you're not qualified to eat at the same table as us." "Top students should definitely insult the underachievers"... This was all considered positive energy on campus.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 什么你分这么低，怪不得你来食堂排队要这么久，你分这么低，你根本没资格和我们在食堂一桌吃饭，什么学霸就是要狠狠侮辱学渣口牙……都属于校园正能量。

0002.en: "This is a world completely obsessed with scores, a hell for underachievers."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: “这完全就是个分数至上的世界，学渣的地狱。”

0002.en: Zhang Yu looked at the screen showing 'First Year, 10th Place: Zhang Yu' and sighed. "Good thing I'm one of the high-scorers."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 张羽张羽看了看电子屏上的‘高一年级总分第10名张羽’，心中叹道：“还好我是分数高的那个。”

0002.en: "Although my ranking might not be well-deserved right now, at least it hasn't been exposed yet. I should still be able to live a decent life at school, right?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: “虽然我这个排名目前看来可能有些名不副实，但至少现在还没被戳穿，那应该还能在学校里过点体面日子吧？”

0002.en: The cafeteria at Songyang High School served breakfast, so Zhang Yu followed his memories there.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 嵩阳高中的食堂是提供早饭的，张羽便也跟随着记忆来到这里。

0002.en: Along the way, he noticed that although there were many students queuing for food, it was completely silent. Almost everyone queued quietly, got their food quietly, and found a seat to eat quietly, like interlocking gears, each step running with precision.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 一路走下来，他便发现食堂里排队吃饭的学生虽然很多，却都安静无比，几乎所有人都默默排队，安静地取餐，静静地找位置吃饭，就像是一个个卡在一起的齿轮，精准地运转每一步。

0002.en: Some students were even reading books while eating, using every minute to study.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 也有些学生吃饭的同时还在拿着书本看书，抓紧每一分钟去学习。

0002.en: After finding a random seat, Zhang Yu had just taken a bite of a meat bun when someone sat down in the empty seat opposite him.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 随便找了个位置坐下去，张羽刚咬了一口肉包，就发现一人在自己面前的空位坐下了。

0002.en: It was a girl with long, dark hair and a pale face.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 这是一名有着乌黑长发，脸庞白皙的少女。

0002.en: Her name appeared in Zhang Yu's mind.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 张羽脑海里浮现出对方的名字。

0002.en: "Bai Zhenzhen."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: “白真真。”

0002.en: "To be precise, the top-ranked student in the first year, Bai Zhenzhen. The woman at the top of the first-year food chain."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: “准确的说是高一总分第一的白真真，位于高一鄙视链顶端的女人。”

0002.en: Looking at the girl drinking porridge in front of him, Zhang Yu wondered, "Is she my friend?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 看着坐在自己面前正在喝粥的少女，张羽心道：“对方和我是朋友？”

0002.en: "Because I'm in the top ten? Is this the so-called 'top student circle'?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: “因为我是年级前十？难道这就是所谓的学霸圈子？”

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen was the kind of person who looked like she was sulking if she wasn't smiling. Even ordinary words from her could sound distant and unapproachable.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 白真真是那种只要不笑出来，就感觉像是在生闷气的人，哪怕普普通通的话语，在她嘴里也能感觉出一种拒人于千里之外的疏离感。

0002.en: Just sitting in front of Zhang Yu without saying a word made him feel as if she had some problem with him.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 就像此刻坐在张羽面前，只要她一句话都不说，便让张羽感觉对方是不是对自己有什么意见。

0002.en: As Zhang Yu was trying to recall his memories of Bai Zhenzhen to figure out their relationship,
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 就在张羽专注回忆着脑袋里和白真真有关的记忆，想要确认双方到底是什么关系的时候。

0002.en: the girl spoke, "After you finish eating, meet me in the small garden. I'll wait for you there."
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 便听少女开口道：“吃完饭到小花园去，我在那里等你。”

0002.en: Watching her leave, a thoughtful look flashed in Zhang Yu's eyes.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 看着对方离去的背影，张羽眼中闪过一丝若有所思。

0002.en: A moment later, after he had eaten his fill, he left the cafeteria and went to the small garden behind the school.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 片刻后，等他吃饱喝足便也抬步离开了食堂，来到了学校后面的小花园。

0002.en: This was a quiet place behind the dormitory building. Since most students were rushing to the academic buildings, there was almost no one around.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 这里是宿舍楼后方的静谧之处，在此刻绝大部分学生都赶去教学楼的情况下，更是几乎看不到人影。

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen was standing in front of a flower bed. Hearing Zhang Yu's footsteps, she turned and walked quickly towards him.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 白真真便站在一处花坛前，一听到张羽的脚步声她就转过身来，快步走到了他的面前。

0002.en: "Dad!"
0002.speaker: 白真真

0002.en: She knelt on the ground with a thud, hugging Zhang Yu's leg. "There were too many people in the cafeteria just now, I was too embarrassed to say it."
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 砰的一声跪倒在地上，白真真抱着张羽的大腿说道：“刚刚食堂人太多，我不好意思说。”

0002.en: "Please lend me some money. My microloan is almost a month overdue! I'm begging you..."
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: “你借点钱给我吧，我小贷逾期快一个月了！我给你跪下……”

0002.en: Witnessing this scene, Zhang Yu cursed inwardly, "What kind of broken school is this? The first and tenth-ranked students are both borrowing money to show off?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 望着眼前这一幕的张羽心中暗骂一声：“这什么破学校啊，年级第一和年级第十都是贷款装逼是吧？”

0002.en: Zhang Yu now remembered. He and Bai Zhenzhen knew each other not because of some top student circle, but because she was his 'upline' who had promoted microloans to him.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而张羽此刻也已经回忆了起来，他和白真真相互认识并非因为什么学霸圈子，而是因为对方是自己上线，给自己推销过小贷。

0002.en: Let me reintroduce her: Bai Zhenzhen, Zhang Yu's classmate and a good buddy who shared information about various lending platforms, bonded by a strong friendship of borrowing money from everywhere.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 再次隆重介绍，张羽的同班同学白真真，和张羽是一起分享各大平台借贷情报的好兄弟，有着一起四处借钱的坚固友谊。

0002.en: Thinking about how she was constantly scheming to borrow money from him behind that cold, poker face in the cafeteria, Zhang Yu shook his head helplessly. "Let go of me first. How could I have money to lend you?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 想到对方刚刚在食堂那冷冰冰的扑克脸下面，是在不断想着如何跟自己借钱，张羽就无奈摇了摇头：“你先给我松开，我哪有钱借给你？”

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen shook her head. "You're only tenth in the grade, how much could you possibly spend? The loans you applied for must be much smaller than mine, right?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真摇头说道：“你才年级第十，能花多少钱？申请的贷款一定比我少的多吧？”

0002.en: Then, she said stiffly and shyly, "As long as you help me pay off my debt, you can do whatever you want."
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 说着，她有些僵硬又羞涩地说道：“只要帮我还了债，你想做什么都行。”

0002.en: Zhang Yu's eyes lit up. Seeing the usually cold Bai Zhenzhen now blushing like a peach blossom, he found her exceptionally charming.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 张羽闻言目光一亮，望着原本冷冰冰的白真真此刻那面若桃花的模样，只觉得别有一番魅力。

0002.en: He looked her up and down and asked, "Really, anything?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 他上上下下看着白真真的身子，问道：“真什么都行？”

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen bit her lip and nodded. "Yes."
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真轻咬嘴唇，点了点头：“嗯。”

0002.en: Zhang Yu: "Can I use you as collateral?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 张羽：“那我能把你抵押了吗？”

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen let go of him and stared. "Yu, are you really broke?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真松开了手，瞪着张羽道：“羽子，你真没钱了？”

0002.en: Zhang Yu showed her his phone's balance and overdue notifications.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 张羽拿出手机亮了亮余额和逾期的信息。

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen stood up, dusted off her pants, and looked at Zhang Yu in disbelief. "You owe seven hundred thousand? Even after graduating from university, you'd have to work for a long time to pay that off."
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真站了起来，拍了拍自己满是尘土的裤腿，然后有些不可思议地看着张羽道：“你欠了七十万？就算是大学毕业以后恐怕也要工作很久才能还完吧。”

0002.en: "You're only in your first year of high school and you're already spending so much?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: “你现在才高一花钱就这么猛？”

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen shook her head repeatedly. "Zhang Yu, how on earth did you spend all that money?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真说到这里连连摇头：“张羽，这钱你到底是怎么花的？”

0002.en: Zhang Yu rubbed his head. "I forgot... Let me think."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 张羽揉了揉脑袋说道：“我忘了……你等我想一想。”

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen looked at him suspiciously. "You didn't invest it in something, did you? Were you scammed?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真疑惑地看着张羽：“你该不会拿去投资了什么东西了吧？你是不是被人骗了？”

0002.en: As Zhang Yu tried to remember, he became uncertain. "Probably... not?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 张羽回忆的同时，也有些不确定起来：“应该……没有吧？”

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen's expression turned serious. The more she thought about it, the more she felt something was wrong with how Zhang Yu spent the 700,000. "Let me see your phone."
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真的表情却是一下子严肃了起来，越想越觉得张羽这七十多万花的有问题：“把你手机给我看看。”

0002.en: Zhang Yu knew she was worried about him. After all, investment, fraud, gambling, sudden death, and cultivation deviation were the top five causes of death in Songyang City, with cultivation deviation ranking fifth.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 张羽明白对方这是在关心他，毕竟投资、诈骗、赌博、猝死和走火入魔，分别是嵩阳市排名前五的死亡原因，其中走火入魔排第五。

0002.en: He also had his own doubts about the original owner of the body, so he handed over his phone. "Good, I also want to review how this money was spent. Let's look at the transactions together."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 而他心中此刻也同样涌起了对原身的疑惑，当即拿出手机来：“正好我也想复盘一下这钱是怎么花的，那就一起看看流水吧。”

0002.en: The two looked at the phone screen, seeing every expense made by the original Zhang Yu.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 两人目光扫过手机屏幕，便看到张羽原身那一笔笔的花费。

0002.en: As Zhang Yu saw these, details of related memories flooded his mind.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而张羽看到这些的同时，许多相关记忆的细节也不断从脑海里涌了出来。

0002.en: Danding Pharmacy
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 丹鼎药房

0002.en: Danding Pharmacy
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 丹鼎药房

0002.en: Time Waits for No One Meditation Room
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 时不待我静室

0002.en: Zhang Yu explained as he looked, "This is when I bought pills from the school pharmacy and then rented a meditation room for breathing exercises..."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 张羽边看边说道：“这是我在学校药房买了丹药，然后租了静室去吐纳……”

0002.en: Besides general courses like language, math, physics, and history, Songyang High School's curriculum included cultivation-related courses.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 嵩阳高中的教学内容除了语文、数学、物理、历史等等通识类课程之外，便是仙道相关的课程。

0002.en: The so-called path of cultivation was the journey from being a human to becoming an immortal step by step. This was the most important part of the high school curriculum, with the highest score weight, and the key to getting into a prestigious university.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而所谓仙道，便是由人一步步成仙的修行之路，这也是整个高中阶段最为重要，分数占比最高的教学内容，更是考入名牌大学的关键项。

0002.en: Breathing exercises were the most basic skill in cultivation. By gathering spiritual energy from the atmosphere through these exercises, a cultivator could accumulate mana in their body.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 吐纳则是仙道最基础的一种技能，通过吐纳汇聚大气中的灵机，方能积攒修仙者体内的法力。

0002.en: Only with enough mana could one achieve greater combat power and reach higher realms. Mana was the foundation for all cultivation techniques.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而只有拥有足够的法力，就能够推动更强的战力，攀登更高的境界，可以说法力是一切仙道技术运转的根基。

0002.en: For example, to break through from the Qi Refining realm to the Foundation Establishment realm, one needed over 60 points of mana. The maximum mana a Qi Refining cultivator could have was 100 points.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 比如炼气境界想要突破到筑基境界，法力上的要求就是60点以上，而炼气境界能够掌握的法力上限则是100点。

0002.en: In the system built by the Ten Great Sects, everything was standardized and digitized as much as possible, even mana. The current mana tests in school were accurate to one decimal place.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 在十大宗门努力建设的体系中，一切都尽力被标准化、数字化，就连法力也是如此，像是目前学校里的法力检测通通都精确到小数点后一位。

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen nodded slightly and continued to scroll.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 白真真微微点头，继续翻看下去。

0002.en: Shuixiu Catering Services Co., Ltd.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 水秀餐饮服务有限公司

0002.en: Zhang Yu said, "This is for nutritional supplementation meals in the cafeteria. It cost quite a bit."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 张羽说道：“这是在食堂进行食补加餐，花的比较多。”

0002.en: In cultivation, physical strength was also crucial. Consuming large amounts of food rich in spiritual energy and cultivation elements was a daily routine for cultivators, known as nutritional supplementation.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 仙道修炼中，肉身的强度同样至关重要，而摄入大量富含灵机和仙道要素的食物，便也是修炼者日常的一环，被称为食补。

0002.en: Longxiang Education Services Co., Ltd.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 龙翔教育服务有限公司

0002.en: Longxiang Education Services Co., Ltd.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 龙翔教育服务有限公司

0002.en: Zhang Yu recalled for a moment and said, "Hmm... this is for the last tutoring session, and the fee for renting a Spiritual Root."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 张羽回忆了一下说道：“嗯……这是上趟的补课费，还有租借灵根的费用。”

0002.en: A Spiritual Root was a special talent that only a few geniuses possessed, greatly increasing a cultivator's training efficiency and combat power.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 灵根本是一种特别的天赋，只有极少数天才拥有，能够让修仙者的修炼效率和战斗力都大大增长。

0002.en: As the most famous barrier to entry in cultivation, even Zhang Yu and his mother in middle school had heard legends about Spiritual Roots. The original Zhang Yu even used renting a Spiritual Root as an excuse to get money from his mother to pay for his tutoring and loans.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 作为曾经仙道最出名的门槛，甚至连过去读初中的张羽和母亲也知道了关于灵根的种种传说，以至于原来的张羽补习还贷的时候，还用租借灵根作为借口让母亲打钱。

0002.en: However, with the advancement of cultivation technology, ordinary people like Zhang Yu who didn't have a Spiritual Root could now pay to rent one to improve their training efficiency.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 不过在如今仙道技术日渐发达之后，像张羽这样没有灵根的普通人便也已经能够花钱租用灵根来提升修炼效率。

0002.en: As they continued scrolling, besides the initial explanations from Zhang Yu, the subsequent expenses were mostly similar, almost all related to cultivation practice.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 继续翻了下去，除了最开始张羽稍作解释之外，后面的花费项目几乎来来回回都是些类似的内容，几乎全都和仙道修行有关。

0002.en: After quickly reviewing Zhang Yu's expenses from the last few months, Bai Zhenzhen looked at him with pity. "You really spent all this money on your own cultivation?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 很快翻了翻完了张羽最近几个月的花费之后，白依依看向张羽的眼中已经充满了怜悯：“你小子还真是实打实花了这么多在自己的仙道修行上？”

0002.en: "And you only managed to get to tenth place after owing over seven hundred thousand?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: “结果欠了七十多万才冲到第十名？”

0002.en: "It's only been three months since school started, right? What are you going to do now?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: “这才开学三个多月吧？你接下来怎么办？”

0002.en: As someone who had just transmigrated to another world a day ago, Zhang Yu was naturally lost about the future. He shrugged and said, "I'll just take it one step at a time and figure something out."
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 作为一个穿越异世界才第一天的人，张羽自然也对前路一片迷茫，此刻耸了耸肩说道：“先混着吧，慢慢想办法。”

0002.en: Seeing it was almost time for class, the two walked towards the academic building while talking.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 看了看时间快上课了，两人一边走向教学楼一边聊。

0002.en: "How come you, who owes over seven hundred thousand, seem more relaxed than me, who owes over two hundred thousand?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: “你这欠了七十多万的怎么比我欠二十多万的人看上去还轻松？”

0002.en: Seeing Zhang Yu's calm expression, Bai Zhenzhen reminded him, "You won't have any money to spend on your studies from now on!"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真看着张羽平静的样子，提醒道：“你接下来可没钱继续砸在学习上了！”

0002.en: "Do you know the consequences of not having money for studying? Do you know how dangerous our situation is right now?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: “你知不知道没钱学习是什么后果吗？知不知道我们现在的情况有多危险？”

0002.en: Zhang Yu: "What consequences?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 张羽：“什么后果？”

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen said, "The monthly exam is in three weeks. For three weeks, you won't have money to rent a Spiritual Root, buy pills, attend tutoring, or even buy your daily supplements... While everyone else is improving every second, it'll be normal for your rank to drop by dozens. Then you'll be kicked out of the demonstration class!"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真说道：“还有三周时间就要月考了，三周时间你没钱租灵根，没钱买丹药，没钱上补习班，就连每天的补剂都没钱买……而其他人每分每秒都在进步，到时候你年级排名跌个几十位都很正常，那就要直接被踢出示范班了！”

0002.en: As Bai Zhenzhen spoke, more related memories flooded Zhang Yu's mind.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 结合白真真说的话，张羽脑海中又有许多相关记忆涌了出来。

0002.en: There were ten classes in the first year, from Class 1 to Class 10, assigned based on monthly exam results.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 整个高一共有十个班级，从一班到十班，按照每月月考的成绩分班。

0002.en: According to his ranking, Zhang Yu was naturally assigned to Class 1, the one with the best resources, also known as the demonstration class.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 按照张羽的排名，自然是被分到了待遇最好的一班，也被称为示范班。

0002.en: And the monthly exam results were not just about the general knowledge tests; the most important factor was the cultivation score.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而每个月月考的成绩除了看常规的通识考试外，最重要的终究是仙道修为的成绩。

0002.en: After all, general education only accounted for 50 points, while the cultivation subjects added up to a total of 650 points.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 毕竟通识教育只占50分，其余的仙道科目加起来则有足足650分。

0002.en: Especially since they were all first-year students who had just started cultivating after school began, their cultivation levels were actually quite similar.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 特别大家都是高一学生，也都是开学以后才正式修仙的，修为方面其实都相差有限。

0002.en: Although he seemed to be in tenth place, if he couldn't maintain his previous rate of progress for the next few weeks, he could easily fall dozens of places.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 虽然他看似是第十名，但若接下来几周都没能保持以前的进步速度，那很容易就会被甩到几十名开外。

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen continued, "If you keep having no money, your ranking will get worse, your treatment will get worse, and in this vicious cycle, you'll be kicked from Class 1 all the way down to Class 10!"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真继续说道：“继续没钱，排名越来越差，待遇越来越低，在这种恶性循环下会一步步从一班被踢到十班！”

0002.en: Her face was grim. "No money, no grades, you'll become flammable trash in the eyes of the teachers, a joke to the demonstration class students, and an object for the cheap self-superiority of the ordinary class nobodies!"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 她满脸凝重道：“没钱没成绩，你会成为老师眼中的可燃垃圾，示范班学生口中的笑话，普通班那些龙套们实现廉价自我优越感的对象！”

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen held her head. "In that situation, forget about cultivation resources, it'll be hard to even maintain a stable Dao Heart. Your grades will only get worse, and you'll eventually fall below the elimination line, kicked out of Songyang High School with injuries and a mountain of debt."
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真抱着脑袋：“这样的情况下别说修炼资源了，道心都难以维持稳定，成绩也只会越来越糟，最终掉入淘汰线，只能带着一身伤病和一屁股欠债，被嵩阳高中一脚踢出学校。”

0002.en: As if seeing that tragic future in her mind, Bai Zhenzhen looked up at the sky and lamented, "Do you want to live at the bottom of the school's food chain, constantly insulted! And eventually become a high school dropout, a piece of social scum?"
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 似乎在脑海中看到了那可悲的未来，白真真仰头看天，哀叹道：“难道你想要活在整个学校鄙视链的底端，被人反复侮辱！最终成为高中肄业的社会渣滓吗？”

0002.en: Zhang Yu's mouth twitched. "So what do you suggest I do?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 张羽闻言扯了扯嘴角：“那你说该怎么办？”

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen was silent for a moment, then turned her head. "Brother, to be honest... spending seven hundred thousand to only get to tenth place, you might really not be suited for cultivation."
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真沉默了片刻，转过头：“兄弟，说句实话……欠七十万才冲到第十名，你可能真的不适合仙道。”

0002.en: "I don't know how you got into Songyang, but my advice is... drop out and go work. Otherwise, I'm afraid you'll only sink deeper."
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: “我不知道你是怎么进嵩阳的，但我的建议是……退学打工去吧，不然我怕你越陷越深。”

0002.en: Zhang Yu didn't respond, but sighed inwardly, "The only good thing about this damn world is that I can cultivate, and on my first day, you're telling me I have no talent for it?"
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 张羽没有回应，心中却是一阵哀叹：“这破世界唯一的好处就是能修仙了，结果才来了一天就告诉我没修仙的天赋？”

0002.en: Shortly after returning to the classroom, Zhang Yu's phone vibrated. He saw that Bai Zhenzhen had transferred him 500 yuan and sent a message.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 回到教室后不久，张羽拿起震动的手机，便发现是白真真给他转账了500块钱，还发了个消息。

0002.en: Bai Zhenzhen: Pay your utility bills first.
0002.speaker: 白真真
0002.cn: 白真真：先把水电费交了吧

0002.en: Zhang Yu was stunned for a moment, then sniffed his clothes and immediately understood that Bai Zhenzhen had smelled that he hadn't showered in days.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 张羽微微一愣，突然闻了闻自己的衣服，立刻明白白真真是闻到了自己身上那几天没洗澡的味道了。

0002.en: Although he had gotten used to the smell, it must have been quite noticeable to others.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 这味道虽然他自己已经习惯，但在旁人闻来应该是比较明显的。

0002.en: Thinking about how she sent him money despite her own poor financial situation, Zhang Yu sighed, typed a long message on his phone, then deleted it all and simply replied: Thanks.
0002.speaker: 张羽
0002.cn: 想到对方的经济状况这么差还给他送了钱，张羽心中叹了口气，用手机打了一大段文字后又统统删掉，最终回道：谢谢。

0002.en: After replying, Zhang Yu looked at his palm and saw that the symbol on it was now half-filled with black.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 回完了手机的张羽看向自己的掌心，发现上面的符号已经被黑色填满了一半。

0002.en: On his way to school and into the classroom, Zhang Yu had realized that only he could see the symbol on his palm.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 这一路来到学校走进教室，张羽已经发现掌心上的这个符号只有他自己看得见。

0002.en: He calculated the time and estimated that the symbol would be completely filled with black by tonight. He just didn't know what would happen when it was full.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 此刻他算了算时间，估计这符号今天晚上就会被黑色给彻底填满，就是不知道填满了以后到底会发生什么。

0003.en: Chapter 3: Physical Education
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 第3章 体育

0003.en: Without much time for reflection, soon after Zhang Yu returned to the classroom, the math teacher, wearing black-rimmed glasses, walked in with a stack of papers.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 没有太多时间去感慨，张羽回到教室后不久，戴着黑框眼镜的数学老师已经带着一叠卷子走了进来。

0003.en: "Today, we're going to go over the test from last time."
0003.speaker: 数学老师
0003.cn: “今天我们讲一下上次做的卷子。”

0003.en: "Pass the papers out."
0003.speaker: 数学老师
0003.cn: “把卷子都发下去。”

0003.en: "Look at your mistakes. How many times have I told you to come ask me if you don't understand something? I sat in my office for three hours yesterday afternoon, and not a single person came to ask me a question..."
0003.speaker: 数学老师
0003.cn: “你们看看错的地方，我跟你们说了多少遍有不懂的就来问我，昨天我下午在办公室坐了三个小时，没一个人来问我问题的……”

0003.en: Just after the math papers were handed out, the tall and sturdy PE teacher came into the classroom, looked at the math teacher, and said, "You're sick."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 就在数学卷子发完不久后，身材高大雄壮的体育老师来到了教室内，看着数学老师说道：“你生病了。”

0003.en: After sending the "sick" math teacher away, the PE teacher, Wang Hai, looked at the students and said, "This class is now PE."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 支走了生病的数学老师后，体育老师王海看着众多学生说道：“这节课改成体育课了。”

0003.en: "But don't forget to review math on your own. General studies are worth fifty points on the college entrance exam, and a single point can make a huge difference."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: “不过数学你们自己回去也别忘了复习，通识课程在高考里也占了五十分，那高考差一分就是差了很多人了。”

0003.en: "Speaking of general studies, I've already talked to your language teacher. The next class will also be PE. Including the originally scheduled one, this entire morning is my PE class."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: “说起通识课，我顺便跟你们说下，下节语文课我也已经跟你们语文老师打过招呼了，也改成体育课。加上原来的体育课，今天整个上午都是我的体育课。”

0003.en: The students followed PE teacher Wang Hai to the indoor training hall. It was as huge as a public square and filled with all kinds of exercise equipment.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 众人跟随体育老师王海来到室内练功场，便看到这练功场好似一个广场般巨大，其中更放满了各式各样的锻炼器械。

0003.en: Wang Hai said, "The Qi Refining realm is the first stage of cultivation. What's important is to build a solid foundation. How solid your foundation is in your first year will determine how high you can reach in your second and third years..."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 王海说道：“练气境作为仙道第一境，重要的是夯实基础，而高一这一年基础打得有多牢固，就决定了你们未来高二高三能达到什么高度……”

0003.en: As he took in these familiar scenes, many detailed memories flooded back into Zhang Yu's mind.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而感受着这些眼熟的场景，众多记忆细节也不断从张羽的脑海中涌出。

0003.en: Since cultivation was organized by the Ten Great Sects, it had long been divided into systematic realms and power levels, covering all aspects of cultivation techniques in vast detail.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 仙道修行自从经过十大宗门的归纳整合之后，如今早已经拥有了系统性的境界和实力划分，其中包罗万象，覆盖了仙道技术的方方面面，可以说是浩如烟海。

0003.en: The most widely known were the ten great realms of cultivation.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 最广为人知的，便是仙道十大境界。

0003.en: The key factors determining which realm a person could reach were their Dao Heart level and Mana level.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而决定一个人能登上哪个仙道境界的关键指标便是道心等级和法力水平。

0003.en: For high school students, only by surpassing level 10 in their Dao Heart and 60 points in Mana could they break through from the Qi Refining realm to the Foundation Establishment realm.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 像是对高中生来说，唯有道心跨越10级门槛，法力超过60点，才能从炼气境界突破到筑基境界。

0003.en: The high school PE class, however, was for tempering the body and forging the will.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而眼前的高中体育课则是为了磨练肉身，锤炼意志。

0003.en: After all, a strong body not only increased the efficiency of mana growth but also greatly helped the strong will required for the Dao Heart level, and it enhanced combat ability in the Qi Refining realm.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 毕竟肉身强大既能增加法力提升的效率，又对道心等级所需的强大意志帮助很大，还能增强炼气境界的实战能力。

0003.en: If Dao Heart and Mana were the foundation of cultivation, then the Physical Strength trained in PE class was the foundation of the foundation.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 如果说道心、法力是仙道的基础，那么体育课上锻炼的肉体强度，便是基础的基础。

0003.en: At the same time, waves of light scanned the students' bodies, displaying their Physical Strength data on a large screen nearby, ranked from high to low.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 与此同时，一阵阵光波扫过了在场众多学生们的身体，将他们的肉体强度数据都显示在了不远处的大屏幕上从高到低排列。

0003.en: 1st Place: Qian Shen, Physical Strength 1.15
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 第1名钱深肉体强度1.15级

0003.en: 2nd Place: Bai Zhenzhen, Physical Strength 1.13
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 第2名白真真肉体强度1.13级

0003.en: 3rd Place: He Dayou, Physical Strength 1.12
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 第3名何大有肉体强度1.12级

0003.en: Zhang Yu had to look down to 19th place to find his own score.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而张羽一直到看到第19位，才找到了自己的分数。

0003.en: 19th Place: Zhang Yu, Physical Strength 0.82
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 第19名张羽肉体强度0.82级

0003.en: With the continuous development of cultivation technology in Kunxu, various data and metrics had become increasingly precise.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 昆墟之中的仙道技术经过不断发展，如今各种数据、指标都越发精细。

0003.en: For instance, Physical Strength was not only quantified but also re-tested every PE class.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 像是肉体强度不但被量化，更是每节体育课都会被重新检测出来。

0003.en: And this metric, like the Dao Heart, could only reach a maximum of level 10 in the Qi Refining realm.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而这个指标和道心一样，在炼气境界最多只能达到10级。

0003.en: Although Physical Strength was not a key metric for breaking through cultivation realms, it affected a cultivator's efficiency and combat power, making it an important foundation. It accounted for 150 points out of the 650 for cultivation subjects.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 虽然肉体强度不是突破仙道境界的关键指标，却关系到修炼者的效率和战力，是仙道的重要基础，在仙道科目的650分中占了150分。

0003.en: "Has my Physical Strength really dropped to 19th place?"
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: “肉体强度已经掉到19名了吗？”

0003.en: Looking at his result, Zhang Yu recalled how his peers had recently been surpassing his progress in Physical Strength.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 张羽看着自己的成绩，脑海中想起了这段时间他的肉体强度的进步幅度不断被周围人超越。

0003.en: At the same time, the surrounding students took out syringes and injected various enhancement supplements into their arms.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 与此同时，周围的同学们纷纷拿出针管扎向自己的胳膊，将各类增强补剂打入自己体内。

0003.en: These supplements from different brands not only strengthened muscles and bones but also boosted training efficiency by several to ten times, making them essential drugs for first-year students.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 这些各种不同牌子的补剂被送入身体之后，不但会提升筋肉、骨骼的强度，更是会提升数倍到十数倍不等的锻炼效率，是高一学生的必备药物。

0003.en: Here, you could skip a day of training, but you couldn't skip a day of injections. Top students often took eight or more shots a day.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 在这里，你可以一天不锻炼，但不能一天不扎针，优秀的学霸更是往往一天八针往上。

0003.en: Zhang Yu saw Bai Zhenzhen nearby give herself a total of nine shots in her bottom, arms, and thighs.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 张羽就看到不远处的白真真一口气分别往屁股、胳膊和大腿上扎了一共九针。

0003.en: However, compared to the many muscular figures around, Bai Zhenzhen looked much smaller. Zhang Yu remembered this was because their physical training focused on different goals, resulting in different body shapes.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 只不过和周围的许多大块头比起来，白真真显得小只许多，张羽记得这是因为双方的肉体锻炼方向不一样，于是塑造的外形也不太一样。

0003.en: Seeing Zhang Yu hesitate to take his injection, the PE teacher Wang Hai frowned and walked over. "Zhang Yu, how many days has it been since you took your functional enhancer?"
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 而一旁的体育老师王海看到张羽迟迟没有扎针的动作，皱着眉头走了过来：“张羽，你几天没扎功能增强剂了？”

0003.en: Zhang Yu didn't dare to say he was out of money. He knew that at Songyang High, being poor was as shameful as having bad grades. He only dared to mention it to close friends like Bai Zhenzhen.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 张羽不敢说自己没钱了，他知道这在嵩阳高中是和成绩差一样丢人的事情，也就只有和白真真这样知根知底的朋友交流时他才敢说出来。

0003.en: Also, fragmented memories told him that his original self had already fainted several times due to taking too many drugs, putting a heavy strain on his organs and cardiovascular system. It was becoming life-threatening.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 其次脑海中那些破碎的记忆告诉他，原身因为打药太猛，内脏、心血管负担沉重，已经晕倒数次，开始危及生命了。

0003.en: So, Zhang Yu gave a vague excuse, "I want to try... without the drugs."
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: 于是便听张羽敷衍道：“我想试试不打药……”

0003.en: Unexpectedly, Wang Hai's frown deepened, and his voice boomed like thunder, "Have you been watching those influencers who can't handle the hardship of taking drugs and promote 'natural' body tempering? That's all a scam. How can you keep up without drugs?"
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 哪知道王海听到这话后眉头皱的更紧，声如雷震般说道：“你是不是又看了那些吃不了打药苦的网红宣传的自然炼体了？那都是骗人的，不打药你怎么跟得上？

0003.en: "Look how many ranks you've dropped! If you keep this up, you'll be kicked out of the demonstration class after the next monthly exam."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: “你看看你都掉了多少名了？再这么下去，你下次月考就要被踢出示范班了。”

0003.en: He looked at him with disappointment, "Am I asking you to take drugs for my own benefit? It's not like I'll get stronger if you take them."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 他一脸恨铁不成钢地说道：“让你打药炼体难道是为我了打的吗？你打药了我又不会涨肉。”

0003.en: Pointing to a student in the distance, he said, "Look at Qian Shen. 12 shots of Dragon-Elephant agent a day to grow his muscles and bones, 2 shots of painkiller to suppress the pain of his body tearing and growing, 2 shots of Gluttony agent to speed up his metabolism and absorption of cultivation elements from food, and he eats fifteen pounds of food a day to gain weight..."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 说着他随手一指，便指向了远处的一名学生：“你看看钱深，一天12针龙象制剂增长筋肉骨骼，2针止痛剂压住肉身撕裂生长之痛，2针饕餮利加快代谢和食物中仙道要素的吸收，每天狂吃十五斤来增重……”

0003.en: "In just three months, his Physical Strength has soared from 0.13 to the current 1.15, making him the strongest physique in the first year. That's worth twenty years of your 'natural' training."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: “短短三个月时间，他肉体强度就从0.13暴涨到现在的1.15级，成为高一最强肉体，顶你自然炼体二十年。”

0003.en: As Wang Hai spoke, Zhang Yu remembered how Qian Shen had transformed from a skinny boy under 170cm three months ago into the nearly two-meter tall, three-hundred-pound giant he was today.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 伴随着王海的诉说，张羽想起了钱深是怎么从三个月前一米70不到的细狗，变成如今身高超两米，体重超三百斤的小巨人。

0003.en: Wang Hai then pointed to another student. "And look at Zhao Tianxing, who used to be worse than you. He broke through 1.00 in Physical Strength the day before yesterday. Now his blood is like lead and mercury, his arteries are hardened like rubber, and his heart has tripled in size..."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 王海接着又一指另一学生：“你再看以前还不如你的赵天行，前天也肉体强度突破1.00级，现在真正血如铅汞，动脉胶硬化，心脏暴涨了三倍大小……”

0003.en: After pointing out a few more students, Wang Hai sighed, "Zhang Yu, I'm only telling you all this because your Physical Strength used to be in the top ten. You have good talent and exceptional drug tolerance..."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 就这么随便指了一圈学生，王海叹道：“张羽，我是看你以前肉体强度能排进前十，天赋不差，耐药性过人，这才跟你说这么多……”

0003.en: Seeing Wang Hai's earnest expression, Zhang Yu could feel his concern. But whether it was due to lack of money or fear of death, he was unwilling to take any more drugs.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 看着王海苦口婆心的模样，张羽也感受到了对方的关心，但不论是没钱还是怕死，都让他现在不愿意扎药了。

0003.en: Just as he was wondering how to explain, Wang Hai pulled a box of medicine from his bag. "As they say, three parts training, seven parts eating, and the other ninety parts depend on your injections."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 正当他想着接下来该怎么和对方解释的时候，便见王海把一盒药剂从一旁的包里掏了出来：“所谓三分练，七分吃，剩下九十分都看你怎么扎药。”

0003.en: "This is the new Divine Elephant Power functional enhancer from the Jingang Sect. Quality guaranteed from a major sect. One shot is as good as ten."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: “这是金刚宗最新推出来的神象力功能增强剂，大宗门质量有保障，一针顶十针。”

0003.en: "To be honest, this stuff is still in the lab. I got it from a good friend. Seeing your talent, I'll sell it to you at a 20% discount. Ten vials for 8800..."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: “我实话跟你说，这东西原本还在实验室里，是我从一个好兄弟手里拿来的，看你天赋不错，现在我打八折卖给你，十瓶算你8800……”

0003.en: Seeing Wang Hai trying to sell him drugs, Zhang Yu now fully remembered that more than half of the body enhancement supplements the students took were bought from Wang Hai.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 看着王海向自己推销药品的模样，张羽此刻也完全想了起来，班里这些学生吃的打的各种肉身增强补剂，有一半以上都是从王海这边买来的。

0003.en: This was a normal phenomenon at Songyang High. After all, pharmacology and physical training went hand in hand. Every PE teacher was not only an excellent body tempering expert but also an excellent medicine salesman, often with multiple pharmaceutical connections.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而像这样的情况在嵩阳高中属于正常现象，毕竟药体不分家，每一个体育老师既是优秀的炼体专家，更是优秀的药品销售，背后往往更是有着多个医药渠道。

0003.en: But at this moment, Zhang Yu could neither afford them nor could his body handle the drugs. He could only try to brush it off.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 但此刻的张羽既买不起这些，身体也负担不了药剂，只能想着敷衍过去。

0003.en: Seeing Zhang Yu making excuses, Wang Hai snorted, put the medicine back, and said with a look of disappointment, "Well, suit yourself then."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 看着推三阻四不断找借口的张羽，王海冷哼一声，将药放了回去，一脸恨铁不成钢地说道：“那你好自为之吧。”

0003.en: Watching the PE teacher turn away to instruct and sell to other students, Zhang Yu sighed helplessly and thought, "Is even PE class this hard in this damn place?"
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: 看着转身离去，开始向其他同学指导和推销的体育老师，张羽无奈地叹了口气，心中暗道：“这破地方，体育课都这么难上的吗？”

0003.en: Just then, a boy walked over and leaned in close to Zhang Yu, asking, "Did Wang Hai try to sell you stuff again?"
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: 就在这时，一名少年走了过来，凑到张羽身旁问道：“王海又跟你推销了？”

0003.en: The speaker was a handsome boy with a friendly, neighborly look.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 说话的学生看上去眉清目秀，一副邻家少年的模样。

0003.en: Memories of him surfaced in Zhang Yu's mind.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 张羽的脑袋里也泛起了和对方有关的记忆。

0003.en: "He is... Zhou Tianyi."
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: “他是……周天翊。”

0003.en: Zhou Tianyi was the buddy Zhang Yu had met on the first day of school, with whom he ate and studied.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 周天翊是张羽在开学第一天就认识的吃饭和自习搭子。

0003.en: They had eaten and studied together for three months, building a fragile friendship in the process.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 两人一起吃了三个月的饭，上了三个月的自习，并在这过程中建立了一段脆弱的友谊。

0003.en: But as the memories emerged, the first thing Zhang Yu thought of was the other boy's school ranking.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 不过在记忆涌出的同时，张羽首先想到的就是对方的年级排名。

0003.en: "Ranked 25th in the grade, good enough to eat at my table... Huh? Why am I being so discriminatory based on grades?"
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: “年级排名25，够格跟我一桌吃饭了……嗯？我怎么也有这种成绩歧视了？”

0003.en: Zhang Yu felt that as the memories merged, he was being influenced, paying more and more attention to the school's ranking system.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 张羽感觉到随着记忆的不断融合，他似乎也被不断影响，对这学校里的成绩排名越来越重视了。

0003.en: Hearing Zhou Tianyi's question, he nodded and said, "Yeah, he wanted to sell me Divine Elephant Power."
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: 而此刻听到周天翊的询问，他点点头说道：“嗯，想卖神象力给我。”

0003.en: "You didn't buy it again?" Seeing Zhang Yu nod, Zhou Tianyi hissed, "Aren't you afraid old Wang will give you a hard time?"
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: “你又没买？”看到张羽点头，周天翊嘶了一声道：“你小子就不怕老王整你吗？”

0003.en: "A hard time?" Zhang Yu said, "It's just not buying medicine. It won't get that bad, will it?"
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: “整我？”张羽说道：“没买药而已，不至于吧。”

0003.en: Zhou Tianyi shook his head repeatedly. "Sigh, do you want to hear a rumor about Wang Hai?"
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: 周天翊连连摇头道：“唉，你想不想听一个关于王海的八卦？”

0003.en: "Forget it, I'm not one for gossip."
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: “算了吧，我这人不八卦。”

0003.en: Zhang Yu turned and walked toward the exercise equipment, intending to get familiar with his body and the PE curriculum.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 张羽转身朝着一旁的练习器材走去，打算熟悉一下自己的肉体和体育课程的内容。

0003.en: Zhou Tianyi continued, "A teacher complained that Wang Hai was masturbating in the next office, and the force of his ejaculation cracked the ceiling."
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: 周天翊接着说道：“有老师抱怨王海在隔壁办公室挊，射的时候震裂了房顶。”

0003.en: Zhang Yu stopped in his tracks. He wasn't a gossip, but such a ridiculous rumor... he had to see what was really going on.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 张羽的脚步停了下来，他并不是一个八卦的人，但这么烂的八卦……他得看看到底是怎么回事了。

0003.en: Zhou Tianyi said, "Wang Hai later explained that he didn't do it. The banging sounds were him disciplining a disobedient student."
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: 周天翊说道：“王海后来解释他没做，砰砰砰的声音是他在教训不听话的学生。”

0003.en: "Later, I asked students from the two previous years, and it turns out Wang Hai has a history of giving corporal punishment to underachieving students."
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: “后来我问了前两届的学生，原来王海早就有体罚差生的习惯。”

0003.en: "Especially if their grades drop and they don't buy his medicine, he'll lead the bullying against them."
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: “特别是成绩下滑还不买他药的话，更是会被他带头霸凌。”

0003.en: "I heard a student was even driven to jump off a building a few years ago."
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: “听说前几年还有一个学生被他逼得跳楼了。”

0003.en: Hearing the words "jump off a building," Zhang Yu's gaze sharpened. "And Wang Hai got away with that?"
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: 听到跳楼两个字，张羽的目光骤然间一凝：“王海这都没事？”

0003.en: Zhou Tianyi said casually, "Wang Hai's teaching results have always been excellent. He's a star PE teacher at Songyang High. He has coached three students who got first place in the city for Physical Strength on the college entrance exam. Some say he has channels to get drugs that are still in the labs of the major sects."
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: 周天翊不以为然道：“王海的教学成绩一直很好，是嵩阳高中的王牌体育老师，教出过三个高考时肉体强度全市第一的学生，有人说他有大宗门一些还在实验室里的药物的渠道。”

0003.en: "Even if the school wanted to get rid of him, most students and parents wouldn't agree. They all rely on Wang Hai for medicine to improve their Physical Strength."
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: “就算学校真的不想用他了，大部分学生和家长也不会同意，他们都指着王海买药，帮他们提高肉体强度呢。”

0003.en: With that, he looked at Zhang Yu and warned, "If you keep refusing to buy medicine and your grades don't improve, you'll probably be targeted by him too."
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: 说着，他看向张羽告诫道：“你要是一直不买药，成绩又上不去，恐怕也会被他整。”

0003.en: Seeing Zhang Yu frowning, Zhou Tianyi asked curiously, "I say... you used to take a lot of shots. Why did you suddenly stop? Don't tell me you're out of money? Want me to lend you some?"
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: 看着眉头皱起的张羽，周天翊好奇道：“我说……你小子以前扎针也不少啊，怎么突然不买了？该不会是没钱了吧？要不要我借点给你？”

0003.en: Feeling the sincerity in his eyes, Zhang Yu just smiled helplessly. "No need."
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: 感受到对方眼中的真诚，张羽却无奈地笑了笑：“不用。”

0003.en: "Really?" Zhou Tianyi said, "How about you use mine for today?"
0003.speaker: 周天翊
0003.cn: “真不用？”周天翊：“要不你今天先扎我的？”

0003.en: Zhang Yu naturally shook his head again and again. He was genuinely afraid a few more shots would kill him on the spot.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 张羽自然连连摇头，他真怕自己再多扎几针就直接暴毙了。
