0003.en: According to his memories, the world was full of people who were seriously injured, disabled, or even died from drug overdose. Even at Songyang High, students were severely injured every year from using too many drugs.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 根据他脑海中的记忆，这世上可不缺因为药物负荷过大而重创、残疾甚至是死亡的人，甚至嵩阳高中每年都有因为用药过猛而重伤的人。

0003.en: But even so, the stream of students using drugs to pursue Physical Strength was endless.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 可就算如此，追求肉体强度而用药的学生仍旧是络绎不绝。

0003.en: And his original self had been showing signs of being overwhelmed since last week.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而原身从上周开始便已经有了不堪重负的迹象。

0003.en: Thinking about how the original Zhang Yu not only left him with a seven-hundred-thousand-dollar debt but also this broken body, Zhang Yu sighed in despair again.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 想到原身不但欠下七十万巨债，还给他留下这么一具肉身，张羽心中便再次哀叹。

0003.en: Just as they were whispering, a cold gaze suddenly swept over them. Wang Hai shouted, "No talking during PE class."
0003.speaker: 王海
0003.cn: 就在两人窃窃私语的时候，一道冷冽的目光突然扫了过来，只听王海喝道：“上体育课别在下面说小话。”

0003.en: Zhang Yu and Zhou Tianyi immediately stopped talking and started their exercises.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 张羽和周天翊立刻停下了交流，各自开始了锻炼。

0003.en: Zhang Yu went to a large iron ball, tensed his muscles, and with a sudden burst of strength, lifted the hundred-kilogram ball.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 只见张羽来到一颗大铁球面前，浑身筋肉一震，猛地发力之后，便将一百公斤重的铁球抱了起来。

0003.en: Then, as his muscles contracted and expanded, he moved the large iron ball around his body as if it were a toy.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 紧接着伴随他浑身筋肉收缩、膨胀的发力，大铁球就好像是个玩具一样被他搬运到了周身的各个方位。

0003.en: As the iron ball moved up and down, spinning, Zhang Yu felt the blood rush through his body, and his body parts gradually warmed up.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 随着铁球的上下翻飞、旋转，张羽也感觉到浑身气血涌动，身体各部位也逐渐升温。

0003.en: "This is the warm-up..."
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: “这是热身……”

0003.en: The whole process felt as if it were instinctively carved into his flesh and blood. Zhang Yu completed the warm-up training almost without thinking.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 整个过程都好似本能一样被刻在了他的血肉之中，张羽他几乎没怎么动脑子就完成了热身训练。

0003.en: In the following training, his control over this body deepened, and related memories continuously surfaced in his mind.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而在接下来的训练中，他对这具肉身的掌握越来越深入，相关的记忆也不断从脑海里冒了出来。

0003.en: "Body tempering in the Qi Refining stage is mainly about strengthening muscles and bones, breaking limits through repeated practice to ultimately raise the Physical Strength level."
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: “炼气阶段的炼体，主要就是锤炼筋肉、骨骼，通过一次次的练习来打破上限，最终提升肉体强度等级。”

0003.en: "The specific method... for example, the most widespread one among high school students, is the technique called the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms."
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: “具体的方法……比如在高中生里流传最广的办法，便是被称为健体三十六式的功法。”

0003.en: The Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms was a body tempering technique created by the Ten Great Sects specifically for high school teaching. Its thirty-six movements, combined with different equipment, could fully develop the body and effectively increase Physical Strength.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 健体三十六式是由十大宗门专为高中教学而创造出来的炼体功法，三十六种动作配合不同的器械，能够全面开发肉身，有效提升肉体强度。

0003.en: In the cultivation framework summarized by the Ten Great Sects, all martial arts and techniques were graded from level 1 to 100.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 在十大宗门总结出的仙道框架下，一切武功、道术都被划分为了1到100级。

0003.en: Most students at Songyang High could master basic martial arts like the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms to level 1 after one or two weeks of practice.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 像是嵩阳高中的大部分学生在学习一两周以后，便都能成功入门，将健体三十六式这样的基础武学练到了1级。

0003.en: And if one could continue to increase its level, the training effect of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms would become stronger and more incredible.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而若是能够继续提升等级的话，健体三十六式的锻炼效果便也会越来越强，越来越不可思议。

0003.en: But this was clearly not easy. In Zhang Yu's memory, only Bai Zhenzhen had managed to raise the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms to level 2 in the three months since school started.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 但这显然并不容易，在张羽的记忆之中，开学三个月来便只有白真真一人将健体三十六式提升到了2级。

0003.en: It was precisely because of this that Bai Zhenzhen, with just nine shots a day, could maintain her Physical Strength rank at second in the entire grade, closely chasing Qian Shen, who took 16 shots a day.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 也正是因为如此，白真真才能一天9针便将肉体强度的成绩维持在全年级第二，紧紧追赶在一天16针的钱深后面。

0003.en: "The level of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms affects the efficiency of Physical Strength improvement, but what truly determines the amount of power and the PE grade is still Physical Strength itself."
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: “健体三十六式的等级，关系到肉体强度提升的效率，但真正决定力量大小，以及体育课成绩的关键，仍旧是肉体强度本身。”

0003.en: "Speaking of which, with my Physical Strength at 0.82, I can casually toss around things weighing hundreds of pounds. The maximum Physical Strength in the Qi Refining realm is level 10, and after Foundation Establishment, it can reach level 20... The gap between people is too big."
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: “说起来，我的肉体强度是0.82级，就能随便把几百斤的东西甩来甩去。而炼气境界的肉体强度最高能达到10级，筑基以后最高能到20级……这里面人和人的差距太大了。”

0003.en: At first, Zhang Yu just wanted to train casually to get familiar with the PE curriculum and his own body.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 张羽一开始只想随便练练，熟悉一下体育课的内容和自己的身体。

0003.en: But as he went through the sets of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, he became more and more serious and meticulous, as if an instinct in his body was urging him on, encouraging him to persevere.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 但随着健体三十六式的动作一套套练习下去，他变得越来越认真，越来越仔细，就好像是身体里有一种本能在催促着他，鼓舞着他，让他持之以恒地锻炼下去。

0003.en: His muscles were constantly torn, his bones were repeatedly impacted. After countless repetitions, his body, having been repeatedly ravaged, finally produced a warm current that began to silently repair the damage in his flesh and blood.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 筋肉被不断撕裂，骨骼被不断冲击，一次又一次的练习下，他的肉身经过反复的摧残，终于从中涌出一股暖流，开始默默修复血肉中的损伤。

0003.en: This was Zhang Yu's mana. And just like in the PE classes of the past few months, his body was ravaged under heavy pressure, then constantly repaired by mana, becoming stronger in the process.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 这便是张羽体内的法力，而就像是过去几个月的体育课一样，肉体在重压下被摧残，然后又在法力的作用下不断得到修复，并变得更强。

0003.en: Phew!
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 呼！

0003.en: Two hours passed in a flash. Zhang Yu let out a long breath, feeling sore all over, as if his flesh and blood were about to fall apart.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 转眼便是两个小时过去，张羽深深吐出一口气来，只觉得此刻浑身酸痛，一身血肉像是要解体了一样。

0003.en: "No wonder painkillers are necessary..."
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: “怪不得要打止疼药……”

0003.en: He looked up at Bai Zhenzhen, who was still sweating profusely in the distance, and the other classmates who were also training frantically. A sense of urgency instinctively rose in his heart, seeming to urge him to push his body even further.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 他抬头看了眼远处仍在挥汗如雨的白真真，还有另一边同样也在疯狂锻炼的其他同学，一种紧迫感便本能地从心中涌了起来，似乎又在催促着他继续压榨自己的身体。

0003.en: "If I trained this crazily in my original world, I probably would have died, right?"
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: “要是原来的世界这么疯狂锻炼，恐怕早就练死了吧？”

0003.en: "It's only because of the support from various cultivation drugs and mana here... that I can endure this and even get stronger."
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: “也就是这边有各种仙道技术下的药物支持，还有法力……这才能撑下去，还变得越来越强。”

0003.en: Feeling the pain from all over his body and the instinct that still craved training and becoming stronger, Zhang Yu couldn't help but marvel at the deep obsession of the original Zhang Yu.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 感受着此刻从体内各处传来的痛感，以及那股仍旧在渴望着锻炼，渴望着变强的本能，张羽心中也不得不感慨原来的张羽心中执念之深。

0003.en: However, as the training continued, this instinct hidden deep within the body seemed to be fading.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 不过随着锻炼的持续，这股蕴藏在人体深处的本能似乎也在越来越淡。

0003.en: The future path would ultimately have to be chosen by the current Zhang Yu.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 未来的路，终究要靠此刻的张羽自己去选择。

0003.en: By the time the morning PE class was over, Zhang Yu was exhausted on the floor, surrounded by a group of classmates who were still full of energy and crazily cultivating.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 当上午的体育课彻底结束时，张羽已经累趴在了场上，四周围则站了一群仍旧活蹦乱跳，还在疯狂修炼着的同学。

0003.en: Zhang Yu sighed at the difference between using drugs and not.
0003.speaker: 张羽
0003.cn: 张羽感慨着这便是有没有用药的区别吧。

0003.en: Suddenly, he glimpsed the black patch on his palm and noticed that the part not yet filled with black was less than a quarter.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 忽然他瞥见了自己掌心那黑乎乎的一片，发现上面还没有被黑色填满的部位只剩下了不到四分之一。

0004.en: Chapter 4: The God-Summoning Ritual
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 第4章 请神

0004.en: Looking at the change on his palm, Zhang Yu couldn't help but think, "What does this mean?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 看着掌心位置的变化，张羽忍不住想到：“这到底是什么意思？”

0004.en: "Will I die after it's completely filled?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “不会填满以后我就挂了吧？”

0004.en: Unfortunately, no one could answer the unease in Zhang Yu's heart.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 可惜无人能够解答张羽此刻心中的不安。

0004.en: After finishing the morning physical education class, Zhang Yu dragged his half-dead body to lunch with Bai Zhenzhen and Zhou Tianyi, then rested for a moment before the afternoon classes began.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 结束了上午的体育课后，张羽便拖着半死不活的身体和白真真、周天翊一起吃了午饭，然后稍稍休息片刻就又迎来了下午的课程。

0004.en: The first class in the afternoon was history, taught by an old man with white hair.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 下午第一节课是历史课，讲课的老师是一名满头白发的老者。

0004.en: After entering the classroom, the old man sat down behind the teacher's desk and began to lecture casually from his book.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 老者进入教室后便自顾自坐到了讲台后，翻开书本便随意的讲解了起来。

0004.en: He didn't seem to care whether the students below were resting, meditating, cultivating, or even leaving the classroom for physical training.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 至于台下的学生们是在抓紧时间休息，吐纳，修炼，甚至离开教室去炼体，他似乎都没有在意。

0004.en: Zhang Yu wasn't interested in the history teacher's lecture either. He just quickly flipped through the textbook, recalling its contents in his mind and combining it with his own memories to understand it.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 张羽也没兴趣听这位历史老师讲课的内容，他只是快速翻看着课本，脑海中便不断回想起了其中的内容，并结合自己本身的记忆进行了理解。

0004.en: "There are no countries in Kunxu; everything is monopolized and controlled by the Ten Great Sects. Kunxu has thirty-six floors above ground. The first floor is about the size of two Chinas and is made up of cities of various sizes, each managed by a city government set up by a major sect."
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: “昆墟没有国家，一切都由十大宗门垄断并掌握。昆墟在地面上有三十六层，第一层大概有两个中国这么大，由各个大小不一的城市组成，每个城市有大宗门搭建的市政府进行管理。”

0004.en: "Besides the cultivation-related aspects, the technology on the first floor seems to be about the same as in my previous life, but the lives of ordinary people seem much harder."
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: “第一层的世界抛开仙道相关之外，科技水平似乎和我上辈子差不多，但老百姓的日子好像要辛苦多了。”

0004.en: "The first floor of Kunxu is also where the original Zhang Yu had always lived. As for the floors above... he had only seen them on TV and in movies."
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: “昆墟第一层也是张羽一直以来生活的地方，至于再往上……那他就只有在电视电影里见过了。”

0004.en: According to Zhang Yu's memory, you could only enter the second floor of Kunxu by getting into a university, and only by graduating and joining a major sect could you go even higher.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 根据张羽记忆中所了解，只有考上大学才能进入昆墟第二层，而只有大学毕业并加入大宗门，那才能上到更高层。

0004.en: It could be said that within Kunxu, only by mastering stronger cultivation powers and having higher authority could one climb up step by step.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 可以说在这昆墟之中，只有掌握更强的仙道力量，更高的权限，才能一步步向上爬。

0004.en: And the higher the floor, the more abundant the spiritual energy was said to be, the more advanced the cultivation technology, and the more plentiful the resources.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 而越是上层，传说中灵气更为充沛，仙道技术更为发达，各种物资也越发富足。

0004.en: Thinking of this, Zhang Yu couldn't help but look out the window, feeling the sunlight pouring down.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 回想到这里的时候，张羽忍不住回头看向窗外，感受着那漫天洒下的阳光。

0004.en: "Such a real sky and sunlight... Is this place really inside some kind of giant structure?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “如此真实的天空和阳光……这里真的是在某座超巨型建筑里吗？”

0004.en: "The first floor alone is the size of two Chinas, so how much space does the entire Kunxu take up? It can't be on Earth, right?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “第一层就有两个中国大小，那整个昆墟要占多大空间？肯定已经不在地球上了吧？”

0004.en: "How did I even get to this world?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “我究竟又是怎么来到这个世界的？”

0004.en: He unconsciously recalled the scene of his arrival in this world, thought of the strange ritual, and his head felt dizzy again.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 他脑海中不知不觉回想起了刚刚来到这个世界的景象，想起了那诡异仪式，然后脑袋就又感觉到了一阵眩晕。

0004.en: Zhang Yu quickly shook his head. For him at this moment, things like high school grades, living expenses, making money, and PE class needed his attention more than these big questions.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 张羽赶紧摇了摇头，对于此刻的他来说，相比起这些大事，还是高中成绩、生活费、赚钱、体育课……这些眼前的事情更需要他的关注。

0004.en: And thinking of grades and cultivation, Zhang Yu felt another headache coming on.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 而想起成绩和修炼，张羽就又是一阵头疼。

0004.en: Besides the morning PE class, his cultivation scores were divided into four subjects: Dao Heart, Mana, Martial Arts, and Magical Arts.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 除了上午的体育课之外，仙道成绩中还分别有道心、法力、武功、道术这四科。

0004.en: Dao Heart was worth 150 points, Mana was 150 points, Martial Arts was 100 points, and Magical Arts was 100 points.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 其中道心占150分，法力占150分，武功100分，道术100分。

0004.en: And according to his memory, his recent rankings had been slipping in every area; not a single subject was improving.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 而按照张羽心中的记忆来看，最近他的成绩排名已经是全方位下滑，就没一科不是在退步的。

0004.en: If this continued, it seemed to be only a matter of time before he was expelled from Songyang High School.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 照这样下去，似乎最后被嵩阳高中退学也只是时间问题。

0004.en: Another question popped into Zhang Yu's mind.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 而张羽心中又冒出了另一个疑问。

0004.en: "From the looks of it, Zhang Yu's family isn't rich, and he doesn't have any outstanding cultivation talent. Both his first and second-year interviews weren't very successful, so how did he get into Songyang High School?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “现在看来，张羽家里既不有钱，他自己也没有什么出众的仙道天赋，不论是第一年还是第二年的面试好像都不太成功，他到底是怎么进嵩阳高中的？”

0004.en: Zhang Yu thought back repeatedly, only remembering that the original owner of the body entered Songyang High School with less-than-ideal interview results.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 张羽反复回忆，只记得原身就是顶着不太理想的面试结果进入了嵩阳高中。

0004.en: Thinking of the original owner's family, his eyes moved slightly as he took out his phone and opened the contacts.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 而想到原身的家庭，他目光微微一动，掏出手机打开了通讯录。

0004.en: "Right, should I contact Zhang Yu's parents and sister after school?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “对了，放学后要不要联系一下张羽的爸妈还有姐姐？”

0004.en: During the afternoon classes, Zhang Yu spent his time reviewing and organizing his memories, which deepened his understanding of the knowledge in his mind, this world, and his identity as Zhang Yu.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 下午的课程中，张羽便在一边复习，一边整理脑海中的记忆中渡过，这让他对于脑海中的知识，对于这个世界，对于张羽的身份，都了解得越来越深。

0004.en: In the blink of an eye, it was six o'clock, time for school to end.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 转眼间时间来到了六点放学的时候。

0004.en: The school's classes for the day were over, but for most students at Songyang High School, only half the day's lessons were done. They still had their respective tutoring sessions to attend, followed by self-study until late at night before they could rest.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 学校今天的课程已经全部结束，但对绝大部分嵩阳高中的学生们来说，一天课程只过了一半，接下来他们还需要参加各自的补习，然后自习到后半夜才能休息。

0004.en: Unlike his classmates who were rushing to their tutoring classes, Zhang Yu was sitting in the empty cafeteria.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 而和急匆匆赶往各自补习班的同学们不同，张羽此刻正坐在空荡荡的食堂里。

0004.en: With no savings and no borrowing limit left, he had stopped attending tutoring two weeks ago.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 没有了存款和借贷额度的他从两周前开始就没上补习班了。

0004.en: So after finishing dinner, he thought for a moment and turned on his phone.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 于是在吃完了晚饭之后，他思量一番，还是打开了手机。

0004.en: "Let's give it a try."
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “试试看吧。”

0004.en: He first called Zhang Yu's mother, then his father, but neither of them answered.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 先是打给了张羽的母亲，接着又打给了父亲，却全都是无人接听的状态。

0004.en: Recalling the memories of Zhang Yu's parents and sister, he finally, reluctantly, called his sister.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 回忆着脑海中张羽父母、姐姐的相关记忆，他最终还是无奈地打给了姐姐。

0004.en: "Zhang Yu?"
0004.speaker: 姐姐
0004.cn: “张羽？”

0004.en: Hearing the slightly cold voice on the other end of the phone, Zhang Yu braced himself and said, "Sister, can I borrow some money?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 听着手机另一头那略显冰冷的声音，张羽硬着头皮说道：“姐，能不能借我点钱？”

0004.en: There was a moment of silence. Just as Zhang Yu thought she would hang up, a voice came from the phone: "When you were in the first grade of elementary school, I told Mom and Dad that you have no talent for cultivation. Going down this path is a complete waste of time and money."
0004.speaker: 姐姐
0004.cn: 一阵沉默中，就在张羽以为对方会挂了电话的时候，从手机中传来声音：“你小学一年级的时候，我就和爸妈说了，你没有仙道天赋，往这条路上走完全是浪费时间和钱。”

0004.en: "After we separated, Mom believed in your fantasy and insisted on supporting you through high school alone. She even came to us for money not long ago, trying to use my tutoring fees."
0004.speaker: 姐姐
0004.cn: “分开后，老妈却相信了你的妄想，硬着头皮想要一个人供你上高中，甚至她前不久还找我们来借钱，想要动我的补课费。”

0004.en: "Heh, and in the end, you foolishly took out loans for cultivation? To study in high school, you must be deep in debt by now, right?"
0004.speaker: 姐姐
0004.cn: “呵，结果你这不自量力的蠢货还要借贷修仙，为了在高中学习，你现在已经欠了一屁股债了吧？”

0004.en: Faced with her accusations, Zhang Yu had nothing to say, because according to the memories he had sorted through, she wasn't wrong.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 面对对方的指责，张羽却无话可说，因为根据他脑海中整理的记忆来看，对方说的并没有错。

0004.en: After their parents separated, each taking one child, the original Zhang Yu, knowing his mother's income was low and they had no money, recklessly pursued cultivation, taking out small loans and getting trapped in a cycle of debt.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 父母各自带着他们姐弟俩分开以后，明知道母亲的收入不足，家里没钱，但原本的张羽却太过不自量力，最后硬着头皮撸小贷也要修仙，一路以贷养贷到现在。

0004.en: And his mother, after repeatedly helping him repay his loans only to find the hole getting bigger and bigger, finally left him.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 而母亲也在张羽反复借贷，一次次帮他偿还，又一次次发现窟窿越来越大后，终于离他而去。

0004.en: The voice on the phone continued.
0004.speaker: 姐姐
0004.cn: 手机那头的声音继续传来。

0004.en: "This is the last time we'll talk. You can pay back your own debts."
0004.speaker: 姐姐
0004.cn: “这是我们最后一次联系了，你欠下来的债你自己去还。”

0004.en: "Here's some advice: drop out of school and get a job to pay off your debt."
0004.speaker: 姐姐
0004.cn: “再给你一个忠告，退学然后去打工还债吧。”

0004.en: "For the sake of us once being family, I'll send you 500. That should be enough for you to find a job before you starve."
0004.speaker: 姐姐
0004.cn: “看在曾经是一家人的份上，我一会打给你500，这些钱足够你在饿死前找到一份工作了。”

0004.en: Hearing the phone hang up, Zhang Yu sighed helplessly. "Well, at least I got 500."
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 听着对方电话挂断的声音，张羽无奈地叹了口气：“还好，至少也要到了500。”

0004.en: With the 500 from Bai Zhenzhen, Zhang Yu's savings finally exceeded 1000.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 算上白真真给的500，张羽现在的存款终于突破1000。

0004.en: But walking home, his sister's advice kept replaying in his mind.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 但走在回家的路上，张羽脑海中仍旧不断泛起对方的忠告。

0004.en: "Drop out and get a job?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “退学去打工吗？”

0004.en: Lying on the bed in his rented room, Zhang Yu stared blankly at the slightly moldy ceiling.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 躺回了出租屋的床上，张羽怔怔看着那有些发霉的天花板。

0004.en: Falling grades, no money, massive debt, a body on the verge of collapse... he had to admit that dropping out and getting a job seemed like a rational decision.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 成绩下滑，身无分文，背负巨债，肉体不堪重负……他不得不承认，早点退学去打工似乎是个理智的决定。

0004.en: Just then, a sharp pain shot from his palm. The symbol only he could see was finally filled with black.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 就在这时，一阵刺痛从掌心处传来，那只有他才能看到的符号在这一刻终于被黑色所填满了。

0004.en: At the same time, a clear female voice sounded from the side, "Kid, the God-Summoning Ritual is complete. Time to grant three wishes."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 与此同时，一道清脆女声从一旁响起：“小子，请神仪式已经完成，该实现三个愿望了。”

0004.en: Zhang Yu whipped his head around and saw a cloth doll sitting on his bed.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 张羽猛地转过头去，就发现一个布娃娃正坐在自己的床边上。

0004.en: Looking at the doll with its faded yellow cloth and crooked stitches that looked like they could split open at any moment, he suddenly realized—wasn't this the doll he saw during the strange ritual on the rooftop when he first arrived in this world?
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 看着那布料泛黄褪色，缝线歪歪扭扭，仿佛随时会裂开的布娃娃，他猛地反应了过来，这不就是他昨天来到这个世界后，在天台的诡异仪式里看到的布娃娃吗？

0004.en: Doll: "Hey, did you hear me? Three wishes, not one less."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 布娃娃：“喂，你听见我说的没？三个愿望，一个都不能少。”

0004.en: Faced with this strange scene, Zhang Yu just wanted to leave.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 面对眼前的诡异场景，张羽只想离开。

0004.en: He was no longer the clueless newcomer he had been.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 此刻的他已经不是对这个世界一无所知的小白了。

0004.en: After organizing his memories, he knew that gods in this world weren't just vague beliefs; they were the administrators managing countless affairs within Kunxu.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 在整理了脑海中的记忆后，他知道神在这个世界可不是什么虚无缥缈的信仰，而是执掌着整个昆墟内大大小小无数事务的管理者。

0004.en: But these official gods were not beings that a cultivation failure like him could summon casually. The deity summoned by his so-called God-Summoning Ritual must be one of the legendary Evil Gods who caused chaos, took lives indiscriminately, and were strictly suppressed by the Ten Great Sects and the official gods.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 但这些正神绝不是张羽一个仙道废材能随随便便请来的，能被张羽那所谓请神仪式唤来的神灵，想必是传闻之中祸乱四方，草菅人命，被十大宗门和各部正神严厉打击的邪神。

0004.en: Stories of mortals making deals with Evil Gods and ending up dead with their souls scattered were tales that the common folk of Kunxu's first floor grew up hearing.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 那些凡人和邪神达成交易，最终身死道消，魂飞魄散的小故事都是昆墟一层的老百姓从小听大的。

0004.en: "This guy Zhang Yu was so desperate that he turned to an Evil God?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “张羽这家伙走投无路，最后竟然找到邪神那去了？”

0004.en: "No wonder I get a headache whenever I think about related memories. Is this also a trick of the Evil God?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “怪不得我一想到有关的记忆就头晕，这也是邪神的手段？”

0004.en: Zhang Yu's first instinct was to run away from the danger, but on second thought, he stopped his trembling body.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 张羽在第一时间感觉到了危险想走，但转念一想却又止住了不断颤抖的身体。

0004.en: The original Zhang Yu had turned to an Evil God only because he truly had no other choice.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 原来的张羽之所以找上邪神，只因为他已经真的走投无路。

0004.en: Should he work like an animal at the bottom of society for the rest of his life to pay off his debt, or risk his life for a chance to continue cultivating?
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 是要一辈子在最底层当牛做马来还债，还是冒着生命危险博一个继续修仙的机会？

0004.en: "Evil God! My first wish is for you to grant me 100 wishes!"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “邪神！我的第一个愿望就是由你帮我实现100个愿望！”

0004.en: After saying that, Zhang Yu swallowed nervously and looked at the doll, asking, "You can do that, right?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 说罢，张羽咽了咽口水，紧张地看着对方问道：“你能做到吧？”

0004.en: "Haha, of course I can do something so simple."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “呵呵，这么简单的事情我当然能做到。”

0004.en: Seeing the smile on Zhang Yu's face, the doll let out a sneer, "But I choose... not to."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 看着张羽脸上露出的笑容，布娃娃发出一阵嗤笑：“但我的选择是……不做。”

0004.en: "Because after the God-Summoning Ritual is complete, it is you who must grant my three wishes."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “因为请神仪式完成之后，是你要实现我的三个愿望。”

0004.en: "If you choose to refuse, or deliberately delay or fail in the process, you will suffer the ritual's backlash and your flesh will explode, your soul will scatter."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “若是你选择拒绝为我实现愿望，或者在实现的过程中故意拖延甚至失败，那都将在仪式的反噬之下，血肉爆裂魂飞魄散。”

0004.en: "Alright, my first wish is for you to grant me another 1000 wishes."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “好了，我第一个愿望就是你得再帮我实现1000个愿望。”

0004.en: Hearing this, Zhang Yu was stunned and cursed inwardly, "What... I went through this whole God-Summoning Ritual just to grant your wishes? Is this Zhang Yu an idiot? 1000 wishes? Is that even possible?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 听到这番话的张羽微微一呆，心中骂道：“不是……搞了这么个请神仪式，就是为了替你实现愿望？这个张羽是白痴吗？还1000个愿望？这也行？”

0004.en: After stating its first wish, the doll smiled, its empty black button eyes staring straight at Zhang Yu.
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 而布娃娃说完第一个愿望后，微微一笑，黑色纽扣组成的空洞双眼继续直挺挺地看向张羽。

0004.en: "Are you ready? I'm about to make my next wish."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “准备好了吗？我要说下一个愿望了。”

0004.en: Hearing this, Zhang Yu's heart tightened. "What kind of wish is this thing going to make now?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 张羽闻言心中骤然一紧：“这鬼东西又要许什么愿望了？”

0004.en: "If I really have to grant it a thousand wishes, won't I become its slave?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “真要让我给她完成一千个愿望，我岂不是成了她的奴隶？”

0004.en: "Or... what if it makes a wish I can't possibly fulfill... Won't I be doomed to die?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “又或者……许下一个我根本完成不了的愿望……我岂不是必死无疑？”

0004.en: The doll said slowly, "I've thought about it. My next wish is... for you to help me collect some antiques."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 布娃娃慢悠悠道：“我想好了，我下一个愿望就是……由你来帮我收集一批古董。”

0004.en: Zhang Yu swallowed. "Antiques?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 张羽咽了咽口水：“古董？”

0004.en: The doll giggled and said, "Don't worry, I've already found them for you. Just buy everything in your shopping cart."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 布娃娃咯咯一笑，说道：“放心，我都已经替你找好了，你直接把你购物车里的东西全买下来就行。”

0004.en: Zhang Yu paused, then took out his phone. Following his memory, he opened his shopping cart and found it filled with various Buddha statues, altars, incense burners, wooden swords... The prices were steep; any single item cost tens of thousands.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 张羽闻言微微一滞，接着拿出手机，按照记忆打开自己的购物车，便发现里面已经选满了各种佛像、供桌、香炉、木剑……其价格不菲，随便一个都要上万块钱。

0004.en: And if he couldn't afford these antiques, it seemed he couldn't fulfill the wish. If he couldn't fulfill the Evil God's wish, wouldn't he die a violent death under the effect of the ritual?
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 而买不起这些古董，似乎就完成不了愿望，无法完成邪神的愿望，那岂不是便要在仪式的作用下死于非命？

0004.en: Thinking of this, Zhang Yu quickly asked, "Could you please consider a different wish?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 想到这里，张羽连忙问道：“您看能不能换一个愿望？”

0004.en: "I'm afraid I can't afford so many antiques."
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “这么多古董我恐怕买不起。”

0004.en: "Making excuses..." The doll's gaze hardened, endless malice pouring from its black-hole eyes. "Are you trying to go back on your word? If you can't afford it, borrow. If you can't borrow, sell your heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, and lungs. There's always a way to get the money."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “推三阻四……”布娃娃目光一凝，黑洞洞的双眼中似有无尽恶意涌出：“你想赖账不成？买不起就去借，借不到就卖了心肝肾脾肺，总有你凑钱的办法。”

0004.en: Zhang Yu looked at the doll seriously and said slowly, "If I do that, I'll die just to fulfill this one wish, won't I?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 张羽认真地看着布娃娃，缓缓说道：“如果那样做的话，那为了实现这一个愿望我就会死吧？”

0004.en: The doll chuckled lightly, "So what?"
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 娃娃轻笑道：“那又如何？”

0004.en: Zhang Yu: "You are choosing to immediately lose someone who will grant you a thousand wishes in the future."
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 张羽：“你是选择现在立刻就失去一个未来帮您实现一千个愿望的人。”

0004.en: "Or will you give me some time, and let a future disciple of a Great Sect buy these antiques for you, and then one by one... help you fulfill those thousand wishes?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “还是给我一些时间，让一个未来的大宗门弟子帮您买下这些古董，再去一个又一个……帮您实现那一千个愿望？”

0004.en: "Hmm?" The doll gave Zhang Yu a surprised look. "Continue."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “嗯？”布娃娃有些意外地看了张羽一眼：“继续。”

0004.en: Zhang Yu: "I've calculated it. To buy all these antiques, I probably couldn't save enough money even if I worked for decades on the first floor of Kunxu."
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 张羽：“我算了算，要买下这些古董的话，就算我在昆墟一层打工打上几十年可能也凑不出来这么多钱。”

0004.en: "But if I can join a Great Sect, I'll be able to save up this amount in just a few years."
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “但如果我能加入大宗门的话，那用不了几年时间就能攒够这笔钱了。”

0004.en: The doll: "So?"
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 布娃娃：“所以？”

0004.en: Zhang Yu: "What I mean is... as long as I study hard, cultivate diligently, keep getting stronger, get into a top university, and join a Great Sect after graduation, I can use my sect allowance to fulfill your wish."
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 张羽：“就是说……只要我好好学习，努力修行，不断变强，考上名牌大学，毕业后再加入大宗门，就能靠宗门俸禄来实现您的愿望了。”

0004.en: The doll was silent for a moment, then suddenly said, "You're saying you're going to study hard, then get a job to earn a salary, and fulfill my wish that way?"
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 布娃娃又沉默片刻后，陡然说道：“你是说你要好好读书，然后上班赚工资，这样来实现我的愿望？”

0004.en: "Are you kidding me?"
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “你耍我？”

0004.en: An endless wave of malice rushed forward. The doll's eyes were like two giant black holes, about to suck in all the surrounding light.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 无穷的恶意扑面而来，布娃娃的双眼好似两个巨大的黑洞，要将四周围的光都瞬间吸入。

0004.en: Zhang Yu clenched his fists, trying his best to control his trembling legs, and stared at the doll, saying word by word, "Your first wish is for me to grant you a thousand wishes. Your second wish is to collect the antiques in the shopping cart."
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 张羽捏紧双拳，尽力压制住不断颤抖着的双腿，盯着眼前的布娃娃一字字道：“你的第一个愿望，便是让我为您完成一千个愿望。第二个愿望则是收集购物车里的古董。”

0004.en: "If I die of poverty while collecting antiques for you, how can I fulfill the thousand wishes?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “如果我在为你收集古董的时候就穷死了，还怎么完成一千个愿望？”

0004.en: "If I know this but still try to fulfill the second wish in a way that will kill me, isn't that deliberately failing to complete the first wish?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “如果我明知道这一点，却仍旧以必死的方式去完成第二个愿望，岂不是故意不完成第一个愿望？”

0004.en: "Deliberately making myself unable to complete the first wish would violate the ritual's requirements. I'd probably die from the ritual's backlash before even completing the second wish, right?"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “故意让自己完成不了第一个愿望，那就违反了仪式的要求，恐怕连第二个愿望都未能完成就会被仪式反噬而死吧？”

0004.en: "So, studying hard, getting into university, and working seriously to make money is the only feasible plan I can think of right now to fulfill both the first and second wishes."
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: “所以努力读书，考上大学，认真工作赚钱，这是我目前唯一能想到的，可以实现第一、第二个愿望的可行性计划。”

0004.en: As Zhang Yu finished speaking, a dead silence filled the room.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 伴随着张羽的这番话说完，房间里是死一样的沉默。

0004.en: A moment later, the doll's voice was heard.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 片刻之后，布娃娃的声音响起。

0004.en: "Let me see your account balance."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “让我看看你的余额。”

0004.en: After seeing Zhang Yu's account balance and the text messages about overdue loans, the doll was silent for a long time.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 当看到张羽账户上的余额和各种贷款逾期的短信之后，布娃娃良久没有说话。

0004.en: "This kid..." The doll's thoughts raced. "Normally, this situation wouldn't happen. The ritual is supposed to target rich people, for whom buying a pile of antiques is just a matter of lifting a finger."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “这小子……”布娃娃心中思绪狂涌：“正常来讲是不会遇到这种状况的，毕竟仪式挑选的目标应该都是有钱人，买那一堆古董不过是动动手指的事情。”

0004.en: "But this kid... this kid is too poor. So poor he can't even fulfill the first wish, so poor that he's created a loophole."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “但这小子……这小子太穷了，穷得连第一个愿望都无法完成，以至于穷出了一个漏洞。”

0004.en: "Damn it, didn't I say to find someone rich! Why did you bring me this one!"
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “MD，不是说了要找个有钱人吗！怎么给我找了这么个货色！”

0004.en: After a long silence, the doll looked at Zhang Yu and said, "What you said... does make some sense."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 良久的沉默之后，布娃娃看着张羽说道：“你说的……倒也不无道理。”

0004.en: "Fine, go study hard. I'll come find you when you've earned enough money."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “行吧，你努力读书去吧，等你赚够了钱我再来找你。”

0004.en: With that, the doll sneered again, "But you must remember, all of this is to fulfill my wishes."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 说着，娃娃再次冷笑了起来：“不过你要记住了，这一切都是为了完成我的愿望。”

0004.en: "From now on, if you slack off in the process of fulfilling my wishes, you will die from the ritual's backlash."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “接下来一旦你在为我完成愿望的过程中稍有懈怠，那便都将死在仪式反噬之下。”

0004.en: Watching the doll gradually disappear, Zhang Yu let out a sharp breath and collapsed onto the bed, his body going limp.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 看着逐渐消失的布娃娃，张羽猛地吐出一口气来，身体一软就瘫倒在了床上。

0004.en: Suddenly, he remembered something and shouted, "Wait, this ritual... what did I get from this ritual?!"
0004.speaker: 张羽
0004.cn: 突然，他想起了什么，大喊道：“等等，这仪式……这仪式我究竟得到了什么？！”

0004.en: Although he suspected his transmigration might be related to the ritual, he didn't dare to reveal this secret directly, choosing an indirect approach instead.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 虽然怀疑自己的穿越可能和这仪式有关，但他还是不敢直接说出这个秘密，而是选择了旁敲侧击的办法。

0004.en: Unless absolutely necessary, he decided to keep the secret of Earth buried deep in his heart, never to be revealed.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 不到万不得已，他决定把地球的秘密死死压在心底，永不透露。

0004.en: The doll disappeared completely, leaving only a voice in Zhang Yu's ear: "Your potential has been stimulated. But everyone's potential is different. What it is... you'll have to feel it for yourself."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 布娃娃彻底消失无踪，只有一阵声音留在了张羽的耳畔：“你被激发了潜力，不过每个人的潜力并不一样，到底是什么……你自己去感受吧。”

0004.en: Outside the room, the doll walked and thought, "This kid's aptitude is terrible. Stimulating his potential will probably just boost his mana or physical strength a little. I doubt he can even get into a university, let alone join a Great Sect. How can he fulfill my wishes?"
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: 房间外，布娃娃一边走一边想到：“这小子的资质差得很，潜力激发无非是增强点法力或者肉体强度吧？连大学我看他都考不上，别说加入大宗门了，怎么能完成我的愿望？”

0004.en: "But his improvisation was quite interesting... Let's see how far you can struggle."
0004.speaker: 邪神
0004.cn: “不过临场应变倒还挺有趣……就让我看看你能挣扎到哪一步吧。”

0004.en: Inside the room, Zhang Yu watched as the black symbol on his palm slowly began to change.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 房间内，张羽看着自己掌心那一团黑色的符号渐渐开始了变化。

0005.en: Chapter 5: The Feather Book
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 第5章 羽书

0005.en: As the black symbol in his palm shifted, a thick, ink-black book appeared in Zhang Yu's hand.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 随着掌心的黑色符号一阵变化，一本漆黑如墨的厚厚书本已经出现在了张羽的手中。

0005.en: "The Feather Book?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “羽书？”

0005.en: Looking at the two large characters on the cover, Zhang Yu felt a flicker of surprise.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 看着封面上的两个大字，张羽心中微微一愣。

0005.en: With a mere thought from him, the black book opened by itself to the first page.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 接着伴随他心念一跳，手中的黑书便已无风自动，自然而然翻开了第一页。

0005.en: "This must be the table of contents?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “这是目录吧？”

0005.en: He looked at the table of contents. Besides the first line, "Prologue," all the following lines were blurry and unreadable, as if they had been censored.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 看着目录上除了第一行的序章之外，后面全都是一行行模模糊糊看不清的字迹，就好像被打上了一层码一样。

0005.en: Zhang Yu thought, "Does this mean only the prologue is available for now?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: 张羽心道：“这意思是现在只有序章？”

0005.en: With a thought, he turned to the prologue. Before him was a portrait on the left page and lines of data on the right page.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 心念一动间，他翻开序章，出现在面前的分别是左边页面上的人物画像，以及右边页面上的一行行数据和资料。

0005.en: "Is this a drawing of me?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “这画的是我？”

0005.en: The portrait on the left page was of himself, sitting cross-legged with his eyes gently closed, as if meditating.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 只见左页面上的人物画像，正是张羽双腿盘坐，双目轻闭，好似在冥想的模样。

0005.en: It was so lifelike that it seemed the figure in the painting was actually breathing.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 其神态栩栩如生，给人的感觉就像是画中人物还在一呼一吸。

0005.en: A faint light flowed within it, and Zhang Yu sensed it must represent the flow of mana inside his body.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 特别是其中隐隐有光辉流转，张羽感觉那应该就代表着他体内的法力流动。

0005.en: On the right page were lines of data:
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 而右侧的页面上则是一行行资料和数据，分别是：

0005.en: Zhang Yu
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 张羽

0005.en: Dao Heart: Level 1
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 道心1级

0005.en: Mana
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 法力

0005.en: Physical Strength: Level 0.83
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 肉体强度0.83级

0005.en: Martial Arts: Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 1, Free-Form Fighting Level 1
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 武功：健体三十六式1级，散手1级

0005.en: Dao Arts: Basic Breathing Technique Level 1, Basic Heart-Refining Technique Level 1
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 道术：基础吐纳法1级，基础炼心法1级

0005.en: "This is me?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “这是我？”

0005.en: "These are the stats for my cultivation qualities. The Dao Heart level is the same as the school's test; it can't be measured to a decimal point."
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “上面是各项仙道素质的数据，这里的道心等级倒也和学校里的检测一样，没法精确到小数点后面。”

0005.en: "And below are the martial and Dao arts I've learned so far?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “下面则是我目前学会的武功道术？”

0005.en: Among the four skills, besides the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms for increasing physical strength, there was also Free-Form Fighting for practical combat from martial arts class, the Basic Breathing Technique for refining mana from mana class, and the Basic Heart-Refining Technique for improving the Dao Heart. All were at the beginner's Level 1.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 下方的四门技能中，除了用来提升肉体强度的健体三十六式之外，还有武道课学的用于锻炼实战能力的散手，法力课提炼法力的基础吐纳法，以及用来提升道心的基础炼心法，全都是刚入门的1级。

0005.en: Looking at the numbers, Zhang Yu thought to himself, "Is this the potential the Evil God unlocked? This book can detect all my attributes?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: 张羽看着上面的数字心中暗道：“这就是邪神激发出来的潜力？这本书能够检测出我的各项属性？”

0005.en: "But... that can't be all, right?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “但……应该不止如此吧？”

0005.en: "According to the Evil God, it unlocked my potential. But what kind of potential is just detection? I get tested at school every day."
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “按照那邪神的说法是激发了我的潜力，但光检测算什么潜力？我每天在学校里都能测啊。”

0005.en: "There must be some other use."
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “应该有别的妙用。”

0005.en: Thinking this, Zhang Yu decided to test it. He focused his attention on the attribute numbers and shouted in his mind, "Feather Book! Add points for me!"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: 想到这里，张羽决定测试一下，他将注意力集中到属性数字上，心中喝道：“羽书！给我加点！”

0005.en: Seeing the data on the book remained unchanged, Zhang Yu sighed. This Evil God was useless; it hadn't unlocked his potential at all.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 看着书上那纹丝不动的数据，张羽暗叹这邪神就是不给力，根本没有激发出来他的潜力嘛。

0005.en: He tried to turn to the next page, only to find the words 'To be continued' written there.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 试着翻到下一页，却发现上面竟写着‘未完待续’四个大字。

0005.en: Recalling the unrevealed contents in the table of contents, Zhang Yu guessed, "What does this mean? Can this ability be upgraded? And the later functions will only be available after upgrading?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: 联想到之前目录上尚未显示的内容，张羽心中猜测：“什么意思？难道这个能力还能升级？升级了以后才有后面的功能？”

0005.en: He could only turn back to the previous page, focusing his attention on his data and skills to see if he could trigger any effect.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 他只能再次翻回了前面，不断将注意力集中到自己那一行行数据和技能上，看看是否能引发什么效果。

0005.en: Just as he focused on 'Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 1', he suddenly felt the line of text twitch. It was dragged directly and moved around the page with his thoughts.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 而就在他将注意力集中到‘健体三十六式1级’上的时候，突然感觉到那行字微微一跳，竟被直接拖动，随着他的意念在书页上来回转悠。

0005.en: As Zhang Yu dragged 'Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 1' across the page, wondering what its use was.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 就在张羽将‘健体三十六式1级’在书页上拖来拖去，想着这有什么用的时候。

0005.en: When 'Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 1' touched the portrait, it suddenly froze and was absorbed by the Zhang Yu in the portrait.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: ‘健体三十六式1级’在碰触人物画像时陡然一凝，竟被画像中的张羽给直接吸收了。

0005.en: With this absorption, Zhang Yu felt a cool stream pour down from the top of his head. An indescribable feeling arose in his heart, making him feel a strange connection with the Zhang Yu in the portrait.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 随着这一阵吸收，张羽只觉得天灵盖上像是有一汪清泉浇灌而下，某种说不清道不明的感觉在心中涌起，让他觉得自己和画像中的张羽产生了一种奇异的联系。

0005.en: At the same time, the originally seated portrait suddenly stood up and began to practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, move by move.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 与此同时，原本盘膝而坐的画像陡然间站了起来，竟开始一招一式地演练起了健体三十六式。

0005.en: And above the portrait, a line of small text appeared: Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 1
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 而画像上方已经浮现出了一行小字：健体三十六式1级

0005.en: Seeing the small '+' at the end, Zhang Yu became excited, "Here it is! My potential has really been unlocked!"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: 看着最后面那个小小的‘+’，张羽一下子激动了起来：“来了来了！我的潜力真的被激发了！”

0005.en: His attention quickly focused on the '+'. It felt as if he had pressed it with his mind.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 他的注意力迅速集中在‘+’上，感觉就好像是用自己的念头在上面按了一下。

0005.en: The next moment, the '+' blurred slightly and then turned into '(0/10)'.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 下一刻，便见那‘+’微微一阵模糊后，就变成了‘（0/10）’

0005.en: Then, an understanding arose in Zhang Yu's mind: practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms ten times to upgrade the martial art.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 接着一股明悟便从张羽心中升起：练习十遍健体三十六式，即可完成武道升级。

0005.en: Looking at 'Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 1 (0/10)' on the Feather Book, Zhang Yu was surprised, "I can upgrade this martial art just by practicing it ten times?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: 看着羽书上的‘健体三十六式1级（0/10）’，张羽心中惊讶道：“练个十遍就能把这门武功升级了？”

0005.en: Since school started, Zhang Yu had practiced the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms many times, but he had never felt any sign of an upgrade.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 要知道自从开学以来，这健体三十六式张羽练了许许多多遍，从来都是一点要升级的感觉都没有。

0005.en: "Ten times?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “十遍吗？”

0005.en: Zhang Yu eagerly began to try. He took a step forward, and with a loud bang, his muscles twisted like a giant python, releasing waves of power.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 张羽有些迫不及待地尝试了起来，只见他一步踏出，伴随着砰的一声炸响，浑身血肉如一条巨蟒拧转，爆发出层层力量。

0005.en: Although Zhang Yu used equipment to practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms at school, that was only to enhance the training effect.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 虽然在学校里的时候，张羽修炼健体三十六式都会借助器械，但那只是为了增加练功的效果。

0005.en: In fact, as the most basic body-refining martial art, the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms could be practiced with or without equipment. The practitioner could even focus on different aspects like strength, speed, or agility according to their preference.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 实际上健体三十六式作为最基础的炼体武学，不论有无器械均可练习，甚至修炼者更可以按照自己的倾向性将重点放在力量、速度、灵巧等不同方向上。

0005.en: For example, the original Zhang Yu had chosen a balanced development of strength and speed, without becoming a muscle-bound oaf.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 比如原来的张羽选择的便是力量、速度均衡发展的方向，没有变成大块头。

0005.en: Now, Zhang Yu moved back and forth in the small room, his feet making thudding sounds on the floor, and his muscles gradually warming up after repeatedly expanding and contracting.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 此刻便看到张羽在小小的房间内来回腾挪，双脚踩在地板上爆出砰砰的响声，浑身血肉则在不断膨胀和收缩后渐渐升温。

0005.en: But before he could practice a few moves, angry shouts came from the surroundings, "Are you crazy?! Tearing down the house in the middle of the night?!"
0005.speaker: 陌生人
0005.cn: 但不等他练上几招，周围就传来一阵叫骂声：“有病啊！大晚上的拆房？！”

0005.en: Zhang Yu stopped immediately, thinking helplessly, "The soundproofing in this rental is too poor. I can't practice martial arts at night."
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: 张羽立刻停了下来，心中无奈道：“出租屋的隔音太差，晚上没法练武啊。”

0005.en: Looking at the Feather Book that appeared in his palm, Zhang Yu couldn't contain his excitement. He wanted to train hard right away, to practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms ten times in one go to see the effect.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 看着掌中浮现的羽书，张羽有些按耐不住心中的蠢蠢欲动，只想立刻一顿爆练，一口气将健体三十六式练个十遍看看效果。

0005.en: "Should I find another place?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “要不换个地方？”

0005.en: "I remember there's an abandoned, unfinished building nearby..."
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “我记得附近有座没人的烂尾楼……”

0005.en: In the darkness.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 一片黑暗中。

0005.en: The sound of thuds echoed in the corridor of the unfinished building.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 砰砰砰的声音不断在烂尾楼的楼道中回响。

0005.en: As the neon lights from the distant street flickered, the figure of a young man appeared and disappeared in the shadows.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 伴随着远处街道上的霓虹灯来回闪烁，一名少年的身影时不时浮现在阴影之中。

0005.en: It was Zhang Yu, who had come to the unfinished building to practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 正是赶来烂尾楼练习健体三十六式的张羽。

0005.en: At this moment, his gaze was serious as he practiced the exercises of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms. Soon, he was drenched in sweat, steam rising from his body.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 只见此刻的他目光凝重，正一招招地演练着健体三十六式的锻炼之法，片刻后便已经浑身汗流浃背，看上去热气腾腾。

0005.en: Zhang Yu had already exercised all morning and collapsed on the ground. Without the help of injections, pills, or dietary supplements, he felt sore all over as he practiced the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms. Every movement and exertion brought a tearing pain to his muscles.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 张羽白天本已经锻炼一上午，最终累趴在了地上，又没有针剂、丹药或者食补的辅助，此刻一练健体三十六式便感觉到浑身酸软，每一个动作每一次运劲都带来筋肉撕裂般的疼痛。

0005.en: But thinking of the changes in the Feather Book, his spirits lifted, and he persisted in finishing one round of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 不过想着羽书上的变化，他的精神就是一阵振作，最终坚持着将健体三十六式练完了一遍。

0005.en: Panting heavily, Zhang Yu eagerly opened his palm, and the Feather Book appeared again with his thought.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 气喘吁吁的张羽迫不及待地张开手掌，羽书再次伴随着他的意念浮现。

0005.en: Looking at 'Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 1 (1/10)' on it, a happy smile appeared on Zhang Yu's face.
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: 看着上面的‘健体三十六式1级（1/10）’，张羽的脸上忍不住露出一丝欣喜之色。

0005.en: "Is this my potential?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “这就是我的潜力吗？”

0005.en: "Upgrading the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms to Level 2... it seems really possible."
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “将健体三十六式提升到2级……好像真的能行啊。”

0005.en: "I'm going to practice ten times tonight!"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “我今天晚上就要练够十遍！”

0005.en: Zhang Yu eagerly started the second round of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 张羽迫不及待又开始了第二遍健体三十六式。

0005.en: But a moment later, he collapsed to the ground, exhausted, feeling as if his arms and legs were no longer his own.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 但片刻之后，他便累得坐倒在了地上，只觉得双手双脚好像都已经不是自己的了。

0005.en: "I can't go on, I've reached my limit. Looks like I'll have to try again tomorrow."
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “不行了，到极限了，看样子只能明天再试了。”

0005.en: Just as Zhang Yu decided to stop training, rest a bit, and then go home for a good sleep, a sudden chill rose in his heart.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 就在张羽决定停止锻炼，休息一下就回家好好睡一觉的时候，一股恶寒猛地从他心中涌起。

0005.en: At the same time, a voice echoed in his mind.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 与此同时，一道声音也在他脑海中响了起来。

0005.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement, work hard to fulfill your wish, and do not deliberately slack off or delay. 10."
0005.speaker: 邪神
0005.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，10。”

0005.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement, work hard to fulfill your wish, and do not deliberately slack off or delay. 9."
0005.speaker: 邪神
0005.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，9。”

0005.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement, work hard to fulfill your wish, and do not deliberately slack off or delay. 8."
0005.speaker: 邪神
0005.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，8。”

0005.en: As the voice continued its countdown, the chill in Zhang Yu's heart grew stronger, as if something was about to burst out from his body and tear him apart.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 随着那个声音的倒计时不断继续，张羽心中那股恶寒也越来越激烈，就好像有什么东西要从他体内狂涌而出，将他的浑身血肉统统撕裂。

0005.en: "Ritual... agreement... wish..." He immediately understood, "Is this the power of that God-Summoning Ritual?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “仪式……约定……愿望……”他也马上反应了过来：“这难道是那什么请神仪式的力量？”

0005.en: The words the doll had said flashed through Zhang Yu's mind.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 张羽脑海中立刻泛起了那布娃娃曾说过的话。

0005.en: "If you choose to refuse to fulfill my wish, or deliberately delay or fail in the process, you will suffer from the ritual's backlash, your body will explode, and your soul will scatter."
0005.speaker: 邪神
0005.cn: “若是你选择拒绝为我实现愿望，或者在实现的过程中故意拖延甚至失败，那都将在仪式的反噬之下，血肉爆裂魂飞魄散。”

0005.en: Zhang Yu thought, "So... it's because I plan to fulfill the second wish by studying hard, getting into a top university, joining a major sect, and earning money."
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: 张羽心道：“所以说……是因为我打算通过努力学习，考上名牌大学，加入大宗门，赚钱来完成第二个愿望。”

0005.en: "So, slacking off in this process is considered deliberately being lazy and delaying the fulfillment of the wish?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “那么在这个过程中有所懈怠，就被认为是对完成愿望故意偷懒拖延？”

0005.en: "If I don't listen, will I die from the ritual's backlash?"
0005.speaker: 张羽
0005.cn: “我若不听的话，莫非就要死在仪式反噬之下？”

0005.en: Hearing the countdown had already reached 3, Zhang Yu quickly jumped up.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 听着那倒计时不知不觉已经数到了3，张羽连忙跳了起来。

0005.en: With a cry of pain, he forced himself to practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, enduring the tearing pain in his muscles.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 伴随着一声惨叫，他便强忍着浑身筋肉撕裂般的痛苦，开始练习健体三十六式。

0005.en: The moment he began to practice, the countdown disappeared completely.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 而就在他开始练习的那一刻，刚刚的倒计时也彻底消失无踪了。

0006.en: Chapter 6: Freedom
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 第6章 自由

0006.en: "Damn it!"
0006.speaker: 张羽

0006.en: Thump!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 砰！

0006.en: "Damn it!"
0006.speaker: 张羽

0006.en: Thump!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 砰！

0006.en: "Damn it!"
0006.speaker: 张羽

0006.en: Thump! Thump!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 砰！砰！

0006.en: In the pitch-black concrete room, amid low grunts and thudding sounds, Zhang Yu finally finished his second round of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, enduring the intense pain that wracked his body.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 黑洞洞的水泥房中，伴随着一阵阵的低喝与撞击声，张羽终于顶着浑身不断传来的剧烈痛苦，将健体三十六式练完了第二遍。

0006.en: He collapsed to the ground with a thud, gasping for air.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 只见他砰的一声坐倒在地上，整个人已经大口大口喘起气来。

0006.en: Feeling his limbs still trembling slightly, Zhang Yu felt that his body had reached its absolute limit; every inch of him refused to move.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 感受着还在微微颤抖的双手双脚，张羽只觉得这具身体已经彻底到了极限，浑身上下的每一寸血肉都不想动弹了。

0006.en: But just then, the chilling sensation and the voice in his mind returned.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 但就在这样的状况下，那股恶寒和脑海中的声音再次传了过来。

0006.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement. Work hard to fulfill your wish. Do not be lazy or procrastinate. 10."
0006.speaker: 邪神
0006.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，10。”

0006.en: "Damn it!" Zhang Yu cursed in his heart. "I'm already at my limit!"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “靠！”张羽心中怒骂一声：“我已经到极限了啊！”

0006.en: "I really can't train anymore!"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “我真练不动了！”

0006.en: "I have school tomorrow!"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “我明天还要上课啊！”

0006.en: But no matter what he said or how he explained, the countdown continued without any pause or hesitation.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 但不论他如何去说，又如何解释，那倒计时却是没有任何的停顿和迟疑。

0006.en: Seeing the countdown nearing its end, Zhang Yu could only curse as he stumbled back to his feet and resumed his training.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 眼看着倒计时一步步就要走到最后，张羽只能骂了一声，再次跌跌撞撞爬了起来练功。

0006.en: Normally, when people exercise alone, it's difficult for them to push themselves to their true limits.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 正常情况下，大部分人独自进行锻炼的时候，是很难将自己迫至真正极限的情况的。

0006.en: Only with a master, teacher, or coach supervising and making strict demands can a person truly push their limits again and again.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 只有在师父、老师、教练……在有人监督和严格要求的情况下，人往往才能一次次锻炼至极限。

0006.en: It was the same for Zhang Yu. If he had been alone, he probably would have done the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms once or twice and then rested, too tired to move.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 对张羽来说也是如此，如果换他自己一个人的话，恐怕今天练了一两遍健体三十六式就累得不想动弹，直接休息了。

0006.en: But now, the ritual's power was like a devil coach, constantly watching him and using death as a threat to push him to train without a hint of laziness.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 但仪式的力量在此刻便好像一个魔鬼教练，时时刻刻盯着他，并以死亡相威胁，敦促着他不能有丝毫偷懒地锻炼下去。

0006.en: The third time...
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 第三遍……

0006.en: The fourth time...
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 第四遍……

0006.en: The fifth time...
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 第五遍……

0006.en: All the way to the tenth time!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 一直到第十遍！

0006.en: Under the repeated threats of the ritual, Zhang Yu completed the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms a full ten times!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 在仪式力量的反复威胁下，张羽足足将健体三十六式练到了第十遍！

0006.en: During this time, the feeling in his muscles went from a tearing sensation to a sharp, stabbing pain, and finally to a growing numbness. He even felt as if his hands and feet were disappearing.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 这期间他浑身上下的血肉从撕裂般的痛苦，到针扎般的巨疼，再到最后似已渐渐开始麻木，他甚至已经感觉自己的双手双脚都要消失了。

0006.en: At the same time, every bit of his mana was forced out and channeled into his damaged muscles.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 与此同时，体内的每一丝法力也被逼迫了出来，不断注入那些受损的血肉之中。

0006.en: After finishing the ten rounds, Zhang Yu felt as if both his body and his mana had been completely squeezed dry, like a rag that had been wrung out thousands of times with not a single drop left.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 这十遍锻炼完了之后，张羽只感觉不论是浑身血肉还是体内法力都像是被榨干了一样，如同一块被拧了几千几万遍的抹布，是一滴都拧不出来了。

0006.en: Now, Zhang Yu just wanted to lie on the floor, unwilling to move even a muscle.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 此刻的张羽便只想这么躺在地上，一丝一毫都懒得动弹。

0006.en: To his relief, the death-chasing voice didn't sound again. It seemed to believe that he had truly given his all and reached his absolute limit.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 让他庆幸的是，一直催命似催着他的声音这一次没有再响起，似乎认为此刻的他已经真正拼尽全力，真正达到了极限。

0006.en: During his training, Zhang Yu had also started to understand the nature of the ritual's power.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 而在刚刚锻炼的过程中，张羽也稍稍摸清了这股仪式力量的特性。

0006.en: "This thing is a bit like a dumb AI. It doesn't have real intelligence, it just operates on a set of rules..."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “这玩意有点像是个人工智障，并没有真正的智慧，只是按照一定的规则进行运转……”

0006.en: Zhang Yu had seen similar things in movies, TV shows, and news reports in Kunxu.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 类似的东西，张羽曾经在昆墟的电影电视还有新闻里都看过。

0006.en: Powerful magic tools contained spirits, and these spirits were like artificial intelligences, possessing some wisdom to handle various problems. The most powerful ones even had intelligence equal to humans.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 那些强大的法宝之中都蕴含器灵，这些器灵便都像是人工智能一样，有着一定的智慧来处理种种问题，甚至那些足够强大的器灵都有着不亚于人类的智能。

0006.en: Now, certain that the ritual's power wasn't going to force him to train anymore, Zhang Yu could finally relax and feel the effects of upgrading the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 此时此刻，在确定了仪式力量没有再出来逼着他锻炼后，张羽也终于能放松一下精神，感受一下健体三十六式升级后的效果了

0006.en: Yes, as soon as he completed the tenth round, he could feel that the martial art had leveled up.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 是的，就在张羽完成第十遍的健体三十六式后，他能感觉到这门武学升级了。

0006.en: In that instant, his knowledge and understanding of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms became much deeper.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 在那一刹那间，他对健体三十六式的认知、理解都变得更深刻。

0006.en: Many details he hadn't noticed or understood before now flashed through his mind like lightning.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 原本许多并没有注意到的、不够理解的细节，在那一瞬间都如同一道闪电乍现，浮现在他的脑海之中。

0006.en: And on the Feather Book, the initial 'Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Lvl 1 (0/10)' had changed to 'Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Lvl 2 (0/20)'.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 而羽书之上，最初的‘健体三十六式1级（0/10）’也变成了‘健体三十六式2级（0/20）’。

0006.en: "I just need to practice 20 more times to get it to level 3?"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “只要再练20遍就能把健体三十六式提升到3级？”

0006.en: "If I keep training like this, won't I get it to level 10 soon?"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “照这么练下去，岂不是很快就能把健体三十六式推到10级了？”

0006.en: Zhang Yu knew that in the Qi Refining realm, the maximum level for martial arts and techniques was 10.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 张羽知道在炼气境界，武功道术的等级最高只能修炼至10级。

0006.en: "At that point, even without injections or pills, my training results won't be any worse than Bai Zhenzhen's... No, they might even be far better."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “到时候哪怕我不扎针，不吃药，锻炼的效果也不在白真真他们之下……不，可能还要远超。”

0006.en: "If this keeps up, it's not impossible for my physical strength to become number one in the grade."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “这样下去，以后把肉体强度提升到年级第一也不是不可能啊。”

0006.en: At this thought, Zhang Yu felt a surge of excitement, and the pain in his body seemed to lessen.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 想到这里，张羽心中振奋，只觉得浑身上下都没那么疼了。

0006.en: "Incredible. My potential is truly incredible. Once it's unleashed by the Evil God, I'm going to soar."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “恐怖啊，我的潜力实在是太恐怖了，一旦被邪神激发出来以后，简直要一飞冲天了。”

0006.en: With beautiful visions of the future, the physically exhausted Zhang Yu gradually felt sleepy and drifted off without realizing it.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 带着对未来的美好想象，肉体锻炼至极限的张羽渐渐陷入了困意之中，不知不觉就睡了过去。

0006.en: He slept until five the next morning, waking up instinctively, just as he had countless times before.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 一觉睡到了第二天早上五点，张羽才本能地醒了过来，就好像是过去无数次在五点起床一样。

0006.en: But today, his limbs were sore and weak, and even opening his eyes was a struggle.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 但今天的他四肢百骸一片酸软，就连睁开眼睛都无比费力。

0006.en: Although he was awake, Zhang Yu had no desire to get up. He just wanted to sleep a little longer, even if it was on the concrete floor of an abandoned building.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 这一刻的张羽虽然已经苏醒了过来，却根本不想起床，只想继续睡上一会儿，哪怕这里是烂尾楼的水泥地上。

0006.en: "Five more minutes... just five more minutes..."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “五分钟……就再睡五分钟……”

0006.en: But just as Zhang Yu tried to sleep in, a chilling voice echoed in his mind again.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 但就在张羽想要赖床的这一刻，一道让他恶寒的声音再次从他心底响了起来。

0006.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement. Work hard to fulfill your wish. Do not be lazy or procrastinate. 10."
0006.speaker: 邪神
0006.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，10。”

0006.en: "Damn it!" Zhang Yu's eyes flew open. After listening to the voice continue and confirming it wasn't a hallucination, he could only curse as he sat up.
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “我靠！”张羽猛地睁开双眼，仔细听着那声音继续响起，在反复确认这并不是幻觉之后，只能骂骂咧咧地坐了起来。

0006.en: At that moment, Zhang Yu suddenly realized that things might be more serious than he had imagined.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 这一刻的张羽陡然意识到，事情可能比他原来想象的更严重。

0006.en: "From now on, for anything related to studying, cultivating, getting into college, or working—anything related to fulfilling my second wish... I can't slack off even a little bit?"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “以后只要和学习、修炼、考大学、工作有关的事情，也就是和学习、修炼、工作、赚钱去满足第二愿望有关的事情……我都不能有一点点懈怠了？”

0006.en: "A 24-hour supervisor, is that it?"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “24小时监工是吧。”

0006.en: Exhausted and weary, Zhang Yu could only hurry back to his rented room.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 带着一身的疲惫和劳累，张羽只能急匆匆地赶回了出租房。

0006.en: Feeling greasy and sweaty, he quickly paid 323.4 for water, took a five-minute shower, and then rushed to the bus stop.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 感觉到自己满身的油腻和汗渍，他抓紧时间补了323.4的水费，又用五分钟冲了个澡以后，便匆匆忙忙地赶往了公交车站。

0006.en: Looking up at the display at the stop, Zhang Yu thought, "The next bus arrives in ten minutes?"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: 抬头看了一眼站台上的显示屏，张羽心道：“下一班车还有十分钟到站吗？”

0006.en: Leaning against a pole, he thought to himself, "I'll rest for a bit. Good thing that damn thing isn't telling me to use this time to train."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: 找了个杆子靠着，他心中暗道：“休息一会吧，还好那破玩意没叫我抓紧这点时间练功。”

0006.en: The moment he had that thought, he regretted it.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 刚刚想到这一点的张羽便后悔了。

0006.en: A chill ran through him, and the nightmare-like voice sounded again.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 因为一股恶寒从他心中涌出，那如同噩梦似的声音再次响了起来。

0006.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement. Work hard to fulfill your wish. Do not be lazy or procrastinate. 10."
0006.speaker: 邪神
0006.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，10。”

0006.en: "What the..." Zhang Yu cursed internally. "Is this thing monitoring my thoughts? If I think of a way to work hard and don't do it... it's going to kill me?"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “我他……”张羽心中骂道：“这玩意一直在监控我脑袋里的想法吗？只要我想到了努力的方法而没有去做……就要弄死我？”

0006.en: And so, as the countdown continued, Zhang Yu, despite his exhaustion, began practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, surrounded by the surprised, confused, admiring, or indifferent gazes of the people around him.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 于是在一声声倒数中，张羽只能顶着一身劳累，在四周围人或惊讶，或疑惑，或赞赏，或无所谓的目光中，开始了健体三十六式的锻炼。

0006.en: "Hah!"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: 喝！

0006.en: Thump!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 砰！

0006.en: With a final punch, a sweaty Zhang Yu collapsed to the ground again.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 伴随着最后一拳击出，出了一身汗的张羽再次累得坐倒在了地上。

0006.en: Watching the bus approach in the distance, he felt a wave of relief. "It's finally here."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: 看着远处越来越近的公交车，他心中庆幸无比：“终于来了。”

0006.en: And today, he even found a seat on the bus, which made him even happier.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 而今天的公交车上竟然还被张羽找到一个位置坐下，让他心中又是一喜。

0006.en: "Finally, I can get some proper rest."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “终于能好好休息一下了。”

0006.en: "I'll just close my eyes for a bit. It can't possibly force me to train on the bus, can it? Unless it's breathing exercises..."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “稍微眯一会吧，公交车上总不能逼我练功了吧？除非是吐纳……”

0006.en: The moment he thought of breathing exercises, he had a bad feeling.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 刚刚想到吐纳这两个字，张羽就感觉不妙。

0006.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement. Work hard to fulfill your wish. Do not be lazy or procrastinate. 10."
0006.speaker: 邪神
0006.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，10。”

0006.en: As expected, the countdown started again, forcing Zhang Yu to practice his basic breathing exercises while riding the bus.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 果然那倒计时又响了起来，逼着张羽一边坐车，一边运转基础吐纳法。

0006.en: Practicing breathing exercises on the bus sounded simple and efficient, but even the old Zhang Yu had given up after a few tries.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 坐车的时候顺便吐纳，这件事情听上去很简单很划算，但就算是以前的张羽试过几次后便也都放弃了。

0006.en: First, the environment on the bus was too noisy, making it difficult to concentrate.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 一是因为车上的环境太嘈杂，让人难以集中精神。

0006.en: Second, and most importantly, Zhang Yu, who woke up early every day, was too tired.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 第二点，也是最重要的一点，便是每天早起的张羽太累了。

0006.en: When he was lucky enough to get a seat, he just wanted to take a short nap and couldn't find the energy to practice.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 难得有一个位置的他只想小小眯一会，根本打不起精神吐纳。

0006.en: The few times he had tried, he would usually start to feel drowsy and fall asleep after a short while.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 尝试过的几次，也往往吐纳了一会就开始迷糊地想睡觉了。

0006.en: But now, forced by the ritual's power, Zhang Yu had to push himself to practice, fighting off sleepiness as he tried to absorb the spiritual energy from the world with each breath.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 但此刻在仪式力量的逼迫下，张羽只能努力吐纳起来，在不断对抗睡意的过程中，通过一呼一吸间努力吸收着天地间的灵机。

0006.en: At this point, he fully understood that the situation was far more serious than he had thought.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 这个时候的他也彻底明白事情比他之前想的更要严重的多。

0006.en: "This isn't just a 24-hour supervisor. This is pushing me to my death at every moment."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “这不是普通的24小时监工，这是时时刻刻把我往死里逼啊。”

0006.en: "As long as this thing is on me, all laziness, slacking, entertainment, enjoyment, and relaxation... will be gone from my life."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “只要这玩意还在我身上，那一切偷懒、摸鱼、娱乐、享受、放松……都将离我而去。”

0006.en: "There will be no more weekends, no more holidays. My life will have no more joy. Every minute and every second will be dedicated to studying, cultivating, and working... until the second wish is fulfilled."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “再也没有周末，更不存在假期，我的人生再无乐趣，每一分每一秒都将献给学习，献给修炼，献给工作……直到完成第二愿望。”

0006.en: Zhang Yu unconsciously clutched his head. "I will become a complete learning machine, a workhorse, with no leisure time at all. I will have to be a grinder for the rest of my life... until I'm finally crushed by the pressure!"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: 张羽不知不觉抱住了自己的脑袋：“我将成为彻彻底底的学习机器、工作牛马，再也没有任何的闲暇时间，一辈子都要当个卷王……直到被这种压力彻底摧垮为止！”

0006.en: He lamented in his heart, "If my whole life is going to be like this, then what's the point of succeeding in cultivation and living a few hundred more years? More years of life just means more years of suffering."
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: 他心中哀叹道：“要是这辈子都这样，那就算仙道有成，再多活个几百年又有什么用？多活多少年，就是再多吃多少年的苦啊。”

0006.en: "Oh, heavens!"
0006.speaker: 张羽
0006.cn: “苍天啊！”

0006.en: The other passengers looked at Zhang Yu, who was holding his head in agony.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 周围的乘客们都看向了抱着脑袋一脸痛苦的张羽。

0006.en: But Zhang Yu could no longer care about them. As the "Please abide by the ritual's agreement..." countdown began again, he sat up straight, suppressed the sorrow in his heart, and continued his basic breathing exercises.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 可张羽已经管不上这些了，伴随着“请遵守仪式约定……”的倒计时再次响起，他已经重新正襟危坐，强压着心中的悲哀，继续运转基础吐纳法。

0006.en: But at the same time, a new resolve began to grow within him.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 但与此同时，张羽的心中也渐渐涌起一股决意。

0006.en: In fact, until this morning, the Zhang Yu who had arrived in this world had been somewhat lost.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 事实上直到今天早上为止，来到这个世界的张羽心里都是有些迷茫的。

0006.en: Although he thought about getting into a famous university, joining a great sect, and succeeding in cultivation, it was hard to say how much of that was the influence of the original owner's memories, a choice made by following the inertia of life.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 虽然想着要考上名牌大学，加入大宗门，修炼仙道有成，但很难说其中有多少是原身记忆的影响，是他顺着生活惯性的选择。

0006.en: But at this moment, Zhang Yu finally had a goal, something he was determined to achieve, no matter the setbacks.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 直到这一刻，张羽终于有了一个目标，一个他下定决心，百折不挠也要完成的事情。

0006.en: That was to become strong enough—strong enough to completely remove the ritual's power that was forcing him.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 那就是变得足够强大，强大到把这股逼迫着他的仪式力量彻底去除。

0006.en: Zhang Yu wanted... freedom!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 张羽想要……自由！

0007.en: Chapter 7: The Gap Between People
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 第7章 人和人的差距

0007.en: On the bus.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 公交车上。

0007.en: After getting the Feather Book, Zhang Yu thought his future life would be: "Feather Book! Let me see your limits!"
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 拥有了羽书之后，张羽本以为自己未来的生活会是：羽书！让我看看你的极限在哪里！

0007.en: Who knew it would instantly become... Ritual: "Zhang Yu! Let me see your limits!"
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 哪知道转眼就变成了……仪式：张羽！让我看看你的极限在哪里！

0007.en: But with things as they were, the only way Zhang Yu could think of to break the ritual's power was to become stronger.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但事已至此，张羽想要解除仪式的力量，他唯一能想到的路子就是让自己变得更强。

0007.en: So for now, he could only cultivate diligently.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 于是他此刻也只能努力修行。

0007.en: With each breath, wisps of spiritual energy from the world flowed into his body, gathering in his dantian's sea of qi. It was refined drop by drop into mana, solidifying his cultivation foundation.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 只见张羽一呼一吸之间，天地间的灵机一缕缕地涌入他的体内，汇聚到丹田气海之中，被一点一滴地提炼为法力，夯实着他的仙道基础。

0007.en: However, thinking about practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms last night, Zhang Yu wanted to try the same method to see if he could quickly level up his Basic Breathing Technique.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 不过想到昨天晚上练习健体三十六式的过程，张羽便想要如法炮制，看看能不能把基础吐纳法也迅速提升级别。

0007.en: As the thought crossed his mind, the Feather Book opened. Zhang Yu focused his attention on 'Basic Breathing Technique Level 1' on the page and immediately dragged it.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 只见羽书随着他心念一动而展开，接着张羽的注意力向书页上的‘基础吐纳法1级’稍稍集中过去，立刻就将‘基础吐纳法1级’拖动了起来。

0007.en: But just as he dragged 'Basic Breathing Technique Level 1' toward his character portrait, a flash of understanding emerged from the Feather Book.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但就在他将‘基础吐纳法1级’拖向自己的人物画像时，一丝明悟从羽书中涌出。

0007.en: "You can only focus on improving one skill at a time."
0007.speaker: 羽书
0007.cn: “一次只能专注于提升一个技能。”

0007.en: "Once you switch, you must wait a day before switching again."
0007.speaker: 羽书
0007.cn: “切换一次，就要等待一天时间才能再次切换。”

0007.en: In his mind, Zhang Yu named this function of the Feather Book 'Specialization'.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 张羽心中将羽书的这项功能取名为专精。

0007.en: At that moment, he understood that a specialized skill could be improved rapidly, but he could only specialize in one skill at a time and had to wait a day after switching before he could switch again.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 这一刻，他一下子明白被专精的技能可以得到快速提升，但一段时间里只能专精一项技能，切换技能后要等一天时间才能再次切换。

0007.en: "So, if I switch my specialization from the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms to the Basic Breathing Technique, the breathing technique will improve quickly with practice, but the Body-Strengthening forms will go back to their normal training efficiency."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: “也就是说如果我现在把专精从健体三十六式切换成基础吐纳法的话，那接下来基础吐纳法可以通过练习而快速提升，但是健体三十六式又会恢复原本正常的练习效率。”

0007.en: "Unless I switch back to the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms after a day..."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: “除非一天之后，我再把健体三十六式切换回来……”

0007.en: Thinking about the situation in PE class, Zhang Yu decided not to switch for now and to continue focusing on improving the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 想到体育课上的情况，张羽便决定暂时不做切换，继续以提升健体三十六式为主。

0007.en: Time passed in a flash, and Zhang Yu maintained his Basic Breathing Technique until the moment he got off the bus.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 转眼间时间过去，张羽便维持着基础吐纳法，直到下车前的那一刻。

0007.en: In the school cafeteria.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 学校食堂内。

0007.en: Bai Zhenzhen, carrying her tray, sat down in front of a zombie-like Zhang Yu. She gave him a curious look and said coolly, "Were you busy all night?"
0007.speaker: 白真真
0007.cn: 白真真端着餐盘，来到宛如行尸走肉般的张羽面前坐下，好奇地看了对方一眼，淡淡道：“昨天导了一晚上？”

0007.en: Zhang Yu wolfed down the large meat bun in his hand and grumbled, "I was working hard, training late into the night."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 张羽一口吞下手中的大肉包，骂骂咧咧道：“老子是用功锻炼到了深夜。”

0007.en: Bai Zhenzhen's face was expressionless, but her words were blunt. "Sigh, you're the only one in the whole school who hasn't had the sterilization surgery. I told you not to save that twenty thousand yuan. Look how much time, energy, and protein you've wasted."
0007.speaker: 白真真
0007.cn: 白真真脸上面无表情，嘴上却毫无顾忌道：“唉，全校就你没做绝育手术了，早就劝你别节约那两万块钱，看看你浪费了多少时间，多少精力，多少蛋白质？”

0007.en: Zhang Yu swallowed an egg in one bite and said with a confident smile, "Bai Zhenzhen, let me tell you something. Even I am amazed by my own self-discipline and potential now. It won't be long before I take your spot as number one in the grade."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 张羽又一口吞掉一颗鸡蛋，自信一笑道：“白真真，告诉你一件事情，我现在的自律和潜力连我自己都感觉到心惊，你这年级第一的宝座要不了多久就会被我抢下来的。”

0007.en: Hearing this, Bai Zhenzhen rolled her eyes and said bluntly, "Yu, it's fine to say such overconfident things to me, but if anyone else heard you, I'm afraid they'd laugh so hard they'd pee."
0007.speaker: 白真真
0007.cn: 白真真闻言却是快速翻了个白眼，秀气的小嘴说着毫不留情的话：“羽子，这种不自量力的话在我面前说说就算了，给外人听到了我怕人家连尿都要笑出来啊。”

0007.en: "You're competing for first in the grade, not first in self-pleasure. Your un-sterilized advantage won't help you here."
0007.speaker: 白真真
0007.cn: “你要争的是年级总分第一，不是年级导管第一，你没绝育的优势用不上。”

0007.en: Zhang Yu shook his head speechlessly, thinking, "This girl Zhenzhen, she acts so cold all the time, but in private, she dares to say anything."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 张羽无语地摇了摇头，心道：“阿真这家伙，平时装得冷冰冰的，私底下什么都敢说是吧。”

0007.en: Speaking of being the only student in school who hadn't been sterilized, Zhang Yu wasn't that surprised anymore. He was gradually getting used to the madness of this damned world and school.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 说起全校学生就他没做绝育手术，张羽对此已经没那么惊讶了，他已经渐渐习惯了这破世界破学校的癫狂。

0007.en: However, not being sterilized was still a little secret of his, which he had only told Bai Zhenzhen among his classmates.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 不过没绝育的事情仍旧是他的一个小秘密，同学之中张羽也只和白真真说过。

0007.en: But thinking about it now, a question suddenly popped into his mind: "Why was I allowed to enroll without having the surgery?"
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 但此刻想到这点，张羽心中突然涌出一个疑惑：“为什么我没做绝育手术就能入学？”

0007.en: Just then, Zhou Tianyi also sat down with his tray, looking at Zhang Yu with curiosity. "You look exhausted. Did you study all night?"
0007.speaker: 周天翊
0007.cn: 就在这时，周天翊也端着餐盘坐了过来，同样好奇地看向张羽：“你看上去很累啊，昨天通宵学习了？”

0007.en: Zhang Yu shook his head and said, "I practiced the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms for a bit and had a moment of insight."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 张羽摇了摇头说道：“稍稍练了一会儿健体三十六式，心中偶有所得。”

0007.en: While they ate and chatted, Zhang Yu suddenly noticed that after Zhou Tianyi arrived, Bai Zhenzhen became much quieter, as if she had turned back into the cold, quiet top student.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 吃饭聊天时，张羽突然有了一个发现，似乎周天翊来了以后，白真真的话就少了许多，好像又变成了那个冷淡、话少的学霸。

0007.en: After breakfast, the three of them walked across the sports field toward the classroom building.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 吃完早饭，三人顺着操场一路走向了教室的方向。

0007.en: From time to time, Zhang Yu would open his palm, watching the Feather Book appear and disappear.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 张羽时不时张开手掌，看着羽书从自己的掌心浮现和消失。

0007.en: "So, no one else can see the Feather Book, right?"
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: “果然大家都看不见羽书吗？”

0007.en: Just then, a loud bang came from the direction of the school building, followed by a series of shouts and screams.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 就在这时，却听砰的一声从教学楼的方向传来，然后又是一阵阵大呼小叫声响个不停。

0007.en: A crowd had already gathered in front of the main entrance of the building. A body with a smashed head lay quietly on the ground.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 只见教学大楼的正门前已经围了一圈人，一具脑袋开花的尸体正静静躺在地上。

0007.en: The people around were murmuring, and someone had already recognized the body.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 四周围的人则是议论纷纷，已经有人认出了尸体的身份。

0007.en: Someone familiar with the deceased was sharing gossip.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 有熟悉的人说着死者的八卦。

0007.en: "That's Lu Chao from Senior 3, Class 3. He used to be in the honors class, right? I think his grades were slipping, and he was about to be moved to a lower class again."
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: “这是高三（3）班的卢超，他以前是示范班的，好像是成绩一直下滑，又要掉班了吧？”

0007.en: "Lu Chao? He was in the top ten of the grade back in Senior 2."
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: “卢超啊，他高二的时候还是年级前十。”

0007.en: Someone with a prejudice against the poor started a broad attack.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 有贫穷歧视者开始了范围攻击。

0007.en: "So what if his grades were good in Senior 2? The poor are poor. By Senior 3, how many poor students are left in the honors class? Poor people just aren't suited for cultivation."
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: “高二成绩好又怎么样？穷人就是穷人，你看到了高三还有几个穷人能留在示范班的，穷人就不适合修仙。”

0007.en: Someone with severe grade discrimination began their commentary.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 也有严重分数歧视的人开始自己的点评。

0007.en: "Hmph, he died just from jumping from the sixth floor. What a loser. If it were a top student from the Senior 3 honors class, I bet they'd have to jump from at least the tenth floor to die."
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: “哼，从六楼跳下来就死了，果然是个差生。如果是高三示范班的学霸跳下来，我看起码也得十层起跳才死得掉。”

0007.en: Passing by, Bai Zhenzhen looked at the scene and sighed, "Another Senior 3 student jumped?"
0007.speaker: 白真真
0007.cn: 路过的白真真看着这一幕，叹道：“又有高三的跳楼了？”

0007.en: Zhou Tianyi said, "This is the third one this year, right? It seems like this year's Senior 3 class is under a lot of pressure."
0007.speaker: 周天翊
0007.cn: 周天翊说道：“这是今年第三起了吧，看来这届高三的压力很大。”

0007.en: But Zhang Yu suddenly asked, "Was he very poor?"
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 张羽却是突然问道：“他很穷吗？”

0007.en: Bai Zhenzhen glanced at him. It was unclear if she was advising or lamenting as she said flatly, "He probably took out a lot of loans. Anyone who has to borrow money for school is definitely not rich."
0007.speaker: 白真真
0007.cn: 白真真瞄了他一眼，不知道是劝戒还是感叹，淡淡说道：“借贷了不少吧。反正读书还要借贷的，肯定不是有钱人咯。”

0007.en: "When students like him first enter Songyang High, their grades are often quite good."
0007.speaker: 白真真
0007.cn: “这种学生进入嵩阳高中之后，一开始成绩往往都还不错。”

0007.en: "But usually, by the time they reach Senior 3, they gradually fall behind their wealthy classmates. In the end, they can often only get into second or third-rate universities."
0007.speaker: 白真真
0007.cn: “但一般到了高三之后，就渐渐跟不上同班的富哥儿了，最后往往只能考上些二三流的大学。”

0007.en: "As for the Ten Greats, it seems like it's been over a decade since a commoner from Songyang High got accepted."
0007.speaker: 白真真
0007.cn: “至于十大，好像在嵩阳高中里，已经十几年没有平民能考上了吧。”

0007.en: Zhang Yu was stunned. He knew the "Ten Greats" referred to the universities directly under the Ten Great Sects, the top ten universities that countless students dreamed of.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 张羽闻言微微一怔，他知道所谓十大便是指十大宗门直属的大学，那也是最顶尖的十座大学，是无数学生的梦中情校。

0007.en: But he didn't know that no commoner from Songyang High had been accepted into the Ten Greats for over a decade.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但他不知道的是，嵩阳高中里竟然十几年没有平民子弟考上十大了。

0007.en: He thought to himself, "Is it because of a lack of resources and money?"
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 他心中暗道：“是因为资源不足，钱不够吗？”

0007.en: Zhang Yu recalled some rumors about the wealthy students. It was said that many top tutors, secret study materials, high-level techniques, and lab-made potions... only circulated within the circles of the rich and were never shared with the poor.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 张羽又想起了一些关于那些有钱学生们的传说，据说许多王牌补课老师，补习秘籍，高端的功法，实验室的药物……都只在那些有钱人的圈子里流传，从来不会透露给穷人。

0007.en: Looking at the splattered blood on the ground, Zhang Yu thought, "If my potential hadn't been unlocked, I might have ended up on the same path in the future."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 看着地上溅开的血水，张羽心中暗道：“我如果没有被激发潜力的话，未来说不定也可能走上这条路。”

0007.en: Although the suicide caused a stir, for students busy with studying and cultivating every day, it was just something to talk about during their breaks.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 跳楼事件虽然引发了一波热议，但对每天忙碌于学习、修炼的学生们来说，也就是一些休憩时的谈资。

0007.en: Soon, no one cared about it anymore. The students plunged back into their daily routine of cultivation studies, fighting for their futures.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 很快就没人在意这件事情，学生们继续投入到自己日复一日的仙道学习中，为自己未来的人生去拼搏。

0007.en: Even though they were only in their teens, everyone already knew a cruel fact.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 虽然他们只有十几岁，但人人都已经知道一个残酷的事实。

0007.en: Different scores led to different universities.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 根据不同的分数，进入不同的大学。

0007.en: Different universities determined one's future sect.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 根据不同的大学，决定未来的宗门。

0007.en: Different sects determined one's entire life.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 根据不同的宗门，决定人的一生。

0007.en: Whether they were friends or rivals, classmates with different scores would go their separate ways.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 周围的同学不伦关系好还是差，若成绩不同，都将分道扬镳。

0007.en: In the blink of an eye, it was time for the three-period-long PE class.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 时间转眼又来到了要连上3节的体育课上。

0007.en: After once again refusing PE teacher Wang Hai's sales pitch, Zhang Yu wondered if it was his imagination, but he felt the way the teacher looked at him had changed.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 再一次拒绝了体育老师王海的推销之后，张羽不知道是不是自己的错觉，他感觉到对方看着自己的目光似乎有些变了。

0007.en: But he couldn't do anything about it. Due to both money and health concerns, he couldn't take the injections anymore.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但他也实在没有办法，不论是钱的问题，还是健康问题，他都不可能再去扎药了。

0007.en: So Zhang Yu could only pretend not to notice and continue his practice.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 于是张羽只能当作没看见，继续着自己的练习。

0007.en: Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 2 (1/20)
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 健体三十六式2级（1/20）

0007.en: Counting the session before getting to school, Zhang Yu only needed to practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms 19 more times to level up.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 算上车站前锻炼的一次，此刻的张羽只需要再将健体三十六式练个19遍就能升级了。

0007.en: This motivated him during his training, pushing him to activate his muscles again and again, draining every last bit of his mana.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 这让他在接下来锻炼的过程中特别有干劲，一遍又一遍地催动着浑身筋肉，不断榨干每一寸法力。

0007.en: Even when he wanted to slow down and rest, the ritual's power would remind him to pull himself together and keep practicing.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 而就算有时候他想要缓一缓，想要休息一下，也会在仪式力量的提醒下，很快振作起来，继续努力练习。

0007.en: He pushed past his limits time and again, accompanied by the tearing pain in his muscles and the constant threat of death. It was both painful and joyful.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 伴随着浑身撕裂般的痛苦，一次次地突破极限，一次次的生死威胁，可谓是痛苦又快乐着。

0007.en: After more than two class periods, Zhang Yu finally collapsed on the ground, not wanting to move an inch.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 在花了两个多课时之后，张羽终于彻底躺倒在了地上，再也不想动弹一下。

0007.en: Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 2 (17/20)
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 健体三十六式2级（17/20）

0007.en: "I've reached my limit."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: “到极限了。”

0007.en: The ritual's power didn't force him further, apparently agreeing that he had reached his limit.
0007.speaker: 旁白
