0007.cn: 仪式力量也没有继续逼迫他，显然是同样认为他已经达到了极限。

0007.en: But Zhang Yu wasn't discouraged at all. To level up a basic martial art from Level 1 to almost Level 3 in just two days was something his past self wouldn't have dared to imagine.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但张羽却丝毫没有沮丧，两天时间就快把一门基础武学从第1级升到第3级，这绝对是以前的张羽想都不敢想的事情。

0007.en: "If I hadn't done the extra training last night, I probably could have lasted all three PE periods, right?"
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: “要是昨天晚上没加练的话，我应该能练满三节体育课吧？”

0007.en: "But with this damn ritual forcing me to train every second, I'm afraid it will become normal to train extra at night and then be too tired to train during PE class..."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: “不过有这狗屁仪式逼着我，让我抓紧每一分每一秒去锻炼，那恐怕以后晚上加练，反而体育课上累得只能休息而无法锻炼……都会是一种常态。”

0007.en: Zhang Yu felt it was like his past life, where some people crammed and studied all night only to sleep through class during the day. It was obviously not a healthy routine.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 张羽感觉这就像是上一世的时候，有人晚上疯狂补课和自习，白天在课堂上睡大觉，显然不是什么健康作息。

0007.en: "It's all this stupid ritual's fault. It has no sense of time or place."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: “都怪这智障仪式，根本分不清时间场合。”

0007.en: Just then, as he lay on the ground, Zhang Yu felt a shadow fall over him, as if a mountain was blocking the sun.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 就在这时，躺倒在地上的张羽突然感觉到自己的身体被一片阴影覆盖了，就好像有一座山挡在了自己的头上。

0007.en: Wang Hai looked down at Zhang Yu and said coldly, "It's PE class. What are you doing?"
0007.speaker: 王海
0007.cn: 王海看着地上的张羽，冷冷道：“体育课时间，你在干什么？”

0007.en: Zhang Yu quickly replied, "Teacher, I did extra training last night, so I'm a bit too tired to practice now."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 张羽连忙说道：“老师，我昨天晚上加练，现在有些练不动了。”

0007.en: Sensing Wang Hai's displeasure, Zhang Yu added, "My Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms broke through last night. I'm at Level 2 now."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 感觉到王海的面色不善，张羽又补充解释道：“我的健体三十六式昨晚突破了，已经升到2级了。”

0007.en: He offered this explanation because he knew that in this grade-obsessed school, most teachers wouldn't bother students with good results.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 之所以会有这么一个解释，是因为张羽知道在这个唯成绩论的学校中，绝大部分老师都不会为难成绩好的学生。

0007.en: He thought that if Wang Hai knew he had made significant progress, he wouldn't give him a hard time.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 他觉得王海若是知道他有很大进步的话，应该也不会为难他了。

0007.en: This was something Zhang Yu had started thinking about after vaguely sensing the change in Wang Hai's attitude toward him.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 这是张羽在隐隐察觉到王海对他态度变化后，便开始思考的一个事情。

0007.en: But Zhang Yu was wrong.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但张羽想错了。

0007.en: There are many kinds of teachers in this world.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 这个世界上的老师有很多种。

0007.en: For example, most main subject teachers at Songyang High liked high-achieving students. They were easy to teach and gave a sense of accomplishment, so they were more tolerant of their mistakes.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 比如嵩阳高中内的大部分主课老师都喜欢成绩好的学生，喜欢教导起来不费力，有教学成就感的学生，对成绩好的学生犯错都更能容忍。

0007.en: Other teachers poured more energy into underperforming students, focusing on improving their scores because it was easier to see improvement in them.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 也有的老师对成绩差的学生倾注更多的精力，专注提高差生的成绩，因为差生更容易提高。

0007.en: Many elective teachers didn't care how their students did. They clocked in, taught, and clocked out, considering any extra second spent on work a loss.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 还有很多副课老师无所谓学生学得怎么样，反正到点上课，到点下班，多一秒钟浪费在工作上算我输。

0007.en: But there was another type of teacher who, more than their students' grades, cared about whether students were obedient and whether their authority was challenged.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但还有一种老师，比起学生的成绩，这种老师有时候更在意学生听不听话，有没有挑战他的威严。

0007.en: In this kind of teacher's class, their word was law. They would not tolerate any defiance from students. Even if you just used a method they hadn't taught, they would mock you and use you as a bad example.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 在这种老师的课堂上，他便是绝对的权威，不接受任何学生的违逆，甚至你只是用了他没教的方法来学习，也会被他明嘲暗讽，拉出来当作典型给一通贬低。

0007.en: And clearly, Wang Hai, who liked to sell potions and use corporal punishment, was this type of teacher.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 而很显然，喜欢卖药和体罚学生的王海就是这种老师。

0007.en: PE class at Songyang High was his little kingdom, and the students were his sales channel for potions.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 嵩阳高中的体育课便是他的小王国，学生便是他倾销药剂的渠道。

0007.en: Zhang Yu's consistent refusal to buy his potions had already annoyed him.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 本来张羽一直都不买药，已经引起了他的不满。

0007.en: Seeing Zhang Yu lying down and 'slacking off' made him even more dissatisfied. He wanted to use this as an opportunity to teach him a lesson and make an example out of him, to shame those who didn't take injections and discourage natural training like Zhang Yu's.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 刚刚看到张羽躺下来‘偷懒’之后，他便更是不满，就想要借机教训对方一番，树立典型，让学生们以这个上课不扎针的人为耻，不要学张羽这样自然炼体。

0007.en: But his planned lecture was cut short by Zhang Yu's statement, "My Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms broke through last night."
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但他那一番教训的话却被张羽一句‘健体三十六式昨晚突破了’给堵在了嘴里。

0007.en: In Wang Hai's eyes, this was a challenge to his authority in PE class.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 这在王海看来已经挑衅了他在体育课上的权威。

0007.en: "So what if you're Level 2 in Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms?"
0007.speaker: 王海
0007.cn: “健体三十六式2级就了不起了吗？”

0007.en: Wang Hai pointed at Bai Zhenzhen and said, "Look at her. Did she stop taking injections after reaching Level 2? Does she slack off in class?"
0007.speaker: 王海
0007.cn: 王海指着白真真说道：“你看她2级以后就不扎针了吗，上课偷懒了吗？”

0007.en: Zhang Yu said helplessly, "Teacher, that's not what I meant..."
0007.speaker: 张羽
0007.cn: 张羽无奈道：“老师，我不是这个意思……”

0007.en: Wang Hai said coldly, "Zhang Yu, I've seen plenty of students like you. You think you can ignore your teacher's guidance and the school's curriculum just because you have a little talent."
0007.speaker: 王海
0007.cn: 王海冷冷道：“张羽，你这样的学生我看多了，仗着自己有点天赋就不听老师的指导，不管学校的教学。”

0007.en: "You need to understand that the only reason you broke through is because you have been diligently attending class and taking injections for the past three months. My guidance laid a solid foundation for you."
0007.speaker: 王海
0007.cn: “你要明白你之所以能突破，是因为过去三个月来一直认认真真地上课、扎针，是有我的指导才给你打下的扎实基础。”

0007.en: "As for your self-study or tutoring outside of school, that's just dessert at best."
0007.speaker: 王海
0007.cn: “至于你在外面自习也好，补课也罢，那最多都只能算是甜点。”

0007.en: "Only the classes here at school are the main course."
0007.speaker: 王海
0007.cn: “只有学校里的课才是最重要的主餐。”

0007.en: "I will report your attitude to your homeroom teacher. You'd better watch yourself."
0007.speaker: 王海
0007.cn: “你的问题我会跟你班主任反应的，你好自为之吧。”

0008.en: Chapter 8: A Teacher's Care
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 第8章 老师的关心

0008.en: Until the end of PE class, Wang Hai completely ignored Zhang Yu, as if he were just a puff of air, offering no guidance or instruction.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 直到体育课下课，王海都没有再理会张羽，似乎将他当成了一团空气，也不再对他进行任何的指导和教学。

0008.en: With Wang Hai leading the isolation, the other students also subconsciously avoided Zhang Yu, creating an invisible no-man's-land around him.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 而在王海这样的带头孤立下，其他同学也都下意识地不再接近张羽，像是在他身边空出了一个无形的无人区。

0008.en: "That Old Wang is so... How can he be so petty."
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: “这老王真是……心眼怎么这么小。”

0008.en: But since things had come to this, Zhang Yu could do nothing about it, so he simply lay down quietly on the ground to continue resting.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 但事已至此，张羽也没什么办法，干脆安安静静地躺倒在地上继续休息。

0008.en: In the blink of an eye, class was over, and everyone gradually headed to the cafeteria.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 转眼间下课时间到了，众人陆陆续续赶去了食堂。

0008.en: After everyone else had left, Zhou Tianyi walked over to Zhang Yu and gave him a thumbs-up. "Brave warrior, did you buy accident insurance?"
0008.speaker: 周天翊
0008.cn: 周天翊在众人离开后走到了张羽的身旁，朝对方竖起个大拇指：“勇士，你买好意外保险了吗？”

0008.en: Zhang Yu slowly got up, dusted off his pants, and said, "What's there to be afraid of? Once my cultivation improves and my scores shoot up, there will be plenty of teachers backing me."
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 张羽缓缓爬了起来，拍了拍裤子说道：“怕什么，等我过段时间修为大进，成绩暴涨，多得是老师会保我。”

0008.en: He looked confidently at the Feather Book in his palm; his Physical Strength had already increased from 0.83 to 0.84.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 他信心十足地看了看自己掌心的羽书，肉体强度已经从0.83提升到了0.84。

0008.en: And this was without any injections, medicine, or even nutritional meals, just from practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 这可是在没打针没吃药，更没有任何食补，仅仅以健体三十六式来锻炼的情况下。

0008.en: As the level of his Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms continued to increase, his Physical Strength would improve even faster.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 想必未来健体三十六式的等级不断提升，肉体强度的进步幅度也将越来越快。

0008.en: Just thinking about this, Zhang Yu couldn't help but marvel again at his own terrifying potential.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 光是想到这里，张羽就忍不住再次感叹自己潜力的可怕。

0008.en: Seeing Zhang Yu's sudden burst of confidence, Zhou Tianyi asked curiously, "Did you find a new source for drugs? Don't forget your brother if you get the good stuff."
0008.speaker: 周天翊
0008.cn: 一旁的周天翊看着突然开始一脸自信的张羽，好奇道：“你是不是找到新药的进货渠道了？有好货可别忘了兄弟啊。”

0008.en: Zhang Yu clenched his fist and smiled. "Kid, I'm training naturally!"
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 张羽捏了捏拳头，微笑道：“小子，哥是自然炼体！”

0008.en: Outside the training room door, Bai Zhenzhen's face was flushed after intense training, sweat dripping from her forehead as steam rose from her body.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 训练室大门外，经过剧烈炼体的白真真此刻脸颊红扑扑的，额头上不断滴着汗，全身上下冒着热气。

0008.en: Knock, knock, knock!
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 砰砰砰！

0008.en: She knocked on the door and said flatly, "Zhang Yu, are you done showing off? I'm hungry, let's go eat."
0008.speaker: 白真真
0008.cn: 只听她敲了敲门，淡淡道：“张羽，装完了吗？我好饿，赶紧去吃饭了。”

0008.en: The three of them hurried to join the crowd at the cafeteria. Since they were late, they could see a long line of people queuing at the entrance from a distance.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 一行三人匆匆加入食堂大军，来晚的他们隔着老远便看到了一大片人正在食堂大门前排队。

0008.en: However, as students from the Demonstration Class, the three of them had the privilege of entering the cafeteria first and could use the VIP channel to get their meals directly.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 不过身为示范班的张羽三人有着优先进入食堂用餐的特权，能够通过VIP通道直接用餐。

0008.en: Under the varied gazes of students from other classes, the three of them walked into the cafeteria.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 便见三人在众多其他班级学生目光各异的注视下走入了食堂。

0008.en: How to describe that feeling?
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 那感觉怎么说呢。

0008.en: If Zhang Yu were to describe it, it was like an inner sect prodigy from a novel, walking slowly into the Juxian Restaurant to dine under the gazes of outer sect servants—gazes filled with envy, jealousy, or the belief that they could take his place.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 如果让张羽来形容一下的话，那就是小说里内门天骄在外门杂役或羡慕、或嫉妒、或自觉可取而代之的注视下，缓缓步入聚仙酒楼用餐。

0008.en: As soon as they entered the cafeteria, Bai Zhenzhen said, "I'm having a nutritional meal today, so I'm going to the second floor to eat."
0008.speaker: 白真真
0008.cn: 而一进入食堂后，白真真便说道：“我今天食补，要去二楼吃饭。”

0008.en: The so-called nutritional meal involved cooking with ingredients full of cultivation elements and various medicines. It could effectively strengthen the body, recover from intense exercise, and improve the efficiency of physical training and breathing exercises.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 所谓食补，便是以充满了仙道要素的食材辅以种种药物进行烹饪，能够有效增强体质，弥补身体在剧烈锻炼后的亏损，提升炼体和吐纳的效率。

0008.en: It could be said that nutritional meals had countless benefits for cultivation studies. The only reason Zhang Yu wasn't eating one right now was that it was too expensive. Far too expensive.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 可以说食补对仙道学习有着百般好处，张羽此刻不去吃的唯一原因就是太贵了，实在是太贵了。

0008.en: A single meal cost at least several hundred, and thousands for rarer ingredients was normal. Even when Zhang Yu had a huge loan, he couldn't afford to eat it every day, let alone now.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 一顿最少也要好几百，珍贵一些的食材几千也很正常，以前手握巨贷出来的钱的张羽都不舍得天天吃，更别说现在的张羽了。

0008.en: Watching Bai Zhenzhen go up to the second floor alone, Zhang Yu could feel that the second floor and the first floor of the cafeteria were another dividing line, just like the one between him inside the cafeteria and the queue outside.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 看着独自走上二楼的白真真，张羽能感觉到食堂的二楼和一楼又是一重分界，就好像此刻他所站的食堂内和食堂外的排队队伍一样。

0008.en: But a trace of doubt rose in Zhang Yu's heart. "Doesn't Ah Zhen have no money? How can she afford to go to the second floor?"
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 但张羽心中又涌起一丝疑惑：“阿真不是没钱了吗？怎么舍得上二楼的？”

0008.en: Not long after lunch, Zhang Yu, who was on his lunch break, was called to the teacher's office.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 吃过午饭不久，正在午休的张羽便被叫到了老师的办公室。

0008.en: A middle-aged man sipped his tea, glanced at Zhang Yu standing in front of his desk, and said, "Teacher Wang Hai told me about what happened with you."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 一名中年男子一边喝着茶，一边看了一眼站在办公桌前的张羽，说道：“王海老师跟我说了你的事情。”

0008.en: The man's name was Su Haifeng. He was both the head teacher of the Demonstration Class and the director for the first-year students.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 男人名叫苏海峰，既是示范班的班主任，同时也是高一的年级主任。

0008.en: He looked at Zhang Yu with a disappointed expression and said, "Do you remember what you told me during your interview?"
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 只见他此刻一脸失望地看着张羽，说道：“你还记得面试的时候，你跟我说过什么吗？”

0008.en: When the original Zhang Yu had interviewed for Songyang High School, Su Haifeng had been the interviewer sitting in the middle.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 原本的张羽参加嵩阳高中的面试时，苏海峰便是坐在中间的面试官。

0008.en: Hearing Su Haifeng's words, Zhang Yu was slightly stunned. Although he had merged with the original owner's memories, many details couldn't be recalled instantly.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 此刻听到苏海峰说的话，张羽微微一愣，虽然他融合了原身的记忆，但很多细节真不是瞬间就能回想起来的。

0008.en: Su Haifeng sighed. "I still remember you said you wanted to get into a famous university."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 苏海峰叹了口气：“我还记得你当时说自己想要考名牌大学。”

0008.en: "In PE class, you don't buy medicine, you don't get injections, you lie on the ground being lazy, and you talk back to the teacher. Is this your attitude for getting into a famous university?"
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: “上体育课你既不买药，也不扎针，还躺地上偷懒，顶撞老师，这就是你想要考名牌大学的态度？”

0008.en: Listening to the criticism, Zhang Yu didn't know how to explain. He couldn't just say that he couldn't afford medicine or injections because he was poor and useless, and that he was slacking in PE because his potential had been unlocked.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 听着对方的批评，张羽一时间不知道该如何解释才好，总不能说因为自己又穷又废所以买不了药扎不了针，又因为潜力被激发出来，所以体育课随便上了。

0008.en: Sensing Zhang Yu's silence, Su Haifeng sighed again and said, "Zhang Yu, your performance over the past three months has been good. I know you're a good kid."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 感受着张羽的沉默，苏海峰又叹了口气，说道：“张羽，你过去三个月来的表现一直不错，我知道你是个乖孩子。”

0008.en: "Did something happen at home recently?"
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: “你是不是最近家里出了什么事情？”

0008.en: Zhang Yu looked up in surprise, feeling the teacher's concerned gaze. He found it hard to believe. "In this crazy school, there's actually a teacher who cares about students?"
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 张羽有些惊讶地看着，感受着对方关心的眼神，有些难以置信：“这癫学校里竟然还有关心学生的老师？”

0008.en: He thought for a moment and said quietly, "Yes, I had a small disagreement with my family."
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 他想了想，小声说道：“嗯，是和家里闹了点矛盾。”

0008.en: "I'll try to sort it out and get back on track soon."
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: “我会尽量调节，快点恢复状态的。”

0008.en: Although he felt the teacher's concern, Zhang Yu could only give a vague answer for now. Once his grades improved, he wouldn't have to explain these difficult things to his teacher.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 虽然感受到了对方的关心，但此刻的张羽只能尽快敷衍过去，而过段时间等自己成绩进步了，自然不用再和老师解释这些不好解释的事情。

0008.en: But Su Haifeng frowned as if dissatisfied, and said annoyedly, "What is there that you can't tell your teacher?"
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 苏海峰却好似不满的一皱眉，恼道：“跟老师还有什么不敢说的？”

0008.en: "Is it that your family is having financial problems recently?"
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: “是不是家里最近经济状况出了问题？”

0008.en: "The debt collectors from the loan companies have already called the school."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: “贷款平台的催债电话已经打到学校里来了。”

0008.en: "What?" Zhang Yu's head snapped up. "They called you, teacher?"
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: “啊？”张羽猛地抬起头来：“他们打给老师你了？”

0008.en: Su Haifeng nodded gravely. "If they hadn't called me, I wouldn't have known you owe so much money. Why didn't you tell me?"
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 苏海峰凝重地点了点头：“要不是他们打给我，我还不知道你欠了这么多钱，你怎么都不告诉我？”

0008.en: He truly hadn't thought that telling the school would be of any use, especially with the culture at Songyang High. He figured it would only make his situation worse.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 他是真没想过这种事情告诉学校有什么用，特别是以嵩阳高中的风气，他估计知道了只会让他情况更糟糕。

0008.en: But Su Haifeng let out a long sigh and looked at Zhang Yu with a kind expression. "I know the school can be strict sometimes, and you were afraid to tell us when something went wrong."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 但苏海峰却是长叹一声，一脸慈祥地看着张羽，说道：“我知道学校有时候比较严苛，出了事你不敢告诉我们。”

0008.en: "But you have to know that we are your teachers, after all. How could we not help our own students?"
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: “但你要知道我们毕竟是你的老师，怎么会不帮自己的学生？”

0008.en: As he spoke, he pulled a document out of his drawer and handed it to Zhang Yu.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 说着，他从抽屉中抽出了一份文件递到了张羽的面前。

0008.en: "This is a financial aid plan for needy students that I specially applied for you. Sign it quickly."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: “这是我特地去为你申请的贫困生补助计划，你赶紧签了吧。”

0008.en: Taking the document, Zhang Yu looked at Su Haifeng, moved. "Teacher, thank you."
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 伸手接过文件，张羽有些感动地看着苏海峰：“老师，谢谢你。”

0008.en: He realized his opinion of the teachers at this school was wrong again.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 他发现自己对这个学校老师的看法又错了。

0008.en: Zhang Yu thought to himself, "Although there are unreliable guys like Wang Hai, there are also kind elders like Teacher Su."
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 张羽心中暗道：“虽然有王海那样不靠谱的家伙，但也有苏老师这样的淳淳长者啊。”

0008.en: Su Haifeng smiled and waved his hand, passing him a pen. "Go on, sign it."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 苏海峰微笑着摆了摆手，将笔递了过去：“赶紧签字吧。”

0008.en: Zhang Yu lowered his head, his eyes sweeping over the document, and then he froze.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 张羽低下头，目光在文件上一扫而过，接着就愣在了原地。

0008.en: Su Haifeng chuckled. "What's wrong? Sign it quickly. I'll try to submit it for you before I leave work."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 苏海峰呵呵笑道：“怎么了？赶紧签啊，我争取下班前就给你交上去。”

0008.en: Zhang Yu's voice was low. "Teacher, this seems to be a debt restructuring contract. Did you grab the wrong one?"
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 张羽声音低沉：“老师，这个好像是债务重组合同？你是不是拿错了？”

0008.en: Su Haifeng chuckled. "The reason needy students are needy is because they're in debt, right? After restructuring the debt, doesn't that help the needy student? This is the financial aid plan for needy students."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 苏海峰笑呵呵道：“贫困生之所以贫困，不就是因为欠债？把债务重组之后，不就帮助到贫困生了？这就是贫困生补助计划啊。”

0008.en: Zhang Yu looked at the contract's contents. It basically consolidated all his debts, and the school would lend him a sum of money to pay them off.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 张羽看着合同上的内容，具体就是将他的所有欠债统一打包计算后，学校借一笔钱让他去还债。

0008.en: From then on, his creditor would be the school.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 从此以后，他的债主就变成了学校。

0008.en: Zhang Yu estimated the debt after the restructuring. After all sorts of miscellaneous fees, interest, principal, handling fees, and upfront deductions... it seemed the total had risen to over a million.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 张羽又估算了一下债务重组后的欠债，经过各种乱七八糟的手续后，各种利息、本金、手续费、砍头息……加起来好像涨到了100多万。

0008.en: "What debt restructuring! This is just using a new loan to pay off an old one."
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: “什么债务重组！这不就是以贷养贷嘛。”

0008.en: He roared inwardly, "Even the head teacher is a loan shark?"
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 他心中怒吼：“连班主任都是搞借贷的是吧。”

0008.en: "So this is how they play? Is there not a single normal teacher in this rotten school?"
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: “这么玩是吧，这破学校里是没正常老师了吗？”

0008.en: Suppressing his anger, Zhang Yu let out a breath and said, "Teacher, I think I'll pass. I can repay this money myself."
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 压抑着心中的愤怒，张羽吐出一口气道：“老师，我想想还是算了吧，这笔钱我自己能还。”

0008.en: Su Haifeng persuaded him earnestly, "How can a kid like you repay such a large sum? Hurry up and sign. The school will bear this burden for you."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 苏海峰谆谆善诱道：“这么大一笔钱你一个小孩怎么还？赶紧签了吧，这事情学校替你扛了。”

0008.en: "Don't worry, the school's installment plan is very flexible."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: “你放心，学校的分期很宽松的。”

0008.en: Zhang Yu: "No, thank you, teacher. Really, I don't need it."
0008.speaker: 张羽
0008.cn: 张羽：“不用了老师，真不用了。”

0008.en: After refusing several times, Zhang Yu simply tossed the contract aside and ran out of the office.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 张羽再三拒绝后，干脆把合同一丢就跑出了办公室。

0008.en: Watching his departing figure, Su Haifeng raised his teacup and blew on it lightly.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 看着他离去的背影，苏海峰举起茶杯，轻轻吹了一口气。

0008.en: A moment later, he picked up his vibrating phone and said, "He refused."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: 片刻后，他拿起震动的电话，说道：“他拒绝了。”

0008.en: "Yes, I'll try again in a while."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: “嗯，我过段时间再试试。”

0008.en: "Don't worry. He's poor... eventually he won't be able to handle the collection agency's methods. He'll come to borrow."
0008.speaker: 苏海峰
0008.cn: “你放心吧，穷人嘛……最后撑不住催收公司的手段，总会来借的。”

0009.en: Chapter 9: Work
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 第9章 工作

0009.en: After school that day.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 当天放学后。

0009.en: In the cafeteria.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 食堂里。

0009.en: Zhang Yu, Zhou Tianyi, and Bai Zhenzhen were sitting together eating dinner.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 张羽和周天翊、白真真正坐在一块吃晚饭。

0009.en: Bai Zhenzhen was cold and silent as usual, calmly working her way through the large plate of food in front of her.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 白真真仍旧是像平时一样，冷冰冰的不说话，正淡定地对着自己面前的一大盘饭菜默默输出。

0009.en: Zhou Tianyi glanced at Zhang Yu and said, "Your financial situation seems a bit rough lately."
0009.speaker: 周天翊
0009.cn: 周天翊则看了张羽一眼说道：“你最近的经济状况有点糟糕啊。”

0009.en: "Is it that obvious?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: “这么明显吗？”

0009.en: Zhang Yu froze for a moment, wondering if the debt collectors had already called his classmates. Did this mean his seven hundred thousand yuan debt was about to be exposed at school?
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 张羽微微一愣，心想难道催款电话已经打给同学了？那岂不是他欠债七十万的事情要在学校里被戳破了？

0009.en: Zhou Tianyi glanced at Bai Zhenzhen's lavish dinner, full of chicken, duck, and fish, then looked at Zhang Yu's five-yuan "poor man's meal."
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 周天翊看了一眼白真真那鸡鸭鱼肉俱全的丰盛晚餐，又看了一眼张羽那价值5块钱的穷鬼套餐。

0009.en: He stroked his chin and said, "Based on my observations of the cafeteria over the past three months, what a person eats can effectively reflect their financial situation and even their cultivation level during that time."
0009.speaker: 周天翊
0009.cn: 他摸了摸下巴说道：“根据我这三个月来对食堂的观察，一个人在食堂吃什么，能够有效反应出他在那段时间的经济状况，甚至是修为实力。”

0009.en: "For example, someone who eats ten pounds in one meal wouldn't sit at the same table as someone who eats three pounds."
0009.speaker: 周天翊
0009.cn: “比如一顿吃十斤的人，是不会和一顿吃三斤的人坐一桌的。”

0009.en: "Because they're not in the same social class at all; they're at the top and bottom of the campus food chain."
0009.speaker: 周天翊
0009.cn: “因为双方完全不是一个阶层，分别处在校园鄙视链的上游和下游。”

0009.en: "Oh, so it's because I'm eating less." Zhang Yu breathed a sigh of relief, thinking his status as super-poor was about to be exposed.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: “原来是看我吃得少啊。”张羽心中松了一口气，还以为自己超级穷人的身份要曝光了呢。

0009.en: He turned to Bai Zhenzhen, looking at the dozen chicken legs in her meal box with curiosity. "A-Zhen, those chicken legs look amazing. Let me try one."
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 他转头看向白真真，看着对方饭桶里的十几个鸡腿，一脸好奇道：“阿真，这鸡腿看上去好特别啊，给我尝一个呗。”

0009.en: Without looking up, Bai Zhenzhen said, "Get lost."
0009.speaker: 白真真
0009.cn: 白真真头也不抬地说道：“爬。”

0009.en: Beside them, Zhou Tianyi smiled and picked a duck leg from his own bowl for Zhang Yu. "Zhenzhen had a really intense workout today, she must be starving. Here, try mine."
0009.speaker: 周天翊
0009.cn: 一旁的周天翊笑着从自己碗里给张羽夹了个鸭腿：“真真今天运动量特别大，一看就是饿急了，你尝尝我的吧。”

0009.en: "You're a true brother!" Zhang Yu gave Zhou Tianyi a thumbs-up, grabbing the duck leg and starting to chew on it.
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: “好兄弟！”张羽朝着周天翊竖起一个大拇指，抓过鸭腿便啃了起来。

0009.en: Watching Zhang Yu devour the food, Zhou Tianyi smiled slightly. "If you're having money problems, I can lend you some."
0009.speaker: 周天翊
0009.cn: 周天翊看着张羽狼吞虎咽的模样，微微一笑道：“如果遇到资金困难了，我可以借你点。”

0009.en: Zhang Yu waved his hand and said, "No need, I'll figure it out myself."
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 张羽摆了摆手说道：“不用了，我自己会解决。”

0009.en: Even though he was drowning in debt, Zhang Yu had no intention of borrowing money from classmates. Besides, borrowing from them wouldn't solve a massive seven hundred thousand yuan debt. He needed a way to earn money consistently to pay it off.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 虽然欠了一屁股债，但张羽并不打算问同学借钱，或者说问同学借钱也不可能一口气解决七十万巨债的问题，他需要的是持续赚钱，持续还债的方法。

0009.en: "I at least need to cover the monthly interest so the collectors don't escalate their methods."
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: “至少要把每个月的利息还上，不能再让催收的升级手段了。”

0009.en: Zhang Yu knew that the longer his payment was overdue, the more aggressive the collection agency would become, moving from online harassment to real-world threats, each step more severe than the last.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 张羽知道随着他逾期的时间不断增长，催收公司的手段也将越来越厉害。从线上侮辱，到线下真实，一步比一步厉害。

0009.en: "And then there's rent, utilities, food..."
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: “还有房租，水电费，伙食费……”

0009.en: The thought gave him a headache.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 想到这里，张羽感觉自己开始头疼了。

0009.en: After Zhou Tianyi left, Bai Zhenzhen suddenly spoke up, "Based on my observations of you and Zhou Tianyi over the past three months, he's exceptionally nice to you."
0009.speaker: 白真真
0009.cn: 就在周天翊走了以后，白真真突然开口说道：“根据我这三个月来对你和周天翊的观察，他对你特别好。”

0009.en: "Is he?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 张羽：“有吗？”

0009.en: Bai Zhenzhen chuckled. "When a guy smiles and gives a duck leg from his own bowl to another guy, in my sixteen years of life, I've only seen that happen in two situations."
0009.speaker: 白真真
0009.cn: 白真真呵呵一笑道：“一个男的笑着把自己碗里的鸭腿给另一个男的，我活了十六年只看到过两种情况发生这种事情。”

0009.en: "One, they're father and son."
0009.speaker: 白真真
0009.cn: “一种，双方是父子关系。”

0009.en: "Two... hehehe..."
0009.speaker: 白真真
0009.cn: “另一种，嘿嘿嘿嘿……”

0009.en: Zhang Yu raised an eyebrow. "A-Zhen, you've been reading some interesting stuff."
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 张羽眉头一挑：“阿真，你看的东西挺杂啊。”

0009.en: Bai Zhenzhen: "Yuzi, you don't have to be scared. In this school, you're the one with the power to take initiative."
0009.speaker: 白真真
0009.cn: 白真真：“羽子，其实你也不用害怕，反正在这学校里，你才是掌握主动能力的那个。”

0009.en: With that, Bai Zhenzhen pushed her food tray towards Zhang Yu. "Sigh, I can't eat anymore. You can have the leftovers. You're my dear son, after all."
0009.speaker: 白真真
0009.cn: 说着，白真真将自己的餐盘一推，放到了张羽的面前：“唉，吃不下啦，这些剩菜剩饭就赏你了吧，谁叫你是我的好大儿呢。”

0009.en: "Get lost." Zhang Yu snatched the tray, his eyes scanning the neatly arranged food, which was clearly untouched.
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: “爬。”张羽一把抢过餐盘，目光一扫，便能看到里面摆放得整整齐齐，一看就没有动过的小半饭菜。

0009.en: Just as Zhang Yu looked up to thank her, he only saw Bai Zhenzhen's back as she left the cafeteria.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 正当张羽抬起头来想要谢谢对方时，却只看到白真真离开食堂的背影。

0009.en: Outside the cafeteria, Bai Zhenzhen's expression turned indifferent again. She thought to herself, "Yuzi, there's actually a third situation where this happens."
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 走到食堂外，白真真的目光重新淡了下来，她心中暗道：“羽子啊，其实还有第三种情况，也会这样的。”

0009.en: Bai Zhenzhen turned to look at the steps of the cafeteria entrance, where a cafeteria worker was pouring leftovers from a swill bucket into a cat's bowl.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 白真真转头看向食堂门口的台阶上，一名食堂阿姨正在将泔水桶的剩饭剩菜倒进一只猫的碗里。

0009.en: After leaving school, Zhang Yu started planning how to make money.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 离开学校，张羽便开始计划找赚钱的路子了。

0009.en: "My rent is one thousand five hundred, utilities are about two hundred a month, and the loan repayment is fifteen thousand a month..."
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: “我现在房租一千五，水电每个月两百多左右，贷款每个月要还一万五……”

0009.en: "Hiss..."
0009.speaker: 旁白

0009.en: Thinking about it gave him another headache.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 想到这里，张羽就又开始脑袋痛了。

0009.en: "I need to earn at least twenty thousand a month. A regular job definitely won't cut it."
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: “我每个月起码要赚两万才行，普通工作肯定是不行的。”

0009.en: As the thought crossed his mind, the Feather Book opened in front of him.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 伴随着张羽心念一动，羽书已经在他面前展开。

0009.en: Zhang Yu
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 张羽

0009.en: Dao Heart Level 1
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 道心1级

0009.en: Mana
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 法力

0009.en: Physical Strength Level 0.84
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 肉体强度0.84级

0009.en: Martial Arts: Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 2 (17/20), Freestyle Combat Level 1, High School Basic Swordsmanship Level 0
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 武功：健体三十六式2级（17/20），散手1级，高中基础剑法0级

0009.en: Dao Arts: Life-Nourishing Breathing Technique Level 1
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 道术：养生吐纳1级

0009.en: Seeing the new entry 'High School Basic Swordsmanship Level 0', Zhang Yu thought back to his martial arts class today.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 看到新出现的‘高中基础剑法0级’这一条，张羽心中闪过今天的武道课。

0009.en: The so-called martial arts class was for learning various combat techniques, and 80 out of the 100 points were for practical combat.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 所谓武道课，便是学习种种技击武学、战斗武学的课程，武道课的100分中更是有80分的实战分。

0009.en: First-year students were required to learn one unarmed and one armed combat martial art.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 像是高一年级便要求学会一门徒手实战武学和一门持械类的实战武学。

0009.en: This High School Basic Swordsmanship was what he had learned in class today, but since he hadn't truly mastered it, it still showed as Level 0.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 而这门高中基础剑法正是他在今天的武道课上学的，只不过似乎因为没有真正练成的关系，仍旧显示了0级。

0009.en: But Zhang Yu tried it for a moment and found that 'High School Basic Swordsmanship Level 0' could also be dragged.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 但张羽稍稍尝试了一下，发现这‘高中基础剑法0级’同样可以被拖动。

0009.en: He figured that if he specialized in this martial art, with his potential, he could master and level it up quickly.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 他估计要是他专精这门武学的话，凭借自己的潜力，也可以将之快速练成，然后快速升级。

0009.en: After these thoughts quickly flashed through his mind, Zhang Yu continued to stare at his stats, thinking about what kind of job he could do.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 脑海里快速闪过这些，张羽继续盯着自己的面板，思考着自己能做什么工作。

0009.en: "Although I've only just started on the path of cultivation, I'm still an official student of Songyang High School..."
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: “虽然才刚刚踏上修仙之路不久，但怎么说我也是嵩阳高中的正式学生……”

0009.en: A moment later, Zhang Yu started using his phone to contact his old cram school.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 片刻后，张羽就开始用手机联系自己以前的补习班。

0009.en: The original Zhang Yu had attended this cram school for a year after junior high before getting into Songyang High School.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 原先的张羽正是在初中毕业之后，在这个补习班补习了一年后，才进入了嵩阳高中。

0009.en: "The pay at this kind of cram school should be good, and since I'm a student at Songyang High, I should have an advantage."
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: “这种补习班的收入应该不错，我又是嵩阳高中的正式学生，应该有优势才对。”

0009.en: But when he inquired, the teacher told him they were fully staffed and suggested he try other cram schools.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 但在他的询问之后，补习班的老师却说他们那边已经满员了，让他去别的补习班试试。

0009.en: So, Zhang Yu started contacting other cram schools.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 于是张羽又联系起了其他补习班。

0009.en: "Hello, I'd like to be a part-time tutor. I'm a first-year student at Songyang High School..."
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: “你好，我想当兼职的补课老师，我是嵩阳高中的高一学生……”

0009.en: "May I ask where you graduated from for elementary and junior high school?"
0009.speaker: 陌生人1
0009.cn: “请问您小学、初中分别毕业于哪里？”

0009.en: "No, I'm already an official student at Songyang High School!"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: “不是，我已经嵩阳高中的正式学生了！”

0009.en: "Sorry, but we have plenty of tutors with degrees from top high schools. For a first-year student like you looking for part-time work, parents place a lot of importance on your elementary and junior high school credentials."
0009.speaker: 陌生人1
0009.cn: “抱歉，因为重点高中学历的补习老师也不少，像你这样还没毕业的高一学生来当兼职的话，家长们会很看重高中以前的第一和第二学历。”

0009.en: After learning about Zhang Yu's elementary and junior high schools, the other party stopped replying.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 在得知张羽的小学学校和初中学校后，对方便没有再回复了。

0009.en: After this conversation repeated five or six times, Zhang Yu gradually understood.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 而以上对话在重复了五、六次后，张羽也渐渐明白了过来。

0009.en: "Damn it!"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: “可恶！”

0009.en: "Why are the requirements for elementary and junior high so high?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: “竟然都对第一、第二学历的要求这么高？”

0009.en: "Has the competition for tutoring jobs gotten this intense?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: “补课老师的竞争现在卷成这样了？”

0009.en: Zhang Yu felt as if his elementary and junior high school records were like ugly labels stamped on his face, making it incredibly difficult to even find a part-time tutoring job.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 张羽感觉自己的小学学历、初中学历简直就像是两块难看的标签一样，被深深地印在了脸上，让他连兼职补习老师的工作找起来都难度暴涨。

0009.en: So Zhang Yu had to temporarily give up on the cram school route and try his backup plan.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 于是张羽不得不暂时放弃补习班这条路，转而尝试另一个后备计划。

0009.en: "I'll have to try temporary jobs first."
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: “只能先试试打零工了。”

0009.en: The original Zhang Yu had learned a bit about temporary work over the first three months of school.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 对打零工这条路，其实原来的张羽在开学这三个月来也有所了解。

0009.en: Of course, this wasn't the kind of temporary work ordinary people found, but jobs for those who had already stepped onto the path of cultivation.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 当然，这里说的临时工作并非是普通人找的临时工，而是已经踏上仙道之路后的人找的临时工作。

0009.en: High school students made up a large portion of this group. After all, not every high schooler was rich, and a good number of them needed to earn their own money to lessen their family's burden or buy things they wanted.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 像是高中生在这个群体里便占比不小，毕竟不是每一个高中生都是富哥儿，相当一部分高中生为了给家里减轻负担，又或者为了购买一些自己想要的东西，都需要自己去赚钱。

0009.en: And because high school students lacked a high school diploma and spent most of their time in class, they could usually only take on temporary part-time jobs.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 而因为高中生既没有高中毕业学历，大部分时间又需要上课，往往便只能兼职一些临时工作。

0009.en: Zhang Yu had looked into this a bit over the past two days, so he immediately added an agent and asked if there was any work available.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 张羽这两天也稍稍了解过这方面的路子，此刻当即加了一名中介，询问对方现在有没有什么活干。

0009.en: "You're asking too late, all of today's jobs have been taken."
0009.speaker: 陌生人1
0009.cn: “你来问晚了，今天的活暂时都被接走了。”

0009.en: "Why don't you come over here and wait? You can grab a new job as soon as it comes up."
0009.speaker: 陌生人1
0009.cn: “要不你来这边等等？有新活直接就能抢到了。”

0009.en: Half an hour later, Zhang Yu arrived at a small plaza.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 半小时后，张羽来到一处小广场。

0009.en: From a distance, he could see many people scattered around the plaza, sitting or lying down. There were old and young, men and women. Some were napping on the ground, while others, wearing school uniforms, were meditating and breathing.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 离着老远他便看到广场上零零散散，或坐或躺了许多人，这些人里有老有少，有男有女，有的随便在地上一躺就小憩起来，也有的穿着校服，还在盘膝吐纳。

0009.en: Following the address he was given, Zhang Yu found a human resources company in a corner of the plaza.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 按照对方给出的地址，张羽找到了广场角落的一家人力资源公司。

0009.en: The company was small, with a storefront that looked like a real estate agency. Various crude job postings were taped to the dirty glass.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 公司不大，门面看上去就像是一家房产中介公司，脏脏的玻璃上贴满了各种简陋的招聘单子。

0009.en: After glancing at the old sign, Zhang Yu pushed the door open and was hit by a thick wave of cigarette smoke, which made him frown.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 看了一眼陈旧的招牌，张羽刚一推门进去，一股浓烈的烟味便扑面而来，闻得他眉头一皱。

0009.en: Behind a messy desk, a middle-aged man who was smoking looked up. He glanced at Zhang Yu and said, "Are you the high school student who just called?"
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: 凌乱的办公桌后，一名正在抽烟的中年男子抬起头来，看了张羽一眼便说道：“你是刚刚咨询的那个高中生？”

0009.en: After Zhang Yu nodded, the man introduced himself as Lao Wang, the agent here. He took out a few sheets of paper and said, "Fill out the resume, I'll register you in a bit."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: 看到张羽点头之后，男人自我介绍叫老王，是这边的中介，只见他拿出几张纸说道：“简历填一填吧，我一会给你登记上去。”

0009.en: Zhang Yu took it and saw that besides personal information, he had to fill in his learned martial and dao arts and their levels, as well as his school grades.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 张羽接过一看，发现上面除了一些资料之外，还要填上所学的武功道术和等级，还有在学校时的成绩。

0009.en: Handing the filled-out form to the man, Zhang Yu asked, "How long does it usually take to find a job? What's the pay like?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 将填完的单子交给了对方，张羽问道：“一般多久能找到工作？收入怎么样？”

0009.en: Lao Wang scratched his messy hair and said casually, "The minimum is a few hundred an hour... but it's hard to say how long it'll take to find something. It's normal to go a week without work if you're unlucky."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: 老王抓了抓有些乱糟糟的头发，随意道：“最低一小时也有几百块吧……不过多久能找到就不好说，运气不好一周没活也正常。”

0009.en: Zhang Yu thought to himself: "The pay is that high? If so, couldn't I work two or three hours a day to cover my loan payments and living expenses?"
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 张羽心道：“这的工作收入这么高？要是这样的话，我每天工作两三个小时，岂不是足够还贷和生活费了？”

0009.en: At this thought, Zhang Yu's heart filled with joy.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 想到这里，张羽的心中就是一喜。

0009.en: But then he heard the man say that jobs were hard to find, so he asked curiously, "Why?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 但接着又听到对方说工作不好找，他便好奇道：“为什么？”

0009.en: He emphasized his status: "I'm in the top ten of my first-year class at a top high school. Is it still that difficult?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 他强调了一下自己的身份：“我是重点高中的高一年级前十，也很难找吗？”

0009.en: Lao Wang smiled and pointed outside, "See those people in the plaza? Besides high school students like you, the rest are high school graduates."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: 老王闻言笑了笑，指了指外面说道：“广场上那些人看到了吗？除了像你一样的高中生，剩下的都是高中毕业的。”

0009.en: Zhang Yu was shocked and said in disbelief, "How is that possible? They've graduated from high school and are cultivators, but they're still looking for temporary work here?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 张羽闻言心中一惊，接着不信：“怎么可能？高中毕业了，都修仙了还来这里找临时工？”

0009.en: Lao Wang shrugged. "They didn't get into college. Not every high school student can."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: 老王耸了耸肩：“没考上大学呗，又不是每一个高中生都能考上大学的。”

0009.en: "If you don't get into college, you'll be stuck in the Qi Refining stage for life, you can't get to the second layer of Kunxu, so you can only struggle here on the first layer year after year..."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: “考不上大学，一辈子都是练气期，更上不了昆墟二层，只能一年年地在这第一层混……”

0009.en: Zhang Yu was still confused. "But they could still find a full-time job on the first layer. Why do temporary work?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 张羽仍旧不解：“那也能在一层找个正式工作啊，为什么要来干临时工？”

0009.en: Lao Wang explained, "They don't need to sleep. After finishing their day job, if the company doesn't require overtime, they come here to find some temporary work."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: 老王解释道：“又不用睡觉，人家是干完了白天的工作，公司不加班的话，就来找点临时工干。”

0009.en: "Otherwise, how would they pay back their loans? How would they have enough money to maintain their cultivation?"
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: “不然怎么还贷？又怎么够钱维持修为？”

0009.en: This revelation sent waves through Zhang Yu's mind. He never knew high school graduates had it so tough.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 对方这一番话在张羽心中掀起了一片波澜，他之前的记忆里可不知道高中毕业生还这么辛苦。

0009.en: He had always imagined that even if they didn't get into college, they would work in an office in a downtown skyscraper, enjoying air conditioning, drinking tea, and earning a decent salary...
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 只觉得高中毕业了，哪怕没考上大学，也是每天在市中心的摩天大楼里坐在办公室里，吹着空调，喝着茶，就能得到一份体面的工资……

0009.en: But it turns out they study 24 hours a day before graduation and work 24 hours a day after. The suffering just keeps piling on.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 结果好家伙，毕业前24小时学习，毕业后24小时上班，苦越吃越多了是吧。

0009.en: Lao Wang looked at Zhang Yu's resume and smiled. "Oh, from Songyang High. We're alumni then. I also went to Songyang, but I dropped out in my third year."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: 老王看着张羽的简历，笑道：“哟，嵩阳高中的，那咱们是校友啊，我也是嵩阳高中的，不过高三那年辍学了。”

0009.en: Zhang Yu: "Dropped out?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 张羽：“辍学？”

0009.en: Lao Wang shrugged. "Couldn't get into college, so I figured I shouldn't waste any more money. I just paid off my high school loans the year before last."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: 老王耸了耸肩：“考不上大学呗，干脆就别浪费钱了。高中欠下的贷款我可前年才刚刚还清。”

0009.en: "Since we're alumni, let me give you some advice."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: “看在校友的份上，我也给你个建议。”

0009.en: "In high school, know your limits. If you feel like you can't make it, get out early. Don't be like some people who get into too much debt and ruin their lives."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: “高中量力而行，感觉考不上就早点撤，免得像有些人一样，欠债欠得太多，一辈子都毁了。”

0009.en: After filling out the information, the man told Zhang Yu to wait outside and that he would be notified immediately if a job came up.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 填写完资料之后，对方便让张羽在外面等着，有工作了立刻就会通知他。

0009.en: Zhang Yu: "Competing with those high school graduates, will I even get a chance at a job?"
0009.speaker: 张羽
0009.cn: 张羽：“和那些高中毕业的人一起竞争，有工作能轮到我吗？”

0009.en: Lao Wang: "Don't worry, some jobs are specifically for current high school students."
0009.speaker: 老王
0009.cn: 老王：“放心，有些工作就是专门找的高中在读生。”

0010.en: Chapter 10: Fierce Competition and Level 3 Body-Strengthening
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 第10章 竞争激烈和3级健体

0010.en: Finding a random spot to sit, Zhang Yu watched the crowd also waiting for work in the square and felt a wave of exhaustion.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 随便找了个位置坐下，看着广场上同样在等待着工作的人群，张羽只感觉到一阵心累。

0010.en: "This damn place is so hard to survive in. Isn't there a single place that isn't a rat race?"
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: “这破地方也太不好混了，就没一个不卷的地方吗？”

0010.en: He had only been resting on the ground for a moment when a sudden chill crept into his heart.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 刚坐在地上休息一会，一股恶寒便从张羽的心中涌起。

0010.en: "Please adhere to the ritual's agreement. Strive to complete your wish. Do not deliberately slack off or delay. 10."
0010.speaker: 邪神
0010.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，10。”

0010.en: "Damn it."
0010.speaker: 张羽

0010.en: Zhang Yu cursed inwardly, but under the pressure from the ritual's power, he had no choice but to get back to the grind.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 张羽心中怒骂一声，却也只能在仪式力量的逼迫下卷了起来。

0010.en: However, considering his body hadn't fully recovered and the work he might get would require stamina, he decided not to practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms. Instead, he chose to refine his mana with the basic breathing method.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 不过考虑到自己的身体状态尚未恢复，一会儿的工作可能也有体力要求，此刻的张羽并没有选择修炼健体三十六式，而是选择了以基础吐纳法来提炼法力。

0010.en: With each inhale and exhale, wisps of spiritual energy from the world quickly gathered, converging in his Dantian's sea of qi, where he refined them drop by drop into mana.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 只见他一呼一吸之间，天地间很快便有丝丝缕缕的灵机涌来，逐渐汇聚于丹田气海之中，一点一滴地被他提炼为法力的一部分。

0010.en: Time trickled by as Zhang Yu focused on his breathing, and an hour soon passed.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 时间便在张羽的吐纳中缓缓流逝，来到了一个小时之后。

0010.en: In that hour, three different groups had come to hire workers: one for temporary security, one for a construction site needing cultivators for heavy labor, and one for a delivery company hiring cultivators for sorting.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 而在这一个小时里，也先后出现过三批人过来招工，有招临时安保人员的，有工地急需要修仙者干重活的，还有快递公司雇修仙者去分拣的。

0010.en: Zhang Yu gradually understood that most temporary jobs for Qi Refining cultivators were related to manual labor.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 张羽也渐渐明白过来，大部分雇佣练气期修仙者的临时工作，几乎都和体力活有关。

0010.en: After all, cultivators in the Qi Refining stage had no significant advantage over mortals in intelligence or knowledge, but their physical fitness was a hundred times better. They could excel in construction, factories, security, and other jobs, with production efficiency far exceeding that of ordinary people.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 毕竟练气期的修仙者在智商、知识方面和凡人并没有拉开质变差距，反而身体素质个个以一当百，在工地、工厂、安保等等工作上都能发光发热，生产效率远超普通凡人。

0010.en: So, many places needing to urgently increase their workforce would come here to hire cultivators.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 于是很多需要紧急增加人手的地方，都会过来雇佣修仙者。

0010.en: Although the pay for cultivators was much higher than for ordinary people, it was still cost-effective.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 虽然修仙者要的报酬也远超普通人，但算下来还是划算。

0010.en: After all, if one cultivator could do the work of 30 ordinary people, you usually only had to pay them ten times more.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 毕竟一个修仙者如果能干30个普通人的活的话，往往只用给10倍以上的钱就行了。

0010.en: And everyone waiting in this square was a super beast of burden, capable of working 007.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 而在这广场上等着的人，一个个都可谓是能坚持007工作的超级牛马。

0010.en: Compared to them, Zhang Yu, who still needed four or five hours of sleep, was just an ordinary high schooler who could still fall asleep.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 在他们面前，每天还要睡上四、五个小时的张羽也不过是个高一还睡得着觉的普通学生罢了。

0010.en: So, after seeing the rush of people scrambling for every job, Zhang Yu simply maintained his breathing exercises and didn't join the fray.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 于是看了一眼每次一大堆人挤上去抢工作的架势，张羽总是维持着吐纳的状态，并没有上去跟其他人争抢。

0010.en: He knew that as a first-year high school student, he couldn't compete with those who had already graduated.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 他便知道以自己高一学生的状态，不可能抢得过那些早已经毕业的高中生。

0010.en: He was waiting, waiting for the kind of job Lao Wang had mentioned, one specifically for currently enrolled high school students.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 他在等待，等待着老王说的专门找高中在读生的工作。

0010.en: A few other high school students were doing the same as Zhang Yu. Some were reading, some were practicing breathing, and some were practicing martial arts. None of them went up to compete for jobs; they just waited quietly.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 和张羽一样的还有其他几名高中生，有的看书，有的吐纳，有的打拳，也都没有上去争抢工作机会，只是默默等待着。

0010.en: In the blink of an eye, another hour passed.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 转眼又是一个小时过去。

0010.en: Snap! Pop! Crack!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 啪！啪！啪！

0010.en: A series of small explosions echoed in the air.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 伴随着空气中传来一声声轻微的炸响。

0010.en: Feeling that his body had rested enough, Zhang Yu began to practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 感觉肉身休息差不多的张羽开始锻炼健体三十六式。

0010.en: The people around him glanced over but paid no mind. Too many people cultivated while waiting for work, and a basic technique like the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms couldn't possibly attract their attention.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 四周围的人看了一眼便也都不在意，等待工作的时候顺便修炼的人太多了，健体三十六式作为一个基础功法更是无法吸引周围人的注意力。

0010.en: Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 2 (18/20)
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 健体三十六式2级（18/20）

0010.en: Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 2 (19/20)
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 健体三十六式2级（19/20）

0010.en: After practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms twice, Zhang Yu felt his muscles begin to ache, but his spirits were higher than ever, because just one more time would bring it to Level 3.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 练完两遍健体三十六式的张羽虽然感觉到浑身筋肉开始酸软，但精神却越发振奋，只因为再有一遍就能把健体三十六式升到3级了。

0010.en: This was something that even Bai Zhenzhen, the top-ranked student in the grade, hadn't achieved.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 这可是年级总分第一的白真真都未能做到的事情。

0010.en: And he had managed it in just two days.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 而他不过花了两天就能做到了。

0010.en: Just as Zhang Yu was starting his third practice of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, a temporary job for high school students finally arrived.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 就在张羽练习第三遍健体三十六式的时候，一份要求高中生的临时工作终于找来了。

0010.en: A small car drove to the front of the square, the window rolled down, and the driver shouted, "Any first or second years? I'm hiring two martial arts sparring partners."
0010.speaker: 司机
0010.cn: 一辆小轿车开到广场前，车窗落下，司机在车里喊道：“有没有高一高二的？招两个武道陪练。”

0010.en: A martial arts sparring partner was someone hired to assist a cultivator in their combat training according to specific requirements.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 所谓武道陪练，便是修炼者在进行武道的实战训练时，找人按照一定要求来陪同训练。

0010.en: Hearing the driver's words, the high school students who had been waiting quietly all sprang into action, moving like blurs and rushing towards the car with the sound of wind and thunder.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 听到司机的这番话，广场上原本正安安静静等待着的高中生们齐齐动了起来，在空气中划过一道道残影，带着阵阵风雷之声冲到了小轿车前。

0010.en: "I'm a second year!"
0010.speaker: 陌生男1
0010.cn: “我是高二的！”

0010.en: "My physical strength is 2.15!"
0010.speaker: 陌生男2
0010.cn: “我肉体强度2.15级！”

0010.en: The second-year students were far ahead of the first-years in physical strength. By the time Zhang Yu rushed over, he found that the spots in front of the driver were all occupied by big guys, and he couldn't squeeze through.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 高二的学生在肉体强度上领先了高一的学生们一大截，当张羽冲过去的时候，就发现司机面前的位置几乎都被一个个大块头给占满了，让他根本挤不上去。

0010.en: Zhang Yu thought to himself, "So many people are rushing to get beaten up. Have they no self-respect as high school students?"
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: 张羽心道：“挨打都这么多人抢着上，还有没有点高中生的自尊了。”

0010.en: The driver scanned the students with their hands raised and asked, "Any from key high schools?"
0010.speaker: 司机
0010.cn: 司机扫了一眼面前举手的众多学生，开口说道：“有重点高中的吗？”

0010.en: More than half of the hands went down.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 举手的人一下子少了大半。

0010.en: Zhang Yu quickly raised his hand, "I'm from Songyang High School!"
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: 张羽连忙举起了手来：“我嵩阳高中的！”

0010.en: The driver asked again, "Anyone with a practical combat skill at level 3 or above?"
0010.speaker: 司机
0010.cn: 司机又问道：“实战武学3级以上的有没有？”

0010.en: Looking at the remaining three, the driver asked again, "Three hundred an hour, you in?"
0010.speaker: 司机
0010.cn: 看着剩下的三人，司机又问道：“一小时三百干不干？”

0010.en: A student with a buzz cut said, dissatisfied, "Isn't three hundred a bit too low?"
0010.speaker: 陌生男3
0010.cn: 一名剃着寸头的学生不满道：“三百太少了吧？”

0010.en: But another student next to him eagerly said, "I'll do it for three hundred!"
0010.speaker: 陌生男4
0010.cn: 却见他身旁的另一名学生急道：“三百我干！”

0010.en: Watching the car speed away after the other student got in, the buzz-cut student cursed, "Three hundred an hour. Who the hell do they think they are."
0010.speaker: 陌生男3
0010.cn: 看着对方上车后轿车疾驰而去，寸头学生骂道：“一小时三百，真TM想的出来。”

0010.en: "Three hundred to hire a sparring partner? If you can't afford it, don't hire one."
0010.speaker: 陌生男3
0010.cn: “三百就想请人陪练实战？花不起钱请什么陪练？”

0010.en: Someone else joined in, "He took 300? Scab! When that kid gets injured, he'll find out that 300 isn't even enough for medical bills."
0010.speaker: 陌生男5
0010.cn: 有人跟着骂道：“300都接下来？工贼！等那小子被打伤了，就知道这三百还不够医药费了。”

0010.en: As the employer left, the surrounding students dispersed after a round of cursing, each returning to their own cultivation or studies.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 而随着雇主离开，四周围的学生们也在一阵骂骂咧咧后都散了回去，各自继续修炼、学习。

0010.en: Zhang Yu could only go back and continue practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 张羽也只能回去继续锻炼健体三十六式。

0010.en: If things continued like this, he felt he might not find a job today.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 照着目前这个势头下去，他感觉今天可能是找不到工作了。

0010.en: About ten minutes later, someone else drove up to hire high school students, specifically asking for first-years.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 十多分钟后，又有人开着车来招高中生，还特意要求是高一学生。

0010.en: But this time, the job was drug testing, supposedly for a new drug developed for cultivation beginners in a lab.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 但这次的工作内容却是试药，据说是试用某种实验室里最新研发，用于仙道初学者的药品。

0010.en: Considering his physical condition, Zhang Yu didn't even bother applying. He continued with his 20th repetition of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 张羽想了想自己的身体状况，干脆都没有上前应聘，而是继续着第20遍健体三十六式的锻炼。

0010.en: A moment later, with a final crack, Zhang Yu threw the last punch of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, successfully raising the skill to the third level.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 片刻后，伴随着噼啪一声炸响，张羽打出了健体三十六式的最后一拳，也顺利将这门武功提升至了第三级。

0010.en: Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 3 (0/30)
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 健体三十六式3级（0/30）

0010.en: At that moment, countless memories of practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms flooded into Zhang Yu's mind, making him feel as if he had practiced it thousands of times.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 这一刻，无数健体三十六式的练习记忆像是猛地灌入张羽的脑海之中，让他感觉自己就像是又进行了千百次的练习。

0010.en: And among these practices, there was not just the memory of flesh and blood, but also the memory of mana circulating on its own within his body.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 而这些练习之中，更是不止有着单纯的血肉记忆，还有着一丝丝法力在体内自行运转的记忆。

0010.en: "Upon reaching Level 3, practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms can simultaneously stimulate the circulation of mana, accelerating the repair and enhancement of the body."
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: “健体三十六式达到第三级，修炼这门武功的同时便能够引动体内法力运转周天，加速肉体的修复和增强。”

0010.en: If the first and second levels of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms were about damaging the body during practice to forcibly squeeze out mana,
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 如果说一、二级的健体三十六式只是在锻炼的过程中不断损坏血肉，强行压榨出体内法力来参与锻炼。

0010.en: Then reaching the third level meant the movements themselves would guide mana to flow throughout the body, nourishing the flesh during exercise and greatly improving the training effect.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 那么踏入第三级的健体三十六式，便是动作带动法力在浑身上下来回游走，在锻炼的同时不断滋润血肉，大大提升了锻炼效果。

0010.en: At this moment, as Zhang Yu began a new round of practice, a warm current flowed through his limbs with his movements, silently increasing his physical strength, transforming him step by step from an ordinary person into a superhuman.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 此时此刻，随着张羽开始新一遍健体三十六式的练习，一股股暖流便随着他的动作，在他的四肢百骸中流淌，默默增长着他的肉体强度，让他一步步由常人走向超人。

0010.en: Nourished by the warm current, the muscles that had begun to ache and feel sore now felt much more relaxed, allowing him to persist in his training more easily.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 在暖流的滋润下，原本开始酸软、疼痛的血肉好像也变得轻松了许多，让张羽能更轻松地坚持锻炼下去。

0010.en: Suddenly, Zhang Yu felt his muscles contract and expand.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 突然间，张羽感受着浑身血肉一阵收缩和膨胀。

0010.en: Physical Strength 0.84 → 0.85
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 肉体强度0.84级→0.85级

0010.en: Glancing at the change in his physical strength on the Feather Book, a flash of joy crossed Zhang Yu's mind.
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: 扫了一眼羽书上肉体强度的变化，张羽心中闪过一丝欣喜。

0010.en: At this moment, even without the urging of the ritual's power, he felt energized and continued to train.
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: 这一刻的他便是没有仪式力量的催逼，也振奋着精神继续锻炼了下去。

0010.en: While Zhang Yu was cultivating, the recruitment for the drug trial was still ongoing.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 而就在张羽修炼着健体三十六式的同时，另一边的试药招人也一直在持续。

0010.en: However, not many first-year students were willing to try a job like drug testing.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 只不过面对试药这种工作，愿意尝试的高一学生并不多。

0010.en: Although the recruiter wanted to hire five students, they only managed to get two after a long time and then left.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 虽然来人想招5名学生，但最终喊了半天也只招到2个便离去了。

0010.en: As time went on, the night grew deeper, and fewer employers came to hire. Zhang Yu still hadn't found a job and could only continue practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 接下来的时间里，夜色逐渐加深，来招人的雇主也越来越少，张羽更是迟迟没有找到工作的机会，只能继续锻炼健体三十六式。

0010.en: Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 3 (6/30)
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 健体三十六式3级（6/30）

0010.en: When Zhang Yu had practiced the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms for the sixth time, he felt he couldn't just wait around anymore.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 当张羽将健体三十六式练到第六遍的时候，他感觉自己不能再这么等待下去了。

0010.en: Zhang Yu walked back into the human resources company and saw Lao Wang still sitting behind the desk, as if he hadn't moved for the past few hours.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 张羽重新走进了人力资源公司，便看到老王仍旧坐在那张办公桌后，就像过去几个小时都没动过一样。

0010.en: He took out a pack of cigarettes he had bought, handed one to him, and asked, "Brother Wang, is there any work I can do?"
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: 他掏出自己买的一包烟，递给对方，接着问道：“王哥，有没有什么我能做的工作。”

0010.en: Lao Wang glanced at the cigarette Zhang Yu offered and said nonchalantly, "Didn't I tell you? They'll call outside if there's work."
0010.speaker: 老王
0010.cn: 老王看了一眼张羽递来的烟，漫不经心道：“不是说了吗？有工作外面会叫的。”

0010.en: But Zhang Yu persisted, "I mean besides the jobs outside."
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: 张羽却不放弃道：“我是说除了外面这些。”

0010.en: "There's no way all the temporary jobs in Songyang City are recruited from here, right? Are there any others?"
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: “总不可能全嵩阳市的临时工作都会开车到这边招人吧？还有没有别的了？”

0010.en: Pestered by Zhang Yu, Lao Wang said impatiently, "See for yourself. It's not that I don't want you to work, but are those other temp jobs really that easy to get?"
0010.speaker: 老王
0010.cn: 老万被张羽缠了一会，不耐烦道：“不信你自己看吧，不是我不让你干，那别的临时工是那么好干的吗？”

0010.en: Zhang Yu looked at a screenshot on the man's phone, which listed rows of long-term recruitment positions.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 张羽看着对方手里机发来的一张截图，上面大大小小列着一排排长期招募的工作。

0010.en: There were long-term drug trials after signing a contract.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 有签订合同之后，参与长期试药的。

0010.en: There was long-term participation as a test subject for cultivation technique research.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 有作为试验者长期参与功法研究的。

0010.en: There was also work as an assistant for exploration teams deep in the underground of Kunxu.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 还有深入昆墟地下，作为探索小队帮工的。

0010.en: And there was assisting the police in fighting criminals.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 也有配合警方去打击罪犯的。

0010.en: Looking through the list, Zhang Yu found them either too dangerous, or both dangerous and impossible for him to do.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 这一份份张羽看来看去，要么太危险，要么又危险又干不了。

0010.en: "These long-term jobs that are never filled are really all traps."
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: “这些长期招人都招不满的工作，果然一个个都是坑啊。”

0010.en: Suddenly, Zhang Yu looked at one of the listings and asked, "Brother Wang, what are the dangers of participating in cultivation technique research?"
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: 突然，张羽看着其中一条问道：“王哥，这个参与功法研究，有什么危险吗？”

0010.en: Lao Wang said casually, "You're the test dummy. You test the new techniques developed by big corporations. They record what side effects you have, what injuries you sustain, where you become disabled, and how you eventually die..."
0010.speaker: 老王
0010.cn: 老王随意道：“就是让你去做试功的人，试练那些大公司最新研发出来的功法，他们在你练功的过程中记录你身上有哪些副作用，受了什么伤，哪里残疾了，最后又怎么死的……”

0010.en: Zhang Yu swallowed hard, then his eyes lit up as he looked at another temporary job and asked, "What about this introductory technique trial? Ten thousand yuan for one time? Why does it only recruit first-year high school students?"
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: 张羽咽了咽口水，突然目光一动，看着另一份临时工作问道：“那这个入门试功呢？一万块一次？为什么只招高一学生？”

0010.en: Lao Wang thought for a moment, then said, "Oh, that one. I think the Xianyun Group developed a technique that's already been tested. It has no side effects and won't kill you."
0010.speaker: 老王
0010.cn: 老王想了想，接着噢了一声说道：“那个啊，好像是仙韵集团开发了一门功夫，已经经过修炼测试了，没什么副作用，也练不死人。”

0010.en: "But the initiation process is too difficult. If you fail, you can easily suffer internal injuries, so they're always looking for people to test it."
0010.speaker: 老王
0010.cn: “但入门过程太难了，练不成就容易内伤，所以就一直在找人测。”

0010.en: "Because it's a technique intended for cultivation beginners, they specifically look for first-year high school students to test it..."
0010.speaker: 老王
0010.cn: “因为是准备卖给仙道初学者的功法，所以专门找的高一学生来测试……”

0010.en: At this point, he looked at Zhang Yu, who was listening intently, and frowned. "You're not thinking of doing this, are you? The last student who went got his mana out of control, suffered internal injuries, and had to take two weeks off from school and still hasn't recovered."
0010.speaker: 老王
0010.cn: 说到此处，他看向一旁认真听着的张羽，皱眉道：“你不会想去做这个吧？上次有个学生去了以后，练得法力失控，受了内伤，向学校请了两周的假还没康复。”

0010.en: "That ten thousand yuan isn't easy money."
0010.speaker: 老王
0010.cn: “这一万块可不好拿。”

0010.en: Zhang Yu shrugged helplessly, "I can't help it. I need the money urgently, so I have to give it a try."
0010.speaker: 张羽
0010.cn: 张羽无奈地耸了耸肩：“没办法，我急用钱，只能试试看了。”

0012.en: Chapter 12: Vigorous Progress
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 第12章 勇猛精进（感谢‘水

0012.en: A moment later, Zhang Yu emerged from the Xianyun Group office building, his face pale and his body hunched over in a state of weakness.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 片刻之后，走出仙韵集团办公大楼的张羽看上去脸色苍白，佝偻着身体，一副虚弱的模样。

0012.en: However, a few kilometers after leaving the skyscraper and boarding the subway, his complexion gradually began to return to normal.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 不过就在他离开摩天大楼几公里，坐上了地铁后，他的脸色逐渐开始恢复正常。

0012.en: As he began to circulate the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique, the mana in his body surged forward like countless small streams, instantly permeating all his flesh and blood.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 伴随着他运转周天采气法之后，体内法力顿时如一道道小溪滚滚向前，转眼间便贯通了他浑身上下的血肉。

0012.en: The once out-of-control mana that had been scattering was now guided back into place by the surging streams, merging into the complex circulatory system within him and flowing endlessly on its own.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 原本失控溢散的法力也随着一道道滚滚向前的法力重新回归了正轨，融入了体内那复杂的法力循环之中，自然而然便在张羽的体内运转不休。

0012.en: Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique Level 1 (0/20)
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 周天采气法1级（0/20）

0012.en: Looking at the technique that appeared on the Feather Book, a slight smile touched Zhang Yu's lips.
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: 看着羽书上浮现出来的道术，张羽的嘴角涌起一丝微笑。

0012.en: "I knew I could master it."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “果然可以练成。”

0012.en: "If I hadn't mastered the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique, it would have taken one or two weeks for this rampant mana to dissipate."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “要不是练成这门周天采气法的话，这失控的法力估计要一两周才能散去。”

0012.en: The reason Zhang Yu dared to accept the technique-testing job was because of his confidence in the Feather Book.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 之所以敢接下试功的工作，张羽的底气便来自于羽书。

0012.en: However, back at the Xianyun Group, he had not revealed his ability to master the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 只不过在仙韵集团的时候，他并没有暴露自己能练成周天采气法的能力。

0012.en: "Although this is just a basic breathing technique for beginners, once you master it, it runs automatically, 24 hours a day."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “这门功法虽然只是一门给初学者修炼的吐纳法，但练成之后便能24小时日夜不休地自行运转。”

0012.en: "Even without actively practicing, it still operates at thirty percent of the efficiency. After mastering it... even if I do nothing all day, it's like practicing for more than seven hours."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “即使不主动去运功，也有主动运功时三成的吐纳效率，练成之后……每天哪怕什么也不干，都相当于其他人吐纳了七个多小时。”

0012.en: "And that's just the effect at Level 1."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “这还只是1级时候的功效。”

0012.en: "If this technique is successfully developed, it would probably become one of the best-selling breathing techniques on the market."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “这门功法要是真的开发成功，怕不是立刻就成为市面上最畅销的吐纳法之一。”

0012.en: Zhang Yu knew that, apart from the techniques taught in school, the techniques from major corporations and sects were all protected by copyright and had to be purchased, representing immense profits.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 张羽知道，除了学校里教授的种种功法之外，其余大公司、大宗门的功法都是有着版权的，全部都需要花钱购买，其中蕴含着天大的利益。

0012.en: It was precisely because this Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique was so powerful that Zhang Yu saw it as a critical development project for the Xianyun Group. He was unwilling to reveal that he had mastered it, to avoid complications.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 也正是因为这门周天采气法太过强横，在张羽看来绝对是仙韵集团极为看重的一个开发项目，他才不愿暴露自己练成了周天采气法的事情，免得节外生枝。

0012.en: Moreover, the technique was incredibly difficult to learn. In Zhang Yu's opinion, a first-year high school student could never master it without the aid of the guidance equipment, let alone circulate it completely even once.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 特别是这门功法的修炼难度还如此之高，在张羽看来高一学生若是没有那辅助设备进行指引的话，别说练成此功了，再完整运功一次都不可能。

0012.en: This made him even more reluctant to reveal that he had mastered the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 这让他更不想暴露自己练成周天采气法的事情了。

0012.en: And in order to master the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique, Zhang Yu had switched the Feather Book's specialization from the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms to this breathing technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 而为了练成周天采气法，张羽也将羽书的专精从健体三十六式切换到了这门吐纳法上。

0012.en: Although this meant he couldn't quickly advance the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms for now, the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique was now on the fast track.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 虽然如此一来，健体三十六式暂时没办法快速提升了，但周天采气法却是踏上了快车道。

0012.en: "Level 3 of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms is enough for now."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “3级的健体三十六法暂时也够用了。”

0012.en: "From now on, I'll focus on improving this Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “接下来的时间里，我便专注提升这门周天采气法吧。”

0012.en: Besides the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique, the biggest reward from this trial was the payment from the Xianyun Group.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 而这趟试功除了周天采气法的收获之外，最大的收获便是仙韵集团打来的报酬了。

0012.en: Ten thousand yuan, plus an additional three thousand, for a total of 13,000.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 一万块钱加上后加的三千，一共13000的报酬。

0012.en: Zhang Yu's savings suddenly jumped to thirteen thousand seven hundred yuan.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 此刻张羽的存款一下子增长到了一万三千七百块。

0012.en: Unfortunately, after he used ten thousand to repay loans on multiple platforms, his savings instantly dropped to three thousand seven hundred.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 只可惜随着张羽拿出一万块去多个平台还贷，存款便又瞬间降到了三千七。

0012.en: However, after repaying the ten thousand, the collection calls became much less frequent. They probably wouldn't escalate their methods anytime soon.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 不过好在还了这一万之后，催收的频率降低不少，短时间内应该是不会升级手段了。

0012.en: Soon, the countdown in his mind interrupted his thoughts, forcing him to focus again on circulating the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 接着脑海中响起的倒计时很快就断了张羽的遐想，让他再次集中注意力，运转起了周天采气法。

0012.en: In the blink of an eye, the night passed.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 转眼间一夜过去。

0012.en: At the entrance of Songyang High School, Zhang Yu was walking while checking the changes in the Feather Book.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 嵩阳高中的门口，张羽正边走边看羽书上的变化。

0012.en: Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique Level 1 (0/20) → Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique Level 1 (11/20)
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 周天采气法1级（0/20）→周天采气法1级（11/20）

0012.en: His mana had also increased, thanks to his previous hard work and the recent practice of the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 而法力凭借原本的苦练，以及这次周天采气法的用功，也获得了提升。

0012.en: Mana 7.7 →
0012.speaker: 旁白

0012.en: "It really is running passively. Last night before bed, I only circulated it five times."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “果然在被动运行啊，昨天我睡觉前才运转了5个周天，算作5遍。”

0012.en: "But when I woke up this morning, it had increased to eight times. On the way to school, I actively circulated it, and it increased to eleven."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “结果早上起床之后，就涨到了8遍，来学校的路上经过我的主动运转，便涨到了第11遍。”

0012.en: Zhang Yu was secretly pleased with his calculation. Compared to the thirteen thousand yuan, the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique was yesterday's greatest reward.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 张羽算到这里暗暗心喜，相比起那一万三千块钱，这周天采气法才是昨天最大的收获。

0012.en: He resolved to raise the level of this Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique first.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 他此刻决心先把这门周天采气法的等级推上去。

0012.en: Naturally, he also decided to keep the Feather Book's specialization on the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 包括羽书的专精，他自然也决定继续定在周天采气法上。

0012.en: Unfortunately, this morning there were two consecutive PE classes.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 可惜今天早上又是两节连上的体育课。

0012.en: Walking toward the training ground, Zhang Yu felt a bit regretful.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 走在前往练功场的路上，张羽心中有点可惜。

0012.en: "Sigh, I have to practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms again."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “唉，又要练健体三十六式了。”

0012.en: "My specialization is the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique now. It's the best time for me to practice this breathing method."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “我现在专精的是周天采气法，明明最适合修炼这门吐纳法才对。”

0012.en: As soon as Zhang Yu entered the training ground, he saw little giants with muscles bulging like marble, sticking needles into their own bodies.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 张羽一进入练功场，便看到一尊尊筋肉如同大理石般隆起的小巨人们正在一针一针扎在自己的身上。

0012.en: Accompanied by popping sounds, beast-like roars, and the clash of equipment, the students of the demonstration class were already training with great enthusiasm.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 接着伴随一阵阵噼啪炸响，以及种种野兽般的嘶吼声，器械的碰撞声，示范班的学生们已经热火朝天地锻炼了起来。

0012.en: Just then, a student looked at Wang Hai in shock: "No... impossible, my cousin sold this to me..."
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 就在这时，一名学生吃惊地看着王海：“不……不可能啊，这是我表哥卖给我的……”

0012.en: Wang Hai shook his head, crushing the syringe in his hand into powder with a snap and tossing it into the trash.
0012.speaker: 王海
0012.cn: 王海摇了摇头，将手中的针管啪的一声捏成粉末，撒进了垃圾桶里。

0012.en: "Look at your weight change these past two weeks. No signs of growth in muscle or organs. Your physical strength only increased by 0.03 in two weeks. It's a classic case of natural training decline. You obviously bought fake drugs."
0012.speaker: 王海
0012.cn: “你看看你这两周体重有什么变化？不论筋肉还是脏器，都没有增长的迹象，两周时间肉体强度只提升0.03，一副自然炼体的衰样，一看就是买到了假药。”

0012.en: At this point, he stopped looking at the devastated student and raised his voice, "How many times have I told you all? You must buy drugs through proper channels. The safest is definitely the supply from the school's teachers."
0012.speaker: 王海
0012.cn: 说到这里，他不再看眼前失魂落魄的学生，而是放大音量说道：“我跟你们说了多少次了，买药一定要走正规渠道，最安全的肯定是学校老师这边的供货。”

0012.en: "If you try to save a little money and buy fake or expired drugs, you're being penny-wise and pound-foolish. You're wasting your own time."
0012.speaker: 王海
0012.cn: “要是为了贪便宜买到假药、过期药，那就是因小失大，浪费的是你们自己的时间。”

0012.en: After scolding the student, Wang Hai's gaze swept over to Zhang Yu, who was training in the corner.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 教训了一番学生后，王海的目光扫过角落里正在炼体的张羽。

0012.en: Looking at Zhang Yu, Wang Hai recalled the physical strength data from today's test: "0.85? A 0.02 increase in physical strength in three days?"
0012.speaker: 王海
0012.cn: 看着张羽，王海脑海中闪过对方今天检测的肉体强度数据：“0.85级？三天时间，增长了0.02级的肉体强度？”

0012.en: "Wasn't Zhang Yu this fast even when he was taking drugs every day?"
0012.speaker: 王海
0012.cn: “张羽之前天天扎药的时候也没这么快吧？”

0012.en: From Wang Hai's years of teaching experience, such a rapid increase in physical strength meant Zhang Yu couldn't possibly be training naturally without drugs or injections as he claimed. He must have secretly taken something before class.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 以王海多年执教的经验来看，这么快的肉体强度增长，张羽绝不可能像他说的那样不吃药不扎针纯自然，必然是在上课前偷偷扎药了。

0012.en: "Not only is he not training naturally, but the drugs he's taking must be very potent to achieve this effect. The damage to his body is probably also significant."
0012.speaker: 王海
0012.cn: “不但不是自然炼体，他扎的药一定还很猛才能达到这个效果，对身体的损伤恐怕也很大。”

0012.en: As for Zhang Yu reaching the third level of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms and undergoing extreme demonic training on his own, Wang Hai never even considered it.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 至于张羽能达到健体三十六式第三级，并且独自进行了极限状态下的魔鬼训练，那根本没被王海想过。

0012.en: But no matter what, Zhang Yu was now increasingly challenging his authority in the classroom.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 但不论如何，此刻的张羽在王海眼中越发挑战了他的课堂威严。

0012.en: A key question was, where did Zhang Yu get his drugs?
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 特别是其中蕴含了一个问题，张羽从哪里买的药？

0012.en: Would other students see Zhang Yu's results and try to buy from the same source?
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 会不会有学生看张羽身上的效果不错，也找这个路子去买药？

0012.en: If that happened, wouldn't it affect his sales performance?
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 如此一来，岂不是影响了他的销售业绩？

0012.en: The thought of the bloody competition in the physical enhancement drug market instantly put Wang Hai on high alert.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 一想到炼体药品市场的血雨腥风，王海脑袋里的警戒神经便瞬间绷紧了起来。

0012.en: "A second-year? A third-year teacher?"
0012.speaker: 王海
0012.cn: “高二？高三的老师？”

0012.en: "Or did a tutor from outside of school guide him?"
0012.speaker: 王海
0012.cn: “还是校外的补课老师指点了他？”

0012.en: "Is someone trying to sell on my turf?"
0012.speaker: 王海
0012.cn: “是不是想要来我的地盘卖货？”

0012.en: To Wang Hai, Zhang Yu himself was just a pawn. What he wanted to figure out now was the person behind Zhang Yu.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 至于张羽本身，在王海看来只是一个棋子，他现在最想要弄清楚的是张羽背后的人。

0012.en: However, the influence in the class had to be eliminated.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 不过班级里的影响还是要抹去的。

0012.en: So, a moment later, Wang Hai gave a few instructions to a student named Zhao Tianxing.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 于是片刻之后，王海跟名为赵天行的学生吩咐了几句话。

0012.en: Then Zhao Tianxing walked over to Zhang Yu and said, "Zhang Yu, Teacher Wang asked me to check if you're sure you won't be buying any more drugs."
0012.speaker: 赵天行
0012.cn: 接着赵天行来到了张羽身旁，说道：“张羽，王老师让我问一下你，确定接下来都不买药了吗？”

0012.en: After seeing Zhang Yu nod, Zhao Tianxing scratched his head and said embarrassedly, "Well... the teacher told me to tell you, to avoid disturbing others' training, he wants you to practice alone in the small room next door. Is that okay?"
0012.speaker: 赵天行
0012.cn: 看到张羽点头之后，赵天行挠了挠头，一脸不好意思地说道：“那什么……老师让我跟你说，为了不影响其他人训练，想让你去一旁的小房间单独练习，你看行不行？”

0012.en: After being instructed by Wang Hai, Zhao Tianxing understood that Wang Hai intended to further isolate Zhang Yu.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 在被王海授意后，赵天行便明白王海要进一步孤立张羽。

0012.en: He looked at Zhang Yu with a trace of pity, but his actions didn't hesitate in the slightest.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 他看向张羽的眼中带着一丝怜悯，但动作却没有丝毫迟疑。

0012.en: As one of Wang Hai's "good students," Zhao Tianxing had followed all of Wang Hai's guidance, purchased all the recommended drugs, and through his own effort, had broken through the 1.00 physical strength level, becoming one of the top ten strongest students in the class.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 作为王海口中的好学生，听话的学生，赵天行正是因为完全接受王海的指导，购买了对方推荐的所有药物，再加上自身的努力，这才一步一步将肉体强度突破了1.00级，成为了班中肉体强度前十的学生。

0012.en: So, he always did as the PE teacher, Wang Hai, told him.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 所以对于体育老师王海，他一直都言听计从。

0012.en: However, worried that Zhang Yu might get upset, he spoke very politely and added, "Why don't you just buy some drugs? Teacher Wang's drugs are really good quality. Natural training really doesn't work..."
0012.speaker: 赵天行
0012.cn: 不过担心张羽有情绪，他说话也非常客气，说完后还补充道：“要不你还是买点药？王老师的药质量特别好，自然炼体真不行的……”

0012.en: But to Zhao Tianxing's surprise, Zhang Yu agreed to go out and train without any hesitation.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 但让赵天行意外的是张羽没有一点犹豫，直接便答应了出去锻炼。

0012.en: Watching him leave, Zhao Tianxing scratched his head and thought to himself, "Sigh, Zhang Yu is a bit stubborn. Can't he just apologize to the teacher, admit his mistake, and continue with class? He's ruining his own future by being so impulsive."
0012.speaker: 赵天行
0012.cn: 看着对方离去的背影，赵天行挠了挠头，心中暗道：“唉，张羽同学有点犟啊，跟老师道个歉认个错，继续好好上课不行吗？这么一冲动就把自己的前途给毁了。”

0012.en: Meanwhile, Zhang Yu entered the small room, chuckled, sat down, and immediately began practicing the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 另一边，张羽来到小房间里，呵呵一笑便坐了下来，直接就练起了周天采气法。

0012.en: Strands of spiritual energy flowed into his Dantian's sea of qi, where he refined them drop by drop into mana.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 一缕缕灵机涌入丹田气海之中，被张羽一点一滴地提炼为法力。

0012.en: Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique Level 1 (11/20) → Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique Level 1 (16/20)
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 周天采气法1级（11/20）→周天采气法1级（16/20）

0012.en: In the blink of an eye, five circulations were completed, and the two PE classes were over.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 转眼间便是五个周天练完，两节体育课也已经过去。

0012.en: But during the following Chinese and Math classes, Zhang Yu remained in the classroom, completely focused on circulating the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 但接下来的语文课和数学课上，教室里的张羽仍旧在专心致志地运转周天采气法。

0012.en: Breathing in spiritual energy and refining mana for a long time was naturally a very boring task.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 长时间的吐纳灵机，提炼法力，自然是一件很无聊的事情。

0012.en: His waist, abdomen, and shoulders would ache, his skin would itch, and his mind would feel dull.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 腰腹、肩膀都会酸痛，皮肤会瘙痒，精神更会感觉到枯燥。

0012.en: Even the old Zhang Yu would often need to relax after an hour or two of practice, standing up to walk around, or scratching his itches.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 便是以前的张羽，往往吐纳一到两个小时后，都会忍不住放松一下，站起来走走，又或者是抓抓痒，挠挠头。

0012.en: But now, forced by the ritual's power and encouraged by the numbers changing in the Feather Book, Zhang Yu pushed through and finally completed the 20th repetition of the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 但此刻的张羽在仪式力量的逼迫下，羽书数字变化的鼓励下，就这么硬撑着修行了下去，终于一口气将周天采气法练到了第20遍。

0012.en: Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique Level 2 (0/40)
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 周天采气法2级（0/40）

0012.en: Countless experiences of circulating the technique bloomed in Zhang Yu's mind. He could feel the mana circulation in his body become more complex, more refined, and more powerful.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 无数遍周天采气法的运功经验在张羽的脑海中绽放，他能感觉到体内的法力循环变得更加复杂，更加精妙，也更加澎湃了一些。

0012.en: When Zhang Yu stopped, the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique continued to operate, but at a slightly faster speed than before.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 当张羽停下之后，周天采气法也仍旧在持续运转，但速度却比原来快上了一些。

0012.en: "At Level 1, the passive breathing speed is only thirty percent of the active speed."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “1级的周天采气法，被动吐纳只有主动吐纳的三成速度。”

0012.en: "But at Level 2, the passive breathing speed has increased to thirty-five percent of the active speed."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “但到了2级之后，被动吐纳的速度提升到了主动吐纳的三成半。”

0012.en: "As for actively circulating the technique, the efficiency has also improved a lot. It's so much stronger than my original Level 1 basic breathing technique."
0012.speaker: 张羽
0012.cn: “至于主动运转周天采气法后，吐纳的效率也提升了不少，比原本我那1级的基础吐纳法强上太多了。”

0012.en: Zhang Yu nodded slightly, somewhat satisfied. This was a continuous, day-and-night improvement.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 张羽微微点头，略感满意，这可都是天长地久，日夜不停的提升。

0012.en: So, after lunch, he redoubled his efforts, continuing to improve the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 于是接下来吃过午饭，他再接再厉，继续提升周天采气法。

0012.en: In the following days, he invested almost all his available time into the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 甚至接下来的时间里，他几乎所有能利用的时间都砸在了周天采气法上。

0012.en: The path of cultivation in high school was both boring and arduous. Especially since Zhang Yu had no time to relax under the pressure of the ritual. Only by watching the numbers after the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique slowly increase, and imagining the long-term benefits of its passive effect, could his spirit feel a little more at ease.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 高中的仙道学习既枯燥又辛苦，特别张羽还在仪式力量的逼迫下没有丝毫放松的时间，也就只有看着周天采气法后的数字一点一点增长上去，想象着这门功法的被动效果所带来的长期收益，能让他的精神稍微舒服点。

0012.en: As they say, if you can't fight it, you might as well enjoy it.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 所谓无法反抗，那便只有享受。

0012.en: So, during PE class, he was cultivating the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 于是体育课的时候他在修炼周天采气法。

0012.en: During Chinese class, he was cultivating the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 语文课上他在修炼周天采气法。

0012.en: During his lunch break, he was still cultivating the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 午休的时候他还是在修炼周天采气法。

0012.en: At night, while waiting for work in the square, he was still cultivating the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique. Unfortunately, he didn't find any work for three days.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 晚上在广场上等工作的时候，他依旧在修炼周天采气法，只可惜这三天他都没有找到工作。

0012.en: As for sleeping at home, needless to say, the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique was still operating on its own.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 至于回家睡觉的时候更不用说，周天采气法还在自行运转。

0012.en: In just three short days, the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique was raised to Level 4 (5/80).
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 短短三天时间过去，周天采气法便被提升到了4级（5/80）。

0012.en: His mana also progressed vigorously with his hard work, increasing from 7.8 to 8.3.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 法力也随着张羽的用功而勇猛精进，从7.8提升到了8.3。

0012.en: Now, the passive breathing speed of the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Technique had reached forty-five percent of the active breathing speed.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 此刻周天采气法的被动吐纳速度，已经达到了主动吐纳速度的四成半。

0013.en: Chapter 13: The Mana Tournament
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 第13章 法赛

0013.en: On this day in mana class, the students of the demonstration class were sitting cross-legged in the quiet room, practicing a breathing technique.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这天的法力课上，示范班的学生正盘坐在静室之中运转着吐纳法。

0013.en: A camera at the front monitored their every move, recording any slight irregularity—whether a student opened their eyes, scratched an itch, fidgeted, or wriggled in their seat.
0013.speaker: 旁白
