0013.cn: 前方的摄像头则监控着学生们的一举一动，将学生们有没有睁眼，有没有挠痒，有没有动手动脚，有没有屁股扭来扭去……任何轻微的异状都会被一一记录下来。

0013.en: All of this data was compiled and recorded as a "distraction rate."
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 而所有这些数据会被统一记录为走神率。

0013.en: Each week, the class with the highest distraction rate was publicly criticized by the entire school.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 每周走神率最高的班级，会被全校通报批评。

0013.en: The students of the demonstration class weren't concerned; no matter the assessment, their class was always guaranteed to be first.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 示范班的学生对此不以为意，反正不论怎么考核，他们班也必然是第一。

0013.en: However, the student with the lowest weekly distraction rate would not only be publicly praised but also rewarded with 500 yuan and a one-hour free rental of a Heavenly Spiritual Root.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 而每周走神率最低的学生，不但会被通报表扬，更是会被奖励500块钱，以及一小时天灵根的免费租用权。

0013.en: This reward made every student in the demonstration class sit up and pay attention.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这就让示范班的学生们一个个提起了神来。

0013.en: When Zhang Yu first learned of this "distraction rate," he thought that if it had existed in his previous life, students would have cursed the school for being completely insane.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 而张羽第一次在脑海里知道走神率这玩意的存在，便感叹如果前世有这个东西，学生们必然会骂学校大傻逼。

0013.en: But this world was different. The students in the demonstration class stared at the daily distraction rate like bulls in heat, and the whole classroom was filled with a fierce, competitive atmosphere.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 但这个世界却不一样，示范班的学生们个个像是发情的公牛一样盯着每天的走神率，整个班级里都充满了一股激烈的卷气。

0013.en: At that moment, a bell rang, and the students, who had been silently cultivating, stopped and looked at the large screen at the front, awaiting the distraction rate data for the class.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 此时此刻，伴随着一阵铃响，静室内默默运功的众人都停了下来，将目光看向了前方的大屏幕，期待着这节课的走神率数据。

0013.en: 1st Place: Zhang Yu, Distraction Rate 0%
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 第1名张羽走神率0%法力

0013.en: 2nd Place: Bai Zhenzhen, Distraction Rate 0.03%
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 第2名白真真走神率0.03%法力

0013.en: 3rd Place: Qian Shen, Distraction Rate 0.12%
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 第3名钱深走神率0.12%法力

0013.en: Looking at the rankings, although the students remained silent, a ripple of surprise could be seen in the subtle changes in their eyes and expressions.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 看着这走神率的排名，教室内的学生们虽然没有出声，但从他们眼神和表情的细微变化中，能感觉到一丝丝的惊讶在蔓延。

0013.en: The mana class instructor, a woman with her hair in a bun and wearing black-framed glasses, was named Yan.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 台上法力课的指导老师姓严，是一名盘着头带着黑框眼镜的女老师。

0013.en: Teacher Yan looked at the results on the screen and said, "I won't call out the names of the few students whose distraction rate exceeded 0.3% today."
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: 此刻便听这位严老师看着大屏幕上的成绩说道：“走神率超过0.3%的几位同学，我今天也不点名了。”

0013.en: "It's been three months since school started. How many times have I told you to focus your mind and unify your qi?"
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: “已经开学三个月了，我说了多少次冥心于一，合气于淡？”

0013.en: "With such a high distraction rate, how can your breathing efficiency possibly compare to others?"
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: “走神率这么高，你们的吐纳效率怎么可能比得上别人？”

0013.en: "Everyone cultivates 24 hours a day. You don't get more time than anyone else. If your breathing efficiency is low, you fall behind a little each day. After three years of high school, the gap in your mana could be 10, 20, or even 30 points."
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: “大家都是一天修炼24个小时，你们不会比别人多出时间来，吐纳效率低了以后，一天落后个一点点，高中三年后你们在法力上的差距可能就是10点、20点甚至30点。”

0013.en: "And how many times have I said it? Students who can't lower their distraction rate can come to my office to buy Calming Agent. I sat in my office for three hours yesterday afternoon, and not a single person came to ask... Do you all think you have no problems at all?!"
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: “还有我说了多少次了，走神率降不下来的同学，可以来我办公室买静心剂，昨天我下午在办公室坐了三个小时，没一个人来问我的……是都觉得自己一点问题没有了？！”

0013.en: After her criticism, Teacher Yan smiled slightly and looked at the top names on the screen. "Of course, there are also students who performed very well."
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: 一番批评后，严老师又微微一笑，看着屏幕上的前几名说道：“当然，也有表现很好的同学。”

0013.en: "I want to give special praise to the three students with the lowest distraction rates, especially Zhang Yu. His rate has been 0% for four consecutive days. Compared to before, this is a massive improvement."
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: “这里点名表扬一下走神率最低的三名同学，特别是张羽，已经连续4天走神率0%了，对比以前，可谓是质的飞跃。”

0013.en: "His mana has also increased by 0.5 points in the last three days, which shows he must have put in a lot of hard work outside of class. He either rented a Spiritual Root or a high-level cultivation room, right, Zhang Yu?"
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: “还有法力这三天也提升了足足0.5点，说明他在课外时间也一定下足了苦功，不是租了灵根，就是租了高灵机的修炼室，是吧张羽同学？”

0013.en: All the students immediately turned to look at him.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 所有学生们目光立刻全都看了过去。

0013.en: But Zhang Yu's eyes were still tightly closed, as if he were half-asleep, still silently circulating the Zhou-Tian Qi-Gathering Method.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 却见张羽仍旧双目紧闭，看上去似睡非睡，还在继续默默运转周天采气法。

0013.en: Teacher Yan said with admiration, "Look, this is the attitude of a true top student. He doesn't even stop after class, seizing every minute and every second to cultivate and become stronger."
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: 严老师赞赏道：“你们看，这就是真正学霸的态度，下课了都不停，抓紧每一分每一秒的时间去修炼，去变强。”

0013.en: Zhou Tianyi looked at Zhang Yu, who was still focused on his breathing, and found he understood his classmate less and less. "He's clearly such a hard worker, so why does he slack off and not use stimulants in P.E. class?"
0013.speaker: 周天翊
0013.cn: 赵天行看着还在认真吐纳的张羽，发现自己越来越看不懂这位同学了：“明明是这么用功的人，为什么体育课上反而要偷懒不扎药呢？”

0013.en: Bai Zhenzhen watched Zhang Yu, his eyes still shut, and thought, "These past few days, aside from eating and using the bathroom, Yu'zi has been breathing almost non-stop, even while walking. Is he pushing himself this hard because of the 700,000 yuan debt collection calls?"
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: 白真真看着仍旧紧闭双目的张羽，心道：“羽子这几天除了吃饭拉屎，就差走路的时候没吐纳了，用功到了这种地步……难道是被70万的催债电话逼出来的？。”

0013.en: At the front of the class, Teacher Yan continued, "Of course, you get what you pay for. There's no free lunch on the path of cultivation. You won't get far without spending money. There are some Heavenly Spiritual Roots available for rent at the school recently. Any interested students can come see me."
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: 台上，严老师继续说道：“当然了，所谓一分钱一分收获，仙道之路上没有免费的东西，不砸钱是走不长远的，最近学校里的天灵根租借有了空位，感兴趣的同学可以来找我。”

0013.en: But before Teacher Yan left, she said something that caught Zhang Yu's attention.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 而在严老师离开之前，她说的一件事情却是引起了张羽的注意。

0013.en: "Oh, right, the city's Mana Tournament starts next month. Basically, all high schools in the city will participate in the first-year division. The first-place prize is 100,000 yuan..."
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: “对了，市里的法赛下个月要开始了，高一组基本上全市所有高中都会参加，第一名的奖金有10万……”

0013.en: "Because registration is next Friday, the school plans to select the top ten students in terms of mana level from the first-year grade to participate..."
0013.speaker: 严老师
0013.cn: “因为比赛下周五报名，所以高一年级里，学校打算在下周五挑选法力水平前十的学生参加法赛……”

0013.en: That evening, in the cafeteria.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 当天晚上，食堂。

0013.en: Zhou Tianyi had to leave early for his tutoring class, leaving only Zhang Yu and Bai Zhenzhen at the table.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 周天翊今天要提前赶去补习班，餐桌上此刻只留下了张羽和白真真。

0013.en: After being stared at by Bai Zhenzhen for an uncomfortably long time, Zhang Yu spoke up. "Ah Zhen, I know I'm handsome, and in a school full of bookworms like Songyang High, I stand out like a crane among chickens. But you don't have to stare so intently."
0013.speaker: 张羽
0013.cn: 被白真真左看右看，看得有些受不了了，张羽开口说道：“阿真，我知道自己的颜值很高，在这只知道学习的嵩阳高中里犹如是鹤立鸡群，但你也不用这么死盯着看吧。”

0013.en: Bai Zhenzhen asked, "You're saying you want to participate in the Mana Tournament?"
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: 白真真问道：“你说你也想参加法赛？”

0013.en: "What a pity, Ah Zhen." Zhang Yu shook his head. "If you, the top-ranked genius of our grade, weren't my friend, you would probably provoke me now, only to be repeatedly shocked by my amazing performance in the tournament, your world shaken to its core."
0013.speaker: 张羽
0013.cn: “可惜了，阿真。”张羽摇摇头道：“你这位年级第一的绝世天才如果不是我的朋友，接下来就该向我挑衅一番，接着在赛场上被我的惊人表现连番打脸，最后瞳孔地震几十级了。”

0013.en: Bai Zhenzhen shook her head. "Yu'zi, you want to compete in the city-wide Mana Tournament."
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: 白真真摇了摇头：“羽子，你想参加的可是全市法力竞赛啊。”

0013.en: "That's where all the high schools in Songyang City send their best, most powerful, and wealthiest students to compete. It's a gathering of countless super-rich people."
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: “那是整个嵩阳市所有高中，派出自己最优秀，法力最雄厚，家里最有钱的学生来参赛，汇聚了无数的死有钱人。”

0013.en: With a look of deep sympathy, Bai Zhenzhen said, "What do you think will happen to an ordinary person like you?"
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: 白真真一脸感慨地说道：“像你这样的普通人去参加会是怎么样的结果？”

0013.en: Her eyes seemed to have already seen the tragic future. "You'll be repeatedly humiliated by countless powerful opponents, become a stepping stone for the rich, the laughingstock of Songyang High, and drag the school's reputation into the dust!"
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: 她的双眼似乎已经看穿了未来的绝景，一脸悲哀道：“被无数强者反复侮辱，成为有钱人们的垫脚石，嵩阳高中的小丑，学校风评降到尘埃！”

0013.en: "It's too tragic! I can already see you being ruthlessly crushed under the feet of geniuses from other high schools, your Dao Heart shattered, lying there like a dead dog."
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: “太惨啦，我都已经看到你被其他高中的妖孽狠狠踩在脚底，道心破碎，宛如死狗的模样了。”

0013.en: Zhang Yu rolled his eyes. "Don't be so dramatic. The Mana Tournament isn't a fighting ring. There's no shame in losing."
0013.speaker: 张羽
0013.cn: 张羽翻了个白眼：“你别太夸张了，法力赛又不是擂台赛，输了也不丢人。”

0013.en: "Besides, the first prize is one hundred thousand yuan."
0013.speaker: 张羽
0013.cn: “而且第一名可是有十万块钱的。”

0013.en: "Even the top ten get ten thousand yuan."
0013.speaker: 张羽
0013.cn: “哪怕只是前十也有一万块钱啊。”

0013.en: Seeing Zhang Yu's greedy expression, Bai Zhenzhen thought to herself that the debt collectors must have really pushed him over the edge, making him delusional enough to want to enter the tournament.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 白真真看着张羽一脸贪财的模样，心想羽子果然是被催收公司逼得不行，已经魔怔到妄图参加竞赛去了。

0013.en: Zhang Yu was indeed in financial trouble. Although he had just earned 13,000 from Xianyun Company a few days ago, he had immediately used 10,000 to pay off a loan and another 1,500 for rent, leaving him with just over 2,000 yuan.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 张羽确实是经济困难，虽然前几天才在仙韵公司赚了一万三，但转眼间就被他拿了一万去还贷了，又被他花了一千五补上房租，后来也就剩下两千多块钱。

0013.en: "If you want to compete, first figure out how to get your mana level into the top ten of our grade. You're ranked 16th right now, right? How much money will you have to borrow to break into the top ten?"
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: “想参赛，你先想想怎么把法力水平提升到年级前十吧，你现在排名才16吧？想要冲到前十还得借多少钱？”

0013.en: Zhang Yu quickly calculated in his head.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 张羽也在心里快速算了算。

0013.en: His current mana was 8.3, ranking him 16th in the grade.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 他如今法力8.3，排名年级第16。

0013.en: The student currently ranked tenth had a mana of 9.5.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 而现在年级第十名的学生，法力是9.5。

0013.en: To surpass that person, Zhang Yu would need to raise his mana to 9.5 before next Friday...
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 那么想要超越对方的话，张羽就必须在下周五之前，将法力提升到9.5的水平……

0013.en: "No, I have to consider that everyone else will be improving too."
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: “不对，要考虑到所有人都会进步的情况。”

0013.en: "To be safe, I should probably aim to get my mana to 10.0 before next Friday."
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: “那么保险一点的话，最好能在下周五之前把法力提升到10.0的水平。”

0013.en: "There are eight days until next Friday. Can I really raise my mana from 8.3 to 10.0, a full 1.7 points, in that time?"
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: “距离下周五还有八天，八天时间内，将法力从8.3提升到10.0，足足提升1.7吗？”

0013.en: "That's an increase of more than 0.2 per day... Is that even possible?"
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: “每天要提升0.2以上……可能吗？”

0013.en: Absolutely! Easily!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 绝对可以！轻易可以！

0013.en: In the eyes of other teachers and students, his recent rapid progress must have been the result of spending a fortune to rent high-quality Spiritual Roots and cultivation spots.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 在其他老师和同学的眼中，张羽这几天的迅猛提升一定是砸下重金，租了优质的灵根和场地才获得的。

0013.en: But Zhang Yu knew it all came from his amazing potential and extreme self-discipline.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 但张羽知道，这一切都源自于他的惊人潜力和极度的自律。

0013.en: A level 4 Zhou-Tian Qi-Gathering Method had allowed him to increase his mana by 0.5 in just three days. He believed that as the method continued to level up, his mana would increase even faster.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 4级的周天采气法就可以让他在短短3天内提升法力0.5之多，他相信接下来随着周天采气法继续升级，他的法力提升也一定会越来越迅猛。

0013.en: "After all, the highest skill level in the Qi Refining stage is level 10."
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: “毕竟炼气阶段，技能的最高等级也就是10级。”

0013.en: "A level 4 breathing technique is something most first-year high school students couldn't possibly achieve in their first semester."
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: “一门4级的吐纳法，对绝大多数高一新生来说，都是不可能在第一个学期内达到的。”

0013.en: "As I continue to cultivate, I'll probably be able to raise the Zhou-Tian Qi-Gathering Method to level 8, 9, or even 10 in a short time. That's a level many might not reach even after three years of high school."
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: “而我接下来继续修行，短时间内恐怕就能将周天采气法一路提升到8级、9级甚至是10级，那就是许多人在高中三年后也未必能达到的水准了。”

0013.en: As he was steeling his resolve with this thought, he suddenly saw Bai Zhenzhen's chopsticks reach for his bowl.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 想到这里，张羽正振作精神的时候，突然发现白真真一筷子朝着他碗里伸来。

0013.en: "How dare you!" Zhang Yu shouted, raising his own chopsticks to block her.
0013.speaker: 张羽
0013.cn: “好胆！”张羽一声呵斥，抬起筷子便挡了上去。

0013.en: With a series of clashing sounds, his chopsticks were easily deflected by Bai Zhenzhen.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 接着铛铛铛的撞击声中，他的筷子已经被白真真轻松搅下。

0013.en: Feeling a familiarity in her movements, Zhang Yu was surprised. "High School Basic Sword Arts? You've already learned it? And you've adapted it for use with chopsticks?"
0013.speaker: 张羽
0013.cn: 感受着白真真动作中的熟悉感，张羽惊讶道：“高中基础剑法？你已经学会了？还化用进了筷子里？”

0013.en: Quickly snatching a few pieces of meat from Zhang Yu's bowl, Bai Zhenzhen chuckled. "Is it that hard, Yu'zi? Isn't it easy if you just have hands?"
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: 迅速从张羽碗中夹了几块肉，白真真轻笑道：“这很难吗羽子？不是有手就行？”

0013.en: Zhang Yu thought to himself, "Damn, she's showing off again."
0013.speaker: 张羽
0013.cn: 张羽心道：“干，又被她装到了。”

0013.en: Mixing the stolen meat with her rice, Bai Zhenzhen took a few quick bites and said with surprise, "I didn't expect the pork ribs in the 5-yuan set meal to be so good. I'll buy a portion next time."
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: 白真真混着夹来的肉又迅速扒了几口饭，意外道：“想不到5元套餐的排骨也挺好吃的，下次我也买一份。”

0013.en: Patting her slightly full stomach, Bai Zhenzhen let out a burp and said, "Sigh, if I eat any more, it'll affect my tutoring session."
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: 拍了拍微微有些鼓涨的肚子，白真真打了个饱嗝说道：“唉，再吃就影响补课了。”

0013.en: With that, she pushed her meal tray toward Zhang Yu. "Extra food for you, Yu'zi."
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: 说着，她将餐盘推向了张羽：“给你加餐了，羽子。”

0013.en: Looking at the neat, untouched half-portion of 'leftovers' Bai Zhenzhen had left, Zhang Yu understood she had intentionally saved it for him.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 看着白真真留下的整整齐齐半份没动过的‘剩饭剩菜’，张羽明白这是对方故意留给他的。

0013.en: It seemed that since learning about his financial difficulties, Bai Zhenzhen had often been feeding him during dinner.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 似乎是因为了解到张羽的经济困难，这段时间的白真真便经常在晚饭的时候投喂他。

0013.en: Zhang Yu pulled the tray over and said while eating, "Ah Zhen, you don't have to worry about my pride or face. With our relationship, it's fine even if you just give me money directly."
0013.speaker: 张羽
0013.cn: 张羽一把将餐盘拿了过来，一边吃一边说道：“阿真，你不用考虑我的什么自尊心、面子之类的东西，以我俩的关系，直接给我打钱都没问题。”

0013.en: Bai Zhenzhen rolled her eyes. "I'm heading to my tutoring session. Take your time eating."
0013.speaker: 白真真
0013.cn: 白真真翻了个白眼：“我要去补课了，你慢慢吃吧。”

0013.en: Outside the cafeteria.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 食堂外。

0013.en: A tall figure stood in a nearby corridor, eyes fixed on the cafeteria entrance.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 一道高大的身影正站在不远的楼道中，双眼死死盯着食堂大门的方向。

0013.en: A moment later, when he saw Zhang Yu walk out of the cafeteria, the tall figure's spirits lifted, and he immediately followed him.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 片刻后，当看到张羽从食堂大门里走出来的时候，这道高大身影精神一震，立刻便跟了上去。

0013.en: He followed Zhang Yu out of the school gate and saw him enter a stationery store across the street. A thought struck Zhao Tianyi: "Could this be where Zhang Yu gets his supplies?"
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 跟着张羽走出学校大门，当看到对方进了街对面的文具店时，赵天行目光一动，心中想到：“难道这里就是张羽进货的地方？”

0014.en: Chapter 14: Preparations and a New Job
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 第14章 准备和新工作

0014.en: The stationery stores near school entrances always sell all sorts of things that students need.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 学校门口的文具店中总是卖着各种各样学生们所需要的东西。

0014.en: The one outside Songyang High School was no different.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 嵩阳高中门口的文具店同样如此。

0014.en: Besides various school supplies, the huge display cabinet behind the owner looked like a pharmacy, filled with all the drugs a high schooler might need, from sedatives and stimulants to focus potions.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 除了各种文具之外，老板背后巨大的展柜就好像是药房一样，从镇定剂，兴奋剂再到专注药剂，摆满了各种高中生所需要的药品。

0014.en: Zhang Yu leaned on the counter with both hands and asked, "Boss, do you have any Neuro-Fillers?"
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽双手趴在柜台上，开口问道：“老板，有神经填充剂吗？”

0014.en: The owner, scrolling on his phone, replied without looking up, "Do you want the expensive kind or the cheap kind?"
0014.speaker: 老板
0014.cn: 正刷着手机的老板头也不抬的说道：“你要贵一点的，还是便宜一点的。”

0014.en: Zhang Yu: "I'm a student. Can you sell me the expensive one for a bit cheaper?"
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽：“我是学生，能不能把贵的便宜点卖我吗？”

0014.en: The owner finally looked up, giving Zhang Yu a sideways glance.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 老板终于抬起头来，斜了张羽一眼。

0014.en: Zhang Yu said nonchalantly, "I'm tenth in the first year, Class 1, a campus celebrity. If your potions work well for me, my classmates will definitely follow me here to buy them."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽毫不在意道：“我是高一（1）班的年级第十，校园风云人物，你这的药如果我吃得好，同学肯定都会跟着我来买的。”

0014.en: The owner's mouth twitched. He pulled a box of medicine from the cabinet and placed it in front of Zhang Yu. "Neuro-Filler from Ziyun Corporation. Guarantees you'll only need 20 minutes of sleep a day. 500 a box. I'll sell it to you for 480 this time."
0014.speaker: 老板
0014.cn: 老板扯了扯嘴角，从柜子里掏出一盒药，放到张羽面前：“紫云公司的神经填充剂，保证你一天只需要睡20分钟，500一盒，这次我卖你480吧。”

0014.en: Zhang Yu picked up the box and looked at it. "Aren't you going to throw in something extra?"
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽拿起药盒看了看：“不送点什么吗？”

0014.en: The owner frowned, took out a few painkillers, and said, "Here, take these for free."
0014.speaker: 老板
0014.cn: 老板皱了皱眉，又掏出几片止痛药，说道：“这个送你。”

0014.en: Zhang Yu chuckled, stuffed the painkillers in his pocket, and said, "Thanks, boss. In that case, can I pass on the Neuro-Filler?"
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽嘿嘿一笑，将止痛药塞进裤兜里，说道：“谢谢老板，那神经填充剂我能不能不要了。”

0014.en: Seeing the owner's face darken, Zhang Yu scanned the payment QR code nearby. "Just kidding. Paying you now."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 看到老板黑下来的脸庞，张羽朝着一旁的付款码扫了扫：“开个玩笑嘛，这就扫你。”

0014.en: Picking up the Neuro-Filler from the counter, Zhang Yu felt a pang of regret.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 将柜台上的神经填充剂拿起来，张羽心中感觉到一丝肉痛。

0014.en: A box like this would only last a week, but it cost him a full 480. His account balance instantly dropped to just over seventeen hundred.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 这么一盒神经填充剂也就能用个一周，但却花了他整整480，此刻他的账户余额瞬间就下降到了一千七百多。

0014.en: But Zhang Yu believed it was all worth it.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 但张羽相信这一切都是值得的。

0014.en: After all, since he'd decided to enter the Cultivation Tournament, Zhang Yu planned to give it his all. He would go without sleep for the next week, focusing entirely on practicing the Circadian Qi-Gathering Technique.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 毕竟都已经决定了要参加法赛，那张羽就准备拿出自己的全力，接下来一周都不睡觉了，全力去修炼周天采气法。

0014.en: "Heh, my goal isn't just to be in the top ten."
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: “呵呵，我的目标可不只是年级前十。”

0014.en: Meanwhile, Zhao Tianxing walked into the stationery store and watched Zhang Yu buy the medicine and leave. He wondered, "Is it really a Neuro-Filler?"
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 另一边，赵天行跟着走进文具店内，看着买药走人的张羽，他心中暗道：“真的是神经填充剂吗？”

0014.en: He followed Zhang Yu out of the store and down the street. When they reached a corner, he was startled to find Zhang Yu already standing there, waiting for him.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 他跟着张羽离开文具店，沿着街道一路走，直到一处拐角的时候，却猛然发现张羽已经站在那里等着自己。

0014.en: "Uh... hello, Zhang Yu," Zhao Tianxing said awkwardly. "What a coincidence, you take this road too?"
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: “你……你好啊张羽。”赵天行有些尴尬地说道：“这么巧啊，你也走这条路？”

0014.en: Zhang Yu looked at him and asked, "Why are you following me?"
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽看着对方，问道：“你跟着我干嘛？”

0014.en: Zhao Tianxing scratched his head, playing dumb. "Following you? I always take this road after school."
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: 赵天行抓了抓头皮，装傻道：“跟着你？我放学也走这条路啊。”

0014.en: Zhang Yu said impatiently, "Just look at yourself."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽不耐烦地说道：“麻烦你看看你自己。”

0014.en: "You're over two meters tall and weigh more than three hundred pounds. I saw you the moment I left the cafeteria."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: “两米多高，三百多斤，从食堂出来我就看到你了。”

0014.en: "What do you really want?"
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: “你到底有什么事情？”

0014.en: Zhao Tianxing couldn't possibly tell him that the PE teacher, Wang Hai, had asked him to get close to Zhang Yu and find out where he was getting his supplies.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵天行自然不可能告诉对方，是体育老师王海让他接近张羽，查探一下张羽的进货渠道是哪里。

0014.en: So, Zhao Tianxing scratched his head again and said shyly, "Zhang Yu, I think you're really amazing. I want to follow you and learn from you."
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: 于是赵天行又抓了抓头皮，有些不好意思地说道：“张羽，我觉得你特别优秀，想要跟着你，多和你学习学习。”

0014.en: Seeing the bashful expression on the sixteen-year-old, 300-pound boy, Zhang Yu thought to himself, "Are... are your social skills still at an elementary school level?"
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 看着眼前十六岁300多斤的大男孩羞涩的模样，张羽心道：“不是……你这社交能力还停留在小学阶段是吧？”

0014.en: Zhang Yu thought for a moment and said, "Alright. Just buy me some fried chicken, and you can follow me around all you want."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽想了想，说道：“行啊，只要请我吃炸鸡，你接下来想跟就跟着呗。”

0014.en: Feeling a chill run through his body and the countdown timer in his head urging him on, Zhang Yu knew he couldn't stay any longer.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 感受着体内传来的一股股恶寒，以及脑海中不断催促的倒计时，张羽知道自己不能再逗留了。

0014.en: He walked forward helplessly and waved. "Let's talk as we walk."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 于是他无奈地向前走去，同时招了招手：“边走边说吧。”

0014.en: Zhao Tianxing followed behind Zhang Yu, hesitating. "You want to eat fried chicken? That's terrible for body-strengthening. Teacher Wang told us not to eat it. Can we get grilled chicken breast instead?"
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: 赵天行跟在张羽身后，满脸犹豫道：“你要吃炸鸡？那可是炼体大忌啊，王老师让我们不要吃的，能不能换成鸡胸肉？”

0014.en: "Don't worry, I'm not asking you to eat it. You just have to buy it for me." Thinking of the taste of fried chicken, Zhang Yu couldn't help but wipe the corner of his mouth.
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: “放心，没要你吃，你请我吃就行了。”想到炸鸡的味道，张羽忍不住擦了擦嘴角的口水。

0014.en: Ever since coming to this world, he had eaten three cheap, healthy meals a day at the high school cafeteria. He hadn't eaten anything like fried chicken in a long time.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 自从来到这个世界后，一天三顿都是在高中食堂吃穷鬼健康餐，张羽已经很久没吃过炸鸡这样的食物了。

0014.en: The daily hard training had built up a lot of stress, with no time to relax and no courage to spend an extra cent.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 而一日日的苦修让他不断在心中积攒着压力，没有时间放松，更不敢多花一分钱。

0014.en: Now, the thought of eating fried chicken made him feel much lighter, and some of the pressure seemed to melt away.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 此刻想到一会能吃炸鸡，张羽就感觉心里都轻快了许多，压力似乎也消解了一些。

0014.en: Zhao Tianxing followed him onto the subway and off again, watching as he arrived at a fried chicken shop. He asked curiously, "We came all this way to this shop. It must be especially delicious, right?"
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: 赵天行一路跟着对方坐地铁下地铁，看着对方来到一处炸鸡店门口，好奇道：“坐这么远来这家店，一定是因为这家店特别好吃吧？”

0014.en: Zhang Yu: "Because it's on the way."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽：“因为顺路。”

0014.en: Unfortunately, as soon as Zhang Yu stepped into the fried chicken shop, the cursed countdown started again in his mind.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 可惜张羽一踏入炸鸡店逗留，便听到脑海中那该死的倒计时又响了起来。

0014.en: He could only say to Zhao Tianxing, "Buy me a fried chicken combo. I'll wait for you here."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 他只能朝着一旁的赵天行说道：“你给我买份炸鸡套餐，我在这里等你。”

0014.en: Watching Zhang Yu sit down and start meditating on the spot, Zhao Tianxing scratched his head, confused about what was happening.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 看着原地坐下开始打坐的张羽，赵天行摸了摸脑袋，有些搞不懂是什么情况。

0014.en: A moment later, watching Zhang Yu happily munching on a fried chicken leg on the street, Zhao Tianxing felt even more puzzled.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 片刻后，看着路上一脸快乐地啃着炸鸡腿的张羽，赵天行心中感觉越发古怪。

0014.en: "He's so disciplined that he uses the time waiting in line to practice his breathing, yet he eats fried chicken... What a strange person."
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: “明明自律到排队时间都要拿来吐纳，却又要吃炸鸡……好奇怪的人。”

0014.en: Following Zhang Yu, Zhao Tianxing was even more surprised to find that he wasn't going to a cram school or to buy medicine, but to a public square to wait for temporary work.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 而接下来跟着张羽，赵天行更意外的是对方竟然不是去补习班，更不是去买药，而是来到一处广场等待临时工作。

0014.en: Zhao Tianxing: "You're going to work?"
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: 赵天行：“你要打工？”

0014.en: Zhang Yu rubbed his stomach, found a clean spot on the ground, and sat down comfortably. He waved his hand and said, "A fried chicken meal doesn't buy you a conversation. I'm going to wait for work while I cultivate. Do as you please."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽摸了摸肚子，安逸地找了块干净的地面坐了下来，摆摆手道：“一顿炸鸡不陪聊啊，我接下来要一边修炼一边等工作了，你随意。”

0014.en: Seeing Zhang Yu start his breathing exercises right there on the ground, Zhao Tianxing was stunned again.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 看着张羽就这么在地上吐纳起来，赵天行又是愣住了。

0014.en: "Breathing exercises?" He glanced at the nearby sewage, listened to the loud music from the barbershop across the street, and looked at the intimidating job-seekers all around. He couldn't help but ask again, "You're doing them here?"
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: “吐纳？”他看了看不远处的污水，听着街对面理发店里传来的吵闹音乐声，又看了看四周围一个个明显不好惹的求职者，忍不住再次问道：“在这吐纳？”

0014.en: But Zhang Yu had already started to fully concentrate on practicing the Circadian Qi-Gathering Technique and ignored him this time.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 但张羽已经开始全心全意地修炼周天采气法，这一次没有再理会他。

0014.en: Zhao Tianxing squatted next to Zhang Yu and observed him for a while. He realized that he was genuinely practicing his breathing, and more questions bubbled up in his mind. "Is there any benefit to practicing here?"
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: 赵天行蹲在了张羽身旁，仔细观察了一阵，发现对方真的是在吐纳，心中忍不住涌起了更多的疑惑：“在这吐纳……有什么好处吗？”

0014.en: "Is it just to practice while waiting for a job?"
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: “只是为了等工作的同时，顺便修行？”

0014.en: After waiting for a while and seeing that Zhang Yu had no intention of getting up, Zhao Tianxing was thinking about leaving when his phone vibrated.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 等了一会儿，发现张羽完全没有要起来的意思，就在赵天行想着是不是要走的时候，手机震动了起来。

0014.en: Seeing the inquiry message from Wang Hai, Zhao Tianxing replied that he was getting close to Zhang Yu. After a long hesitation, he finally sat down next to him and also began his breathing exercises.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 看着王海发来的询问信息，赵天行回了个正在接近张羽，犹豫良久之后，终于也坐到了对方的身旁，同样开始吐纳了起来。

0014.en: Half an hour later, Zhao Tianxing couldn't help but open his eyes. He saw that Zhang Yu was still practicing.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 半个小时后，赵天行忍不住睁开了眼睛，发现张羽仍旧在吐纳。

0014.en: An hour later, Zhao Tianxing couldn't help but stand up, walk around, and stretch. He turned to see Zhang Yu still practicing.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 一个小时后，赵天行忍不住站起来走了一圈，伸了个懒腰，转头看见张羽还在吐纳。

0014.en: More than two hours later, Zhao Tianxing had long stopped his breathing exercises and had started practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, one move at a time.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 两个多小时后，赵天行早已经不再吐纳，而是开始一招一式地练习健体三十六式。

0014.en: In his occasional glances, Zhang Yu remained motionless from beginning to end. He didn't even make small movements like scratching his head or bottom. Even his eyelids didn't move, and his breathing rhythm remained unchanged.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 而在他时不时的观察中，张羽便从头到尾纹丝不动，别说是什么挠头、抓屁股之类的小动作，便是连眼皮都没抬一下，呼吸的节奏都没有丝毫变化。

0014.en: Zhao Tianxing couldn't help but marvel, "Such high concentration. No wonder he can maintain zero distraction for days on end."
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: 赵天行心中忍不住感叹道：“好高的专注度，不愧是能连着几天0走神率的人。”

0014.en: "But there's no spiritual root here, no high-spirit-energy environment, and he's not on any drugs... Is there really any point in practicing with such low efficiency?"
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: “但在这里既没有灵根，又没有高灵机环境，也没服什么药……吐纳的效率这么低，真的有意义吗？”

0014.en: With Zhang Yu's focused cultivation, the progress of his Circadian Qi-Gathering Technique advanced again, reaching level 4 (12/80).
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 而在张羽的专注修行下，周天采气法的进度也再次提升，来到了4级（12/80）。

0014.en: Just then, another van drove into the square. Hearing that they were looking for security guards, Zhang Yu retracted his focus and continued to cultivate.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 就在这时，又一辆面包车开进了广场，听着对方要找安保人员，张羽便又收回了心神，继续专注修炼。

0014.en: A first-year high school student like him had no chance of competing for a security job against the old-timers around him.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 他这样的高一学生，在安保工作上和周围的老登们比起来是毫无竞争力的。

0014.en: But soon he heard that the recruiter was looking for someone young, in good shape, clean-cut, and with good looks.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 但很快他又听到对方的招人要求是年轻，身材好，长得干净清爽，颜值不能太低。

0014.en: Zhang Yu's eyes flew open. He strode towards the van with the confidence of a dragon and raised his hand. "How about me?"
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽猛地睁开了眼睛，龙行虎步朝着面包车走去，充满自信地举起了手：“你看我怎么样？”

0014.en: The driver in the van's eyes lit up and he walked towards Zhang Yu. "Excellent, excellent, I'll take you."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: 面包车上的司机眼睛陡然一亮，朝着张羽的方向走了过来：“好好好，就要你了。”

0014.en: Zhang Yu smiled, about to shake the man's hand, but realized the man had walked past him and was grabbing Zhao Tianxing's hand with praise. "Good physique, and a handsome face too."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: 张羽呵呵一笑，正要和对方握个手，却发现对方错过了自己，抓着赵天行的手掌赞到：“身材好，脸也长得清秀。”

0014.en: "This chest!"
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “这胸！”

0014.en: "This waist!"
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “这腰！”

0014.en: "This back!"
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “这背！”

0014.en: The driver patted Zhao Tianxing's body, exclaiming, "Simply perfect proportions. Although your absolute strength isn't there yet, the foundational frame is perfectly built, like an unpolished jade full of infinite possibilities."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: 司机一边拍着赵天行的身体，一边赞叹道：“简直是完美比例，虽然绝对实力还不强大，但基础框架已经打造的非常完美，如一颗璞玉，散发着无限可能性。”

0014.en: "To reach this level, it's absolutely impossible without persistent hard training, an extremely disciplined lifestyle, guidance from a master teacher, and taking medicine and injections to the limit."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “要做到这种程度，若没有坚持的苦修，极度自律的生活作息，还有一位名师指导，以及近乎极限的吃药扎针，那都是绝对练不出来的。”

0014.en: "You're the one, kid. I'll give you 800 an hour. Come with me."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “就你了小伙子，我给你800一小时，跟我走吧。”

0014.en: At that moment, Zhang Yu was stunned.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 这一刻，一旁的张羽震惊了。

0014.en: He never expected that his lean, muscular physique, handsome, cool face, and otherworldly temperament would lose to a muscle monster like Zhao Tianxing.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 他没想到自己薄肌拉丝的身材，俊秀清冷的脸庞，异世来客的气质，竟然会输给了赵天行这种筋肉怪物。

0014.en: "Boss, look at me, I can do it too."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: “老板，你看看我，我也行的。”

0014.en: The driver glanced at Zhang Yu and shook his head. "No skinny guys."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: 司机看了张羽一眼，摇了摇头：“细狗不要。”

0014.en: "You don't look reassuring for security. You'd probably block only half as many flying swords as him."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “做安保缺乏安全感，去挡飞剑都比别人少挡一半啊。”

0014.en: Zhao Tianxing opened his mouth to refuse, "Actually, I'm not here to..."
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: 赵天行开口便想要拒绝：“其实我不是来……”

0014.en: Zhang Yu quickly interrupted him, "Boss, we're sworn brothers. We promised that whether it's a job for one person or a group, we do it all together."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽连忙打断他：“老板，我们两个是亲兄弟，发过誓不论是一个人的工作，还是一群人的工作，全都一起上的。”

0014.en: The driver frowned, looked at Zhang Yu, then at Zhao Tianxing, and finally asked Zhang Yu, "400 an hour for you, six hours in total. You in or out?"
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: 司机皱了皱眉，看了看张羽，又看了看一旁的赵天行，最终朝着张羽问道：“给你400一小时，一共6个小时，你干不干？”

0014.en: Zhang Yu nodded repeatedly, "I'm in! I'm in! I'm in!"
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽连连点头道：“干！干！干！”

0014.en: Zhang Yu pulled Zhao Tianxing towards the van.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵天行被张羽拉扯着走向面包车。

0014.en: Zhao Tianxing said to Zhang Yu awkwardly, "I'm not here to work, and my mom will worry if I get back too late. I should go talk to the boss..."
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: 赵天行满脸尴尬地向张羽说道：“我不是来打工的，而且太晚回去我妈会担心的，我还是跟老板去说吧……”

0014.en: Zhang Yu quickly said, "Didn't you have something you wanted to talk to me about? Let's go work together, and you can talk about whatever you want."
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽连忙说道：“你不是有事情想跟我说吗？一起去打个工，你想聊什么都行。”

0014.en: Thinking about the task Wang Hai had given him, Zhao Tianxing reluctantly said, "I need to call my mom first."
0014.speaker: 赵天行
0014.cn: 想了想王海布置的任务，赵天行只能心不甘情不愿地说道：“我要给我妈先打个电话。”

0014.en: The van drove them towards the city center, and the driver explained their job on the way.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 面包车载着两人朝市中心一路开去，司机则在路上介绍了一番他们此行的工作。

0014.en: "Ms. Li Xuelian is holding an art exhibition in the Cloud Hall on the 999th floor. The security is already in place."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “李雪莲女士要在999层的云中厅开画展，安保上其实已经没有了问题。”

0014.en: "However, Ms. Li isn't satisfied with the appearance of the internal security. She's worried it will affect the viewing experience and asked us to find some handsome young lads."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “不过李女士对内保的颜值不太满意，担心影响了观画体验，要求我们找些年轻的帅小伙过去。”

0014.en: "When you two get there, change into security uniforms and follow all orders from the security captain."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “你们两个到了那里以后就换上安保服，一切听安保队长的吩咐。”

0014.en: "And remember this, absolutely, absolutely, absolutely do not offend Ms. Li."
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “特别记住了，绝对绝对绝对不能得罪李女士。”

0014.en: Zhang Yu asked curiously, "This Ms. Li must be very rich, right?"
0014.speaker: 张羽
0014.cn: 张羽好奇问道：“这位李女士，一定很有钱吧？”

0014.en: "Heh, rich?" the driver snorted proudly. "More than rich. Ms. Li is the daughter of a Golden Core Master!"
0014.speaker: 司机
0014.cn: “呵呵，有钱？”司机哼了一声，傲然道：“何止是有钱，李女士可是一位金丹真人的女儿！”

0015.en: Chapter 15: Central Tower
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 第15章 中心大厦

0015.en: Hearing the words "Golden Core Master," Zhao Tianxing, who was in the car, was slightly startled, then said in disbelief, "How could the daughter of a Golden Core Master come to Songyang?"
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: 听到金丹真人这四个字，车上的赵天行便是微微一惊，接着又不信道：“金丹真人的女儿怎么会来嵩阳？”

0015.en: Zhang Yu also nodded from the side. He knew that above Qi Refining was Foundation Establishment, and above Foundation Establishment was Golden Core.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 张羽也在一旁微微点头，他知道炼气之上是筑基，筑基之上才是金丹。

0015.en: To reach the Golden Core realm, one had to graduate from a top high school, get into one of the ten great academies, and develop within a major sect, climbing who knows how high in Kunxu.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 想要成就金丹，必然是重点高中毕业，顺利考入十大名校，还进入大宗门一路发展，也不知道要爬上昆墟的第几层了。

0015.en: The daughter of such a person would be born on at least the second level of Kunxu or higher. How could she come to Songyang City on the first level?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 这种人的女儿，一出生起码也是昆墟二层往上，怎么会来到一层的嵩阳市？

0015.en: The driver smiled upon hearing this, seemingly wanting to show off, and said slowly, "It's not just Ms. Li Xuelian who is coming to our Songyang City."
0015.speaker: 司机
0015.cn: 司机闻言微微一笑，却像是起了卖弄的心思，缓缓说道：“岂止是李雪莲女士要来我嵩阳市？”

0015.en: "It's said that her father, Master Xinghuo, came from our Songyang City. He is retiring now, so he plans to return to Songyang to live out his years..."
0015.speaker: 司机
0015.cn: “据说其父星火真人就是从我们嵩阳市出来的，现在是要退休了，这才打算回到嵩阳市颐养天年……”

0015.en: Zhang Yu found this strange as he listened. A mighty Golden Core expert returning to the beginner's village to retire?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 张羽听着却觉得怪怪的，金丹大能回新手村养老？

0015.en: The driver continued, "This art exhibition has more than just Ms. Li's paintings. There is also a 'Celestial Being Martial Demonstration Painting' by Master Xinghuo himself, which is said to hide a peerless martial art."
0015.speaker: 司机
0015.cn: 司机这边则是接着说道：“这次画展可不止是李女士的画，据说还有一副星火真人亲绘的天人演武图，其中据说隐藏了一套绝世武学。”

0015.en: "Among the people coming to this exhibition, besides those who want to befriend Ms. Li, many others want to comprehend this painting and learn the peerless martial art from it."
0015.speaker: 司机
0015.cn: “来这次画展的人里，除了想要结交李女士的之外，便还有许多都想要参悟一番这演武图，想要从中悟出那一套绝世武学。”

0015.en: Songyang Central Tower.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 嵩阳中心大厦。

0015.en: The 999th floor.
0015.speaker: 旁白

0015.en: Zhang Yu stood before the floor-to-ceiling window, looking with shock at the sea of clouds below his feet. This was the first time he had ever stood at such a height to look down on the entire city.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 张羽正站在落地窗前，有些震撼地看着脚下的滚滚云海，这还是他第一次站在如此高空去俯瞰整座城市。

0015.en: Adjusting the new security guard uniform he was wearing, Zhang Yu sighed inwardly.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 整了整身上新换上的保安服，张羽心中有些感叹。

0015.en: Since entering the Central Tower, Zhang Yu felt as if he had arrived in another, dreamlike world.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 自从进入中心大厦以来，张羽便感觉自己像是来到了另一个梦幻世界。

0015.en: If the suburban environment where he lived was somewhat similar to his previous life, then the infrastructure of Songyang High School had already surpassed his last world in many aspects, and the Central Tower before him...
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 如果说他住的郊区环境还有点类似前世的话，那么嵩阳高中的基建环境就已经隐隐在各方面都超越了上一世的世界，而眼前的中心大厦……

0015.en: ...was a fantastical scene, from its terrifying 999-story height to the various cultivation technologies inside, filled with the flow of mana.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 不论那999层的恐怖高度，还是大厦内充满了法力流转的种种仙道技术，都称得上是梦幻般的场景。

0015.en: Recalling how he had been pulled up to the 999th floor in just a few seconds by a formation array, yet remained completely unharmed, Zhang Yu couldn't help but feel amazed again.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 回想自己在道术加持下，几秒钟内就被阵法牵引至999层，却又毫发无伤的过程，张羽心中便忍不住再生感慨。

0015.en: "It's all Songyang City, but ordinary people live in the suburbs, cultivators gather in the city center, and this Central Tower is the territory of the truly wealthy."
0015.speaker: 张羽
0015.cn: “同样都是嵩阳市，凡人住在郊区，修仙者汇聚于市中心，而这座中心大厦则是真正有钱人的地盘了。”

0015.en: "Three places, all within one city, yet they are like three different, separate worlds..."
0015.speaker: 张羽
0015.cn: “三个地方，虽然都在一座城市之中，却犹如三个不同的分层世界……”

0015.en: Just then, Zhao Tianxing's voice came from behind him, "Zhang Yu, the captain told us to come over and patrol. Shouldn't we get going?"
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: 就在这时，张羽身后响起了赵天行的声音：“张羽，队长让我们过来巡逻的，得走了吧？”

0015.en: Zhang Yu turned around and looked at Zhao Tianxing, who was also wearing a security uniform.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 张羽转过头去，看向身后同样穿着保安服的赵天行。

0015.en: But unlike Zhang Yu's calmness in the uniform, Zhao Tianxing was very uncomfortable and timid... looking as miserable as if he'd soiled his pants.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 只不过和张羽穿了保安服后的坦然不同，赵天行却是十分局促，畏畏缩缩……一副屎拉在裤子里的衰样。

0015.en: He felt like a clown in this security uniform, and that everyone who looked at him had a gaze filled with disdain, contempt, and scorn.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 他总觉得穿上了这套保安服后像个小丑，周围的人看向他的目光中都像是带着三分鄙夷、三分蔑视、三分轻贱。

0015.en: But Zhao Tianxing was overthinking it. After putting on the uniform, he was no longer an ordinary person; he became part of the background, his presence in most people's eyes barely higher than a potted plant.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 但其实是赵天行想多了，穿上这套保安服后，他就再也不是凡人，就像是成为了大厦里的背景板，在大多部分人眼中的存在感也就略高于绿化。

0015.en: Zhang Yu clapped him on the shoulder and said, "Chest out, head up. We're security guards at the Central Tower now, not delivery boys. What are you afraid of?"
0015.speaker: 张羽
0015.cn: 张羽一拍他的肩膀，说道：“挺胸抬头，咱们现在是中心大厦的保安，又不是来送外卖的，你怕什么。”

0015.en: Feeling that the passersby were attracted by Zhang Yu's voice, Zhao Tianxing quickly said, "I know, Zhang Yu, please keep your voice down so we don't disturb others."
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: 感觉到四周围的路人似乎都被张羽的说话声吸引了过来，赵天行连忙说道：“我知道了，张羽你说话声音轻点，别影响到别人。”

0015.en: The art exhibition was quite large, occupying a space of over a thousand square meters and offering drinks and a buffet. To Zhang Yu, it seemed more like a party than an art viewing.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 这次画展的规模不小，占据了上千平米的场地，还供应了酒水和自助用餐，在张羽看来与其说是来看画，更像是一种聚会。

0015.en: The legendary 'Celestial Being Martial Demonstration Painting' was currently covered by a curtain, and it was said that Ms. Li Xuelian herself would unveil it.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 而那传说中的天人演武图此刻便被一层幕布覆盖，据说要等李雪莲女士亲自来揭开。

0015.en: Zhang Yu and Zhao Tianxing were assigned to patrol a relatively remote area of the venue.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 张羽便和赵天行被分到这片场地里较靠边的一处，作为保安来回巡逻。

0015.en: Since the exhibition hadn't officially started yet, the patrol was very relaxed and didn't trigger the ritual's backlash.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 而此刻画展都尚未正式开始，这巡逻也显得轻松无比，更没有引起仪式反噬。

0015.en: After all, the ritual's power was focused on fulfilling the wish.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 毕竟张羽身上的仪式力量针对的是完成愿望的事情。

0015.en: His method to fulfill the wish was to study, cultivate, work hard to get into a university, and earn money... to ultimately fulfill the Evil God's wish.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 而他要完成愿望的方法则是学习，修炼，努力考上大学，工作赚钱……最终来完成邪神的愿望。

0015.en: Temporary jobs like this were part of earning money, and even part of studying and cultivating. The ritual's power wouldn't force him to do something else.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 像是临时工作这一类的事情也是工作赚钱乃至学习修炼的一部分，仪式力量并不会逼迫着他转去做别的事情。

0015.en: In fact, wandering around with nothing to do was much more relaxing for Zhang Yu than the strenuous cultivation of the past few days.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 反倒是此刻没事瞎转悠的状态，对张羽来说反而比这几天的苦修轻松了太多太多。

0015.en: Just then, as the two approached the dining tables, they saw a group of waiters arranging plates and decorating the tables.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 就在这时，两人靠近餐桌这边的时候，便看到一群侍者正在摆放餐盘，整理桌面装饰。

0015.en: Zhang Yu glanced over and was surprised by the dishes being laid out, "Is that... seafood?"
0015.speaker: 张羽
0015.cn: 张羽瞄了一眼，看着那一碟子一碟子被摆放出来的菜色，惊讶道：“这是……海鲜？”

0015.en: Zhao Tianxing also looked over at the abalone and lobster on the plates... and nodded slightly, "They're marine creatures. I saw that one with the shell when I was out with my mom. I think it costs thirty or forty thousand a pound."
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: 赵天行也望了过去，看了看餐盘里的鲍鱼龙虾……微微点头：“是海洋生物，那个带壳的我跟我妈出去的时候看到过，好像一斤就要三、四万呢。”

0015.en: "But this is the Central Tower, so it's normal to have these things."
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: “不过这里是中心大厦，有这些也很正常吧。”

0015.en: Seafood was not uncommon for Zhang Yu in his previous life; he had eaten it many times.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 海鲜，张羽在上一世并不少见，也没有少吃。

0015.en: But here in Kunxu, at least on the first level, marine creatures were extremely rare. The original Zhang Yu had only ever seen them online; he had never eaten, or even seen, them in real life.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 但在这昆墟之中，至少在昆墟第一层里，海洋生物是一种极度稀有的存在，甚至原来的张羽只在网上见过，现实里别说吃了，连看都没看到过。

0015.en: This was because in the entire 20 million square kilometers of Kunxu's first level... there was no ocean.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 只因为整个昆墟第一层的2000多万平方公里中……是没有大海的。

0015.en: It was said that the marine life available in the market was either imported from the upper levels of Kunxu or farmed by organizations in artificial marine environments.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 据说这市面上的海洋生物，要么是从更上层的昆墟引进过来，要么就是一些机构自己制造人工海洋环境来养殖的。

0015.en: Hearing Zhao Tianxing mention the price of tens of thousands per pound, Zhang Yu was secretly stunned, "That expensive?"
0015.speaker: 张羽
0015.cn: 而听到赵天行嘴里那一斤几万块的价格，张羽心中更是暗暗咋舌：“这么贵？”

0015.en: "What's the benefit of eating this? Does it increase mana?"
0015.speaker: 张羽
0015.cn: “这东西吃了有什么好处？是不是能增长法力？”

0015.en: It was no wonder Zhang Yu thought this way. In the cultivation world he knew, both as the original Zhang Yu and now, everyone was striving unscrupulously to advance, doing everything possible to increase their mana, martial skills, techniques, physical strength, and Dao Heart...
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 无怪乎张羽这么想，不论是原来的张羽，还是此刻的张羽，他所接触到的仙道世界中，每一个人都在不择手段地前进，拼尽全力地提升自己的法力、武功、道术、肉体、道心……

0015.en: Clothing, food, housing, transportation... everything in life was related to improving one's cultivation.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 衣、食、住、行……生活中的各种东西都无不和提升修为有关。

0015.en: "Benefits?" Zhao Tianxing thought for a moment and finally shook his head, "I've never heard of any benefits from eating this. I think it's just for the taste."
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: “好处？”赵天行闻言想了想，最终摇了摇头：“没听说过吃这个有什么好处，好像就是为了好吃。”

0015.en: "Just for the taste?" Zhang Yu stared, stunned, at the plates of delicacies on the table.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: “就是为了好吃？”张羽看着桌上的一盘盘佳肴微微一愣。

0015.en: As Zhang Yu and Zhao Tianxing were secretly observing the dining tables, a cold voice suddenly sounded from behind them.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 就在张羽和赵天行两人一同偷偷打量餐桌的时候，一道清冷的声音突然在他们背后响起。

0015.en: "You two security guards, what are you doing snooping around here instead of patrolling properly?"
0015.speaker: 白真真
0015.cn: “你们两个保安，不好好巡逻，在这里偷偷摸摸干什么？”

0015.en: Startled by the voice, Zhao Tianxing turned around and quickly explained, "We weren't doing anything..."
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: 听到这道声音，赵天行吓了一跳，转过身来赶紧解释道：“我们没干什么……”

0015.en: But when he saw the person behind them, Zhao Tianxing froze on the spot.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 但看到背后之人的模样，赵天行却是愣在了当场。

0015.en: Zhang Yu, however, turned around calmly and looked at Bai Zhenzhen, saying, "Huh? It's Ah Zhen. What a coincidence, you came to see the art exhibition too?"
0015.speaker: 张羽
0015.cn: 张羽却是施施然地转过身来，看着白真真说道：“咦？竟然是阿真，这么巧你也来看画展啊？”

0015.en: When the nearby Zhao Tianxing realized the person was a classmate, he felt his security uniform become even more ugly and awkward. His body twisted uncomfortably, as if he were about to defecate on the spot.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 而一旁的赵天行发现来人是同班同学后，只觉得身上的保安服越发难看丑陋，身体尴尬地扭来扭去，就像是憋得要原地大便一样。

0015.en: The thought that his job as a security guard might get back to his class, where he would be labeled as poor, a laborer, and short on money, causing his status and reputation to plummet, made Zhao Tianxing squirm even more.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 特别是想到自己干保安的事情如果被传去班里，贫穷、打工、缺钱等等标签被同学们轮流贴上来，在圈子里的地位、风评便要一落千丈，赵天行就扭得更厉害了。

0015.en: Bai Zhenzhen looked at Zhang Yu with a blank expression and said, "I didn't expect you two to skip decades of struggle at such a young age and come here to work as security guards."
0015.speaker: 白真真
0015.cn: 白真真面无表情地看着张羽，说道：“想不到你们年纪轻轻，就少走几十年弯路，来这干保安了。”

0015.en: Zhao Tianxing quickly waved his hands and explained, "No, that's not it, classmate Bai Zhenzhen. I'm just here with Zhang Yu."
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: 赵天行连忙摆摆手，解释道：“不是的，白真真同学，我是陪张羽过来的。”

0015.en: Zhang Yu slapped Zhao Tianxing on the shoulder forcefully, "What are you panicking about? You're a temporary security guard earning 800 an hour, enough to cover an ordinary person's food and drink for ten days. Countless people would be envious."
0015.speaker: 张羽
0015.cn: 张羽却是猛地一掌拍在赵天行的肩膀上：“你慌什么？你可是时薪800，一小时购买力就能够满足凡人十日吃喝的临时保安，说出去不知道多少人要羡慕。”

0015.en: "Huh?" Zhao Tianxing was slightly stunned, having never thought that 800 an hour was a big deal.
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: “啊？”赵天行闻言微微一愣，从没想过时薪800有什么厉害的。

0015.en: But as he looked at Bai Zhenzhen, who had suddenly gone silent, he felt a chill emanating from her.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 但他看着面前突然不说话的白真真，就感觉到一股冷意从对方身上冒了出来。

0015.en: Zhao Tianxing had never been very familiar with this top-ranking genius girl. He only knew that she had always been cold and distant, only eating with Zhang Yu and Zhou Tianyi.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 对于这位年级总分第一的天才少女，赵天行一直都不太熟悉，只知道对方一直以来都冷冷清清、生人勿进的样子，只跟张羽、周天翊他们一起吃饭。

0015.en: In fact, Zhao Tianxing's own circle had tried to invite her, but they never received a response.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 事实上赵天行所在的圈子也试过邀请对方，却始终没有得到回应。

0015.en: In his mind, Bai Zhenzhen was a talented but very arrogant and unapproachable genius.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 在他心中，白真真就是一名天资纵横，却非常高傲和难接近的天才少女。

0015.en: Seeing her expressionless and silent now, Zhao Tianxing thought she must be angry.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 此刻看着对方面无表情，沉默无声的样子，赵天行只觉得对方好像是生气了。

0015.en: "Zhang Yu must have said something to make her angry."
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: “一定是张羽乱说话惹她生气了。”

0015.en: As he was squirming and racking his brain for something to say to ease the tension, he heard Bai Zhenzhen ask coldly, "You make 800 an hour?"
0015.speaker: 白真真
0015.cn: 正当他扭来扭去，冥思苦想着该说些什么调节气氛的时候，却听白真真冷冷问道：“你一个小时能拿800？”

0015.en: "Yeah," Zhao Tianxing nodded foolishly, not understanding what she meant.
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: “嗯。”赵天行傻傻点了点头，没理解对方想说什么。

0015.en: Just then, a voice called from the other side of the tables. A waiter who was setting up called out, "Newbie, go get the dishes. What are you standing there for?"
0015.speaker: 侍者
0015.cn: 就在这时，一道呼唤声从餐桌另一边传来，只见一名正在布置餐桌的侍者喊道：“新来的，快去端菜啊，愣着干嘛呢？”

0015.en: Bai Zhenzhen said to Zhang Yu and Zhao Tianxing, "I have to go get the dishes. We can talk later."
0015.speaker: 白真真
0015.cn: 白真真朝张羽和赵天行说道：“我先去端菜了，一会儿再聊。”

0015.en: At the same time, she thought to herself, "Damn! Security guards make 800 an hour? I only make 500. I should have been a security guard."
0015.speaker: 白真真
0015.cn: 同时她心中暗道：“干！保安一小时能拿800？我一小时才500啊，早知道来干保安了。”

0015.en: Only then did Zhao Tianxing notice that Bai Zhenzhen was wearing the same uniform as the other waiters. His face showed his shock, "Bai Zhenzhen is working here too?"
0015.speaker: 赵天行
0015.cn: 而赵天行这才发现白真真身上的穿着和那些侍者一模一样，脸上震惊道：“白真真也在这边打工？”

0015.en: "What's so strange about it? Who in this world isn't working?" Zhang Yu had recognized Bai Zhenzhen's uniform at first glance. To him, given her financial situation, it was perfectly normal for her to be working.
0015.speaker: 张羽
0015.cn: “多稀奇啊，这世上又有谁不是在打工了。”张羽却是第一眼就认出了白真真的打扮，而在他看来以白真真的经济情况，打工再正常不过了。

0015.en: However, the thought that she could maintain her number one rank in the grade while working part-time secretly amazed him.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 只不过想到对方打工的情况下，还能把总分维持在年级第一，他就暗暗心惊。

0015.en: "Ah Zhen's talent is truly extraordinary. Among all the disciples of my Songyang Sect, she's probably only a little weaker than me."
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: “阿真这天赋真是非同小可，纵观我嵩阳门下一众入门弟子，恐怕只比我弱上一头了。”

0016.en: Chapter 16: Patrol
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 第16章 巡逻

0016.en: Looking back at Zhao Tianxing, who was still standing there dazed, Zhang Yu urged, "Get to work, Little Zhao. Are you just standing here slacking off?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 回头看了看还呆在原地的赵天行，张羽催促道：“干活啦小赵，愣在这里偷懒呢？”

0016.en: Only then did Zhao Tianxing hurry to catch up, but he couldn't help looking back a few more times at Bai Zhenzhen, who was serving dishes. He thought to himself, "If I tell them back at school, they'll never believe it. Bai Zhenzhen is actually working part-time? Did something happen to her family?"
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: 赵天行这才赶紧跟了上去，又忍不住回头朝着正在端菜的白真真多看了几眼，心中想道：“回学校说出去他们一定不信，白真真竟然在打工？她家里是出了什么事情？”

0016.en: After another patrol round, Zhao Tianxing followed Zhang Yu into an empty emergency exit. He saw Zhang Yu suddenly sit down cross-legged and say, "Don't just stand there. Let's take a break together."
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 两人又巡逻一圈后，赵天行跟着张羽来到一旁无人的安全通道里，便看见张羽突然盘坐了下来，说道：“你也别站着了，一起休息休息吧。”

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing: "Huh? But the captain told us to keep patrolling. What if he finds out..."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: 赵天行：“啊？可是队长让我们一直巡逻，要是被他发现……”

0016.en: Zhang Yu: "The art exhibition hasn't even started yet. What's there to patrol? Besides, we're in the central tower. Are you really worried something will happen?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 张羽：“画展都还没开始呢，有什么好巡逻的，而且在这中心大厦里，你还担心能出什么问题不成？”

0016.en: As he spoke, Zhang Yu smiled and added, "Besides, didn't you want to chat with me? It's a good chance for me to talk to you about the way of the security guard."
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 说着，张羽又笑了笑道：“再说了，你不是想要和我聊一聊吗？正好我也和你谈一谈你保安之道。”

0016.en: Hearing this, Zhao Tianxing remembered Wang Hai's instructions.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 听到这里，赵天行也想起了王海的吩咐。

0016.en: But Zhang Yu, opposite him, had already made a shocking statement: "Being a security guard is all about slacking off!"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 而对面的张羽已经说出了一个暴论：“当保安就是为了摸鱼！”

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing: "Huh?"
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: 赵天行：“啊？”

0016.en: Zhang Yu continued, "If you patrol a few more times or a few less times, does your pay change?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 张羽接着说道：“你多巡逻几遍，少巡逻几遍，酬劳会变吗？”

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing hesitated for a moment and asked, "I guess... it doesn't?"
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: 赵天行迟疑一下，问道：“好像……不会？”

0016.en: Zhang Yu asked again, "With or without us here, will the security level of this venue decrease?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 张羽又问道：“这个会场有我们，没我们，安全等级会降低吗？”

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing scratched his head, "I guess... it won't either? But..."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: 赵天行抓了抓头皮：“好像……也不会？可是……”

0016.en: Zhang Yu: "But the time we steal is our own."
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 张羽：“但我们偷来的时间是我们自己的。”

0016.en: "Alright, I'm going to rest for a bit. We'll go out later when the exhibition officially starts."
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: “好了，我先休息一会儿，晚点等画展正式开始了我们再出去。”

0016.en: Watching Zhang Yu, who had closed his eyes and started breathing exercises, Zhao Tianxing became a little nervous, afraid of being caught slacking off by his superiors.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 看着闭上双眼，已经开始吐纳的张羽，赵天行却有些紧张起来，生怕被上头发现上班摸鱼的事情。

0016.en: He glanced again at Zhang Yu, who was completely absorbed in his breathing exercises. Zhao Tianxing admired him for seizing every moment to cultivate, but also felt he was being far too bold...
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 又看了一眼彻底进入吐纳状态的张羽，赵天行又是佩服对方能抓紧每一点时间来修炼，又觉得对方心实在太大……

0016.en: "Wait, wasn't I supposed to talk to him about buying the medicine? How did I get dragged into a conversation about slacking off..."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: “不对，我不是要和他聊聊他买药的事情吗？怎么被拉着聊摸鱼……”

0016.en: Suddenly, a thoughtful look appeared in Zhao Tianxing's eyes as he reflected on what Zhang Yu had just said.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 突然，赵天行目光一动，回想着张羽刚刚的话若有所思。

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing was the type who wasn't good at socializing but was thoughtful and sensitive, always caring about what others thought and prone to overthinking.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 赵天行是那种不太擅长社交，却又心思细腻敏感，总是很在乎他人想法，很容易东想西想的人。

0016.en: As he recalled Zhang Yu's words, he realized they seemed to apply perfectly to his own situation.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 此刻他回想刚刚张羽所说的话，发觉这一切似乎都能对上自己所做的事情。

0016.en: "If I ask him a few more questions, or a few less, will Teacher Wang Hai stop guiding me?"
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: “我多问他几句，少问他几句，王海老师会不指导我吗？”

0016.en: "Without me to gather information for him, will Teacher Wang Hai really not be able to find anything out?"
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: “王海老师少了个我来查探消息，难道就什么都查不到了？”

0016.en: "Could Zhang Yu have figured out what I was trying to do? Was he saying that to give me a hint, telling me to slack off too?"
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: “张羽难道已经看出来了我要做什么？说这话是故意在点我，让我也摸摸鱼？”

0016.en: Thinking of this, when Zhao Tianxing looked at the meditating Zhang Yu again, he felt that even his breathing seemed profound and mysterious.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 想到这里，赵天行再次看向正在吐纳的张羽时，只觉得对方的呼吸似乎也变得有些高深莫测起来。

0016.en: As his mana flowed through him, Zhang Yu silently circulated it for one cycle, advancing his Circadian Qi-Gathering Method to (13/80). After that, the art exhibition finally began.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 伴随着浑身法力流淌，张羽在默运法力一周天将周天采气法推动到（13/80）之后，画展也终于正式开始了。

0016.en: "As expected of an exhibition held by Ms. Li, all the guests are either rich or noble."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: “不愧是李女士办的画展，来的客人都非富即贵。”

0016.en: Looking at the guests attending the exhibition, Zhao Tianxing sighed with sincere admiration.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 望着那一位位参加画展的宾客，赵天行心中发出由衷感叹。

0016.en: Although he didn't know who these people were, he could tell from their luxurious clothes and accessories that each one was incredibly wealthy.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 虽然他也不认识这些人到底是谁，但光是从他们身上的华服、饰品，就能看出来一个个都价值不菲。

0016.en: Even though Zhao Tianxing's father was a junior manager at a company and their financial situation was quite good, he could still recognize that many of the luxury items these people wore were things his family could never afford.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 即使赵天行的父亲已经是一家公司的小领导，经济状况算是不错了，但他仍旧能认出这些人身上的很多奢侈品是他们家绝对买不起的。

0016.en: Just then, Zhang Yu, who was standing beside him, whispered, "Old Zhao, look at that!"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 就在这时，一旁的张羽小声说道：“老赵，你看那个！”

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing followed the direction of his chin and immediately saw a glittering golden figure walk in, surrounded by a crowd.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 赵天行顺着对方努嘴的方向看去，立刻就看到了一尊金光闪闪的人影在众人的簇拥下走了进来。

0016.en: He looked closely and discovered that the person's entire skin was like a layer of gold foil, reflecting a faint golden light.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 他定睛看去，才发现那人浑身上下的肌肤都犹如一层金箔，正反射着一丝丝淡淡金光。

0016.en: Zhang Yu asked curiously from the side, "What is that? A robot?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 一旁的张羽好奇道：“这是什么东西？机器人？”

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing quickly covered Zhang Yu's mouth, watching nervously until the golden man looked away. Only then did he let out a sigh of relief.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 赵天行赶紧捂住了张羽的嘴巴，紧张地看着那金人没有望向他们，这才轻轻吐出一口气来。

0016.en: Then Zhao Tianxing let go of his hand and explained, "That's the Songyang City Director of the Xianyun Group. You absolutely must not speak carelessly."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: 接着赵天行松口手掌，解释道：“那是仙韵集团的嵩阳市总监，你可千万别乱说话。”

0016.en: "Xianyun Group?" Zhang Yu looked at the golden man with curiosity and asked, "Then why... does he look so shiny?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: “仙韵集团？”张羽好奇地望着那金人，又问道：“那怎么……看上去如此闪耀？”

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing explained, "That's a Dharma-Skeleton. You don't know?"
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: 赵天行解释道：“那是法骸，你不知道吗？”

0016.en: Seeing Zhang Yu's confused expression, Zhao Tianxing figured his family probably had no contact with such things, so he patiently explained, "A Dharma-Skeleton... how should I put it? It's kind of like a prosthetic, but much, much stronger."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: 看着张羽一脸茫然的样子，赵天行心想对方的家庭恐怕接触不到这些，便又耐心解释道：“法骸……怎么说呢，有些像是义肢，却又比义肢什么的强太多。”

0016.en: "And in terms of cultivation technology, Dharma-Skeletons have been extended to the entire human body."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: “而且法骸在仙道技术层面上，已经拓展到了整个人体。”

0016.en: "It's like you can replace any part of the body with a magical treasure, drastically improving all abilities while retaining the original functions."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: “就好像能用法宝替换掉人体的任何部位，并在保留原有功能的前提下，大幅度提升各项能力。”

0016.en: "But you need at least 100 mana to have a Dharma-Skeleton implanted in your body..."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: “不过只有法力达到100以上，才能在体内植入法骸……”

0016.en: Hearing this, Zhang Yu's eyes flickered. He knew that 100 mana was the upper limit for the Qi Refining realm.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 张羽闻言目光一动，他知道100法力便已经是炼气境界的法力所能达到的上限。

0016.en: He asked, "Can you get a Dharma-Skeleton with 100 mana, or do you have to wait until Foundation Establishment?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 他问道：“是100点法力就能植入法骸，还是说要筑基以后才行？”

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing: "100 mana is enough, but this person is a true Foundation Establishment realm cultivator. He comes from a prestigious family and graduated from Myriad Laws University."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: 赵天行：“100点法力便行，不过这位是真正的筑基境界，出身名门，毕业于万法大学。”

0016.en: Zhang Yu understood. A Foundation Establishment ancestor graduated from university and came down to the first layer to show off and put them, a bunch of stubborn Qi Refiners, in their place.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 张羽懂了，筑基老祖大学毕业后跑来一层炸鱼，在他们这帮倔强炼气期面前装逼打脸是吧。

0016.en: As more guests arrived, Zhang Yu saw two more people who seemed to have Dharma-Skeletons. One had eyes like gemstones, and the other had a halo floating behind his head, their styles clashing sharply with the other wealthy people around them.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 接下来随着宾客越来越多，张羽又见到了两个疑似拥有法骸的人物，一个双眼好似宝石，另一个则是脑后浮现一轮光环，画风和四周围的其他有钱人显得截然不同。

0016.en: These two, along with the glittering gold Director of the Xianyun Group, were like three centers of attention, occasionally attracting Qi Refiners who looked like they wanted to kneel and kowtow to them.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 这两人和那位浑身金灿灿的仙韵集团总监便好似三个中心，时不时将一个个炼气仔吸引过去，恨不得给他们跪下磕头。

0016.en: By now, Zhao Tianxing seemed to have gradually gotten used to his security guard uniform, no longer appearing so awkward as he watched the guests come and go.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 赵天行此时好像也渐渐适应了身上这套保安服，看着来来往往的宾客不再显得那么局促。

0016.en: While the two were on patrol, they happened to overhear some of the guests' conversations.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而两人巡逻的时候，便也无意间听到了一些宾客的谈话。

0016.en: Some marveled at Ms. Li Xuelian's wealth and generosity.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 有感慨李雪莲女士财大气粗的。

0016.en: Others praised how excellent the paintings in the exhibition were, and how much they should be worth.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 也有赞叹画展上的这些画如何如何优秀，应该价值多少多少钱的。

0016.en: Naturally, some people also talked about the "Deva's Martial Demonstration" painting, personally drawn by a Golden Core Perfected.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 自然也有人谈起了那副金丹真人亲绘的天人演武图。

0016.en: "Brother Li? Could it be that you're also here to comprehend the 'Deva's Martial Demonstration' painted by Senior Xinghuo?"
0016.speaker: 陌生男1
0016.cn: “李兄？莫非你也是来参悟星火前辈亲绘的那幅天人演武图的？”

0016.en: "Of course. If a young genius under 18 can master the martial arts within it, Senior Xinghuo will take them as a direct disciple. This news has already spread throughout the Songyang cultivation world. How could I not come?"
0016.speaker: 陌生男2
0016.cn: “这是自然，若有未满18岁的少年天才能练成其中的武功，星火前辈便会直接收为弟子，这个消息早就传遍了我们嵩阳仙道界，我又怎能不来？”

0016.en: "Wait, there's intel like this?" Zhang Yu thought to himself, "And it's spread all over the Songyang cultivation world? How come I didn't know?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: “不是，还有这种情报？”张羽心中想到：“而且传遍了嵩阳仙道界吗？我怎么不知道？”

0016.en: Was it because small fries in the cultivation world weren't worthy of knowing?
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 难道是仙道界小虾米不配知道？

0016.en: But for now, Zhang Yu suppressed his doubts and decided to carry out his duties as a security guard.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 不过此刻张羽还是压下了心中的疑问，决定执行起自己保安的职责。

0016.en: He walked up to the person who had spoken and said politely, "Sir, are you alright?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 只见他来到说话的人面前，礼貌道：“先生，你没事吧？”

0016.en: The young man who had just spoken had sharp eyebrows and bright eyes, looking extraordinary. He looked at the security guard, confused, "What could be wrong with me?"
0016.speaker: 炼天极
0016.cn: 刚刚说话的少年剑眉星目，一看便是不凡之辈，他不解地看着保安：“我能有什么事？”

0016.en: The young man said proudly, "I am Lian Tianji from Ziyun High. Can't you see I'm talking with my friend?"
0016.speaker: 炼天极
0016.cn: 少年傲然道：“我是紫云高中的炼天极，没看到我正和朋友聊天吗？”

0016.en: Zhang Yu and Zhao Tianxing looked at him, then at his so-called 'friend'.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 张羽和赵天行看了看对方，又看了看对方所谓的‘朋友’。

0016.en: It was a box on a table. The surface of the box had a special wooden texture, and its size was about that of an urn.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 那是一个被摆放在桌面上的盒子，盒子表面满是一种特别的木制纹理，大小看上去就像是个骨灰盒。

0016.en: Zhang Yu couldn't help but think, "Schizophrenia? Did studying drive him crazy?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 张羽心中忍不住想：“精神分裂？读书读疯了？”

0016.en: However, he had heard of Ziyun High. It was a key high school even more prestigious than Songyang High, one of the three great schools in Songyang City. It was a school that the old Zhang Yu didn't even have the qualifications to apply to, something he wouldn't dare to dream of.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 倒是对方口中的紫云高中，张羽还算是有所了解，那是比嵩阳高中还要厉害的重点高中，属于嵩阳市的三大名校，是过去的张羽连报考资格都没有，想都不敢想的学校。

0016.en: It was said that the principals of Ziyun High were famous for their cruel methods, incredible pressure, and hellishly strict school rules.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 据说紫云高中历代校长以残忍的手段，令人发指的高压，地狱般严酷的校规而闻名。

0016.en: The various things within Songyang High were nothing in comparison. The legendary campus caste system, where underachievers ate in the toilets, and the weak were expected to kneel before the strong... all of it was enough to terrify students from other high schools.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 嵩阳高中内的种种与之相比不过是大巫见小巫，那传说中的校园种姓制，差生在厕所吃饭，弱者就是应该向强者下跪等等规矩……都足以让其他高中的学生心惊胆战。

0016.en: Looking at Lian Tianji, who was currently talking to an 'urn', Zhang Yu couldn't help but sigh. Ziyun High really did drive people crazy.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 此刻看着眼前正和‘骨灰盒’谈话的炼天极，张羽心中也不得不感叹紫云高中真是把人逼成了疯子。

0016.en: But just then, the 'urn' spoke: "Brother Lian, these two security guards must have misunderstood."
0016.speaker: 李星宇
0016.cn: 但就在这时，那‘骨灰盒’说话了：“炼兄，这两位保安应该是误会了。”

0016.en: "I am Li Xingyu, a soul cultivator from Mangshan High."
0016.speaker: 李星宇
0016.cn: “我是邙山高中的魂修生李星宇。”

0016.en: Mangshan High? A soul cultivator?
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 邙山高中？魂修生？

0016.en: Zhang Yu remembered now. Wasn't that the high school he had once tried to apply to?
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 张羽想了起来，那不是他以前曾经试着报考过的高中吗？

0016.en: He knew that besides the lower total score requirement for the college entrance exam, soul cultivators followed a specialized track that required them to abandon their physical bodies.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 虽然知道魂修生除了高考总分要求低，走的是特长路线之外，还有舍弃肉身的要求。

0016.en: But looking at the 'urn' on the table, he was still shocked. "Mangshan High really turns people into ghosts."
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 但此刻看着桌上的‘骨灰盒’他还是狠狠吃惊：“邙山高中，还真是把人逼成了鬼啊。”

0016.en: Zhang Yu and Zhao Tianxing quickly apologized and left. They then saw Lian Tianji exchange a few more words with Li Xingyu before four propeller-like things extended from the 'urn', and it flew away like a drone.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 张羽连忙和赵天行一边抱歉一边离开，然后就看到炼天极和李星宇又谈了几句后，那‘骨灰盒’上就伸展出四个螺旋桨似的玩意，像个无人机一样飞走了。

0016.en: Watching this scene, Zhang Yu was secretly glad that his past self hadn't chosen the path of a soul cultivator. Otherwise, he wouldn't even be able to look remotely immortal. What kind of cultivator would that be?
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 看着这一幕的张羽暗中庆幸原身最后没有选择魂修生的道路，不然连导……道骨仙风都做不到，还当什么修仙者？

0016.en: "Wait, that soul cultivator doesn't even have a body. How does he plan to practice the martial arts from the 'Deva's Martial Demonstration'?"
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: “不对，那魂修生肉身都没了，是打算怎么练天人演武图上的武功的？”

0016.en: Then he remembered the information the two had mentioned about the painting.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 接着他又想起那两人刚刚说的关于天人演武图的情报。

0016.en: "If that's true, then there will probably be a lot of talented teenagers under 18 attending this exhibition, just to try and master the peerless martial arts in that 'Deva's Martial Demonstration'?"
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: “如果真是这样，那恐怕这画展会有很多18岁以下的天才少年过来参加？只为试着练成那天人演武图之中的绝世武功？”

0016.en: Thinking of this, Zhang Yu found himself looking forward to the art exhibition even more.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 想到这里，张羽心中对这场画展反而越发期待了起来。

0016.en: 400 yuan an hour, not only getting paid to watch a show, but also having a chance to comprehend a peerless martial art. Who said this job was bad? This job was great.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 一小时400的工资，不但有钱拿有戏看，还有机会领悟绝世武功，谁说这工作不行的？这工作可太棒了。

0016.en: He turned to Zhao Tianxing beside him and asked, "How about it, Old Zhao? Are you interested in the peerless martial arts from the 'Deva's Martial Demonstration'?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 他转过头看向一旁的赵天行，问道：“怎么样老赵？你对那天人演武图上的绝世武功感兴趣吗？”

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing shook his head naturally.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 赵天行自然地摇了摇头。

0016.en: He was very self-aware. Something that sounded like it could only be mastered by true geniuses or the wealthy had nothing to do with ordinary people like them.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 他很有自知之明，这种一听便只有那些真正的天才或有钱人才能练成的东西，跟他们这样的普通人能有什么关系？

0016.en: Not only was he not interested, but he felt only a sense of withdrawal. Even if the 'Deva's Martial Demonstration' was unveiled later, he wouldn't even want to try, for fear of becoming a clown in front of everyone.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 不但没兴趣，他心中此刻只有退缩之意，便是那天人演武图一会被推出来，他也连试都不想去试一下，生怕众目睽睽之下成为小丑。

0016.en: A moment later, Zhao Tianxing, who had just been getting used to his security guard identity, wanted to cover his face and leave immediately, to shed this uniform.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而片刻之后，刚刚已经逐渐适应保安身份的赵天行便恨不得掩面而走，立刻脱去身上这套保安服。

0016.en: Zhang Yu glanced at the quickly retreating back of Zhao Tianxing, then looked in the direction he had been facing, and immediately spotted a few familiar faces.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 张羽看了一眼迅速背过身去的赵天行，顺着对方刚刚面朝的方向望去，立刻就发现了几个熟人。

0016.en: "Huh? Isn't that Qian Shen? And the others look like they're from our school too, right?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: “咦？那不是钱深吗？还有其他几个好像也是我们学校的吧？”

0016.en: Qian Shen was the top student whose total score was always just behind Bai Zhenzhen's, consistently holding second place in the grade since the start of school.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 钱深是总分成绩一直排在白真真后面，开学以来便一直保持着年级第二的学霸。

0016.en: Zhang Yu patted Zhao Tianxing's shoulder and said, "Old Zhao, look, aren't those our classmates?"
0016.speaker: 张羽
0016.cn: 张羽拍了拍赵天行的肩膀，说道：“老赵你看，那是不是我们班的同学？”

0016.en: Zhao Tianxing quickly pulled Zhang Yu over and said anxiously, "Hurry up and turn around. Don't let them see us."
0016.speaker: 赵天行
0016.cn: 赵天行赶紧将张羽一把拽了过去，局促不安地说道：“你快点转过来，千万别让他们看到了。”

0018.en: Chapter 18: The Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 第18章 天人演武图

0018.en: Under the gazes of the guests, a tall woman slowly approached, surrounded by a crowd.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 在宾客们的注视中，一名身材高挑的女人在众人簇拥下缓缓走来。

0018.en: Her long, silver hair reflected a metallic sheen.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 一头银色的长发反射着金属特有的光泽。

0018.en: Zhang Yu wondered if her beautiful hair was a magical relic, thinking about how much a single strand might be worth.
0018.speaker: 张羽
0018.cn: 张羽猜测着这一头秀发是不是法骸？心想着不知道一根头发值多少钱。

0018.en: The woman's red evening gown was covered in flowing traces of firelight, as if flames were dancing within it, emitting powerful fluctuations of magical power.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 女人红色的晚礼服上满是火光流动的痕迹，就像是一团团火焰在其中跳跃，并散发出强横的法力波动。

0018.en: Zhao Tianxing thought that the dress itself seemed to be a magical treasure, likely priceless.
0018.speaker: 赵天行
0018.cn: 赵天行想着这一套礼服本身似乎就是一件法宝，恐怕是价值连城。

0018.en: Meanwhile, the director of the Xianyun Group, who looked as if he were covered in gold leaf, took the initiative to greet Li Xuelian.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 与此同时，浑身犹如贴了一层金箔的仙韵集团总监主动迎向了李雪莲。

0018.en: Then, two other wealthy individuals at the Foundation Establishment stage also joined
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 接着另外两名筑基期的有钱人也加

0018.en: their conversation.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 入了两人的交流。

0018.en: They were surrounded by wealthy and famous people, all eager to chat with the four and become familiar faces.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 周围则围拢着一名名富豪名流，恨不得能和四人聊上几句，混个脸熟。

0018.en: But Li Xuelian didn't give them much of a
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 但没给这些人太多机

0018.en: chance. After a brief chat with the three, she came to the curtain covering the Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 会，李雪莲在和三人聊了几句之后，便来到了天人演武图的幕布之前。

0018.en: "Everyone, thank you for attending the art exhibition today."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: “各位，谢谢大家今天来参加画展。”

0018.en: Amid the applause, Li Xuelian smiled slightly and continued, "In this moment filled with creativity and inspiration, we gather here..."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: 掌声中，李雪莲微微一笑，接着说道：“在这个充满创意与灵感的时刻，我们齐聚一堂……”

0018.en: Listening to Li Xuelian's speech, Zhang Yu yawned out of boredom, wondering if he should just use this time to practice his breathing exercises.
0018.speaker: 张羽
0018.cn: 听着李雪莲的讲话，张羽无聊的打了个哈欠，想着自己是不是该趁着这时间吐纳算了。

0018.en: Suddenly, his gaze shifted as he thought to himself that he had been cultivating more diligently lately. He wasn't sure if it was because the ritual's power had forced him into the habit, or if it was the subtle influence of this world and society.
0018.speaker: 张羽
0018.cn: 突然他目光一动，心想着自己最近越来越勤于修行了，也不知道是被仪式力量逼迫习惯了，还是这个世界这个社会对他潜移默化的影响。

0018.en: Fortunately, Li Xuelian's speech wasn't long. While Zhang Yu was lost in thought, she had already moved on to the topic that most interested the many cultivation geniuses present.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 还好李雪莲的讲话并不长，就在张羽思索之间，她已经讲起了在场众多修仙天才们最感兴趣的话题。

0018.en: Li Xuelian: "For the past few years, my father has been searching for a disciple to inherit his legacy and pass on his martial arts and cultivation techniques."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: 李雪莲：“这几年来，家父一直想要寻到一名弟子来继承衣钵，传承一身武功道术。”

0018.en: "Unfortunately, his standards are quite high, and after searching for many years, he has yet to find a truly suitable disciple."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: “可惜他老人家要求颇高，苦寻多年之下，却始终没有找到真正符合要求的弟子。”

0018.en: "So, he personally painted this Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram and hid a set of martial arts techniques within it."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: “于是亲手绘下这幅天人演武图，并在这幅画中隐藏了一套武功。”

0018.en: "If any young hero under the age of 18 can master the martial arts within, my father is willing to take them as a disciple and fully support their cultivation until they reach a top university."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: “若有18岁以下的少年英杰能练成其中武功，家父愿意收其为徒，并将之全力培养至顶尖大学。”

0018.en: "However, this painting contains a trace of my father's martial intent. Viewing it will expose you to the impact of this intent, which carries the risk of damaging your Dao Heart."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: “不过这幅画中蕴含了家父所留下的一丝武道意念，观看此画会受到这一丝意念的冲击，有损伤道心之危。”

0018.en: "During the comprehension process, please act according to your own abilities to avoid being injured by the martial intent within..."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: “接下来参悟的过程中，还请诸位量力而行，免得被其中的武道意念所伤……”

0018.en: Following Li Xuelian's introduction, she slowly pulled back the curtain, revealing the Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram behind it.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 随着李雪莲的这番介绍，她的手掌也缓缓将幕布拉开，露出了其后的天人演武图。

0018.en: Within a frame more than two meters high, a blurry human figure slowly emerged.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 只见一副两米多高的画框之中，一道模糊的人影在其中缓缓浮现。

0018.en: "This is the diagram drawn by a Golden Core master?" Zhang Yu looked at the painting, feeling it was just a simple human shape scribbled randomly, no better than a primary school student's doodle.
0018.speaker: 张羽
0018.cn: “这就是金丹大能画的图？”张羽看着那幅画，只觉得像是被人胡乱涂鸦出了一个简单人形，和小学生随手所画都差不多。

0018.en: Just as Zhang Yu thought this, someone shouted, "What a masterpiece!"
0018.speaker: 陌生男1
0018.cn: 就在张羽刚刚这么想的时候，就有人大喝一声道：“好画！”

0018.en: "The painting is so vivid and spirited, the brushwork is masterful! Master Xinghuo's work is truly at its peak, it puts us to shame."
0018.speaker: 陌生男1
0018.cn: “此画气韵生动，骨法用笔，星火真人的画作真是妙到巅峰，令我辈汗颜。”

0018.en: Someone else quickly chimed in with flattery, "It's so beautiful! The painting seems simple, but it holds a deep meaning. The more you look, the more profound it becomes."
0018.speaker: 陌生男2
0018.cn: 连忙就有人跟着吹嘘道：“太美了，此画看似简单，却内藏深远意境，越看便越是回味无穷啊。”

0018.en: As more and more people began to praise the Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram, Li Xuelian coughed lightly to interrupt them. Then she explained, "Everyone, to prevent this painting from unintentionally harming anyone, my father has placed a special restriction on it. Only when you are within five meters can you see its true content, but you will also be affected by the martial intent within."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: 就在越来越多人开始赞美这天人演武图的时候，李雪莲忍不住咳嗽一声，打断众人的说话。然后她解释道：“诸位，家父为防止此画无意间伤人，在其上另设玄妙，只有接近五米之内才能看清画中真正内容，但也会受其中武道意念所影响。”

0018.en: "Any young heroes who wish to comprehend it, please step forward to view the painting."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: “有想要参悟的少年英杰还请上前几步观画。”

0018.en: Hearing Li Xuelian's words, the few who had just been flattering her immediately blushed and fell silent in embarrassment.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 听到李雪莲这番话，刚刚还在吹嘘的几人立刻满脸泛红，尴尬地住了嘴。

0018.en: But someone had already taken a step toward the Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram. It was Lian Tianji from Ziyun High, the one who had been talking to 'Ashtray' earlier.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 却也有人已经当先一步朝着天人演武图走去，正是刚刚和‘骨灰盒’说话的紫云高中炼天极。

0018.en: "Haha, let me, Lian Tianji, see just how mysterious this Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram really is."
0018.speaker: 炼天极
0018.cn: “哈哈，就让我炼天极来看看这天人演武图到底有何玄妙。”

0018.en: Lian Tianji laughed as he walked briskly towards the diagram.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 便见炼天极一边笑着，一边便快步走向了天人演武图的方向。

0018.en: Watching this, Qian Shen's eyes flickered as he thought to himself, "It's Lian Tianji from Ziyun High. A formidable character who scored 670 on last month's exam. He's one of the opponents I must challenge after I defeat Bai Zhenzhen."
0018.speaker: 钱深
0018.cn: 看着这一幕的钱深目光一动，心中暗道：“是紫云高中的炼天极，上个月在紫云高中的月考总分670的狠角色，是我战胜白真真后要挑战的对手之一。”

0018.en: As Lian Tianji approached the diagram step by step, the figure in the painting grew clearer in his eyes, revealing a middle-aged man slowly demonstrating a profound martial art.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 而随着炼天极一步步走向天人演武图，在他的双眼之中，便看到那画卷中的人影变得越来越清晰，似乎能看到一名中年男子正缓缓施展一套深奥武学。

0018.en: Lian Tianji's mind was gradually drawn in, until he saw the man in the painting throw a punch at him from across the space.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 炼天极的精神渐渐被吸引其中，最后看到画中男子猛然一拳朝着他隔空轰来。

0018.en: Bang!
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 砰！

0018.en: A muffled sound seemed to echo in the air.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 空气中似乎传来一阵闷响。

0018.en: Lian Tianji stopped abruptly, his eyes wide with anger, staring intently at the Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 炼天极陡然停下脚步，怒目圆瞪，正死死盯着天人演武图的方向。

0018.en: Seeing him standing frozen, everyone assumed Lian Tianji was completely absorbed in comprehending the mysterious martial art within the diagram.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 看着他呆立原地，一动不动的样子，众人只觉炼天极已经沉浸到天人演武图中，参悟起其中的神秘武学。

0018.en: Not far away, Li Xuelian explained faintly, "To select a disciple with a tenacious will and extraordinary spirit... when comprehending the Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram, one will directly face the fears in their heart."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: 不远处的李雪莲却是淡淡解释道：“家父为了挑选出意志坚韧，气魄不凡的弟子……在参悟天人演武图时，参悟者会直面心中惊怖。”

0018.en: "Only by strengthening one's spirit and overcoming inner weakness can one comprehend the mysteries of the painting."
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: “只有坚定精神，战胜内心的弱点，方能参悟画中奥妙。”

0018.en: Hearing this, the crowd was once again astonished, looking curiously at the motionless Lian Tianji, wondering what he was seeing.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 听到这番话的众人又是一阵惊讶，好奇地看着呆呆不动的炼天极，猜测着他到底看到了什么。

0018.en: At this moment, in Lian Tianji's eyes, the world had changed. He had unknowingly returned to his classroom, as if the art exhibition, Li Xuelian, and the diagram... were all forgotten.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 而此时此刻，在炼天极的眼中，四周围天地变幻，他已经在不知不觉间回到了教室，似乎刚刚的画展、李雪莲、天人演武图……全都不记得了。

0018.en: The class teacher was at the podium, announcing the results of the last monthly exam.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 而班主任正在讲台上报着上次月考的成绩。

0018.en: But starting from first place, he never heard his own name.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 可是从第一名开始，他便始终没有听到自己的名字。

0018.en: Not in the top 10...
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 第10名没有自己……

0018.en: Not in the top 20...
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 第20名没有自己……

0018.en: Still not in the top 50...
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 第50名还是没有自己……

0018.en: As the announced scores got lower and lower, Lian Tianji's heart grew more and more anxious...
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 随着念到的分数越来越低，炼天极的心中也越发紧张起来……

0018.en: At the exhibition, looking at Lian Tianji who was still comprehending the diagram, Li Xuelian said, "The Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram can be comprehended by multiple people at once. Are there any other young heroes interested in coming to the front?"
0018.speaker: 李雪莲
0018.cn: 画展上，看着还在参悟天人演武图的炼天极，李雪莲说道：“天人演武图可以一同参悟，还有哪位少年英杰有兴趣请来到画前。”

0018.en: Qian Shen exchanged a look with a few classmates around him, and they all walked towards the diagram.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 钱深和周围几位同学们对视一眼，齐齐走向了天人演武图的方向。

0018.en: At the same time, other young people who had come to comprehend the diagram also went forward.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 与此同时，其他来参悟天人演武图的少年们先后走了过去。
