0018.en: Zhang Yu looked at Zhou Tianyi beside him and asked curiously, "Aren't you going to give it a try?"
0018.speaker: 张羽
0018.cn: 张羽看了看身旁的周天翊，好奇道：“你不去试试？”

0018.en: Zhou Tianyi chuckled and shrugged, "I'm just here to watch the show. I'd rather not go up and embarrass myself."
0018.speaker: 周天翊
0018.cn: 周天翊呵呵一笑，耸肩说道：“我就是来看看热闹的，还是不上去自取其辱了。”

0018.en: Zhang Yu then turned to Bai Zhenzhen and asked, "What about you? You're not going either?"
0018.speaker: 张羽
0018.cn: 张羽又转头看向了一旁的白真真，问道：“你呢？也不上？”

0018.en: Bai Zhenzhen glanced towards the diagram and said flatly, "I'm still hesitating."
0018.speaker: 白真真
0018.cn: 白真真看了一眼天人演武图的方向，淡淡道：“我还在犹豫。”

0018.en: Zhang Yu asked curiously, "Hesitating about what?"
0018.speaker: 张羽
0018.cn: 张羽好奇道：“犹豫什么？”

0018.en: Bai Zhenzhen: "I don't want to find a master for myself."
0018.speaker: 白真真
0018.cn: 白真真：“我不想给自己找个师父。”

0018.en: She thought to herself, "Becoming a disciple will definitely mean signing a contract with that Master Xinghuo, basically a contract of servitude."
0018.speaker: 白真真
0018.cn: 她心中暗道：“成为弟子，肯定要和那什么星火真人签合同，搞出个卖身契来。”

0018.en: Bai Zhenzhen sighed internally, "Forget everything else... just choosing a university and a major would probably be controlled by him, and I'd end up in a huge amount of debt. Who knows what the interest rates would be..."
0018.speaker: 白真真
0018.cn: 白真真心中叹一口气：“到时候不说别的……光是选哪个大学哪个专业，恐怕自己都要受他节制，还得欠下一屁股债，也不知道利息怎么个算法……”

0018.en: Hearing Bai Zhenzhen's hesitation, Zhang Yu immediately said, "Well, if you don't master this martial art, you won't have to be Master Xinghuo's disciple."
0018.speaker: 张羽
0018.cn: 而张羽听到白真真的犹豫，当即说道：“那不练成这套武功，就不用做星火真人的弟子啦。”

0018.en: Zhang Yu looked towards the Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram and smiled slightly, "A martial art left by a Golden Core master, even one for the Qi Refining stage, would cost us tens of thousands to buy the usage rights. Why pass up a chance to learn it for free?"
0018.speaker: 张羽
0018.cn: 张羽看着天人演武图的方向，微微一笑道：“金丹真人留下的武功，即使是练气期练的武功，要是我们自己去买使用版权的话，起码也是几万块了吧？有白学武功的机会，干嘛不上？”

0018.en: "If you don't want to be Master Xinghuo's disciple, you just have to make sure you don't fully master it today."
0018.speaker: 张羽
0018.cn: “不想当星火真人的弟子，大不了今天不把这门武功练成就是了。”

0018.en: Nearby, Zhao Tianxing heard this and secretly sneered, thinking that Zhang Yu and Bai Zhenzhen were both getting ahead of themselves. He also moved a few steps away, afraid that someone might look over and lump him in with these arrogant and ignorant people.
0018.speaker: 赵天行
0018.cn: 一旁的赵天行听到这话暗暗撇嘴，只觉得张羽和白真真一个比一个口气大，同时他稍稍离远了几步，生怕四周围有人看过来，把他当成一样的狂妄无知之辈。

0018.en: Bai Zhenzhen looked at Zhang Yu speechlessly, thinking, "To have pushed Yu-zi into this mental state... just how aggressive are the collectors from those small loan platforms?"
0018.speaker: 白真真
0018.cn: 白真真无语地看着张羽，心道：“把羽子逼成这种精神状态……小平台贷款的催收下手到底有多猛？”

0018.en: Zhou Tianyi smiled, "That makes sense. It doesn't cost anything to try and comprehend it anyway. Let's go try it together."
0018.speaker: 周天翊
0018.cn: 周天翊笑道：“说的有道理，反正参悟一番也不要钱，我们干脆一起试试吧。”

0018.en: But Zhao Tianxing refused Zhang Yu and Zhou Tianyi's request. Just the thought of himself comprehending the diagram in front of everyone while wearing a security or waiter uniform was too humiliating.
0018.speaker: 赵天行
0018.cn: 赵天行却是拒绝了张羽和周天翊的要求，他光是想想自己穿着保安服或者侍者服在众目睽睽下参悟天人演武图的样子，就感觉太丢人了。

0018.en: But watching Zhang Yu walk away, he suddenly admired the guy's thick skin.
0018.speaker: 赵天行
0018.cn: 但看着张羽走上去的背影，他突然有些佩服对方的厚脸皮。

0018.en: Just then, the walkie-talkie on Zhao Tianxing's waist buzzed. The security captain yelled, "What are you doing? You're security! Who let him leave his post to comprehend the diagram? Get him back here now!"
0018.speaker: 保安队长
0018.cn: 就在这时，赵天行腰间的对讲机响了起来，保安队长骂道：“你们搞什么？你们是保安，谁让他擅离职守去参悟演武图的？还不快点把人叫回来？”

0018.en: Zhao Tianxing broke out in a cold sweat from the scolding. He quickly ran forward, shouting, trying to pull Zhang Yu back.
0018.speaker: 赵天行
0018.cn: 赵天行被骂得满头是汗，连忙一边喊着一边向前跑去，想要将张羽拉回来。

0018.en: And as Zhao Tianxing got closer to the Deva-Human Martial Arts Diagram, the figure in the painting gradually became clear, and sounds of laughter echoed around him.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 而随着赵天行一步步靠近天人演武图，那图中的人影逐渐清晰，四周围也传来一阵阵的嬉笑声。

0018.en: Zhao Tianxing turned to look and saw that everyone at the exhibition was staring at him, pointing and criticizing, mocking him for overestimating his abilities—a mere security guard daring to comprehend the diagram.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 赵天行转头望去，就发现整个画展中的所有人都在看着他，朝着他指指点点，评头论足，嘲笑着他不自量力，区区一介保安都想要参悟演武图。

0018.en: Amid the countless jeers, Zhao Tianxing slowly stopped, frozen in awkward uncertainty. He scratched his head, then his ear, not knowing how to even stand anymore.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 无数人的讥笑中，赵天行缓缓停下了脚步，尴尬地不知所措，手一会摸摸脑袋，一会抓抓耳朵，都不知道该怎么站了。

0018.en: Meanwhile, as Zhang Yu and the other two approached the diagram, the blurry figure in the painting grew clearer, transforming into a resolute-faced middle-aged man who finally threw a punch at them through the air.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 与此同时，随着张羽三人一步步靠近天人演武图，那图中模糊的人影也逐渐清晰，化为一名面容刚毅的中年男子，并最终一拳朝着他们隔空轰来。

0018.en: Bai Zhenzhen felt her vision go dark as her phone began to vibrate wildly.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 白真真只觉得眼前一暗，手机便疯狂震动了起来。

0018.en: She picked it up and saw a collection message from a loan platform.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 她拿起一看，便发现是一条借贷平台的催收短信。

0018.en: "Regarding your overdue 'Owe-it' loan, due to multiple failed collection attempts, the situation is severe. Please settle the payment within three days of receiving this message. If you continue to be overdue, we will proceed according to relevant laws..."
0018.speaker: 催收短信
0018.cn: “关于您拖欠‘欠呗欠款’因多次催缴无效，情节严重，请收到本短信后三日内结清欠款，若继续逾期，我方将按相关法律进行处理……”

0018.en: "Continued non-payment will result in a background check of your location..."
0018.speaker: 催收短信
0018.cn: “继续欠款，将对您背调所在地进行核查……”

0018.en: "Deadbeat, you've lost all face over this small amount of money. How about your whole family helps you by collecting bottles..."
0018.speaker: 催收短信
0018.cn: “老赖，欠这点钱脸都不要了，全家一起帮你捡瓶子还好不好……”

0018.en: More and more collection messages appeared, their content becoming more and more shameless, escalating from simple reminders to all-out insults, curses, and threats...
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 越来越多的催收短信，其中的内容也越来越肆无忌惮，从单纯的催缴，逐渐变成了全方位无死角的侮辱、谩骂、威胁……

0018.en: Bai Zhenzhen stared at the endless stream of messages on her phone, covered in a cold sweat, her body tense, until her phone started ringing.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 白真真看着手机中那些层出不穷的催收短信，满头虚汗，浑身绷紧，直到电话铃声也响了起来。

0018.en: But looking at the constantly ringing phone, Bai Zhenzhen didn't dare to answer.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 可看着那不断响起的手机，白真真却迟迟不敢接听。

0018.en: But even though she did nothing, the phone answered automatically.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 但哪怕她没有进行任何操作，手机却自动接听了。

0018.en: To her horror, a cold male voice came from the phone.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 在她惊恐地注视下，手机中传来一道冰冷的男声。

0018.en: "Due to loan fraud and overdue payment, you have committed a serious breach of contract. Your location has been locked via the Skynet system. If the debt is not cleared within three days, a lightning tribulation will be sent down..."
0018.speaker: 催收电话
0018.cn: “因您信贷诈骗，逾期未缴，已构成严重违约行为。现已通过天网锁定位置，若三日内仍未结清欠款，将降下雷劫……”

0018.en: A clap of thunder rumbled.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 一阵闷雷声响起。

0018.en: Bai Zhenzhen shot her head up and saw the faint flicker of lightning in the sky above.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 白真真猛地抬头，便看到头顶上空隐隐约约有雷光闪烁。

0019.en: Chapter 19: Terror and the Dao Heart
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 第19章 惊怖和道心

0019.en: One by one, the figures of his classmates appeared before Qian Shen. He couldn't see them clearly, but he could plainly see the scores displayed above their heads.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 一名又一名同学的身影浮现在钱深的面前，他看不清他们的身影，却能清楚看到他们脑袋上显示的分数。

0019.en: The score displayed above each person's head was unattainably high, sparkling so brightly that Qian Shen felt ashamed of himself.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 每一个人头上显示的分数都是如此高不可攀，如此闪闪发光，让此刻的钱深自惭形秽。

0019.en: He felt that standing before his classmates, he was so inadequate, as lowly as a henchman.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 他感觉自己站在同学们的面前，是如此不堪，如此卑微如喽啰。

0019.en: "Standing among these people, I'm like a bag of wet trash."
0019.speaker: 钱深
0019.cn: “我站在这些人中，简直就像是一袋湿垃圾。”

0019.en: "With a mere score of over 600, I don't deserve to be here, let alone talk to them or even get close to them..."
0019.speaker: 钱深
0019.cn: “区区600多分的我，根本不配站在这里，更不配和他们说话，不配靠近他们……”

0019.en: In his eyes, the scores on his classmates' heads kept rising, and their figures grew taller with them, like giants towering into the clouds. Soon, he could only see their legs and couldn't even make out their faces.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 在他眼中，那一名名同学脑袋上的分数不断提升，身影也随着不断拔高，如同一个个高耸入云的巨人一般，他甚至渐渐只能看到对方的双腿，连对方的面庞都看不清了。

0019.en: Meanwhile, on the other side of the art exhibition, a drone from Mangshan High School's Li Xingyu traced a path through the air, flying slowly toward the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 与此同时，画展的另一边，邙山高中李星宇的无人机在半空中划过一道轨迹，便朝着天人演武图的方向缓缓飞去。

0019.en: But the next moment, with a crackle, the drone seemed to malfunction and fell crookedly to the ground.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 但下一刻，便随着噼啪一声炸响，无人机便像是发生了某种故障，歪歪斜斜地落在了地上。

0019.en: "The soul cultivation students from Mangshan High are all tied up in contracts. They shouldn't bother joining the fun."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “邙山高中的魂修生一身的合同，就别来凑热闹了。”

0019.en: Li Xuelian murmured softly, then looked away from the drone and continued to observe the other students.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 李雪莲轻轻念叨一下，接着目光便从无人机上收了回来，继续看向了其他学生。

0019.en: "It's a pity. The students trying their luck at this exhibition are almost all first-years. To master the martial arts in the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram, second and third-year students would have a better chance."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “可惜，这次画展来尝试的学生们几乎都是高一的，想要练成天人演武图上的武功，高二高三的学生才更有机会。”

0019.en: "But it's understandable... The top students in the second and third years either don't meet the age requirement or are already bound by contracts, so they wouldn't be looking for a new master."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “但也难怪……高二、高三的学霸们要么年龄不符合要求，要么早就有合同在身，也不可能再来找个师父了。”

0019.en: Just then, the brilliantly shining director of the Xianyun Group in Songyang City approached Li Xuelian, smiling. "This Celestial Martial Arts Diagram, personally drawn by Master Starfire, is truly miraculous. What exactly is it testing?"
0019.speaker: 仙韵集团嵩阳市总监
0019.cn: 就在这时，浑身金光闪闪的仙韵集团嵩阳市总监来到了李雪莲的身旁，微笑着说道：“这天人演武图不愧是星火真人亲绘，真是神妙异常，不知其中要考校的到底是什么？”

0019.en: Li Xuelian didn't answer his question directly. Instead, she said lightly, "The first trial of the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram tests the Dao Heart."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: 李雪莲没有直接回答对方的问题，而是淡淡说道：“天人演武图的第一关，考的是道心。”

0019.en: "Those who can't withstand it are often forced to retreat, and it can even leave a flaw in their Dao Heart."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “经受不住的，往往都会被强行逼退，甚至在道心中留下一番破绽。”

0019.en: Feeling the countless scornful and mocking gazes from all around, Zhao Tianxing couldn't help but step back again and again, moving away from the area of effect of the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 赵天行感受着周围无数人轻蔑、嘲笑的目光，身体忍不住向后连连退去，远离了天人演武图的作用范围。

0019.en: When he came back to his senses and saw the situation around him, he finally understood that the feeling of being watched and despised by everyone was just an effect of the diagram.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 当他回过神来时，看着四周围的状况，这才明白刚刚‘全场围观’、‘蔑视眼神’都不过是天人演武图的作用。

0019.en: Realizing he had failed the test of the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram, his face flushed red with shame. He quickly retreated, afraid that someone might see him, a security guard, making a fool of himself.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 想到这里，明白自己根本没通过天人演武图的考验，他的脸色立刻胀得通红，快步向后退去，生怕周围有人发现他这个保安自取其辱。

0019.en: At the exhibition, Li Xuelian continued, "If one can pass this first trial, it has the effect of tempering the Dao Heart."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: 画展上，李雪莲接着说道：“若能通过这第一关的考验，自有磨砺一番道心的效果。”

0019.en: "When it comes to the level of the Dao Heart, most of us cultivators rely on mind-techniques to improve it."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “所谓道心等级，我们绝大多数修士都是靠着心法去提升。”

0019.en: "And different mind-techniques require different ways of thinking to be compatible."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “而不同的心法，需要不同的思想去契合。”

0019.en: "For example, with the ancient God-Worshipping Mind-Technique, the cultivator must be incredibly devout and have absolute faith in the deity. The more pious they are, the better the technique works."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “像是古代的拜神心法，修炼者就必须无比虔诚，对神灵有着绝对的信仰之心，越是虔诚，拜神心法的效果便越好。”

0019.en: "Or take the Tianqin Mind-Technique from Ziyun High School. It requires the cultivator to practice to the extreme, making hard work an instinct to achieve the greatest effect."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “又像是紫云高中的天勤心法，便需要修炼者苦修到极致，将苦修融入自己的本能，才能发挥最大功效。”

0019.en: "And the Basic Heart-Refining Method for high school students requires a calm and focused mind, paired with patient and persistent effort."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “又比如高中生入门的基础炼心法，求的是一个静气凝神，需要的是默默忍耐、水滴石穿的思想来配合。”

0019.en: "There are thousands of mind-techniques to improve the Dao Heart, some high-level, some low-level, but the key is whether the cultivator's thinking aligns with the technique."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “提升道心的心法千千万万，有高有低，但关键看修炼者有没有契合心法的思想。”

0019.en: "But a person's thoughts are hard to measure. How someone truly thinks, whether they are really compatible with a mind-technique... forget outsiders, sometimes even they themselves can't say for sure."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “可思想难测，一个人究竟是怎么想的，是不是真的与心法相契合，别说外人了，有时候就连他自己也未必说的清。”

0019.en: "Fortunately, the stronger the Dao Heart, the stronger a person's willpower. So, measuring the Dao Heart level by willpower has become the simplest way to test the effectiveness of a mind-technique."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “索性道心越强，人的意志力便也越强，通过意志力的强弱来测定道心等级，检验心法提升的效果，就成了最简单的办法。”

0019.en: "But the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram doesn't just measure the strength of the Dao Heart by testing willpower."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “但天人演武图，并不只是简简单单通过测试意志力的强弱，来确认道心的强弱。”

0019.en: "The diagram targets the terror in one's heart. It directly strikes at the weaknesses of the mind, giving them no chance to resist with mind-techniques. It tests their most primal reaction."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “天人演武图，针对的是心中惊怖，是直接敲打人心灵上的弱点，不给他们用心法去抵抗的机会，测试的就是他们最本真的反应。”

0019.en: "When faced with their own mental weaknesses, only by adjusting their thinking in time can they overcome them and pass the trial."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “在面对心灵上的弱点时，只有及时调整思想，才能弥补心中弱点，方可过关。”

0019.en: The director of the Xianyun Group's eyes lit up. "I understand. Master Starfire wants a disciple with a flexible mind? Someone who, when practicing the God-Worshipping Mind-Technique, can switch gods, and when practicing the Tianqin Mind-Technique, can compete in both hard work and in lying flat."
0019.speaker: 仙韵集团嵩阳市总监
0019.cn: 仙韵集团嵩阳市总监目光一动，说道：“我明白了，星火前辈是想要一个思想灵活的弟子？一个练习拜神心法，能换着神拜，练习天勤心法，既能在苦修上卷，也能在躺平上卷的徒弟。”

0019.en: Li Xuelian nodded. "There are countless mind-techniques, and it's good if one's thinking is compatible. But only those who can constantly adjust their thinking to adapt to changing environments and techniques are the true geniuses, not bound by the techniques themselves."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: 李雪莲点了点头：“心法万千，思想能契合心法固然好。但只有能不断调整自己的思想，适应环境变化，适应心法变化的人，才是真正的天才，不被心法所束缚。”

0019.en: "Especially now, as times are changing faster and faster, the Ten Great Sects influence all aspects of society, and the entire Kunxu is undergoing drastic changes. It's not acceptable if your thinking can't adapt in time."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “特别是如今时代发展越来越快，十大宗门影响着社会中的方方面面，整个昆墟都在发生激烈变化，思想不能及时去适应，那是不行的。”

0019.en: "For instance, in this day and age, exams and scores are essential to walk the path of cultivation. They have long been integrated into every cultivator's life."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “比如当今之世，想要踏上修仙之路，考试、分数都必不可少，早就融入了每一名修仙者的生活中。”

0019.en: "So, modern cultivators naturally have a fixation on exams and scores."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “于是现代修仙者的思想中，自然也少不了对考试、分数的执着。”

0019.en: "Having excellent scores, and the obsession with them, can make a top student's will firm, which makes it easier to raise their Dao Heart level."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “拥有优秀的分数，以及对分数的执念，能让一名学霸意志坚定，那道心等级也就更容易提升。”

0019.en: "But this is also a mental weakness. There is always someone better. A temporary lead doesn't mean a permanent one. Many top students are as confident when they are at the top as they are insecure when they fall behind."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “但反过来这也是一种心灵上的弱点。人外有人，天外有天，一时的领先不代表永远的领先。许多学霸排名前列的时候有多自信，排名落后的时候就有多自卑。”

0019.en: "To overcome this mental weakness, a cultivator needs to be flexible in their thinking. This is the key to passing the trial."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “要克服这种心灵上的弱点，修炼者需要及时在思想上做出灵活变通，这是过关的关键。”

0019.en: "For example, a student once repeatedly experienced getting low scores in the diagram's test. He eventually overcame his fear of low scores and developed a 'delusional mindset'."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “像之前就有一位学生在天人演武图的考验中不断经历考试考低分，最终克服了自己对低分的恐惧，磨砺出一种妄念思想。”

0019.en: Listening to the teacher announce the results from the podium, Lian Tianji suddenly burst out laughing. "Hahaha, since I've already become the last-place loser, I'll just start over from the bottom."
0019.speaker: 炼天极
0019.cn: 炼天极听着讲台上老师报出的成绩，突然大笑数声：“哈哈哈哈，既然我已经成了最后一名的学渣，那便从头开始吧。”

0019.en: "From this day on, I am the worst, the student with the lowest score."
0019.speaker: 炼天极
0019.cn: “从今日起，我就是最废物，是成绩最差的学渣了。”

0019.en: "But even as a failure, I have the chance to surpass you all, one by one, and take the top spot."
0019.speaker: 炼天极
0019.cn: “但成为了学渣的我，也有机会把你们一一超越，登上第一宝座。”

0019.en: "I will definitely become number one in the grade!"
0019.speaker: 炼天极
0019.cn: “我一定会成为年级第一！”

0019.en: As he conquered the terror in his heart, he felt as if he had returned to the art exhibition, and the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram before him became clearer.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 随着他战胜心中惊怖，他感觉到自己像是再次回到了画展，眼前的天人演武图也越发清晰了起来。

0019.en: Li Xuelian continued, "Kunxu has 36 floors above ground and 18 below. Each floor is a different world. Whether they are humans or immortals, they are all divided into ranks. This ranking is ingrained in the bones of every cultivator, influencing the depths of their thoughts."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: 李雪莲接着说道：“昆墟地上36层，地下18层，一层一重天地，不论是人也好，仙也罢，也都分为三六九等，这种分级融入到每一名修仙的骨头里，影响到每一个人的思想深处。”

0019.en: "Previously, there was a student who was crushed by layers of pressure from countless people in the diagram's trial, and eventually developed a 'lying-flat mindset'."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “此前便有一位学生在天人演武图中经历无数人层层压迫，最终蜕变出躺平思想。”

0019.en: Qian Shen watched as the giants, whose scores far surpassed his, rose from the ground, growing taller and taller until their faces became a blur.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 钱深看着那一个个分数远超他的巨人拔地而起，越来越高大，渐渐看不清楚面目。

0019.en: Only the ever-increasing, glowing scores on the giants' heads were still visible.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 只有巨人们脑袋上的分数还在不断增长，发出耀眼光辉。

0019.en: He tried to keep up with them, but it was useless.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 他想要试着跟上对方，却毫无作用。

0019.en: As the giants grew to more and more exaggerated heights and their scores continued to climb, his mood shifted from tense to afraid, then from afraid to desperate, and finally, it turned into a kind of numbness.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 在一个个巨人越来越夸张的拔高，分数的增长下，他的心情也从紧张变成害怕，又从害怕变得绝望，最终逐渐变成一种麻木。

0019.en: He lay down on the ground, no longer looking at the figures of the giants.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 他躺倒在地上，再也不看那些巨人的身影。

0019.en: "Fine."
0019.speaker: 钱深
0019.cn: “行吧。”

0019.en: "I just won't chase them anymore."
0019.speaker: 钱深
0019.cn: “我不追就是了。”

0019.en: "I just need to be able to cultivate myself. Even if I can't compare to anyone... as long as I can cultivate, it's fine."
0019.speaker: 钱深
0019.cn: “我只要自己能修仙就行了，哪怕谁也比不过……只要能修仙就好了。”

0019.en: As if waking from a long dream, Qian Shen, lying on the ground, opened his eyes. He looked at the art exhibition and the martial arts diagram before him with a look of understanding.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 如一场大梦惊醒，躺在地上的钱深睁开眼睛，看着眼前的画展、演武图，眼中露出一丝了然之色。

0019.en: In the exhibition hall, the Songyang City director of the Xianyun Group listened to Li Xuelian's analysis and agreed, "Changes in thinking are inseparable from the influence of the times."
0019.speaker: 仙韵集团嵩阳市总监
0019.cn: 画展中，仙韵集团的嵩阳市总监听着李雪莲的分析，赞同道：“思想的变化，离不开时代发展之影响。”

0019.en: He guessed, "In today's society, everyone relies on loans. I suppose this is also reflected in the trial of the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram?"
0019.speaker: 仙韵集团嵩阳市总监
0019.cn: 他猜测道：“像是如今社会，人人都离不开借贷，想必也会体现在天人演武图的试炼之中吧？”

0019.en: "Correct." Li Xuelian nodded. "There was once a student who faced the terror of repaying his cultivation debts in the diagram's test, and in the end, developed a 'deadbeat mindset'."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “不错。”李雪莲点头说道：“曾经就有一名学生在天人演武图的考验中直面仙路还债之恐怖，最后倒是成了老赖思想。”

0019.en: Seeing the debt-collecting thunderclouds gathering in the sky, Bai Zhenzhen squatted down in terror.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 看着天空中不断酝酿的催债天雷，白真真一脸惊恐地蹲了下来。

0019.en: "Wait! I'll pay it back!"
0019.speaker: 白真真
0019.cn: “等等！我还钱！”

0019.en: "I'll pay it back, okay!"
0019.speaker: 白真真
0019.cn: “我还钱行了吧！”

0019.en: "Don't strike me!"
0019.speaker: 白真真
0019.cn: “别劈我！”

0019.en: She quickly opened her phone to check her accounts, wanting to see how much she owed and how much she could repay.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 她连忙打开手机，查看自己的账户，想要看看自己欠了多少钱，又能还掉多少钱。

0019.en: Opening the first lending platform, Bai Zhenzhen's heart sank.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 打开第一个借贷平台，白真真便是心中一沉。

0019.en: Then the 1.2 million debt from the second platform made her break out in a cold sweat.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 然后第二个平台的120万欠款，更是让她背上冷汗狂冒。

0019.en: Two million... five million... eight million...
0019.speaker: 旁白

0019.en: As the total debt she calculated in her mind grew, the hand holding the phone gradually dropped, limp.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 随着她心中计算的总欠款数额不断增长，握着手机的手也渐渐无力垂落。

0019.en: A total debt of eight million. For a high school student, such a huge amount would either lead to a complete breakdown or...
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 整整800万的欠债，如此庞大的数额对一名高中生来说，不是彻底崩溃便是……

0019.en: Bai Zhenzhen suddenly lay down on the ground and shouted at the thunder in the sky, "If you have the guts, then strike me down."
0019.speaker: 白真真
0019.cn: 白真真突然躺倒在地上，看着天空中的雷霆大喝道：“有种你就劈死我吧。”

0019.en: "If you kill me, eight million will turn to dust."
0019.speaker: 白真真
0019.cn: “劈死我就是800万灰飞烟灭了。”

0019.en: Seeing that the thunder was not striking, Bai Zhenzhen continued, "Either you kill me, and the eight million turns to dust."
0019.speaker: 白真真
0019.cn: 看着迟迟没有落下的雷霆，白真真接着说道：“你要么劈死我，800万灰飞烟灭。”

0019.en: "Or you can help me find some work. I'll pay you back when I earn money."
0019.speaker: 白真真
0019.cn: “要么就帮我介绍点活儿干，我赚了钱就还你。”

0019.en: As the thunderclouds gradually dispersed, the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram reappeared before Bai Zhenzhen.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 伴随着天雷逐渐散去，天人演武图也重新出现在了白真真的面前。

0019.en: And watching the martial arts being demonstrated within it, Bai Zhenzhen felt a sense of understanding.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 而看着其中之人演练的武学，白真真心中若有所悟。

0019.en: At the exhibition, Li Xuelian sighed. "But whether it's a delusional, lying-flat, or deadbeat mindset, it's just a state of using one's thoughts to resist pressure. Although it can temper their will and Dao Heart, their future still depends on the path they take in reality."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: 画展上，李雪莲感叹道：“不过妄念也罢，躺平、老赖也好，只是面对重压之下，用思想去抗衡压力的一个状态而已，虽然能磨砺一番他们的意志和道心，但未来如何，终究还是要看现实里他们怎么走。”

0019.en: "After all, this is just the first trial of the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram, just a threshold."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “毕竟这也不过是天人演武图的第一关，一个门槛罢了。”

0019.en: She remembered when she was in high school, her father had also tested her Dao Heart.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 她想起了自己读高中时，父亲也曾经考验她的道心。

0019.en: At that time, she was most afraid of her father. During the test, she was severely oppressed by him, and finally, under the immense pressure, she rose up in resistance, establishing an "Explosive Filial Piety mindset." After waking up, she fiercely exploited the old man for his resources, and her cultivation advanced by leaps and bounds.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 而当时她最害怕的便是自己的父亲，在考验中被父亲狠狠压迫，最终在重压之下奋起反抗，立下爆孝思想，苏醒之后狠狠爆老东西金币，修为可谓是一日千里。

0019.en: But not long after, the pressures from all aspects of society, along with her father's actions, made her regain her admiration and respect for him.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 不过没多久后，来自现实社会中方方面面的压力，以及父亲的一举一动，便让她重新拾起了对父亲的敬仰和尊重。

0019.en: The Xianyun Group director nodded slightly, knowing that Li Xuelian was right. The effect of such a Dao Heart test was only temporary.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 一旁的仙韵集团嵩阳市总监微微点头，知道李雪莲说的不错，这种道心考验带来的效果只是一时的。

0019.en: After all, a person's thoughts are constantly changing. How could the impact of a mere test withstand the long-term influence of the entire society in the real world?
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 毕竟人的思想无时无刻不在变化，区区道心考验带来的影响，又如何顶得住现实世界中整个社会带来的天长日久的影响呢？

0019.en: Li Xuelian continued, "After surviving the first trial and overcoming the terror in their hearts, the real comprehension comes next."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: 李雪莲接着说道：“挺过第一关，克服心中惊怖之后，接下来才是真正的参悟。”

0019.en: "And after passing the comprehension stage, whether they can ultimately master it is another matter entirely."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: “而过了参悟这一关后，最终到底能不能练成，那又是另一件事了。”

0019.en: The director nodded, understanding that overcoming terror, comprehending the diagram, and mastering the martial art were the three stages of understanding the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 总监点了点头，明白这克服惊怖，参悟演武图，练成武道，这便是参悟天人演武图的三个关卡了。

0019.en: "Then looking at the people here, how many do you think can succeed?"
0019.speaker: 仙韵集团嵩阳市总监
0019.cn: “那你看在场之人，又有几人能练成？”

0019.en: Li Xuelian looked at the many students present and shook her head. "I'm afraid it would be hard to find even one."
0019.speaker: 李雪莲
0019.cn: 李雪莲看了看在场的诸多学生，摇了摇头道：“只怕一人难求。”

0019.en: When Zhang Yu saw the figure in the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram gradually become clear and begin to practice a set of boxing forms, he suddenly felt a chill rise in his heart.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 当张羽看到天人演武图上的身影逐渐清晰起来，看着那道身影开始演练一套拳法之后，他突然感觉到心中一股寒意涌起。

0019.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement. Work hard to fulfill the wish, do not deliberately slack off or delay. 10."
0019.speaker: 邪神
0019.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，10。”

0019.en: Zhang Yu was slightly taken aback. "Wait... I'm trying hard to comprehend the martial arts diagram right now. Isn't that part of working hard to study and get into a good university?"
0019.speaker: 张羽
0019.cn: 张羽微微一愣：“不是……我现在努力参悟演武图，不就是在努力学习，努力考上好大学的路上吗？”

0019.en: But the cold presence could not talk to him; it simply continued the countdown.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 但那股寒意无法和他对话，仅仅是继续倒计时了下去。

0019.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement. Work hard to fulfill the wish, do not deliberately slack off or delay. 9."
0019.speaker: 邪神
0019.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，9。”

0019.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement. Work hard to fulfill the wish, do not deliberately slack off or delay. 8."
0019.speaker: 邪神
0019.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，8。”

0019.en: Having no choice, Zhang Yu could only sit down and try to practice breathing spiritual energy to see if he could stop the countdown.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 张羽无法，只能坐下来尝试吐纳灵机，看看能不能让这倒计时停下来。

0019.en: As he began to practice, the cold feeling gradually dissipated, and the countdown stopped.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 随着他开始吐纳，那股寒意逐渐消散，倒计时也停了下来。

0019.en: "This idiot..."
0019.speaker: 张羽
0019.cn: “这智障……”

0019.en: Just as Zhang Yu was cursing the power of the ritual while practicing, another surging chill rose up inside him.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 就在张羽一边吐纳，一边暗骂这仪式力量的时候，又一股汹涌含义在他体内涌起。

0019.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement. Work hard to fulfill the wish, do not deliberately slack off or delay. 10."
0019.speaker: 邪神
0019.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，10。”

0019.en: Hearing this new countdown, Zhang Yu was shocked.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 听到这新的倒计时，张羽一下子震惊了。

0019.en: "Wait... I am cultivating hard."
0019.speaker: 张羽
0019.cn: “不是……我在努力修炼啊。”

0019.en: "Why is it counting down again?"
0019.speaker: 张羽
0019.cn: “为什么又要倒计时？”

0019.en: "What's wrong with this idiotic ritual?"
0019.speaker: 张羽
0019.cn: “这智障仪式出什么毛病了？”

0019.en: Zhang Yu decided to stop practicing to see what would happen. He found that the surging chill and the countdown did not disappear. Instead, another cold presence and a new countdown began.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 张羽干脆停下吐纳试试看，发现汹涌的寒意和倒计时并没有消失，反而又有新一股寒意和倒计时发生了。

0019.en: Hearing two countdowns going off in his head, taking turns counting down, Zhang Yu finally understood what was happening.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 听着脑袋里两个倒计时连连响动，轮番倒数，张羽终于明白了是怎么回事。

0019.en: "There are two countdowns?"
0019.speaker: 张羽
0019.cn: “有两个倒计时？”

0019.en: "Is one of them fake?"
0019.speaker: 张羽
0019.cn: “两个里面有一个是假的吗？”

0020.en: Chapter 20: Insight
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 第20章 参悟

0020.en: With two identical chills and two identical countdowns, Zhang Yu's repeated attempts led him to discover that the two ritualistic forces were pushing him in different directions.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 两股相同的寒意，两个相同的倒计时，在张羽的多次尝试下，便发现这两股仪式力量的逼迫方向不同。

0020.en: One would stop counting down after he cultivated spiritual energy.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 一个在他吐纳灵机后便不再倒数。

0020.en: The other would stop counting down after he comprehended the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 另一个则是在他参悟天人演武图后便不再倒数。

0020.en: Zhang Yu instantly grew more certain of one thing: one of the two countdowns was fake.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 张羽立时愈发确定一件事，便是这两个倒计时中有一个是假的。

0020.en: "It's probably an effect from the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram."
0020.speaker: 张羽
0020.cn: “恐怕是天人演武图带来的效果。”

0020.en: "Confront the terror in my heart... so it's recreating the pressure of the ritual on me?"
0020.speaker: 张羽
0020.cn: “直面我心中惊怖……所以再现了仪式力量对我的压迫吗？”

0020.en: "I just didn't expect the ritual's power, recreated by the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram, to contradict the real ritual power I'm under."
0020.speaker: 张羽
0020.cn: “却没想到天人演武图再现的仪式力量，和我身上真正的仪式力量相矛盾了。”

0020.en: But of the two ritual powers, which one was the fake?
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 但两股仪式力量中，哪一股才是假的呢？

0020.en: "Is it the one that stops counting down after I cultivate?"
0020.speaker: 张羽
0020.cn: “是我吐纳以后，就不再倒计时的那个？”

0020.en: "Or the one that stops after I comprehend the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram?"
0020.speaker: 张羽
0020.cn: “还是我参悟天人演武图后，就不再倒计时的那个？”

0020.en: Zhang Yu was more inclined toward the latter but couldn't make a decision lightly.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 张羽更倾向于后者，却又无法轻下决定。

0020.en: This was because the price of choosing wrong was death.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 只因为选错的代价便是死亡。

0020.en: "Which one do I choose?"
0020.speaker: 张羽
0020.cn: “到底选哪边？”

0020.en: Listening to the ever-changing countdown in his mind, Zhang Yu was in turmoil, unable to decide.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 听着心中不断变幻的倒计时，张羽脑海中纠结万分，迟迟无法做下决定。

0020.en: "If I can't choose, then I just won't."
0020.speaker: 张羽
0020.cn: “既然选不了，那干脆就不选了。”

0020.en: His gaze hardened as he made his decision: "I'll just treat both countdowns as real."
0020.speaker: 张羽
0020.cn: 他目光一凝，已经做出了决断：“两个倒计时我都当成真的便是。”

0020.en: Zhang Yu then sat down on the spot, began to practice the Circulatory Qi-Gathering Method, and absorbed the spiritual energy of the heavens and earth.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 便看到张羽原地盘坐下来，开始运转周天采气法，吐纳天地间的灵机。

0020.en: As the countdown in his mind continued, from 10 to 5 and then to 3, Zhang Yu stood up again, turned back to the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram, and tried to comprehend the martial art it contained.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 而随着心中的倒计时不断进行，从10到5再到3的时候，张羽便又站了起来，再次看向天人演武图的方向，试着参悟其中蕴含的一套武学。

0020.en: Thus, under the pressure of two countdowns, Zhang Yu alternated between practicing the Circulatory Qi-Gathering Method and comprehending the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram, moving forward with both.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 就这样，张羽便在两个倒计时的一同逼迫下，将周天采气法和参悟天人演武图轮番进行，交替前进。

0020.en: Meanwhile, at the art exhibition, people gradually began to notice Zhang Yu's strange behavior.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 与此同时，画展上也渐渐有人注意到了张羽的异样。

0020.en: The Songyang City Director of the Xianyun Group looked at Zhang Yu with curiosity and said, "This kid is cultivating one moment and then standing up to comprehend martial arts the next. What did he see?"
0020.speaker: 仙韵集团总监
0020.cn: 仙韵集团的嵩阳市总监好奇地看着张羽，说道：“这小子一会吐纳，一会又站起来参悟武学，这是看到了什么东西？”

0020.en: Beside him, Li Xuelian also glanced at Zhang Yu and said thoughtfully, "It looks as if someone is forcing him to cultivate."
0020.speaker: 李雪莲
0020.cn: 一旁的李雪莲也将目光扫向了张羽，若有所思道：“看上去倒像是有谁在逼他吐纳一样。”

0020.en: "Perhaps it's out of reverence for a teacher in the real world."
0020.speaker: 李雪莲
0020.cn: “也许是出于现实中对某位老师的敬畏吧。”

0020.en: Just then, they saw Zhang Yu change his actions again. He stopped cultivating and began practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 就在这时，却发现张羽又变换了动作，不再吐纳而是开始练习健体三十六式了。

0020.en: It turned out that Zhang Yu had a sudden realization. The countdown that stopped when he cultivated wasn't necessarily forcing him to cultivate, but rather forcing him onto the path of studying, training, getting into university, and earning money.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 原来是张羽突然领悟到一件事情，那就是在他吐纳后就不再倒计时的那个倒计时，其本质可能并非是逼迫他吐纳，而是逼迫着他走在学习、修炼、考大学、工作赚钱的这条路上了。

0020.en: So he started trying to practice martial arts while looking at the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 所以他开始尝试一边练武，一边看着天人演武图行不行。

0020.en: After all, he had already mastered the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms to the point of muscle memory. If he could practice them while comprehending the diagram, he could focus most of his spirit on the diagram itself.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 反正他的健体三十六式早就已经练成了肌肉记忆，如果可以一边练武一边看着天人演武图进行参悟的话，便能将大半精神放在天人演武图上。

0020.en: His main goal at the moment was, after all, to comprehend the martial art on the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 毕竟此刻他的主要目的是参悟天人演武图上的武学。

0020.en: After this attempt succeeded, he started to feel that practicing and comprehending at the same time was still a bit troublesome. He simply took out his phone and tried to study his textbooks on it while looking at the diagram.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 这一次尝试成功之后，他又开始觉得一边练功一边参悟还是麻烦了点，干脆拿出手机，尝试一边刷手机中的教材，一边看天人演武图行不行。

0020.en: Finding that studying from his phone was also fine, he played the textbook audio out loud, listening to the content while comprehending the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 发现刷教材也没问题，他干脆公放手机中的教材，听着教材内容的同时参悟天人演武图。

0020.en: Watching Zhang Yu cultivating, practicing martial arts, and studying, Li Xuelian sighed with genuine feeling, "This child must have an incredibly strict teacher behind him, pushing him to work so hard that it has gradually become a figure of immense fear in his heart."
0020.speaker: 李雪莲
0020.cn: 李雪莲看着张羽又是吐纳，又是练武，又是学习的模样，由衷感叹道：“此子的背后必然有着一位无比严酷的老师，一路逼迫着他用功，甚至渐渐成为了他心中无比恐惧的一个形象。”

0020.en: "Next, we'll see if he can break through mentally under all this pressure..."
0020.speaker: 李雪莲
0020.cn: “接下来就看他在层层重压之下，能否以思想去突破……”

0020.en: But before Li Xuelian could finish her sentence, Zhang Yu walked away from the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram, went straight to the buffet table, grabbed a large plate of seafood, and returned to the diagram to eat while comprehending.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 却见李雪莲话音未落，张羽竟然远离了天人演武图，直接跑到自助餐餐桌前，拿了一大盘海鲜，再次回到天人演武图前开始边吃边参悟。

0020.en: He had suddenly remembered that eating was probably something the ritual wouldn't prevent.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 因为他突然想起来吃东西应该也是仪式所不会阻拦的。

0020.en: Watching this scene, Li Xuelian was slightly surprised. "Oh? Such a quick breakthrough. Under all that pressure, has he adopted a mindset of slacking off? Only then can one face the terror in their heart and continue to comprehend the martial arts in the diagram."
0020.speaker: 李雪莲
0020.cn: 而看着这一幕的李雪莲微微惊讶道：“噢？突破的好快，在层层压迫下，直接立下了摆烂思想吗？这才能直面心中惊怖，继续参悟演武图中的武学。”

0020.en: "Perhaps he hasn't even realized it himself, but he has already overcome the fear in his heart and passed this test of the martial diagram. All his actions are now normal."
0020.speaker: 李雪莲
0020.cn: “也许连他自己都未有发现，在不知不觉间，他已经战胜了心中恐惧，过了演武图的这一关考验，一切行动如常了。”

0020.en: Seeing a security guard about to approach Zhang Yu to stop him, Li Xuelian waved her hand, dismissing him. She was now quite curious to see how much Zhang Yu could comprehend from the diagram.
0020.speaker: 李雪莲
0020.cn: 看到有保安想要上前阻止张羽，李雪莲摆了摆手，挥退了对方，她现在倒是挺好奇张羽能从演武图上参悟出多少的。

0020.en: As Zhang Yu ate lobster while looking at the martial diagram, he gradually began to see clearly what kind of martial art the figure was performing.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 而一边吃着龙虾，一边看向演武图的张羽，此刻也渐渐看清楚了那人影在打什么武功了。

0020.en: "It looks like a set of fist techniques?"
0020.speaker: 张羽
0020.cn: “好像是一套拳法？”

0020.en: The fist technique itself wasn't complicated. Zhang Yu had a rough idea after watching it a few times, but when he looked at his Feather Book, he saw no change. Clearly, he hadn't truly learned this martial art, let alone mastered it.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 拳法本身并不复杂，张羽看了几遍后就隐隐有了一个概念，但当他看向自己的羽书时，却发现上面没有丝毫变化，显然他并没有真正学到这套武功，更遑论练成了。

0020.en: Based on his experience learning the high school's basic swordplay and the Circulatory Qi-Gathering Method, a martial art like this should have appeared as level 0 in his Feather Book after watching it just once.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 按照他学习高中基础剑法、周天采气法的经历，类似这种武学他应该是看上一遍就能在羽书上显示一个0级的才对。

0020.en: "What's wrong?"
0020.speaker: 张羽
0020.cn: “是哪里不对？”

0020.en: Just then, Lian Tianji let out a loud laugh, his face full of confidence as he said, "I have completely understood the martial art within. It is indeed an exquisite palm technique."
0020.speaker: 炼天极
0020.cn: 就在这时，便听炼天极大笑一声，满脸自信地说道：“其中的武学我已经尽数参透，果然是一门精妙掌法。”

0020.en: But before he finished speaking, Qian Shen, not far away, spoke up, "What palm technique? It's clearly a leg technique."
0020.speaker: 钱深
0020.cn: 哪知道话音未落，不远处的钱深便开口说道：“什么掌法？这其中分明是一门腿法。”

0020.en: Normally, Qian Shen, with a total score of 600, would never dare to speak loudly in front of someone with a score of 670.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 若换作平时，总分600的钱深是必然不敢在总分670面前大声说话的。

0020.en: But having just been tested by the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram, Qian Shen was at his boldest.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 但此刻刚刚经过天人演武图的一番道心磨砺，正是钱深胆子最大的时候。

0020.en: Their words soon drew opposition from others.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 而两人的这番话很快引起了其他人的反对。

0020.en: Someone argued, "No, no, the art hidden in the diagram is clearly a saber technique."
0020.speaker: 陌生男1
0020.cn: 有人争辩道：“不对不对，演武图中藏着的分明是一套刀法才对。”

0020.en: Someone else began to mock everyone indiscriminately: "A bunch of blind fools. It's obviously a finger technique."
0020.speaker: 陌生男2
0020.cn: 有人开始了无差别嘲讽：“一群瞎子，那分明是一套指法。”

0020.en: Bai Zhenzhen frowned slightly. What she saw was a sword art.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 白真真微微皱起了眉头，她眼前所见的却是一门剑术。

0020.en: Apparently, while Zhang Yu was eating and comprehending, more and more students had completed their understanding of the martial diagram.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 显然，就在张羽边吃边参悟的时候，已经有越来越多学生都已经完成了演武图上的参悟。

0020.en: Lian Tianji, hearing the discussion, simply turned his gaze to Li Xuelian and asked, "Ms. Li, I wonder what kind of martial art is hidden in this diagram?"
0020.speaker: 炼天极
0020.cn: 而炼天极听着众人的讨论，干脆将目光看向了李雪莲，问道：“李女士，不知道这演武图中隐藏的到底是一套什么武功？”

0020.en: Seeing that everyone was looking at her, Li Xuelian simply smiled and said, "As for what specific martial art it is, I have no comment."
0020.speaker: 李雪莲
0020.cn: 看着在场众人都望了过来，李雪莲却是微微一笑，说道：“具体是什么武功，我无可奉告。”

0020.en: "But let me give you all a hint. The diagram has its own mysteries. If anyone here masters the martial art within, there will be a clear sign."
0020.speaker: 李雪莲
0020.cn: “不过提醒诸位一点，演武图中自有玄妙。在场若是有人练成了其中武学，其中也自有明示。”

0020.en: Everyone understood. This meant that if someone mastered the martial art in the diagram, a prompt would naturally appear on it.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 众人明白了，这意思是在场谁要练成演武图中的武功，这演武图自然会有提示浮现。

0020.en: Thinking of this, Lian Tianji stepped forward without hesitation.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 想到这里，炼天极当仁不让走到最前面。

0020.en: Lian Tianji from Ziyun High School already possessed the absolute confidence of a prodigy.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 来自紫云高中的炼天极本就有着作为天之骄子的绝对自信。

0020.en: And after the trial just now, his self-confidence had swelled to a peak. The moment he struck, he unleashed the palm technique he had just comprehended from the diagram.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 而在经过了刚刚的考验后，他的自信心更是膨胀到了一种巅峰状态，此刻一出手便施展起了那一套他刚刚从演武图中参悟的掌法。

0020.en: As he moved, the sound of wind and thunder erupted, and a surging force and killing intent burst from his body, as if he were about to blast the entire exhibition hall away.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 便看到他出手之间，阵阵风雷之声响起，澎湃的劲力、杀意从体内爆发出来，似要将整个画展都轰飞出去。

0020.en: From a distance, Zhao Tianxing had been watching the results here. Seeing this scene, he was struck with amazement.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 远处的赵天行一直在观察这边的结果，此刻看到这一幕，心中涌起一阵惊叹。

0020.en: "Such high physical strength, such a terrifying palm technique. This is a killing art for combat."
0020.speaker: 赵天行
0020.cn: “好高的肉体强度，好恐怖的掌法，这是一套作战用的杀伐武学。”

0020.en: However, while Lian Tianji's physical strength was impressive for a first-year high school student, many cultivators present had graduated long ago. They were more surprised by the proficiency with which Lian Tianji executed the technique.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 不过炼天极的肉体强度在高一之中算得上厉害，但在场却多的是早已高中毕业的修仙者，他们此刻更惊讶的却是炼天极所施展出来的这套武学之熟练。

0020.en: Someone thought in amazement, "Is that really the palm technique he just comprehended from the diagram? Every move is so polished. The top student from Ziyun High School is truly a genius among geniuses."
0020.speaker: 陌生男3
0020.cn: 有人心中惊叹：“这真的是他刚刚从演武图上参悟出来的掌法？这一招一式都都如此纯熟，紫云高中的高材生果然是天才中的天才。”

0020.en: But after Lian Tianji finished performing the entire palm technique, the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram remained motionless, without any reaction.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 但是当炼天极施展完这一套掌法之后，那天人演武图上却是一动未动，没有丝毫反应。

0020.en: "How is that possible?" Lian Tianji said in disbelief. "I've clearly mastered the martial art from the diagram, how can it not work?"
0020.speaker: 炼天极
0020.cn: “怎么可能？”炼天极不信道：“我明明已经练成了图上武学，怎么可能不行？”

0020.en: Qian Shen chuckled and walked up, standing before Lian Tianji. "I told you, it's a leg technique."
0020.speaker: 钱深
0020.cn: 钱深嘿嘿一笑，却是走了上去，来到了炼天极的面前：“我早就说了，这是一套腿法。”

0020.en: He then performed the martial art he had comprehended from the diagram. Although he wasn't as fluid as Lian Tianji, his execution of the moves was already well-practiced.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 接下来他也在演武图前施展出那一套他从图中领悟的武学，虽然不如炼天极表现的那么游刃有余，但招式施展之间，却也已经是驾轻就熟。

0020.en: Bai Zhenzhen watched this, her brow furrowing again. "This is a body-refining martial art? Specifically for training the legs."
0020.speaker: 白真真
0020.cn: 白真真看着这一幕，眉头却又是一皱：“这是一套炼体武学？专门用来练腿的。”

0020.en: And as Qian Shen finished his final move, the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram still remained motionless, showing no sign of change.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 而随着钱深最后一招施展完毕，天人演武图中仍旧是一动未动，不见丝毫异样。

0020.en: "How is that possible?"
0020.speaker: 钱深
0020.cn: “怎么可能？”

0020.en: Repeating the same words as Lian Tianji, Qian Shen also stared at the martial diagram in disbelief.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 和炼天极说出了一样的话，钱深也同样难以置信地看着演武图。

0020.en: Following him, students continuously came forward to demonstrate the martial arts they had comprehended.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 而接下来不断有学生上前展示一番自身所参悟出来的武功。

0020.en: Including Lian Tianji and Qian Shen, 12 students successively demonstrated a total of nine different martial arts: fist, palm, leg, finger, claw, saber, sword, spear, and staff.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 包括炼天极、钱深在内的12名学生，先后展现了拳、掌、腿、指、爪、刀、剑、枪、棍一共九套武学。

0020.en: Three of them had comprehended martial arts that were repeats of what others had shown.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 其中有3人参悟出来的武学与其他人有着重复。

0020.en: But after this series of demonstrations, not a single one could trigger a reaction from the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 但在这轮番演武之后，却始终没有一人能引起天人演武图的反应。

0020.en: Lian Tianji couldn't help but turn to Li Xuelian and ask again, "Ms. Li, with so many of us, has really no one succeeded?"
0020.speaker: 炼天极
0020.cn: 炼天极忍不住转头看向李雪莲，再次问道：“李女士，我们这么多人，真就没有一人成功吗？”

0020.en: Li Xuelian didn't answer, only shaking her head slightly, a hint of disappointment in her eyes.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 李雪莲也不答话，只是微微摇了摇头，眼中似乎有失望之色。

0020.en: Just then, Bai Zhenzhen slowly walked up. Under everyone's gaze, she used her fingers as a sword and performed a set of sword techniques.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 就在这时，白真真缓缓走了上去，在众人的注视下以指代剑，演练起了一套剑法。

0020.en: Although the swordplay was incomparably sharp and Bai Zhenzhen's every move could be called masterful, the crowd lost interest after a few glances.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 虽然这套剑法施展之间锋锐无双，白真真的一招一式也称得上是登堂入室，但在场众人看了几眼便已经不再关注。

0020.en: After all, two others had already demonstrated sword techniques without causing any change in the martial diagram.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 毕竟此前上前演练武学，施展剑法的也有两位，并未能引起演武图的变化。

0020.en: But who would have thought that after finishing the swordplay, Bai Zhenzhen's style would suddenly change, and she would use her hand as a saber, performing a set of saber techniques.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 但哪知道白真真施展完这套剑法之后，竟是画风一变，又以手代刀，施展出一套刀法来。

0020.en: Then came fist techniques, palm techniques, leg techniques...
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 然后是拳法、掌法、腿法……

0020.en: Zhao Tianxing said in surprise, "Did Bai Zhenzhen learn all the martial arts everyone just demonstrated?"
0020.speaker: 赵天行
0020.cn: 赵天行惊讶道：“白真真把之前大家演练的武学都学会了？”

0020.en: Lian Tianji frowned at the scene, thinking, "In such a short time, she can replicate everyone's demonstrated techniques just by watching once. Which key high school is this top student from?"
0020.speaker: 炼天极
0020.cn: 炼天极皱眉看着这一幕，心道：“这么短短时间内，竟然看了一遍就能把所有人演示的武功都打出来，这女人又是哪个重点高中的学霸？”

0020.en: Watching Bai Zhenzhen, who moved as if she had practiced for a long time, Qian Shen's mind was also in turmoil.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 看着一招一式如同已经苦练许久的白真真，钱深同样心中思绪翻涌。

0020.en: On the one hand, he was amazed that Bai Zhenzhen could perform all nine martial arts. On the other hand, a question kept rising in his mind: "Will performing all nine martial arts that everyone comprehended really work?"
0020.speaker: 钱深
0020.cn: 一方面是惊叹于白真真竟然能将那一共九套武学都打出来，另一方面则是心中不断涌起疑惑：“把所有人参悟出来的九套武学都打出来，真就能行吗？”

0020.en: Just then, to the astonishment of the crowd, the man in the Heavenly Being Martial Diagram moved. He looked at Bai Zhenzhen with a smile in his eyes, and two words appeared on the scroll.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 就在这时，在众人惊讶的目光之中，天人演武图上的男人动了起来，竟然是目光含笑地看向白真真，在画卷上泛起两个字。

0020.en: Not bad.
0020.speaker: Narration
0020.cn: 不错。

0021.en: Chapter 21: Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 第21章 天武炼心

0021.en: Seeing these words, many students were startled, thinking that Bai Zhenzhen had succeeded.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 看到这番话，在场众多学生都吓了一跳，以为白真真成功了。

0021.en: But Li Xuelian sighed, looked at Bai Zhenzhen, and said, "To be able to learn the moves of these nine martial arts by yourself in such a short time, your talent is one in ten thousand."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: 却听李雪莲叹息一声，看向白真真说道：“能以一人之力，短短时间内学会这九门武功的招式，你的天赋资质已是万中无一。”

0021.en: "It's just a pity that you still fall a little short of my father's requirements."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: “只可惜距离家父的要求，终究还是差上了一些。”

0021.en: Hearing this, some of the students present breathed a sigh of relief, while others were secretly surprised.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 听到这番话，在场的众多学生有人松了一口气，也有人暗暗吃惊。

0021.en: Zhao Tianxing thought to himself, "This still doesn't meet the requirements? Just how powerful of a disciple does this Master Xinghuo want?"
0021.speaker: 赵天行
0021.cn: 赵天行心道：“这都没达到要求？这星火真人到底想要个多厉害的徒弟？”

0021.en: On the other side, Bai Zhenzhen secretly breathed a sigh of relief.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 另一边的白真真则是心中暗暗松了一口气。

0021.en: She hadn't expected to trigger the change in the Martial Arts Diagram so suddenly. She thought she had succeeded and, in a moment of panic, almost spoke up to refuse Master Xinghuo's offer.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 她刚刚也没想到一举便引动了演武图的变化，还以为此事成了，差点心里一急，就想要开口拒绝掉星火真人收徒的事情。

0021.en: Bai Zhenzhen thought to herself, "Good thing I didn't say it, or I would have been so embarrassed. I knew something was missing."
0021.speaker: 白真真
0021.cn: 白真真心中暗道：“还好没说出来，不然丢脸丢大了。我就说好像还差了点什么的。”

0021.en: After Bai Zhenzhen's attempt, others went up to try and practice the nine sets of martial arts, but no one could trigger a change in the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Diagram again.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 而在白真真这番动作后，也有人上前尝试着将那九套武功分别演练一番，却再也没有引动天人演武图的变化。

0021.en: On the contrary, Lian Tianji, who had been overflowing with confidence, hesitated to go up and try again. He seemed to be pondering the reason for Bai Zhenzhen's failure, wondering what they were all missing.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 反倒是一直都信心膨胀的炼天极，却是迟迟没有再次上去尝试，似乎在思索着白真真失败的原因，他们到底还差了什么东西。

0021.en: For a moment, the entire scene fell silent. Unconsciously, no one else went forward to try.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 一时间，整个现场安静了下来，不知不觉已经没有人再上前尝试了。

0021.en: Just as Li Xuelian was thinking that this was the end of it, she saw Zhang Yu walk up with his phone.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 就在李雪莲感叹到此为止的时候，却见张羽拿着手机走了上去。

0021.en: "Hm?" Li Xuelian suddenly became interested, thinking to herself, "After seeing so many people fail, he still has the confidence to go up. It seems he's certain about something."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: “嗯？”李雪莲一下子感兴趣起来，心道：“见了这么多人的失败，他还有信心上去，看来是有什么把握了。”

0021.en: But the next moment, she couldn't help but frown.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 但下一刻，她忍不住皱起了眉头。

0021.en: Because Zhang Yu actually started playing a video on his phone, and began to practice the martial arts by copying Bai Zhenzhen's movements from the video.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 因为张羽竟然开始播放手机视频，照着视频中白真真的样子来演练武学。

0021.en: Apparently, he had just recorded Bai Zhenzhen practicing the martial arts.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 显然他刚刚把白真真演练武学的样子都拍下来了。

0021.en: And seeing Zhang Yu copying the video, move for move, Li Xuelian's frown deepened.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 而看到张羽照着视频，一招一式打出来的样子，李雪莲的眉头忍不住皱得更深了。

0021.en: It was clear that besides the fist technique he had understood himself, Zhang Yu was unfamiliar with the other eight martial arts. Although he was copying Bai Zhenzhen's movements from the video, it only highlighted the gap in their understanding of the techniques.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 显然张羽除了自己参悟的拳法之外，对另外八套武功都较为生疏，此刻虽然照着视频中白真真的动作依样画葫芦，却更展现出两人各自对这八套武功招式理解上的差距。

0021.en: From a distance, Zhao Tianxing watched Zhang Yu in his security guard uniform, clumsily imitating Bai Zhenzhen's moves under everyone's gaze. He felt his skin crawl, so embarrassed that his toes could carve out a three-bedroom apartment.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 远处的赵天行看着张羽穿着保安服，在众人注视下邯郸学步般模仿着白真真的动作，只觉得头皮发麻，脚趾头都要抠出三室一厅来。

0021.en: Just by watching, he could feel the looks from the crowd seemed to be full of contempt and ridicule. He couldn't imagine how the person actually standing there, doing that, must feel.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 光是这么看着，他就感觉众人看向张羽的目光里好似充满了轻蔑和嘲笑，他难以想象真正站在那个位置，做着这件事情的本人会是什么感觉。

0021.en: "Stop it, Zhang Yu!" Zhao Tianxing couldn't bear to watch anymore and just shouted in his mind, "This is too embarrassing, you're being seen as a clown!"
0021.speaker: 赵天行
0021.cn: “快停下啊张羽！”赵天行不忍再看，只在心中大喊道：“太丢人了，你已经被当成小丑了！”

0021.en: Zhang Yu, of course, couldn't hear Zhao Tianxing's thoughts, nor did he care what the people in the art gallery thought of him now.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 张羽自然不可能听到赵天行的想法，也不在意画展场地里的这些人现在怎么看他。

0021.en: He just seriously practiced the nine martial arts, move by move, following Bai Zhenzhen's actions in the video.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 他只是认认真真，照着视频里白真真的动作一招一式将九门武学一一演练了一番。

0021.en: As he finished the last move, countless experiences and feelings suddenly flooded his mind, giving Zhang Yu an instant, different understanding of the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Diagram, as if he had practiced it tens of thousands of times.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 而随着他最后一招打完，无数的经验、感觉骤然涌入了他的脑海之中，让张羽瞬间对天人演武图有了不同的理解，就好像是打了几万遍一样。

0021.en: At this moment, the moves of the nine martial arts gradually faded from his mind, replaced by nine different intents faintly appearing.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 这一刻，九门武功的招式在他的脑海中逐渐消失，取而代之的是九种不同的意念在他的脑海中若隐若现。

0021.en: At this moment, Zhang Yu suddenly understood that the nine martial arts on the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Diagram were about intent, not moves.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 这一刻的张羽陡然明白了过来，天人演武图上的九门武功重的是意念，而非招式。

0021.en: What a cultivator had to do was to grasp the artistic conception within each move while practicing the martial arts.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 修炼者要做的是在修炼武功的同时，在那一招一式中，揣摩其意境。

0021.en: The killing intent to break an army, the unyielding fighting spirit, the dauntless courage... The nine martial arts cultivated martial intent to strengthen one's Dao Heart.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 击破万军的杀意、九死不悔的斗志、一往无前的气魄……九门武功，培养的是武道意念，以此来坚固自己的道心。

0021.en: "This isn't a martial art for combat or body refining, but one that uses martial intent to temper the Dao Heart."
0021.speaker: 张羽
0021.cn: “这不是一门战斗或者炼体的武学，而是一门以武道意念来淬炼道心的武学。”

0021.en: This was a martial art technique used to raise the level of the Dao Heart!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 这是一门用来提升道心等级的武道心法！

0021.en: Martial intent was the collective term used by the Ten Great Sects for the powers of sword intent, fist intent, saber intent, and so on.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 武道意念，是十大宗门经过梳理之后，对剑意、拳意、刀意等等武道力量的统称。

0021.en: The most basic function of martial intent was to strengthen the spirit and fortify one's will, thereby raising a cultivator's Dao Heart level.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 武道意念最基本的作用，是可以强壮精神，坚固自身的意志，以此提升修行者的道心等级。

0021.en: And for a Golden Core Master like Master Xinghuo, their martial intent could even remain in a painting and influence the consciousness of others.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 而像星火真人这样的金丹真人，其武道意念甚至能留在画中，影响他人的精神意识。

0021.en: At the same time, a strong change occurred in Zhang Yu's aura.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 与此同时，张羽身上的气质也随着产生了一种强烈的变化。

0021.en: Killing intent, fighting spirit, courage, valor... A powerful aura emerged from his body, as if about to condense into his own martial intent at any moment.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 杀意、斗志、气魄、勇武……一股股无比强悍的气质从他体内浮现出来，似乎就要在这一刻一口气凝练为他的武道意念。

0021.en: Meanwhile, the man in the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Diagram became clearer and clearer, even gradually taking on vivid colors, as if turning into a real person, staring intently at the changes in Zhang Yu.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 与此同时，天人演武图上的男子也变得越来越清晰，甚至渐渐出现了鲜艳的色彩，如同是变成了一个真正的人一般，紧紧盯着张羽身上的变化。

0021.en: The people present who noticed this were also shocked; this was definitely the biggest reaction from the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Diagram today.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 发现这一点的在场众人也惊了，这绝对是今天天人演武图反应最大的一次。

0021.en: Lian Tianji, Qian Shen, Bai Zhenzhen... all stared intently at Zhang Yu. They all felt the change in him, and the same unbelievable thought arose in their minds.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 炼天极、钱深、白真真……全都紧紧盯着张羽，他们也全都感觉到了张羽身上的变化，脑海中升起同一个不可思议的想法。

0021.en: "Is he really going to succeed?"
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: “他真要成了？”

0021.en: But the next moment, the change in Zhang Yu was abruptly cut off, and the martial intent that seemed about to condense a moment ago dissipated completely.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 可就在下一刻，张羽身上的变化陡然间被彻底打断，刚刚好像还要凝聚出来的武道意念也在这一刻消散一空。

0021.en: "What a pity, what a pity." A sentence appeared on the painting: "A peerless talent, but one step short."
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: “可惜可惜。”画上浮现出一句话来：“天纵之资，棋差一招。”

0021.en: There was no surprise on Zhang Yu's face.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 张羽的脸上却没有什么意外之色。

0021.en: Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art Level 0 (1/1, 8.3/8 Mana, 0.85/0.8 Physical Strength, 1/3 Dao Heart)
0021.speaker: 旁白

0021.en: A martial art called the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art appeared in the Feather Book.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 只见羽书之上浮现着一门唤作天武炼心诀的武功。

0021.en: This was the martial art that appeared in the Feather Book after Zhang Yu repeatedly studied the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Diagram, carefully watched the other students' performances, and recorded and reviewed Bai Zhenzhen's video.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 这是张羽在反复参悟天人演武图，仔细观看了众多学生的演武，又录下白真真的视频反复揣摩后，最终羽书上才浮现出来的武功。

0021.en: Unlike the martial arts Zhang Yu had learned before, this Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art had requirements for mana, physical strength, and Dao Heart.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 而和以前张羽学习的武功不同，这门天武炼心诀在法力、肉体强度和道心上都有着要求。

0021.en: "Besides practicing all the moves like the fist, palm, and leg techniques, it also requires 8 mana, 0.8 physical strength, and a level 3 Dao Heart."
0021.speaker: 张羽
0021.cn: “除了要把这拳法、掌法、腿法等等招式都统统练一遍之外，还要求8的法力，0.8级的肉体强度，以及3级的道心。”

0021.en: "I've met all the other requirements, except for the level 3 Dao Heart..."
0021.speaker: 张羽
0021.cn: “其他我都已经满足了要求，唯有这3级的道心……”

0021.en: My own Dao Heart is only at level 1.
0021.speaker: 张羽
0021.cn: 张羽自己的道心也不过1级罢了。

0021.en: As expected, this attempt got stuck at the final step.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 如此尝试一番，果然卡在了最后一步。

0021.en: "This Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art seems to be a technique for after reaching Dao Heart level 3, used to condense martial intent and then use that to strengthen the will and temper the Dao Heart."
0021.speaker: 张羽
0021.cn: “这门天武炼心诀，目前看来是道心3级之后，用来凝练武道意念，以武道意念坚固意志，淬炼道心的武功。”

0021.en: Zhang Yu thought to himself, "A requirement of Dao Heart level 3 is so high. How could a first-year high school student who's only been in school for three months achieve that?"
0021.speaker: 张羽
0021.cn: 张羽心中暗道：“3级道心这么高的要求，根本不是开学3个月的高一学生能达到的吧？”

0021.en: Looking at the failed Zhang Yu, Li Xuelian's eyes were shining brightly.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 李雪莲看着失败的张羽，双眼之中却是异彩连连。

0021.en: Her original plan flashed through her mind; she hadn't expected any of these first-year students to succeed in the first place.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 心中闪过原本的打算，她本来就没指望在场这些高一学生能成功。

0021.en: "According to the information just sent from the security company, this person is Zhang Yu, a first-year student at Songyang High School."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: “从刚刚保安公司送来的资料看，这人是嵩阳高中的高一学生张羽。”

0021.en: "For this person to get this far, he can truly be called a peerless talent."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: “此人能做到这一步，真正称得上是天纵之资了。”

0021.en: Recalling Zhang Yu's performance just now, she thought with emotion, "Amazing, I almost misjudged him."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: 回想着张羽刚刚的表现，她心中感慨道：“厉害，我都差点看走眼了。”

0021.en: "His moves looked stiff, and every punch and kick was awkward, yet he was able to grasp the intent within."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: “这人看上去招式僵硬，一拳一脚都歪歪扭扭，最终却能领悟其中蕴含的意念。”

0021.en: "This means he values intent over form and saw the mystery of the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art early on."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: “说明是他重意不重招，早早就看出了天人炼心诀的奥妙之处。”

0021.en: "Good, good, good. Father will have another great disciple under his wing."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: “好好好，父亲门下又能添一高徒了。”

0021.en: In fact, as soon as Li Xuelian had checked the background of the participants, she felt that no one would likely succeed in this test.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 其实早在李雪莲查了一下现场参与者的资料后，她就感觉这次的测试恐怕无人能成功了。

0021.en: After all, students who could master the martial arts in the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Diagram on the spot were either from prominent families or were already in their second or third year of high school and had already been signed to contracts. It was unlikely they would come to become Master Xinghuo's disciple.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 毕竟能当场练成天人演武图中武学的学生，要么家世显赫，要么已经是高二高三，早就被签下了合同，都不太可能过来拜师星火真人。

0021.en: The possibility of finding a genius who could master the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art on the spot was extremely small.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 想要找到能当场练成天武炼心诀的天才，本就可能性极小。

0021.en: But that didn't mean no one could become her father's disciple.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 但这不代表没人能拜入他父亲门下了。

0021.en: If any of the first-year students present could withstand the impact of the martial intent, learn all the moves on the spot, and comprehend the mystery of the martial intent from them, then even if they couldn't master it in the end, they were definitely a genius of outstanding talent.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 若是现场的高一学生之中，有人能顶住武道意念的冲击，当场学会所有招式，并从中体悟出武道意念的奥妙，那就算最后练不成，也绝对是天赋卓绝的天才人物。

0021.en: If such a person came a year later, they would certainly be able to master the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art and would also meet her father's requirements. Now, it was like finding them a year early, before they had fully developed and signed a contract.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 这种人物若是晚一年过来的话，必然能练成天武炼心诀，同样也符合他父亲的要求，现在等于是提前一年，趁着对方还没成长起来签下合同的时候，就找到了对方。

0021.en: She believed her father would definitely be willing to accept such an excellent disciple.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 她相信父亲也一定愿意收下这么一名优秀的弟子。

0021.en: In that case, the fact that this first-year student couldn't master the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art wouldn't be a drawback. Instead, it would be more beneficial for Li Xuelian to press the price down a bit when negotiating the contract.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 那样的话，这位高一学生练不成天武炼心诀不但不会是缺点，反而更有利于接下来签合同时，李雪莲向对方稍稍压一压价。

0021.en: Thinking of this, she was already smiling at Zhang Yu.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 想到这里，她已经向着张羽笑了起来。

0021.en: "Young man, although you didn't truly master the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art, you have already understood its mystery. Mastering this martial art is only a matter of time for you."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: “这位同学，你虽然没能真正练成天武炼心诀，但却已经参透其中奥妙，假以时日练成这门武学也不过是时间问题。”

0021.en: "I will ask my father in a moment to see if he is willing to accept you as his disciple."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: “我一会便问一问家父，看他愿不愿意收你为弟子。”

0021.en: Hearing this, the crowd was once again in shock.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 听到这话，现场众人又是一阵震惊。

0021.en: Lian Tianji looked towards Zhang Yu and secretly took a photo of him with his phone. He wanted to ask someone to find out who this powerful security guard was that had appeared out of nowhere.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 炼天极看向张羽的方向，打开手机便朝着张羽偷偷拍了一张照，他要找人问问这保安到底又是哪里横空出世的猛人。

0021.en: Qian Shen looked at Zhang Yu in disbelief, shouting wildly in his mind, "Impossible! How could a person with a score of 550 be accepted as a disciple by a Golden Core Master? I must be dreaming. Is the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Diagram still testing me!"
0021.speaker: 钱深
0021.cn: 钱深不可思议地看着张羽，心中狂喊道：“不可能！550分的人怎么可能被金丹真人收徒？我一定是在做梦，是不是天人演武图还在考验我！”

0021.en: Bai Zhenzhen: "Is Yu... cheating?"
0021.speaker: 白真真
0021.cn: 白真真：“羽子这是……开挂了？”

0021.en: Discovering that his good friend, who used to be inferior to him in every way and was in debt with him, had suddenly soared, Bai Zhenzhen felt very uncomfortable.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 发现原本样样不如自己，和自己一起四处欠债的好兄弟竟然一飞冲天了，白真真一下子就感觉非常不适应。

0021.en: Yu, it's not that I don't wish you well. If you got into the top ten or top five in the grade, higher than before but lower than me, I would definitely congratulate you.
0021.speaker: 白真真
0021.cn: 羽子啊，不是不盼着你好，你考个年级前十，年级前五，比以前高，比我低，那兄弟一定祝福你。

0021.en: But you had to surpass everyone, including me.
0021.speaker: 白真真
0021.cn: 谁让你镇压群雄，连我也超了。

0021.en: However, seeing the people around him trying to get close to Zhang Yu, Bai Zhenzhen thought to herself, "After Zhang Yu signs with a Golden Core Master, he'll definitely be able to get a lot of investment. I have to fleece him for all he's worth and borrow money from him."
0021.speaker: 白真真
0021.cn: 不过看着四周围人上前交好张羽的样子，白真真心中暗道：“张羽签在金丹真人门下以后，肯定能拉不少投资，到时候一定要狠狠薅他羊毛，找他借钱。”

0021.en: But the next moment, another thought occurred to her, and she frowned: "But half of this Golden Core Master's cultivation was taken away, and he was laid off by a major sect. He has no resources and no background. If Zhang Yu really becomes his disciple, he'll be a workhorse for life."
0021.speaker: 白真真
0021.cn: 但下一刻，她又是转念一想，眉头皱起：“不过这金丹修为都被收走了一半，还被大宗门优化了，要资源没资源，要背景没背景，张羽若真是拜入门下，可真是要当一辈子牛马了。”

0021.en: "Never mind, never mind. We're brothers. I should still remind him not to be blinded by the words 'Golden Core' and tell him to refuse the offer."
0021.speaker: 白真真
0021.cn: “算了算了，兄弟一场，我还是提醒提醒他，不要被金丹两个字晃花了眼，让他一定要拒了对方。”

0021.en: On the other side, Zhao Tianxing's eyes widened, his mind a complete blank. But soon he remembered how he had tried to persuade Zhang Yu, and he felt a wave of embarrassment, "So embarrassing."
0021.speaker: 赵天行
0021.cn: 另一边，赵天行更是瞪大了眼睛，脑海中一片空白，但很快想到自己刚刚劝说张羽的模样，心中一阵尴尬：“太丢人了。”

0021.en: "He's a real genius, and when I was saying those things to him, he must have thought I was a clown."
0021.speaker: 赵天行
0021.cn: “人家是真正的天才啊，我在他面前说那些话的时候，他一定把我当小丑了吧。”

0021.en: Just as Bai Zhenzhen was walking towards Zhang Yu, many other students also gathered around.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 就在白真真走向张羽的时候，四周围也有许多学生围了过去。

0021.en: Some wanted to add Zhang Yu's contact information, some wanted to ask him about the mysteries of the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Diagram, and others wanted to take a photo with him.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 有人想要加张羽联系方式的，有人想要问他天人演武图中奥妙的，还有人想要和他拍照留影的。

0021.en: Meanwhile, Li Xuelian had already stepped aside to call her father.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 与此同时，李雪莲已经来到一旁，给父亲打了电话。

0021.en: "Dad, I've found a good prospect here in Songyang City..."
0021.speaker: 李雪莲
0021.cn: “爹，我在嵩阳市这边找到了一个好苗子……”

0022.en: Chapter 22: The Contract
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 第22章 合同

0022.en: After Li Xuelian explained Zhang Yu's situation, a soft laugh came from the other end of the phone.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 李雪莲将张羽的情况说了一遍后，却听电话另一头传来一阵轻笑。

0022.en: "He is indeed good, but there's no need to accept him."
0022.speaker: 星火真人
0022.cn: “确实不错，但不用收他了。”

0022.en: Li Xuelian asked in confusion, "Why?"
0022.speaker: 李雪莲
0022.cn: 李雪莲疑惑道：“为什么？”

0022.en: Master Xinghuo laughed heartily, his voice full of joy, "I've already found a true genius."
0022.speaker: 星火真人
0022.cn: 星火真人哈哈大笑了起来，语气之中满是欣喜：“我已经找到了真正的天才。”

0022.en: "Also a first-year high school student, only 15 years old, and he mastered the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art in just half an hour."
0022.speaker: 星火真人
0022.cn: “同样是高一，才15岁，只花了半个小时就练成了天武炼心诀。”

0022.en: "And he doesn't have any contracts."
0022.speaker: 星火真人
0022.cn: “身上还没有任何的合同。”

0022.en: At this point, Master Xinghuo couldn't help but laugh out loud again.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 说到这里，星火真人又忍不住地哈哈大笑起来。

0022.en: Li Xuelian said in surprise, "There's such a prodigy?"
0022.speaker: 李雪莲
0022.cn: 李雪莲惊讶道：“竟然还有这种怪胎？”

0022.en: Master Xinghuo chuckled, "I told you before, the first layer of Kunxu never lacks geniuses, only people to invest in them."
0022.speaker: 星火真人
0022.cn: 星火真人呵呵笑道：“我早就跟你说了，昆仑第一层从来不缺天才，只是缺人投资他们罢了。”

0022.en: "You know how brilliant the top scorers in each subject of the college entrance exam are, as well as the overall top scorer."
0022.speaker: 星火真人
0022.cn: “像是每届高考的各科状元，还有总分状元，你应该知道那都是何等惊才绝艳之辈。”

0022.en: "But there are many such geniuses on the first layer of Kunxu every year, and another group not far behind them, popping up year after year like leeks that can't all be harvested."
0022.speaker: 星火真人
0022.cn: “但这样的天才，每年昆墟一层都有好多个，还有一群比他们差不了多少的，一年又一年地冒出来，就像是割不完的韭菜一样。”

0022.en: "There are too many geniuses. It's just that I couldn't find them in the past and was always beaten to it by others. But now, I've finally found one first."
0022.speaker: 星火真人
0022.cn: “天才太多了，只是过去的我没有找到，总是被他人捷足先登，而现在终于被我抢先一步找到了。”

0022.en: Li Xuelian glanced in Zhang Yu's direction with some regret and asked, "Shouldn't we sign this Zhang Yu as well?"
0022.speaker: 李雪莲
0022.cn: 李雪莲有些可惜地看了张羽的方向一眼，问道：“不顺便签了这个张羽吗？”

0022.en: Master Xinghuo: "Forget it. From now on, our family's resources will be invested in the true genius. Let's not divide our attention."
0022.speaker: 星火真人
0022.cn: 星火真人：“算了，接下来我们家的资源都要投在真正的天才身上，就不要分散精力了。”

0022.en: In a meeting room next to the art exhibition.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 画展一旁的会议室内。

0022.en: Li Xuelian looked at Zhang Yu with an apologetic expression and said, "I'm sorry, student. My father has other urgent matters to attend to and probably won't be able to take you as a disciple for now."
0022.speaker: 李雪莲
0022.cn: 李雪莲看着眼前的张羽，充满歉意地说道：“抱歉了这位同学，家父那边另有要事在身，恐怕暂时都无法收你为徒了。”

0022.en: She said sincerely, "However, you can use the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art freely from now on. I'll give you the usage rights as a gift."
0022.speaker: 李雪莲
0022.cn: 她一脸真诚地说道：“不过天武炼心诀你以后能放心使用，具体的使用版权由我做主送你一份。”

0022.en: Li Xuelian looked at Zhang Yu with admiration in her eyes, "Finally, I'd like to give you ten thousand yuan in my own name."
0022.speaker: 李雪莲
0022.cn: 李雪莲看向张羽的眼中满是欣赏之色：“最后，我想以我个人的名义赠送你一万块钱。”

0022.en: "Don't be in a hurry to refuse. This gift is purely out of my appreciation for your talent."
0022.speaker: 李雪莲
0022.cn: “不用急着拒绝，这份赠予纯粹是从出自我对你天赋的欣赏。”

0022.en: "I hope that by the time we meet again, you will have been admitted to a prestigious university."
0022.speaker: 李雪莲
0022.cn: “希望我们下次再见时，你已经考上了一所名牌大学。”

0022.en: "Oh, right, about those videos you recorded, they also involve the distribution rights of the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art. You'll need to delete them..."
0022.speaker: 李雪莲
0022.cn: “噢，对了，关于你录的那些视频，里面也涉及到天武炼心诀的传播版权，还需要你删除……”

0022.en: A moment later, watching Zhang Yu's departing figure, the smile on Li Xuelian's face gradually faded.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 片刻之后，看着张羽的离去的背影，李雪莲脸上的笑容也逐渐收了回来。

0022.en: Although Master Xinghuo had no intention of taking him as a disciple, Li Xuelian didn't want to make an enemy of such a talented young man.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 虽然星火真人不打算收对方为徒，但对于这种天赋不俗的少年，李雪莲也不打算主动交恶。

0022.en: After all, giving away the usage rights to the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art and ten thousand yuan was a small matter for her.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 反正天武炼心诀的使用版权也好，一万块钱也罢，对她来说都不过是举手之劳罢了。

0022.en: She couldn't even remember how many times she had given such small, casual gifts to young geniuses.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 类似这样随手在一些年轻天才身上的小馈赠，她自己都已经记不清给出过多少次了。

0022.en: However, the vast majority of them eventually faded into obscurity and were long forgotten by her.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 只不过其中绝大部分最终都泯然众人，早已经被她所遗忘了。

0022.en: After settling this matter, Li Xuelian went to meet a few more important guests, and then she couldn't wait to find her father.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 而解决完了这件事情以后，李雪莲又去见了几位重要的宾客，然后便迫不及待想要去找自己的父亲了。

0022.en: She was extremely curious about the peerless genius Master Xinghuo had mentioned.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 她对于星火真人口中的那位绝世天才实在是太好奇了。

0022.en: Meanwhile, at the art exhibition that had not yet officially ended.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 另一边，尚未正式结束的画展上。

0022.en: Bai Zhenzhen looked at Zhang Yu, who had just come out of the meeting room, and asked, "How did it go? Did you reject Master Xinghuo? Li Xuelian didn't give you a hard time, did she?"
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: 白真真看着刚刚从会议室里走出来的张羽，问道：“怎么样？拒绝星火真人了吗？李雪莲没为难你吧？”

0022.en: Zhang Yu recalled Li Xuelian's admiring expression and shook his head, "She didn't give me a hard time."
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: 张羽回想着刚刚李雪莲那副欣赏的模样，摇了摇头：“倒是没为难我。”

0022.en: "Before I could even speak, she rejected me, saying Master Xinghuo had other important matters..."
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: “我还没开口说话，她就先一步把我拒了，说是星火真人另有要事……”

0022.en: "But she did give me an extra 10,000 yuan at the end."
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: “倒是最后多给了我10000块钱。”

0022.en: Hearing Zhang Yu's words, Bai Zhenzhen curled her lip, "A standard excuse."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: 听着张羽的说法，白真真撇了撇嘴：“标准的推脱之言。”

0022.en: "Maybe she checked your background and found out you're not that outstanding after all."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “也许是她查了你的资料以后，发现你也没这么优秀。”

0022.en: "For example, your monthly test scores are too low, you have no sterilization record, your muscles aren't well-developed, and you're deep in debt..."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “比如平时月考成绩太差，又没有绝育记录，肌肉长得也不行，还欠了一屁股债……”

0022.en: Listening to Bai Zhenzhen, Zhang Yu pursed his lips, "A-Zhen, you lost and you're still not convinced, so now you're resorting to personal attacks, huh?"
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: 听着白真真说的话，张羽撇了撇嘴：“阿真，输了还不服气，开始人身攻击了是吧。”

0022.en: Seeing Zhang Yu's smug look, Bai Zhenzhen couldn't help but grab his shoulder and demand, "Are you going to tell me what kind of cheat you used or not?"
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: 看到张羽得意的模样，白真真就忍不住一抓对方的肩膀，逼问道：“你他么还不说你到底开什么挂了？”

0022.en: "Tell me now, did you borrow money to bribe the staff and study the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram in advance?!"
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “快跟我说，是不是你借钱贿赂了工作人员，提前就参悟演武图了！”

0022.en: Looking at Bai Zhenzhen's ugly, jealous expression, Zhang Yu chuckled.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 看着白真真满脸嫉妒的丑陋模样，张羽呵呵笑了起来。

0022.en: Go on, A-Zhen. Watching the pathetic state of you losers after your defeat is my current pleasure.
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: 继续呀阿真，观赏你们这些弱者败北后的丑态，就是我现在的乐趣哇。

0022.en: Just as the two were talking, Qian Shen walked over from not far away.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 就在两人交谈时，钱深也从不远处走了过来。

0022.en: He looked at Zhang Yu with a serious expression and asked, "Do you intentionally do poorly on your usual exams?"
0022.speaker: 钱深
0022.cn: 他满脸凝重地看着张羽，开口问道：“你平时考试，是不是故意考差的？”

0022.en: The trial of the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram had increased Qian Shen's resistance to high-scorers.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 天人演武图的考验，让钱深提升了对高分者的抗性。

0022.en: But he was utterly shocked that a low-scorer could outperform him.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 但对于低分者竟然能有超出他的表现，他只觉得万分震惊。

0022.en: Seeing Zhang Yu shake his head in denial, Qian Shen said, unwilling to accept it, "Impossible! If you didn't do it on purpose, why is there such a mismatch between your talent and your scores?"
0022.speaker: 钱深
0022.cn: 看到张羽摇头否认，钱深不甘道：“不可能，如果不是故意考差，你的天赋和分数为什么会如此不匹配？”

0022.en: "Hmm?" Zhang Yu thought for a moment and said, "Exams can't possibly show a person's full potential..."
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: “嗯？”张羽想了想说道：“考试也不可能完全展现出一个人的潜力吧……”

0022.en: But Qian Shen cut him off, saying excitedly, "Impossible!"
0022.speaker: 钱深
0022.cn: 钱深却是直接打断了张羽的说话，激动道：“不可能！”

0022.en: "The college entrance exam and the six major high school courses were designed by the Ten Great Sects. It's a system for evaluating high school students, verified and adjusted by countless experts and powerful individuals. It's the most optimal, scientific, and cultivation-oriented system for evaluating a person!"
0022.speaker: 钱深
0022.cn: “高考和高中六大课程是十大宗门定制，专门用来评价高中生的体系，经过无数的专家、强者来验证来调整，已经是评价一个人的最优最科学最仙道的体系！”

0022.en: "Every subject, every point, perfectly reflects the all-encompassing gap between people, including the superiority and inferiority of bloodlines, regional backwardness, and incomplete evolution..."
0022.speaker: 钱深
0022.cn: “其中的每一科，每一分，都完美体现出了人与人之间的全方位差距，包括血统上的优劣，地域上的落后，进化上的不完全……”

0022.en: Looking at Qian Shen's incredibly serious expression, Zhang Yu realized he had misjudged him before.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 看着钱深无比认真的模样，张羽发现自己以前看错了对方。

0022.en: This guy isn't just a score-discriminator, he's evolved from score-discrimination to bloodline, regional, and even racial discrimination. He's become a supporter of a score-based caste system.
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: 你小子不是个简单的分数歧视者啊，你小子是从分数歧视进化到血统歧视、地域歧视再加人种歧视，已经变成了分数种姓的拥护者了是吧。

0022.en: In short, in Qian Shen's view, a high score means you're awesome, an elite, and you have the right to feel superior and confident, while a low score means you're trash.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 总之，在钱深的表述中，分高就是牛逼，就是精英，就是可以优越可以自信，而分低就是废物垃圾。

0022.en: This was the worldview he had built over many years, the source of his confidence as a top student, and it could even be said to be the rule in all key high schools.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 这就是他多年建立的世界观，也是他一直以来作为高分学霸的信心所在，甚至可以说是所有重点高中的规则。

0022.en: "Hmph, forget it if you don't want to admit it."
0022.speaker: 钱深
0022.cn: “哼，你不愿意承认就算了。”

0022.en: "But I will report the situation here to the school. I hope you'll show your true abilities in the next monthly exam and not get an 'incompletely evolved' score like 550 again."
0022.speaker: 钱深
0022.cn: “但这里的情况我会告诉学校，希望你下次月考拿出真本事，不要再考出550这种进化不完全的分数了。”

0022.en: Watching Qian Shen walk away, Zhang Yu felt as if he had been insulted, but also as if he hadn't.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 看着钱深离去的背影，张羽只觉得自己好像被对方骂了，又好像没被对方骂。

0022.en: Beside him, Bai Zhenzhen nodded thoughtfully, "Out of all that nonsense he said, there's one thing you do need to pay attention to."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: 一旁的白真真却是若有所思地点了点头：“他说的这么多废话里，有一点你确实要注意。”

0022.en: "The school will definitely find out what happened here, and they might try to sign a contract with you."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “学校肯定会知晓这边的情况，到时候他们可能会找你签约。”

0022.en: "A contract?" Zhang Yu looked at A-Zhen curiously. He had vaguely heard about it before, but he didn't know the details.
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: “签约？”张宇好奇地看向阿真，他以前隐隐约约也听过这事，但到底是怎么个情况却终究是雾里看花。

0022.en: Bai Zhenzhen explained, "As you know, not everyone in high school is as rich as Qian Shen's family."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: 白真真解释道：“你知道的，高中里不是每个人都像钱深家那么有钱。”

0022.en: "For many students who are poor but have good grades and talent, they need someone to invest in them."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “对于很多穷但是成绩好，天赋优秀的学生来说，就需要有人投资。”

0022.en: "And the school itself is one of the investors."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “而学校本身便是投资者之一。”

0022.en: "Usually, after the second year of high school begins, they select a group of outstanding students based on their performance and grades in the first year and sign contracts with them, investing money in them."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “一般到了高二开学以后，会根据学生在高一的表现和成绩，筛选出一批优秀者签下合同，在对方身上投钱。”

0022.en: "Of course, there are a very small number of students who are so outstanding, so dazzling, that the school will discuss contracts with them during their first year to prevent others from signing them first."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “当然，也有极少数学生实在是太过优秀，太过耀眼，为了防止他们被其他人抢先签下，学校会在高一时期就找他们商量合同的事情。”

0022.en: Speaking of which, Bai Zhenzhen puffed out her chest, "Like me."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: 说到这里，白真真挺了挺胸：“比如我。”

0022.en: Zhang Yu: "Why didn't you tell me this before?"
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: 张羽：“你以前怎么没跟我说过这个？”

0022.en: Bai Zhenzhen rolled her eyes at Zhang Yu, as if to say, "Don't you know what you were like before?"
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 白真真白了张羽一眼，似乎在说你以前什么B样自己心里没点数吗？

0022.en: Bai Zhenzhen: "With your performance at the art exhibition, the school will definitely talk to you about a contract. As for whether to sign or not..."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: 白真真：“以你在画展这边的表现，学校肯定会跟你谈合同的，至于签不签嘛……”

0022.en: Seeing the conflicted look on Bai Zhenzhen's face, Zhang Yu asked, "Is it that hard to choose?"
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: 看到白真真脸上纠结的表情，张羽问道：“签不签这么难选？”

0022.en: Bai Zhenzhen sighed, "It's not that it's hard to choose. Actually, based on your personal situation, it's an easy choice."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: 白真真叹了口气：“也不能说是难选吧，其实只要根据个人的情况，签不签很好选。”

0022.en: "The difficult part is whether a person's self-perception is right or wrong."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “但难就难在一个人对自己的认知到底是对还是错了。”

0022.en: Bai Zhenzhen looked at Zhang Yu and asked seriously, "For example, what kind of cheat did you use to comprehend the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram this time?"
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: 白真真看着张羽，认真问道：“比如你这次参悟天人演武图，到底开了什么挂？”

0022.en: But halfway through, she waved her hand, "Forget it, a mother shouldn't ask about cheats. You don't have to tell me."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: 不过话说到一半，白真真又摆了摆手：“算了，母子不问挂，你也不用告诉我。”
