0022.en: "Anyway, if you're really confident that you'll get into one of the top ten universities, then don't sign this contract now."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “总之，你如果真的有十足把握，决定考十大顶尖大学的话，那现在这个合同就别签。”

0022.en: "On the other hand, if you're not confident about getting into the top ten and just want to go to a regular university, then just sign the contract as long as it's not too bad."
0022.speaker: 白真真
0022.cn: “反之，如果你没有把握考上十大，只想考个普通大学的话，那合同只要不是太坑，就直接签了吧。”

0022.en: Zhang Yu was thoughtful upon hearing this and asked a few more details about the school and the contract.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 张羽闻言，若有所思，又问了几句关于学校、合同的细节。

0022.en: After they talked for a while, someone else approached Zhang Yu. It was a charming and pretty young girl.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 就在两人交谈片刻后，又有人找到了张羽这边，却是一名娇俏可人的少女。

0022.en: "Hi, you were so cool just now. Can I have your contact information?"
0022.speaker: 武青青
0022.cn: “你好同学，你刚刚好帅，能加个联系方式吗？”

0022.en: Similar things had happened many times since Zhang Yu comprehended the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram. Even Lian Tianji from Ziyun High School had asked for his contact information.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 类似的事情，自从张羽刚刚参悟天人演武图后已经发生了许多次，就连紫云高中的炼天极也找他加了联系方式。

0022.en: Zhang Yu was gradually getting used to it. He sighed inwardly and added her.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 张羽对此已经渐渐习惯，心中感叹感叹一声，便加了对方。

0022.en: "Heh, even pretty girls are taking the initiative to contact me now?"
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: “呵呵，连美少女都来主动联系我了吗？”

0022.en: Zhang Yu asked, "Which school are you from?"
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: 张羽问道：“同学你是哪个学校的？”

0022.en: The girl replied, "I'm Wu Qingqing from Saintess College, in the honors class."
0022.speaker: 武青青
0022.cn: 对方说道：“我是圣女子学院的武青青，重点班的。”

0022.en: Zhang Yu's face suddenly stiffened. In this world of Kunxu, someone who looked like a man might not be a man, but a student in the honors class of a girls' college... must have been a man before.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 张羽脸色骤然一僵，要说在这昆墟世界里，长得像男人的未必是男人，但女子学院重点班的学生……那以前一定是男人了。

0022.en: Wu Qingqing seemed to notice the change in Zhang Yu's expression and smiled slightly, "Oh, your thinking is quite old-fashioned."
0022.speaker: 武青青
0022.cn: 武青青似乎感觉到了张羽的脸色变化，微微一笑道：“哟，你思想还挺老派的嘛。”

0022.en: "Do you think our class is full of people who took advantage of the system to get into a key high school and have terrible grades?"
0022.speaker: 武青青
0022.cn: “是不是觉得我们班里都是些占便宜考进重点高中，实际成绩一塌糊涂的人？”

0022.en: "Let me tell you, the top students in my class are no worse than you. You'll see in the next city-wide exam."
0022.speaker: 武青青
0022.cn: “我告诉你，我们班的几位顶级学霸可不会比你差，下次全市统考你就知道了。”

0022.en: Zhang Yu was speechless as he watched her walk away.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 张羽无语地看着对方离去的背影。

0022.en: Wait, is that what I was thinking about?
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: 不是，我是在想这个问题吗？

0022.en: Kunxu... in this damn place, even transgender people are judged by their scores.
0022.speaker: 张羽
0022.cn: 昆墟啊，这破地方就连变性人来了也得先看看分数高低是吧。

0022.en: "Congratulations." Zhou Tianyi walked over from the side, "Did you sign a contract with a Golden Core master?"
0022.speaker: 周天翊
0022.cn: “恭喜。”周天翊从一旁走了过来：“你跟金丹真人签约了吗？”

0022.en: Zhang Yu looked at Zhou Tianyi and suddenly remembered that he had been quite unnoticeable in front of the Celestial Martial Arts Diagram.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 张羽看着眼前的周天翊，突然想起来对方在刚刚的天人演武图前好像一直没什么存在感。

0022.en: Next, Zhang Yu continued his security guard duty, chatting with guests he knew and didn't know.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 接下来张羽一边当着保安，一边和认识的或者不认识的宾客们交流几句。

0022.en: As the security work for the day was completed, his savings increased by 1,600 and 10,000 yuan, soaring to 13,300.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 随着今天的保安工作彻底完成，他的存款也增长了1600和10000块钱，一口气暴涨到了13300。

0022.en: After paying off the remaining 5,000 yuan loan for the month, Zhang Yu, with a balance of 8,300, was finally free from worrying about debt collection, at least for now.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 将本月剩下的5000贷款也还掉后，账户余额跌落至8300的张羽总算是暂时不用担心催收的事情了。

0023.en: Chapter 23: The Talk
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 第23章 谈

0023.en: One in the morning.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 凌晨一点。

0023.en: Having finished his security guard work, Zhang Yu squeezed his way through the subway and bus to get back to his rented room in the suburbs.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 完成了保安工作的张羽正一路挤地铁坐公交，回到自己郊区的出租房去。

0023.en: As for why the subway and buses were still packed at one in the morning, it was because 1 a.m. was the evening rush hour for night shifts in Songyang City, with countless people commuting.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 至于为什么凌晨一点的公交地铁还是人挤人，自然是因为凌晨一点属于嵩阳市的夜班晚高峰，多得是上下班的人出来挤。

0023.en: Back home, he took a shower first. Zhang Yu checked his account balance, wondering if he could afford an air conditioner.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 回到家里先洗了个澡，张羽看了看账户里余额，心里想着是不是能买个空调了。

0023.en: After all, a deposit of 8,300 made him feel that his life this month was much more comfortable.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 毕竟8300的存款，让他一下子感觉到本月的生活充裕了许多。

0023.en: But thinking that next month was only two weeks away, when he would have to repay a 15,000 loan, he couldn't help but frown.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 不过想到两周后就是下个月了，到时候又要还15000的贷款，他就忍不住皱了皱眉头。

0023.en: He recalled what Bai Zhenzhen had said.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 回想起白真真说的话。

0023.en: He murmured to himself, "A contract from the school?"
0023.speaker: 张羽
0023.cn: 他心中喃喃道：“学校的合同吗？”

0023.en: If signing the contract could give him a large sum of money every month, he wouldn't have to worry about the loan.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 如果签了合同能每月给他一大笔钱，那倒是不用担心贷款的事情了。

0023.en: But Zhang Yu also knew that overthinking was pointless. Whether it was his performance in the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Illustration test or the school's contract, everything ultimately depended on his own talent and strength.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 不过张羽也知道多想无益，不论是这次天人演武图前的表现也好，还是学校的合同也好，一切的根本终究还是在于他自己的天赋和实力。

0023.en: Thinking of this, he took out the neural filler he had bought at the stationery store by the school gate today and consumed it.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 想到这里，他已经拿出了今天在校门口文具店买的神经填充剂服下。

0023.en: Then he sat cross-legged on the bed and began to circulate the Circadian Qi-Gathering Technique, feeling strands of spiritual energy from the world flowing into his body.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 接着他便盘膝坐在床上，开始运转周天采气法，感受着天地间的一缕缕灵机涌入体内。

0023.en: Although he had switched the Feather Book's specialization to the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art for today's test, he would have to wait 24 hours to switch back to the Circadian Qi-Gathering Technique to continue improving it quickly.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 虽然今天为了天人演武图的考验，他将羽书的专精切换成了天武炼心诀，周天采气法要等到24小时后切换回来，才能继续快速提升。

0023.en: But he couldn't practice the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art anyway since his Dao Heart wasn't yet level 3, and he needed to prepare for the upcoming magic competition by increasing his mana.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 但反正天武炼心诀他道心尚未3级也练不成，接下来又要为法赛做准备来提升法力。

0023.en: Although the Circadian Qi-Gathering Technique couldn't be rapidly improved today, the level 4 technique itself could still effectively increase his mana.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 周天采气法虽然今天暂时无法快速提升，但已经达到4级的周天采气法本身就能帮他有效提高法力。

0023.en: And so, the rest of the night passed with Zhang Yu silently breathing and circulating his energy.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 于是接下来这一夜的时间，便在张羽的默默吐纳中过去。

0023.en: The next morning.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 第二天一大早。

0023.en: As soon as Zhang Yu entered the classroom, he noticed something was different.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 张羽一进教室就发现了和平时不太一样的地方。

0023.en: Normally, most students at Songyang High School were focused on their own studies and cultivation, and wouldn't pay much attention to other ordinary students in the class.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 正常来讲，在嵩阳高中里的绝大部分学生，每日都专注于自身的学习和修炼，是不太会关心班里其他普通学生的。

0023.en: Two classmates might go months without saying a word to each other.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 即使是同班同学的两个人，也可能几个月都说不上一句话。

0023.en: Just like how normally, no one paid any attention to Zhang Yu when he entered the classroom.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 就像是张羽每天进教室的时候根本没谁会关注他。

0023.en: Only someone like Zhao Tianxing would wonder if his classmates were looking at him when he walked in every day.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 也就只有赵天行这样的，才会在每天进教室的时候想着同学们是不是在看他。

0023.en: But today was different. Zhang Yu could clearly feel that after he entered the classroom, classmates would occasionally steal glances at him.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 但今天不一样，张羽能够明显感觉到，就在他进入教室以后，不时就有同学偷偷打量着他。

0023.en: And as soon as Zhang Yu sat down, Zhou Tianyi patted his shoulder and said, "The news that you were accepted as a disciple by a Golden Core master has spread throughout the class."
0023.speaker: 周天翊
0023.cn: 而张羽一坐下，周天翊就拍了拍他的肩膀，说道：“你被金丹真人收徒的事情在班里传开了。”

0023.en: "It seems like the people who went to the art exhibition with Qian Shen mentioned it in the group chat."
0023.speaker: 周天翊
0023.cn: “好像是和钱深一起去画展那几个人在群里说的。”

0023.en: As everyone knows, schools are one of the places where gossip travels fastest.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: “上课在吐纳。”

0023.en: And at a key institution like Songyang High School, with its high cultivation pressure, many sterile youths, and universal phone ownership, gossip spread even faster.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 而嵩阳高中作为重点高中，修炼压力大，绝育青年多，手机人人有，这小道消息的传播速度也就更快了。

0023.en: Never mind text messages; even a photo of Zhang Yu in his security guard uniform from yesterday was already circulating in the group chat.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 别说文字消息，就连昨天张羽穿着保安服的照片都已经在群里传开了。

0023.en: Zhang Yu chuckled at this.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 张羽闻言呵呵一笑。

0023.en: "Are they starting to tell my story in class? That's Songyang speed for you. Let them talk."
0023.speaker: 张羽
0023.cn: “班里开始传我的事迹了吗？不愧是嵩阳速度，那就继续传吧。”

0023.en: In these days of being forced to cultivate bitterly, feeling the attention and discussion of others about his excellent performance was a rare pleasure for Zhang Yu.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 在这种每天被逼着苦修的日子里，感受一下他人在背后对自己优秀表现的关注和议论，也算是张羽难得的乐趣了。

0023.en: But then he pouted, thinking of a problem.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 但旋即他又撇了撇嘴，想到一个麻烦。

0023.en: Yesterday, Li Xuelian had secretly called him into a small meeting to reject him.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 昨天李雪莲把他偷偷叫去小会议里讲了拒他的事情。

0023.en: This meant that many people present didn't know he had actually been rejected by the Golden Core master. They still thought, as Li Xuelian had said on stage, that he was going to be taken as a disciple.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这就导致在场的很多人并不知道，他其实已经被金丹真人给拒了，都还以为像李雪莲在场上说的那样，他要被金丹真人给收徒了。

0023.en: "It would be pretty stupid of me to go up to the podium and clarify things now."
0023.speaker: 张羽
0023.cn: “我现在跑到讲台上去澄清的话，好像也挺傻的。”

0023.en: "Forget it, let them gossip. They'll probably forget about it after a while."
0023.speaker: 张羽
0023.cn: “算了，随便他们怎么传好了，过段时间应该就忘了这事情了。”

0023.en: Zhang Yu closed his eyes and continued to circulate the Circadian Qi-Gathering Technique, breathing in spiritual energy.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 张羽闭上眼睛，继续开始运转周天采气法，吐纳灵机。

0023.en: The classmates' discussion was just temporary entertainment.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 同学们的议论也不过是个临时的乐子罢了。

0023.en: As planned, his main goal was still to increase his mana with all his effort to prepare for the city-wide magic competition.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 就像是之前计划的那样，他现在的主要目的仍旧是全力提升法力，准备参加全市法赛。

0023.en: But this time, Zhang Yu hadn't taken more than a few breaths before his head teacher, Su Haifeng, called him out.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 不过这次张羽没吐纳几下，就被班主任苏海峰喊了出去。

0023.en: He remembered the last time he was called for a talk by Su Haifeng was on his third day in this world.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 还记得上一次被苏海峰找去谈话的时候，是张羽来到这个世界的第三天。

0023.en: At that time, he still didn't have a deep understanding of Songyang High School and its teachers.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 那时候的他对于嵩阳高中和嵩阳高中的老师仍旧理解不够深刻。

0023.en: He had even mistakenly thought Su Haifeng was a good teacher who cared about poor students.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 甚至一开始还误以为苏海峰是个关心贫困学生的好老师。

0023.en: But at this moment, outside the classroom, as Zhang Yu followed behind Su Haifeng, he could feel the terrifying pressure from this head teacher of the demonstration class and grade director.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 而此时此刻的教室外，当张羽跟在苏海峰的背后时，他就能感觉到这位示范班班主任兼年级主任的恐怖威压。

0023.en: Wherever Su Haifeng went, the classrooms instantly fell silent, and the students trembled.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 只见苏海峰所过之处，教室内瞬间悄无声息，众多学子瑟瑟发抖。

0023.en: Qian Shen didn't dare to move, concentrating on his breathing exercises.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 钱深一动不敢动，认真吐纳。

0023.en: Zhao Tianxing, who had just stood up to go to the bathroom, quickly sat back down and picked up a book to read.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刚刚站起来想要去上厕所的赵天行连忙坐了回去，拿起了一本书就看了起来。

0023.en: Even Bai Zhenzhen sat bolt upright like a primary school student, her eyes fixed on the textbook in front of her.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 就连白真真都像个小学生一样正襟危坐，紧紧看着眼前的教科书。

0023.en: Everyone's nerves were tense, hoping that Su Haifeng's gaze wouldn't fall on them.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 所有人的神经都在这一刻绷紧了，只希望苏海峰的目光不要盯上他们。

0023.en: This was Su Haifeng, the head of the first-year grade at Songyang High School, a bastard in the hearts of countless Songyang students, and the author of the research paper "On the Application Prospects of Electric Shocks in High School Teaching."
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这就是嵩阳高中的高一年级主任苏海峰，无数嵩阳学生心中的出生，教研论文《论电击在高中教学中的应用前景》的作者。

0023.en: This was a man so intimidating that even a dog passing by would have to read a few pages.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这是一个狗路过他身边都得看几页书的男人。

0023.en: Zhang Yu followed Su Haifeng through his "learning domain" to the office, where the demon smiled at him and said, "I heard that Master Starfire wants to take you as a disciple?"
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: 张羽就这么一路跟着苏海峰的学习领域来到办公室内，看着这魔王朝他笑了笑，说道：“听说星火真人要收你为徒？”

0023.en: Zhang Yu had no intention of deceiving the school about becoming a Golden Core disciple. After all, such a lie would be easily exposed, putting him in a passive position.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 张羽没有欺骗学校自己成了金丹门下的打算，毕竟收徒与否的谎言很容易被拆穿，到时候反而搞得自己被动。

0023.en: So he told the truth, "No, I felt Master Starfire's conditions were a bit lacking, so I refused."
0023.speaker: 张羽
0023.cn: 于是他实话实地讲道：“没，我觉得星火真人的条件还是差了点，所以拒了。”

0023.en: Su Haifeng's mouth twitched.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 苏海峰闻言嘴角一抽。

0023.en: This Zhang Yu was already from a poor family and hadn't given him any gifts in the three months since school started. Now that he finally had a moment in the spotlight, he was starting to act arrogant.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这张羽本来家里就穷，开学三个月都没给自己送过礼，现在好不容易出了个风头，竟然还装上了。

0023.en: "Is it about signing the contract... trying to raise your own value?"
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: “是为了签合同的事情……自抬身价？”

0023.en: As expected, these poor devils get inflated egos easily.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 果然这些穷鬼就是容易膨胀。

0023.en: However, this meant that the contract might not be so easy to sign in a moment.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 不过如此一来的话，苏海峰感觉一会儿的合同恐怕没那么容易签了。

0023.en: "Yes." After a moment of thought, he took out a document and said, "The school is aware of your performance at the art exhibition in the Central Building."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: “嗯。”他沉吟之后，拿出了一份文件说道：“你在中心大厦画展上的表现，学校这边已经知道了。”

0023.en: "Although your grades have been slipping recently, you've been criticized by the PE teacher, you're not proactive about buying medicine, and a debt collection company has even called me, the school still cares about talented students and has decided to offer you some help."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: “虽然你最近成绩有退步，被体育老师批评，买药也不积极，还被催收公司打电话到了我这，但学校还是心系人才的，决定给你提供一些帮助。”

0023.en: Zhang Yu's eyes narrowed.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 张羽闻言眼睛一眯。

0023.en: Truly a recognized bastard of Songyang High School. The moment he opens his mouth, it's classic PUA, isn't it?
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 不愧是嵩阳高中公认的出生，一张口就老PUA了是吧。

0023.en: Zhang Yu thought about what Bai Zhenzhen had said about the contract and guessed this was likely a prelude to negotiating the terms.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 张羽想到白真真讲过的关于合同的事情，猜测这可能是为了接下来谈合同条件做的铺垫了。

0023.en: And just as he expected, Su Haifeng placed the document in front of him and continued, "The school has prepared a student aid contract for you. The terms are much better than the previous poverty assistance plan. Take a look and see if there are any problems."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: 也果然如他所料，苏海峰将文件放到他面前，接着说道：“学校为你准备了一份助学合同，条件比上一次的贫困生补助计划要好的多，你看看有没有什么问题。”

0023.en: Zhang Yu glanced at it and saw that after signing the contract, the school would give him 10,000 yuan a month, but this money had to be repaid, though the interest rate was much lower than a loan.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 张羽接过来扫了一眼，就发现签了这合同以后，学校每个月会给他打一万块钱，但这钱是要还的，只不过利息比借贷要低不少。

0023.en: In addition, it required him to work for ten years in a company under the school's education group, regardless of whether he got into university or not.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 除此之外，便是要求他最终不论考没考上大学，都必须在学校所属的教育集团旗下的企业工作十年时间。

0023.en: Songyang High School belonged to the Wanxing Education Group, which in turn was under the Myriad Laws Sect, one of the Ten Great Sects.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 嵩阳高中是属于万星教育集团旗下的高中学校，而万星教育集团则属于十大宗门中的万法宗门下。

0023.en: This meant that after signing this contract, Zhang Yu would have to work for the Wanxing Education Group for ten years.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 也就是说签了这个合同之后，张羽未来要在万星教育集团工作十年时间。

0023.en: Furthermore, during the university application process, Songyang High School would have the right to decide which university and major the student would apply for.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 除此之外，在报考大学的过程中，嵩阳高中有权决定学生报考哪所大学、哪门专业。

0023.en: "Ten thousand a month for me to sign this kind of slave contract?"
0023.speaker: 张羽
0023.cn: “一个月一万块，就要我签这种卖身契？”

0023.en: Even if Zhang Yu hadn't seen other students' contracts, he could tell this one was rather insulting.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 哪怕张羽没看过其他学生的合同，也能看出来这个合同有点看不起人了。

0023.en: Zhang Yu put down the document and said with a frown, "Teacher, isn't this offer too low? I make 800 an hour as a security guard at the Central Building."
0023.speaker: 张羽
0023.cn: 张羽放下文件，皱眉说道：“老师，这待遇也太低了吧？我在中心大厦当保安，一个小时都有800块。”

0023.en: "Can a temporary job last?" Su Haifeng first dismissed the idea, then changed the subject. "I know the terms of this contract are a bit low, but the school leaders have their reasons."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: “临时工作能长久吗？”苏海峰先是否定了一下，接着话锋一转道：“我知道这份合同的待遇确实有点低了，但学校领导这么做自然有领导的道理。”

0023.en: "After all, what was the content of the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Illustration assessment at the art exhibition? What were the selection criteria? What were the specific qualities of all the candidates? The school doesn't have firsthand information, so it can't make its own judgment, not to mention you didn't even master the martial art in the end."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: “毕竟画展上关于天人演武图的考核，其中到底考的是什么样的内容？选拔的标准又是什么？所有考生的具体素质如何？学校这边没有第一手资料，也就无法亲自判断，更何况你最后也没练成其中的武功。”

0023.en: "On the contrary, your academic performance has declined significantly this month."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: “反倒是你这个月的成绩退步明显。”

0023.en: "The school is ultimately a place that values grades. The six-subject, 700-point evaluation system is certainly more aligned with cultivation, more reasonable, and more valued by the school board than the Heavenly Being Martial Arts Illustration. The contract process can't escape that..."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: “学校终究是个讲成绩的地方，六科700分的评价体系，肯定也比天人演武图更仙道，更合理，也更是被校董们看重的，合同流程也逃不开这一点……”

0023.en: Zhang Yu's frown deepened because what Su Haifeng said was not without reason.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 张羽的眉头皱得更紧了，只因为苏海峰说的不无道理。

0023.en: At Songyang High School, grades and scores were ultimately the top priority.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 在嵩阳高中，成绩分数终究才是第一位的。

0023.en: Besides him, no one at the school knew the true difficulty and power of the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art, let alone that it required a level 3 Dao Heart.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 毕竟除了他之外，学校这边的人根本不知道天武炼心诀的具体难度和厉害，更不知道这门武功有着3级道心的要求。

0023.en: And Zhang Yu didn't have the right to share the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art, nor did anyone vouch for him to make others believe his claims about it.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 而张羽没有天武炼心诀的传播权，更没人为他背书让人相信他关于天武炼心诀的发言。

0023.en: Zhang Yu said, "There's no way I can accept this contract."
0023.speaker: 张羽
0023.cn: 张羽：“这份合同我是不可能接受的。”

0023.en: Su Haifeng smiled slightly, thinking, is he going to ask for a higher price?
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 苏海峰微微一笑，心想着要提价了吗？

0023.en: He said lightly, "Don't be hasty. I am your head teacher, after all. I can help you fight for a bit more."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: 他淡淡：“不要着急，我毕竟是你的班主任，可以帮你多争取点。”

0023.en: Zhang Yu asked, "Can it be as high as the terms you offered Bai Zhenzhen?"
0023.speaker: 张羽
0023.cn: 张羽：“那能和你们开给白真真的条件一样高吗？”

0023.en: Su Haifeng didn't answer directly, but laughed, the meaning of his laughter self-evident.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 苏海峰没有直接回答，而是先笑了起来，但笑声的内涵不言自明。

0023.en: Then he said, "I'm not in charge of Bai Zhenzhen's contract, but I can give you a response. Bai Zhenzhen is the top student in the grade with a score of 650. What's your score?"
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: 接着他说道：“白真真的合同不是我负责的，但我可以给你一个回应。白真真她是650分的年级第一，你多少分？”

0023.en: Zhang Yu said, "Does that mean if I become the top student in the grade, anything is negotiable?"
0023.speaker: 张羽
0023.cn: 张羽：“是不是只要我考上了年级第一，什么都能谈？”

0023.en: Looking at Zhang Yu's serious face, Su Haifeng smiled and took the contract back. "How well you can score depends on your own ability."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: 看着张羽认真的脸庞，苏海峰微笑着将合同收了回去：“你能考多少，看你自己的本事。”

0023.en: "The contract mainly depends on grades. While there can be some fluctuation in the details, it's generally divided into four tiers: A, B, C, and D."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: “合同主要看的还是成绩，细节上虽然能有点浮动，但总的来说就只分甲、乙、丙、丁四个等级。”

0023.en: "The monthly exam is in two weeks. If you're not satisfied with the D-tier contract, we can talk again after your next exam results are out."
0023.speaker: 苏海峰
0023.cn: “两周以后就是月考了，你如果对丁级的合同不满意，也能等你下一次月考成绩出来了我们再接着谈。”

0024.en: Chapter 24: Spiritual Root
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 第24章 灵根

0024.en: Leaving Su Haifeng's office, Zhang Yu walked back to his classroom.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 离开苏海峰的办公室，张羽走在回教室的路上。

0024.en: Next week, he had to break into the top ten in mana for his grade to qualify for the cultivation tournament representing Songyang High School.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 下周要冲进全年级法力前十，获得代表嵩阳高中参加法赛的资格。

0024.en: The week after that, the monthly exams would start. Only with excellent scores could he get a better contract from the school.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 下下周要开始月考，只有月考成绩足够优秀，才能向学校拿到一个更好的合同。

0024.en: Zhang Yu was fully confident he could break into the top ten in mana within a week. After all, his Zhou Tian Qi Gathering Technique was already level 4. Its level would only get higher, and his mana would increase even faster.
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: 法力在接下来一周内冲进前十，张羽心中有十足把握，毕竟他周天采气法已经4级了，接下来这个等级只会越来越高，法力提升也会越来越迅猛。

0024.en: But besides mana, the monthly exams also covered physical education, Dao Heart, martial arts, and cultivation techniques. Having to drastically improve in all four over the next two weeks, Zhang Yu suddenly felt immense pressure.
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: 但月考除了法力之外，还有考体育、道心、武功、道术，要在接下来两周里把这四门也猛猛提升，张羽一下子就感觉到压力十足。

0024.en: As for the general education exam?
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: 至于还有一门通识教育的考试？

0024.en: Not only was it worth only 50 points, but almost everyone in the demonstration class scored nearly full marks on it, so it didn't create any real gap between students.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 不说通识教育本身只占50分，就说这门考试在示范班几乎人人接近满分，根本拉不开差距。

0024.en: Zhang Yu wasn't sure how well he would ultimately do on the monthly exams in two weeks.
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: 可以说两周后的月考最终能到哪一步，张羽心里也有点没数。

0024.en: "In short... I just have to grind."
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: “总之……卷就是了。”

0024.en: Zhang Yu felt a fire light up inside him.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 张羽都感觉自己燃起来了。

0024.en: Who says a hands-on cheat is still a cheat?
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: 谁说手动挡挂就不是挂了？

0024.en: "Feather Book! For the next two weeks, show me your limits!"
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: 羽书！接下来两周就给我看看你的极限在哪里！

0024.en: So as soon as he returned to the classroom, Zhang Yu began to absorb spiritual energy, fully activating his Zhou Tian Qi Gathering Technique.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 于是一回到教室，张羽便开始吐纳灵机，全力运转起了周天采气法。

0024.en: In the blink of an eye, the first class ended.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 转眼间来到第一节课下课的时间。

0024.en: "Sigh, I'm so tired."
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: “唉，好累啊。”

0024.en: Just as Zhang Yu relaxed a little and wanted to rest, the chilling countdown timer appeared again, forcing him to keep pushing forward.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 张羽心中稍稍松懈，想要休息休息的时候，那股带着森森寒意的倒计时便又升了起来，叫他不得不继续努力下去。

0024.en: "Damn it!"
0024.speaker: 张羽

0024.en: "You stupid ritual... one day I'll kill you!"
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: “智障仪式……总有一天杀了你！”

0024.en: In another corner of the classroom, Zhao Tianxing looked at the message on his phone and sighed in relief.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而教室另一角，赵天行看了看自己手机上收到的消息，心中松了一口气。

0024.en: Previously, the P.E. teacher Wang Hai had sent him to find out about Zhang Yu's supply channels. When asked about the results today, Zhao Tianxing told him about the art exhibition.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 之前体育老师王海派他来打听张羽进货的渠道，今天对方来询问结果后，赵天行便把昨天画展的事情告诉了对方。

0024.en: Wang Hai's reply was: "Got it. You don't need to follow Zhang Yu for now, just maintain a good relationship with him. Come to the training grounds after school tomorrow, and I'll give you a private body-strengthening lesson."
0024.speaker: 王海
0024.cn: 而王海的回复则是：知道了，张羽那边你暂时不用跟了，继续和他保持好关系就行。明天放学了来练功场，我带你一节炼体课。

0024.en: Not having to probe Zhang Yu for information anymore was a great relief for Zhao Tianxing.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 不用继续向张羽打探消息，这让赵天行放松了许多。

0024.en: And the reward of an extra training session from Wang Hai made Zhao Tianxing secretly happy.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而王海那加练一节课的奖励，更是让赵天行暗暗开心。

0024.en: After all, as a top teacher, the quality of Wang Hai's private lessons was unquestionable. They were not only expensive but also often hard to get.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 毕竟王海作为王牌教师，他的私教课质量无需多言，不但价格昂贵，经常还一课难求。

0024.en: As for maintaining a good relationship with Zhang Yu...
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 至于要和张羽继续保持关系……

0024.en: Zhao Tianxing looked up towards Zhang Yu's seat and saw him absorbing energy.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 赵天行抬头看向了张羽的座位，便看到对方正在吐纳。

0024.en: "After what happened yesterday, I must be a complete clown in his eyes."
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: “经过昨天的事情，我在他心里一定已经成为了一个小丑。”

0024.en: Thinking about how Zhang Yu might be laughing at his clumsy performance last night, Zhao Tianxing felt his cheeks burn again.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 想想对方可能已经在嘲笑自己昨天晚上的拙劣表现，赵天行就感觉自己脸颊又烧了起来。

0024.en: But thinking of Wang Hai's private lesson, he made up his mind to go talk to Zhang Yu when he was free after class.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 不过想到王海的私教课奖励，他还是打定主意，等一会儿下课对方空闲下来，他就去找张羽聊几句。

0024.en: But as the morning classes went by one by one, Zhao Tianxing couldn't find a single chance to say a few words to Zhang Yu.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 但随着上午的课一节节过去，赵天行却死活找不到和张羽说上几句话的机会。

0024.en: "Is he still absorbing energy?"
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: “还在吐纳吗？”

0024.en: "He's absorbing during class."
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: “上课在吐纳。”

0024.en: "He's absorbing during the break too."
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: “下课也在吐纳。”

0024.en: "He hasn't even gone to the bathroom once... what strong kidneys."
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: “连厕所都没上过一趟……好强的肾。”

0024.en: Zhang Yu's intense effort was starting to make Zhao Tianxing anxious.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 张羽此刻努力的模样让赵天行都感觉到揪心。

0024.en: He finally waited until lunchtime. Just as Zhao Tianxing got his food and was about to sit next to Zhang Yu,
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 好不容易等到中午吃饭，赵天行刚打好饭菜，想要走到张羽身旁坐下。

0024.en: he saw the guy devour his meal in two bites like a ghost and then run out of the cafeteria.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 便看到对方好像鬼一样两口便将饭菜灌进了胃里，然后便飞一样跑出了食堂。

0024.en: Bai Zhenzhen watched and cursed inwardly: "You even have to grind during lunch? Can't you let people eat in peace?"
0024.speaker: 白真真
0024.cn: 白真真看了心中暗骂：“连午饭都要卷是吧？还让不让人好好吃东西了。”

0024.en: Lunchtime was the only time at Songyang High School with no grades, no supervision from vultures like Su Haifeng, and no interference from perverts like Wang Hai.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 吃饭时间，是嵩阳高中唯一没有成绩，没有宋海峰这种出生监督，没有王海这种变态来染指的时间。

0024.en: It was a rare moment for the top students to relax, take a short break, or even gossip a little.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 可以说是在学校的一天时间里，学霸们放松、小憩，甚至聊聊八卦的难得时光。

0024.en: It was Songyang High School's own mental spa time.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 是嵩阳高中自己的心灵SPA时间。

0024.en: Bai Zhenzhen was very unhappy with Zhang Yu's demonic study habits, saving even his lunch break for cultivation.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 对于张羽连午饭时间都要省出来修炼的学魔姿态，白真真心中十分不满。

0024.en: "Dude, if you grind this hard, how are we supposed to eat with peace of mind?"
0024.speaker: 白真真
0024.cn: 兄弟你这么卷，叫我们怎么安心吃饭？

0024.en: "What if you actually surpass us?"
0024.speaker: 白真真
0024.cn: 万一被你卷过我们了怎么办？

0024.en: "Is this an academic arms race?"
0024.speaker: 白真真
0024.cn: 搞学备竞赛是吧？

0024.en: And when Zhao Tianxing returned to the classroom, he saw Zhang Yu was already absorbing energy again. "As I thought," he muttered to himself.
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: 而当赵天行回到教室的时候，看着对方已经吐纳起来的样子，他心中暗道一声果然。

0024.en: For the rest of the afternoon, Zhao Tianxing couldn't find a single opportunity to talk to him. Every time he looked over, Zhang Yu was either paying close attention in class or absorbing spiritual energy.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 接下来的整个下午，赵天行都硬是找不到一丝和对方说上话的机会，只因为他只要转头去看，对方不是在认真上课，就是在吐纳灵机。

0024.en: Watching him, Zhao Tianxing grew more and more anxious.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这么看着看着，直接都把赵天行给越看越焦虑了。

0024.en: "He's already apprenticed to a Golden Core master and he's still working this hard? Is he trying to leave no path for us ordinary students?"
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: “拜师金丹了还这么努力，这是不给我们普通学生活路了？”

0024.en: Finally, when school ended, Zhao Tianxing found a chance to follow him, thinking Zhang Yu would be looking for a temporary job again today.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 一直等到放学的时候，赵天行终于找到机会跟上对方，本以为张羽今天也会去找临时工作。

0024.en: But he heard him say, "Looking for a temp job?"
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: 却听对方说道：“找临时工？”

0024.en: "Little Zhao, as high school students, we should prioritize our studies. How can we go to work every day?"
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: “小赵啊，我们高中生还是要把学习放在第一位的，怎么能天天跑去工作呢？”

0024.en: "Don't think you're so great just because you earned 800 an hour. That's temporary work; you can't find it every day."
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: “别以为你一小时赚800就了不起了，那都是临时工，不是天天都能找到的。”

0024.en: Zhang Yu looked at his balance of 8,300 yuan, feeling confident enough to stop working for now and focus on cultivation.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 张羽看了看自己的8300块余额，便有了暂时不打工，专心修行的底气。

0024.en: So he went home, took a neuro-filler, and continued to absorb energy until the next morning.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 于是他回到家中，服下神经填充剂便继续吐纳，一直到第二天早上。

0024.en: Other than going to the bathroom and switching the Feather Book's focus back to the Zhou Tian Qi Gathering Technique, Zhang Yu spent all his time absorbing energy.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 当中除了上厕所，还有把羽书的专精切换回周天采气法之外，张羽所有的时间便都投进了吐纳上。

0024.en: And so, four days passed in the blink of an eye.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 如此，转眼间便是4天过去。

0024.en: After four days of hard cultivation, Zhang Yu's Zhou Tian Qi Gathering Technique reached level 6 (45/120).
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 经过这4日苦修，张羽的周天采气法达到了6级（45/120）。

0024.en: His mana also rose from 8.3 to 9.4, just two spots away from the top ten in his grade.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而法力经过这数日勤修，也从8.3一口气涨到了9.4，距离法力年级前十只差了2位。

0024.en: In the first-year hallway.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这天的高一年级走廊外。

0024.en: Su Haifeng strolled to the back door of the classroom and looked at the students during their self-study period.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 苏海峰晃晃悠悠地走到了教室后门的位置，看向了正在自习的学生们。

0024.en: As the head teacher of the demonstration class, he had no class but still made a point to wander by. Naturally, he was here to boost the students' morale with his cold stare, merciless taunts, and the authority of a grade director.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 作为示范班的班主任，明明已经没课还特地过来瞎转悠一下的他，自然是为了用自己冰冷的凝视，无情的嘲讽，以及年级主任的权势，狠狠提振一番学生们的精神状态。

0024.en: Then, Su Haifeng noticed that the students in the classroom were grinding even harder than usual today.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 然后苏海峰便发现，今天教室里的学生要比往常更卷。

0024.en: Fewer people were going to the bathroom.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 上厕所的人少了。

0024.en: No one was dozing off while pretending to absorb energy.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 认真吐纳，而不是吐着吐着开始打瞌睡的人没了。

0024.en: The students who were actually just staring blankly at their books to avoid being caught by him were gone.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 其实已经在发呆，但假装盯着书本，只是为了防止被自己发现的人没了。

0024.en: The rate of mind-wandering in the class had dropped significantly.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 班级里的走神率更是有着显著降低。

0024.en: In fact, Su Haifeng had noticed this trend starting a couple of days ago.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 事实上从前两天开始，苏海峰就隐隐发现了这种趋势。

0024.en: Through his observation, he discovered that the source of this trend was the student named Zhang Yu. With Zhang Yu's crazed energy absorption, his continuous 0% mind-wandering rate, and the recent explosion in his mana... Bai Zhenzhen, Qian Shen, Zhao Tianxing, and others were the first to be stimulated.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而经过他的观察，发现这趋势的源头，便是那名叫做张羽的学生。随着张羽疯魔一样的吐纳，连续不间断的0%走神率，还有这几天法力的暴涨……白真真、钱深、赵天行等人首先被刺激到。

0024.en: And the competitive spirit that erupted from them in turn stimulated even more students.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而接下来白真真他们爆发出来的卷气又刺激到了更多人。

0024.en: The 550-pointers are grinding, the 600-pointers are grinding, the 650-pointers are grinding. How can you still rest?
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 550分的在卷，600分的在卷，650分的也在卷，你怎么还休息的下去？

0024.en: Su Haifeng even saw a report that the average mealtime for students in the demonstration class had decreased by more than 20%.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 就连每天示范班学生的食堂平均用餐时间，苏海峰看了报告，发现都减少了20%以上。

0024.en: Su Haifeng looked at Zhang Yu, who was still absorbing energy, and thought to himself, "Is it because his pride was hurt by what I said before?"
0024.speaker: 苏海峰
0024.cn: 苏海峰看向了还在吐纳的张羽，心中感叹：“是因为之前被我刺激到自尊心的关系吗？”

0024.en: "Maybe I can use this trick more often in the future."
0024.speaker: 苏海峰
0024.cn: “那以后也许能多用用这招。”

0024.en: Unconsciously, he had already come up with a topic for his next research paper: "An Exploration of Insulting Students in High School Pedagogy."
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 不知不觉间，他脑海中已经想好下一篇教研论文的课题了，《论侮辱学生在高中教学中的探索》。

0024.en: After another satisfied look at the study atmosphere in the classroom, Su Haifeng nodded and left.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 又满意地看了看教室里的学习氛围，苏海峰点点头便离开了。

0024.en: Not long after Su Haifeng left, the bell rang, signaling the end of school. Zhang Yu immediately stood up and headed for the school's quiet room.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 就在苏海峰离开后不久，随着一声铃响放学，张羽立刻站了起来，走向了学校的静室。

0024.en: For being the student with the lowest mind-wandering rate in the entire grade last week, Zhang Yu not only received a 500-yuan bonus and a public commendation but also one hour of free use of a Heaven-grade Spiritual Root.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 因为在上周成为了全年级走神率最低的学生，张羽不但获得了500块的奖金，被通报表扬，还有1小时天灵根的免费租用权。

0024.en: And today was the day to redeem that one hour.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而今天便是学校兑换这1小时天灵根的日子。

0024.en: Since the school scheduled both the Spiritual Root rental and the quiet rooms, the reward would be forfeited if he missed his slot. So, he rushed to the rental office without delay.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 因为灵根租借和吐纳静室都是由学校排期，若张羽一旦错过便奖励作废，所以他没有一刻拖延地赶往租借灵根的办公室。

0024.en: Zhao Tianxing seized the opportunity, followed behind Zhang Yu, and said, "Are you going to rent a Heaven-grade Spiritual Root?"
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: 赵天行抓紧机会，跟在了张羽的背后，说道：“你要去租借天灵根吗？”

0024.en: Seeing Zhang Yu nod, Zhao Tianxing continued, "You didn't seem to rent them from the school very often before, did you?"
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: 看到张羽点点头，赵天行接着说道：“你以前好像不常在学校里租天灵根吧？”

0024.en: "Do you want me to introduce you to the models of Heaven-grade Spiritual Roots we have at our school?"
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: “要不要我跟你介绍一下我们学校的天灵根型号？”

0024.en: Zhang Yu's eyes flickered. The original Zhang Yu, due to cost, had always rented Spiritual Roots from various tutoring agencies with promotional offers. He really wasn't familiar with the models at the school.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 张羽目光微微一动，原身的张羽因为价格关系，一直都是找各种有着优惠活动教学机构租用灵根，他对学校里的天灵根型号还真不太熟悉。

0024.en: After all, with the development of the times, and especially after the research and organization by the Ten Great Sects, Spiritual Roots were no longer classified as crudely as in ancient times.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 毕竟随着时代的发展，特别又经过十大宗门的梳理和研究，灵根也早就不像古代划分的那么粗浅了。

0024.en: First, in terms of grade, the Ten Great Sects divided Spiritual Roots into five levels.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 首先在等级上，灵根被十大宗门分为了五个等级。

0024.en: There was the lowest-grade Human Spiritual Root, the high-grade Earth Spiritual Root, and the even higher-grade Heaven Spiritual Root. These three grades could be bought as long as one had the money.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 其中有最低级的人灵根，高级的地灵根，更高级的天灵根，这三个等级的灵根只要有钱都能买到。

0024.en: Higher up were the military-grade God Spiritual Root and the special-supply Immortal Spiritual Root, exclusive to the Ten Great Sects.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而再往上的话，便是军用级的神灵根，以及十大宗门特供的仙灵根了。

0024.en: God Spiritual Roots could only be used by the military and some special government departments.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 神灵根只有军队和一些政府的特殊部门能够使用。

0024.en: Immortal Spiritual Roots could only be used by those who joined one of the Ten Great Sects.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 仙灵根更是只有拜入十大宗门才有使用权限。

0024.en: As for categories, the ancient classifications like Gold, Wood, Water, Fire, and Earth Spiritual Roots... had long since disappeared in Kunxu.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而在分类上，像是古代的金、木、水、火、土灵根……昆墟中早就没这种分类了。

0024.en: Because the design and manufacturing industries for Spiritual Roots had become increasingly advanced and prosperous, they were now categorized by function, such as study-type, combat-type, cultivation-type, and so on.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 因为灵根的设计业、制造业都越来越先进和繁荣，灵根已经逐渐通过不同功能来进行类型划分，比如学习类、战斗类、修行类等等等等。

0024.en: Zhao Tianxing continued, "The most popular Spiritual Roots in our high school are definitely the study-type and cultivation-type."
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: 只听赵天行说道：“我们高中最热门的灵根，肯定是学习类灵根和修行类灵根。”

0024.en: "For example, the Ji Spiritual Root..."
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: “比如寄灵根……”

0024.en: Zhang Yu's face changed dramatically. "Chicken Spiritual Root?"
0024.speaker: 张羽
0024.cn: 张羽大惊失色：“鸡灵根？”

0024.en: Zhao Tianxing said, "It's 'Ji' as in 'to entrust'. A 'Parasitic Root' can be temporarily lodged in a person's body, transferring the mana they refine through the root to yourself. It's a favorite among many rich people."
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: 赵天行说道：“是寄存的寄，寄灵根可以暂时寄存在一个人体内，把这人通过灵根提炼的法力，转到自己身上，是很多有钱人最喜欢的灵根。”

0024.en: "The Muscle-Growth Root is also a favorite for many. When absorbing energy, it can refine spiritual energy into a growth-type energy and inject it directly into the muscles, accelerating muscle growth. 24-hour muscle gain, greatly improving the effectiveness of body strengthening..."
0024.speaker: 赵天行
0024.cn: “还有增肌灵根也是很多人的最爱，吐纳时能够把灵机提炼为一种生长灵机，直接注入肌肉中，加快肌肉生长，24小时增肌，大大提高炼体效果……”

0025.en: Chapter 25: The Qi Sea
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 第25章 气海

0025.en: "That Yuanyang Spiritual Root is also very popular among the Heavenly Spiritual Roots. After all, most of the guys at our school are virgins. The Yuanyang Spiritual Root can refine the pure yang essence in a virgin's body into mana; it's very powerful."
0025.speaker: 赵天行
0025.cn: “还有那个元阳灵根在天灵根里也很受欢迎，毕竟咱们学校里都是处男嘛，元阳灵根能够炼化处男体内的元阳精气为法力，提升法力的效果很厉害。”

0025.en: Zhao Tianxing said proudly, "Especially this one at our school. It's been passed down for almost twenty years. Generations of seniors have used it, and it's absorbed the pure yang essence of thousands of students, which makes it even more mystical."
0025.speaker: 赵天行
0025.cn: 赵天行自豪道：“特别是我们高中的这道元阳灵根传了快二十年，经过一代代前辈把玩，其中沾染了成千上万名学生的元阳精气，更有一番玄妙之处。”

0025.en: Zhang Yu frowned as he listened. He felt that this Yuanyang Spiritual Root sounded a bit... dirty. And also...
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 张羽听得眉头一皱，总觉得这元阳灵根听着很脏的样子，而且……

0025.en: "Isn't everyone sterilized? How can they still use this 'virgin' spiritual root?"
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: “大家不都绝育了吗？还能用这处男灵根？”

0025.en: "It's the Yuanyang Spiritual Root," Zhao Tianxing explained. "The sterilization surgery only temporarily removes certain organs. The pure yang essence in our bodies is still continuously produced by the kidneys, it just no longer affects our emotions or mind."
0025.speaker: 赵天行
0025.cn: “是元阳灵根。”赵天行解释道：“绝育手术只是暂时摘除了一些器官，但我们体内的元阳精气还是由肾脏处源源不绝的涌出，只是不会刺激我们的情感和精神了而已。”

0025.en: "Otherwise, how could people have restorative surgery after they grow up and get a 'new root'?"
0025.speaker: 赵天行
0025.cn: “不然一届届长大后进行修复手术，重获新根的人又是怎么做到的。”

0025.en: As they walked, Zhang Yu asked, "Among the school's Heavenly Spiritual Roots, are there any that are particularly good for increasing mana?"
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: 张羽一边走，一边继续问道：“学校的天灵根里，有没有对法力提升帮助比较大的？”

0025.en: Hearing this, Zhao Tianxing's interest was piqued. He recalled Zhang Yu's recent actions and realized how focused he had been on increasing his mana lately.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 赵天行闻言心中一动，回想着张羽最近的所作所为，心想着对方这段时间对提升法力的事情可真是够上心的。

0025.en: "Could it be for the mana competition?"
0025.speaker: 赵天行
0025.cn: “难道是为了参加法赛？”

0025.en: Zhao Tianxing thought for a moment and said, "There are many spiritual roots that help with mana. The most effective one at our school is probably the Qi Sea Spiritual Root. It's quite expensive, but since you're getting it as a free reward, the price doesn't matter..."
0025.speaker: 赵天行
0025.cn: 赵天行想了想，说道：“能辅助法力提升的灵根很多，我们学校里效果最好的应该就是气海灵根了，就是比较贵，不过你这次是免费奖励就无所谓价格了……”

0025.en: The Qi Sea Spiritual Root, nicknamed the "Wall-Through King," had the great advantage of a huge range. It could pass through walls, buildings, and even the ground to gather spiritual energy from a wide area, increasing the efficiency of mana refining.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 气海灵根，外号穿墙王，最大优势是极大的覆盖范围，还能够穿越各种墙壁、建筑乃至大地的阻隔，进行大范围的灵机收摄，提高法力提炼的效率。

0025.en: After listening to Zhao Tianxing's description, Zhang Yu had already decided to try this Heavenly Spiritual Root.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 在听了赵天行的一番介绍后，张羽心中便已经决定要试试看这个天灵根了。

0025.en: Arriving at the spiritual root rental office next to the meditation room, Zhang Yu didn't immediately state his choice. Instead, he picked up the brochure on the desk and started reading.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 来到了静室一旁的灵根租凭办公室，张羽也没急着说出自己的目标，而是拿起桌上的介绍手册看了起来。

0025.en: The administrator was a female teacher with a baby face.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 一旁的管理员是一名长着娃娃脸的女老师。

0025.en: Seeing Zhang Yu, she seized the opportunity to ask, "Student, are you a member here? Are you familiar with any of the spiritual roots?"
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: 看见张羽的动作，她却是见缝插针地问道：“同学，你是这里的会员吗？有没有熟悉的灵根？”

0025.en: Without looking up, Zhang Yu replied, "No, and no."
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: 张羽头也不抬地说道：“不是，没有。”

0025.en: The administrator quickly made a sales pitch, "We have a promotion for new members: deposit ten thousand and get one thousand free. Would you like to try?"
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: 管理员连忙推荐道：“我们现在有新会员充一万送一千的活动，同学你要试试吗？”

0025.en: Zhang Yu said, "I'm here for the Heavenly Spiritual Root rental from the 0% distraction rate reward. I'm only taking the reward. I'm not interested in anything else, so you don't need to sell me anything."
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: 张羽：“我是走神率0%奖励的天灵根租凭，我只拿奖励，其他没兴趣，你不用跟我推销了。”

0025.en: Hearing this, the administrator gave a helpless smile and stepped back. "Alright, just let me know if you need anything else."
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: 管理员闻言无奈一笑，向后退去：“那同学你有什么需要再跟我说。”

0025.en: Listening to him, she silently labeled Zhang Yu as "stingy" in her mind and lost all interest in making a sale.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 听着对方的说话，她便已经在张羽身上默默打了一个抠门的标签，失去了推销的兴趣。

0025.en: Zhang Yu didn't care what she thought. He just lowered his head, quickly scanned the brochure, and found that it said pretty much the same thing Zhao Tianxing had.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 张羽却不在乎对方怎么想的，他只是低下头，快速扫了一圈手册，发现上面写的和赵天行说的都差不多。

0025.en: So he said to the administrator, "I'd like to rent the Qi Sea Spiritual Root."
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: 于是他向一旁的管理员说道：“我想要租气海灵根。”

0025.en: She replied, "Scan your student card."
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: 对方说道：“学生卡扫一下。”

0025.en: Zhang Yu took out his student card and handed it to her.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 张羽拿出来自己的学生卡来递给了对方。

0025.en: This Songyang High School student card was his proof of identity, the key credential that allowed him to legally cultivate and access various related services.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 这张嵩阳高中的学生卡代表着他高中生的身份，是他平日里能够合法修仙，并享受各种仙路修行上的相关服务的重要凭证。

0025.en: A moment later, the administrator returned from the office with a jade box.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 不一会，办公室里的管理员拿着一只玉盒送到了他的面前。

0025.en: "The Qi Sea Spiritual Root is inside. Go to meditation room #2, open the box, and consume the spiritual root."
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: “气海灵根就在里面，你一会到里面的2号静室，打开玉匣，服下灵根就行了。”

0025.en: "Your rental time is one hour. It starts the moment you enter the room. If you're over by even one minute, it counts as a full hour, so watch the time..."
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: “你租的时间是一个小时，时间从你进入静室的时间开始算，超时1分钟按1小时算，你自己看准时间出来……”

0025.en: After explaining the details, the rental administrator urged Zhang Yu to go in.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 负责租凭业务的管理员又叮嘱了一番相关细节之后，便让张羽赶紧进去了。

0025.en: Zhao Tianxing, who was standing nearby, said, "Well, I'll let you get to it, Zhang Yu. I have to go."
0025.speaker: 赵天行
0025.cn: 一旁的赵天行：“那张羽你先忙吧，我也要走了。”

0025.en: Zhang Yu nodded at him. "Thanks."
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: 张羽朝他点了点头：“谢了。”

0025.en: Watching Zhang Yu turn and leave, Zhao Tianxing replayed the expression and tone in his mind, thinking, "I think our relationship got a little closer this time, right?"
0025.speaker: 赵天行
0025.cn: 看着转身离去的张羽，赵天行心中不断回想着张羽的表情和语气，心道：“这次跟他的关系应该是变更近了吧？”

0025.en: Meanwhile, inside meditation room #2.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 另一边的2号静室内。

0025.en: It was a room about twenty square meters in size. A meditation cushion was placed in the center, and the walls were covered with soundproofing material, on which were drawn many twisted talismans of various sizes.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 这是一间大约二十平米大小的房间，房间中央被摆放了一张蒲团，四周围的墙上则被贴了一层隔音材料，上面还画满了大大小小的扭曲符箓。

0025.en: It was said these talismans could accelerate the gathering of spiritual energy and improve the efficiency of cultivation.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 据说这些符箓能够加速灵机的汇聚，对提高吐纳效率有一定效果。

0025.en: However, Zhang Yu only had one hour from the moment he stepped in. He had no time to worry about the room's decor. He went straight to the cushion and opened the jade box.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 不过张羽从踏进房门开始，便只有一小时的吐纳时间，他没时间去关心房间里的布置，而是直接坐到蒲团上，打开了玉匣。

0025.en: Inside the palm-sized box was a delicate, translucent crystal, glowing with a faint green light.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 只见那巴掌大小的玉匣之中，一截玲珑剔透，正闪烁着淡淡青光的晶体。

0025.en: The crystal floated in the center of the box, surrounded by swirling specks of light like green smoke.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 晶体漂浮在玉匣中央，四周围不断环绕着一缕缕青烟般的光粒。

0025.en: This was the spiritual root he had rented, the Heavenly Spiritual Root known as the Qi Sea Spiritual Root.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 这便是他这次租来的灵根，被称为气海灵根的天灵根。

0025.en: Zhang Yu carefully picked up the Qi Sea Spiritual Root. As soon as he brought it to his lips, he felt a coolness in his throat, and the Heavenly Spiritual Root slid into his body like a gulp of ice water, sinking down into his lower Dantian.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 张羽小心翼翼地将气海灵根拾起，刚刚放到自己嘴边，便感觉到喉咙一凉，这天灵根便好似一团冰水一样钻入他的体内，一口气便沉入小腹，钻进了他的下丹田内。

0025.en: Once the Qi Sea Spiritual Root entered his Dantian, it was as if it sprouted roots, extending crystal-like tendrils into the surrounding mana.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 而这气海灵根一进入丹田之中，便好似生根发芽，延伸出一节节晶体似的根须，扎入了周围的法力之中。

0025.en: Zhang Yu knew that, according to the manual and the administrator, the Heavenly Spiritual Root had now been successfully planted in his Dantian.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 张羽明白，按照使用手册和那位管理员的提示，此刻天灵根已经成功种入丹田。

0025.en: Now, all he had to do was cultivate as usual, and the Heavenly Spiritual Root would naturally do its work.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 接下来他只要像往日一样吐纳，这天灵根便能自然发挥作用。

0025.en: With this thought, Zhang Yu took a deep breath and began to circulate the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 想到这里，张羽深吸一口气，便已经开始运转周天采气法。

0025.en: Boom!
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 轰隆！

0025.en: A loud noise seemed to explode in his mind.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 脑海之中似乎爆发出了一阵巨响。

0025.en: Zhang Yu felt the surrounding spiritual energy swarm towards him, pouring into the Heavenly Spiritual Root inside his body.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 张羽只感觉到四周围的灵机蜂拥而来，朝着他体内的天灵根倾泻而去。

0025.en: "Two times?"
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: “两倍？”

0025.en: "Three times?"
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: “三倍？”

0025.en: "So fast... and it's still increasing!"
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: “太快了……还在涨！”

0025.en: Feeling more and more spiritual energy pouring into his body, Zhang Yu quickly focused his mind and operated the level 6 Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method at full power.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 感觉到越来越多的灵机涌入体内，张羽连忙潜下心来，全力运转起了6级的周天采气法。

0025.en: As the mana circulation throughout his body accelerated, wisps of spiritual energy were refined into mana.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 随着他全身上下的法力循环加速运行，丝丝缕缕的灵机被炼化为了法力。

0025.en: His Dantian, which had felt bloated from the rush of spiritual energy, returned to normal.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 原本因为那蜂拥而来的灵机，让张羽感觉到有些膨胀的丹田也重新恢复了正常。

0025.en: But as if sensing the speed of Zhang Yu's mana refining, the Qi Sea Spiritual Root in his Dantian pulsed and expanded, once again increasing the speed at which it gathered spiritual energy.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 但就像是感觉到了张羽提炼法力的速度，丹田内的气海灵根一缩一涨，便已经再次提升了收摄灵机的速度。

0025.en: This time, it wasn't just the spiritual energy around Zhang Yu that rushed in; even the energy from outside the room was drawn to him.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 这一次不只是张羽周身的灵机蜂拥而来，就连房间外的灵机也被吸引了过去。

0025.en: The hallway... outside the window... the sky... even underground...
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 走廊……窗外……天空……甚至是地下……

0025.en: The Qi Sea Spiritual Root increased its gathering range in step with Zhang Yu's refining efficiency, finally stopping at a radius of 50 meters.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 气海灵根随着张羽提炼法力的效率，一步步提高收摄灵机的范围，最终停在了半径50米的距离。

0025.en: Feeling a massive amount of spiritual energy pouring into his body like a great river, then being guided through his body's mana circulation, and finally being refined, bit by bit, into his own mana.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 感受到海量灵机如长江大河一般，开始源源不绝地涌入体内，继而又被导入全身上下的法力循环之中，最终被一丝丝地炼化为了自己的法力。

0025.en: At this moment, Zhang Yu felt a thrill from the surge of mana.
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: 这一刻的张羽竟感觉到了一种法力暴涨的快感。

0025.en: "So this is the true efficiency of a level 6 Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method?"
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: “原来这才是6级周天采气法真正的效率？”

0025.en: At this point, Zhang Yu finally understood that his usual cultivation had never fully unleashed the true power of his level 6 technique.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 此时的张羽也终于明白，平日里自己吐纳灵机，提炼法力，根本就没有能发挥出6级周天采气法的真正威力。

0025.en: Now, with the help of the Qi Sea Spiritual Root, he was truly pushing the efficiency of the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method to its limit.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 如今有了气海灵根的相助，他才真正将周天采气法提炼法力的效率发挥到了极限。

0025.en: Not daring to waste a single second, Zhang Yu focused entirely on absorbing spiritual energy and refining mana.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 不敢浪费任何一秒钟的时间，接下来张羽全心全意地吐纳灵机，提炼法力。

0025.en: Meanwhile, in the spiritual root rental office, the administrator who had helped Zhang Yu looked at her computer screen in surprise. "Huh? The spiritual energy concentration has dropped?"
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: 而与此同时，在灵根的租凭办公室内，刚刚接待张羽的管理员看着眼前的电脑屏幕，意外道：“嗯？灵机浓度下降了？”

0025.en: The school's meditation rooms didn't just provide quiet; the spirit-gathering talismans arranged inside could control the concentration of spiritual energy in the room, improving cultivation effectiveness.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 学校租借的吐纳静室，自然不只有安静的效果，其中布置的聚灵符箓能够控制房间内的灵机浓度，让吐纳效果获得提高。

0025.en: The administrator carefully checked the monitoring parameters and found that meditation room #2 was showing a significant spiritual energy convergence, drawing in a large amount from the surroundings and causing the concentration in the nearby rooms to drop.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 管理员仔细观察了一下监控参数，发现是2号静室出现了明显的灵机汇聚现象，大量吸引了周围的灵机，从而导致四周围房间的灵机浓度出现下降。

0025.en: "Room #2... I remember that new first-year student is using it, right?"
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: “2号静室，我记得是刚刚那个高一学生在用吧？”

0025.en: "This level of spiritual energy convergence... a first-year student can do this?"
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: “这种程度的灵机汇聚，竟然是高一就能做到的？”

0025.en: The administrator was increasingly surprised. In her memory, only second-year students could use the Qi Sea Spiritual Root so effectively.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 管理员越发感觉到意外了，能把气海灵根发挥出如此功效，在她的记忆中至少都是高二的学生才能做到。

0025.en: "Zhang Yu, was it?"
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: “张羽吗？”

0025.en: Recalling the name and class from the registration, the administrator made a mental note, revising the "stingy" label she had given him.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 回想起刚刚那个学生登记的名字、班级，管理员默默记在了心中，更推翻了自己刚刚打在对方身上的抠门标签。

0025.en: "To be so powerful as a first-year, this student must have spent a lot of money on cultivation."
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: “高一就这么厉害，这学生在仙道上肯定花了不少钱。”

0025.en: As she activated more spirit-gathering talismans to restore the energy concentration, the administrator thought to herself, "I'll get his contact info later. If I can get him to sign up for a platinum membership, I won't have to worry about my sales quota for the next few months."
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: 管理员一边开启更多的聚灵符箓，将灵机浓度调整回去，一边在心中默默想到：“待会跟他加个联系方式，如果他能在我这开个白金会员，我这接下来几个月的业绩就不用愁了。”

0025.en: She decided not to tell anyone and to focus on developing this potential high-value customer herself.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 她打算谁也不告诉，自己一个人专心开发这位有潜力的客户。

0025.en: An hour passed in a flash.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 转眼间便是一小时过去。

0025.en: Immersed in the pleasure of the surging spiritual energy, Zhang Yu's mana had unknowingly increased from 9.4 to 9.5. This single hour was clearly worth half a day of his usual hard training.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 张羽沉浸在灵机狂涌而来的快感之中，法力不知不觉间已经从9.4提升到了9.5，显然这一小时已经抵得上张羽半日的苦修。

0025.en: Just then, a female voice came through the room's intercom.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 就在这时，房间里的通话器中响起一道女声。

0025.en: "Student Zhang Yu, your hour is almost up. Would you like to extend your time?"
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: “张羽同学，一小时的时间快到了，请问您需要加钟吗？”

0025.en: For some reason, Zhang Yu felt the administrator's voice was much gentler than before.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 不知为何，张羽感觉管理员的声音好像温柔了许多。

0025.en: Feeling the satisfaction of the surging spiritual energy and his technique running at full power, Zhang Yu couldn't help but ask, "How much to extend?"
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: 而感受着灵机狂涌，周天采气法全功率运转的满足感，张羽也忍不住问道：“加钟多少钱？”

0025.en: The administrator quickly replied, "The rental price for the Qi Sea Spiritual Root is 5,000 per hour. But we have a promotion today for new users. If you deposit 100,000 at once, you'll not only get an extra 10,000, but also an 12% discount on rental fees."
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: 管理员连忙说道：“气海灵根的租用价格是一小时5000块钱，不过我们今天有优惠活动，新用户如果一口气充10万的话，不但送一万块钱，还有8.8折的租凭费优惠。”

0025.en: Zhang Yu sighed internally and slowly stopped his cultivation. "I have things to do today, so I won't extend."
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: 张羽心中无奈地叹了口气，缓缓停下了吐纳：“我今天还有事，就不加钟了。”

0025.en: When he returned the spiritual root, Zhang Yu noticed the administrator was even more polite. He happened to have a question he wanted to ask.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 归还灵根的时候，张羽越发感觉到了管理员的客气，正好他也有些问题想要问。

0025.en: With a reluctant glance at the Qi Sea Spiritual Root being placed back into its jade box, Zhang Yu asked, "If this spiritual root were for sale, how much would it cost?"
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: 于是张羽依依不舍地看了一眼被收回玉匣里的气海灵根，开口问道：“这个灵根如果卖的话，要多少钱？”

0025.en: The administrator's eyes lit up. She smiled and said, "The price of the Qi Sea Spiritual Root is sixty million."
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: 管理员目光一动，微笑道：“气海灵根的价格是六千万。”

0025.en: Zhang Yu took a sharp breath inwardly but kept his expression calm. "That expensive?"
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: 张羽心中倒抽一口凉气，面色不变地感慨道：“这么贵？”

0025.en: The administrator smiled. "Yes. We don't really recommend buying it. Renting is much more cost-effective. After all, it's too extravagant to have a Heavenly Spiritual Root in the early Qi Refining stage. Most cultivators only consider buying one after they get into university."
0025.speaker: 管理员
0025.cn: 管理员笑着说道：“是呀，其实我们也不太建议买的，租要比买划算的多，毕竟炼气前期就配上天灵根还是太奢侈了，一般修行者都是要考入大学以后，才会考虑买灵根的事情。”

0025.en: Zhang Yu nodded slightly. He knew the final step to break through from the Qi Refining realm to the Foundation Establishment realm was to implant one's own spiritual root. That was indeed something for university students to worry about.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 张羽微微点头，他知道炼气境界冲向筑基境界的最后一重关卡，便是要种入一道属于自己的灵根，这也确实是大学生才需要考虑的东西。

0025.en: But whether one implanted a Heavenly, Earthly, or Human spiritual root depended entirely on the cultivator's financial resources.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 不过种入的到底是天灵根，地灵根，还是人灵根，就全看修行者自己的财力了。

0025.en: As for the even higher-grade Divine and Immortal Spiritual Roots, those could only be obtained by joining special departments or great sects.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 至于更高级的神灵根，仙灵根，那就只有加入特殊部门，又或者拜入大宗门之后才能重新移植了。

0025.en: "A useful Heavenly Spiritual Root is... so damn expensive."
0025.speaker: 张羽
0025.cn: “好用的天灵根，真的……TMD贵啊。”

0025.en: Taking one last deep look at the spiritual root as it was put away, Zhang Yu thought to himself that one day, he would buy a spiritual root of his own.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 深深地看了被收起来的灵根一眼，张羽心想着总有一天自己要买下一道属于自己的灵根。

0025.en: Before he left, the administrator took the initiative to add him as a contact. Only then did Zhang Yu learn her name was Wei Xin.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 而在他离开之前，管理员主动和他加了联系方式，张羽这才知道对方叫做魏馨。

0025.en: Wei Xin silently changed Zhang Yu's contact name to "Zhang Yu (Platinum Member Prospect)."
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 魏馨则默默将张羽的备注默默改成了张羽（白金会员种子）。

0026.en: Chapter 26: Signing Up for the Magic Competition and the Monthly Exam's Arrival
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 第26章 报名法赛和月考到来

0026.en: Songyang High School.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 嵩阳高中。

0026.en: In the blink of an eye, four days had passed since Zhang Yu rented the Sea of Qi Spiritual Root.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 转眼间，距离张羽租用气海灵根的那日已经过去了四天。

0026.en: This was the day for Songyang High School's first-year students to be selected for the city-wide Magic Competition.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 这一日正是嵩阳高中的高一年级挑选学生，准备报名参加全市法赛的日子。

0026.en: During Mana Class.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 法力课上。

0026.en: As the bell rang to end class, Zhang Yu stopped his meditation for once, opening his eyes to look toward the large screen.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 伴随着下课的铃声响起，张羽也难得停下了吐纳，睁开双眼朝着大屏幕的方向看去。

0026.en: After several more days of hard cultivation, his mana had continued to surge, jumping from 9.5 to 10.5. The rapid progress made many of his classmates stare in surprise.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 此刻又经过这几日的苦修，他的法力继续迅猛提升，已经由9.5冲到了10.5，进步幅度之快引得班内许多同学侧目。

0026.en: Zhang Yu's Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method had also advanced from Level 6 to Level 8 (3/160), but only he knew about this achievement. If his classmates and teachers found out, they would be more than just surprised.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 而张羽的周天采气法也一路从6级提升到了8级（3/160），只不过这项成绩就只有他自己知道了，若是被同学、老师们知道，恐怕就不是惊讶这么简单了。

0026.en: After all, while Zhang Yu's mana increase was fast, it wasn't unheard of. Many rich people could achieve even faster progress by spending enough money.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 毕竟张羽的法力提升虽然迅猛了些，但还有例可循，很多有钱人砸钱只要够多，那法力比他提升还快。

0026.en: But to advance a meditation technique to Level 8 in such a short time... at least at his current level, Zhang Yu didn't know anyone else who could do that.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 但短短时间内将一门吐纳法提升到8级……至少以张羽目前的水平，他不知道除了他还有谁做到这一点。

0026.en: He looked at the large screen, where the mana rankings for the entire grade had appeared.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 而此刻看向大屏幕，全年级的法力排行已经浮现了出来。

0026.en: First Place, Bai Zhenzhen,
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 第一名，白真真，

0026.en: Second Place, Qian Shen,
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 第二名，钱深，

0026.en: Zhang Yu scanned down the list and quickly found his own name in eighth place.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 张羽继续向下扫去，很快在第八名找到了自己。

0026.en: Eighth Place, Zhang Yu,
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 第八名，张羽，

0026.en: "Eighth place, huh?" Zhang Yu nodded slightly, knowing that signing up for the Magic Competition would be no problem now.
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “第八名吗？”张羽微微点头，知道接下来报名参加法赛是没什么问题了。

0026.en: But a chill quickly returned to his heart. Hearing the countdown timer, Zhang Yu had to close his eyes again and seize the moment to meditate.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 但很快心中的寒意又涌了起来，张羽听着那倒计时，不得不再次闭上眼睛，抓紧时间开始吐纳。

0026.en: On the platform, Teacher Yan brushed her hair back, glanced at the rankings with satisfaction, and said, "Over the past week, everyone's distraction rate has dropped by another 8%, and your mana has improved 12% more efficiently than last month. I am very pleased."
0026.speaker: 严老师
0026.cn: 而讲台上的严老师撩了撩头发，看了一眼排名满意说道：“最近这一周时间，大家的走神率又低了8%，法力提升效率比上个月高了12%，老师我很欣慰。”

0026.en: She saw Zhang Yu grabbing the time to meditate again and nodded in approval. "I want to give special praise to one student, and that is Zhang Yu."
0026.speaker: 严老师
0026.cn: 星火真人呵呵笑道：“我早就跟你说了，昆仑第一层从来不缺天才，只是缺人投资他们罢了。”

0026.en: "Not only has he maintained a 0% distraction rate for two consecutive weeks, but his mana has taken a huge leap in the past week, jumping from 16th place to 8th. That's truly remarkable. Let's give him a round of applause."
0026.speaker: 严老师
0026.cn: “不但连续两周维持0%的走神率，过去一周的时间里，在法力上更是有了质的飞跃，从16名冲到了第8名，真是太了不起了，大家为他鼓掌。”

0026.en: A few scattered claps sounded. Teacher Yan then announced that the top ten students would participate in the Magic Competition.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 稀稀拉拉的掌声响起，严老师接下来又宣布了前十名参加法赛的事情。

0026.en: "The competition starts next month. I will send you the specific schedule and rules as soon as I get them."
0026.speaker: 严老师
0026.cn: “法赛下个月开始，具体的参赛时间和规则，我拿到了就会发给你们。”

0026.en: "Alright, class dismissed."
0026.speaker: 严老师
0026.cn: “好了，下课吧。”

0026.en: "Oh, and any students who want to buy Mana-Gathering Pills, remember to come to my office. There's a discount recently..."
0026.speaker: 严老师
0026.cn: “对了，要买聚灵丹的同学记得来办公室找我，最近有优惠活动……”

0026.en: Down below, Bai Zhenzhen looked a bit thinner, her cheeks slightly sunken.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 台下的白真真看上去似乎瘦了一些，面颊都变得有些凹陷了。

0026.en: Seeing Teacher Yan's beaming face, she thought to herself, "The only reason everyone has been working so hard is because..."
0026.speaker: 白真真
0026.cn: 此刻看着严老师满面春风的样子，她心中暗道：“这段时间都这么卷，还不是因为……”

0026.en: At this thought, she subconsciously glanced toward Zhang Yu's seat, only to find him meditating again.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 想到这里，她下意识地又朝着张羽的座位看去，就发现他又开始吐纳了。

0026.en: "You beast! Zhang Yu, you animal! Stop it! Stop dragging everyone into this insane competition!"
0026.speaker: 白真真
0026.cn: “畜生啊！张羽你这个畜生！快给我停下！别特么给我卷了！”

0026.en: After cursing him in her heart, Bai Zhenzhen couldn't bear to watch her good brother advance all by himself. She closed her eyes in pain and also began to meditate.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 心里怒骂一阵，白真真终究还是无法眼睁睁地看着好兄弟独自一个人进步，她痛苦地闭上了眼睛，也同样开始了吐纳。

0026.en: Not far from Bai Zhenzhen, Qian Shen had been watching both her and Zhang Yu. Seeing them both use the break and the teacher's talking time to meditate, his heart sank.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 距离白真真坐的不远的钱深一直盯着白真真和张羽两人，看着两人先后开始抓紧课间时间和老师说话的时间吐纳，他心中就是一沉。

0026.en: As a student in Songyang High's model class, Qian Shen had never been afraid of competition.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 作为嵩阳高中的示范班学生，钱深自认为自己从小到大都不会怕卷。

0026.en: But after the last eight days of competing with Zhang Yu and Bai Zhenzhen, his mindset had changed.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 但过去八天时间，在和张羽、白真真这一路卷下来以后，他的思想有了变化。

0026.en: "They barely even go to the bathroom or scratch an itch. I really can't be as extreme as them!"
0026.speaker: 钱深
0026.cn: “连厕所都不怎么去上，痒都不抓一下，我真的没法做到他们这个地步啊！”

0026.en: "Compared to them, am I the one who isn't fully evolved?!"
0026.speaker: 钱深
0026.cn: “难道和他们比起来，我才是进化不够完全的那个？！”

0026.en: Staring at the two who were still meditating, Qian Shen finally closed his eyes, unwilling to be left behind.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 死死盯着还在吐纳的两人，钱深终于还是不甘地闭上了眼睛。

0026.en: Compete! I'll just have to grind harder!
0026.speaker: 钱深
0026.cn: 卷！就特么硬卷！

0026.en: During PE class.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 体育课上。

0026.en: Students were either injecting themselves with stimulants or doing physical training. The sound of beast-like roars filled the air, and the floor was slick with the strong smell of sweat.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 众多学生们扎针的扎针，炼体的炼体，伴随着一阵阵野兽般的嘶吼声，就连地板上都不断被沾染上浓烈的汗水气味。

0026.en: Bai Zhenzhen wiped the sweat from her forehead and glanced at the small, dark room in the corner.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 白真真擦了擦满头的汗水，下意识看了一眼角落里的小黑屋。

0026.en: Because PE teacher Wang Hai had led others to isolate him, Zhang Yu had been training alone in that small room during recent PE classes.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 张羽因为之前被体育老师王海带头孤立的关系，最近的体育课便一直在那间小房间里独自自修。

0026.en: But today, Zhang Yu wasn't meditating as he had been for the past few days. Instead, he had started practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 不过此刻的张羽却是没有继续像前几天一样吐纳灵机了，而是开始练习起了健体三十六式。

0026.en: With a series of cracking sounds, Zhang Yu's muscles bulged, erupting with ferocious power as he lifted and lowered the workout equipment, again and again...
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 噼啪一阵炸响中，便看到张羽身上的肌肉隆起，正爆发出一股股狂猛的力量，将眼前的锻炼器械猛然举起，放下，然后再次举起，放下……

0026.en: At the same time, he switched the specialty on his Feather Book from the Level 8 Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method to the Level 3 Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 与此同时，羽书上的专精也从8级的周天采气法，被他切换成了3级的健体三十六式。

0026.en: Zhang Yu had his reasons for doing this.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 张羽这么做自然是有原因的。

0026.en: First, because he lacked a matching Spiritual Root, the amount of spiritual energy he could absorb was limited, and continuing to upgrade his Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method was becoming less effective.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 首先便是因为缺乏灵根匹配的关系，张羽自身能够收摄的灵机太有限，周天采气法的继续升级效果已经越来越弱。

0026.en: Second, he had already qualified for the Magic Competition, so his next goal was the monthly exam in nine days.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 其次便是他已经获得了法赛资格，那么下一个目标就是九天后的月考了。

0026.en: "My mana has improved a lot recently. Even without active meditation, the passive effect of the Level 8 Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method is still 65% as effective."
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “最近法力已经提升了很多，而8级的周天采气法就算不去吐纳，时时刻刻的被动吐纳效果也有着主动吐纳的六成半。”

0026.en: "My mana score on the monthly exam will be good. Continuing to invest heavily in it... is not the most efficient way to raise my overall score."
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “我这次月考的法力成绩已经不会差，继续花大力气投入的话……对提分来说，性价比就有点低了。”

0026.en: Zhang Yu calculated in his head, "So, to improve my monthly exam score, I need to focus on Dao Heart, PE, Martial Arts, and Dao Techniques."
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: 张羽心中盘算：“那接下来要提升月考成绩的话，就要看道心、体育、武功、道术了。”

0026.en: "For Dao Heart... although I haven't mastered the Heavenly Martial Heart-Refining Art, I understand its principles. That should be enough to get a good score on the Dao Heart test."
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “道心方面……虽然天武炼心诀我尚未练成，但其中奥妙我已经尽数参悟，用来参加道心考试应该能获得不错成绩。”

0026.en: "For Martial Arts, aside from the 20 points from theory, the other 80 points are from combat. For that, I'd need to hire a sparring partner, so improvement won't be fast."
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “武功的话，除了理论的20分，剩下80分都看实战，这玩意要雇人给我喂招和我实战，提升没那么快。”

0026.en: "Dao Techniques are even harder. It's impossible to improve in a short time."
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “道术方面就更难了，短时间内不可能有提升。”

0026.en: After thinking it over, Zhang Yu decided it was best to spend the next nine days improving his Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms and his Physical Strength.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 张羽思来想去，还是觉得接下来9天时间多用来提升健体三十六式和肉体强度更好。

0026.en: And while practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, he discovered an unexpected benefit from his Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 特别是在他练习健体三十六式的过程中，竟然还发现了一个周天采气法带来的额外好处。

0026.en: As he exerted his strength and his muscles contracted and expanded, the mana cycle in his body continued to run, converting wisps of spiritual energy into mana.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 只见他周身运劲，浑身肌肉随着他的用力而不断收缩、膨胀的时候，体内的法力循环仍旧在持续运转，伴随着法力的流淌将丝丝缕缕的灵机转化为法力。

0026.en: During this process, as the mana flowed through his strained tendons and torn muscles, it began to nourish the damaged parts, heal his flesh and blood, speed up recovery, and enhance the effectiveness of his training.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 而在这个过程中，随着法力循环流淌过那些磨损的大筋，经过那些被撕裂的肌肉，法力开始滋润那些因为锻炼而被磨损的部位，滋补血肉，加速修复，提升锻炼的效果。

0026.en: Originally, the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms could achieve a similar effect with mana once it reached Level 3.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 本来健体三十六式达到第三级以后，便能引动法力做到类似效果。

0026.en: But now, under the influence of the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method, a more complex and delicate mana circulation continuously covered his entire body, greatly improving his recovery and training results.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 而现在在周天采气法的运转下，更加复杂、更加细腻的法力循环不间断地覆盖了张羽的浑身上下，大大提升了他的恢复力和炼体效果。

0026.en: He felt that if he could normally only practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms twenty or thirty times a day, with the help of the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method, he could now practice it at least fifty or sixty times.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 他感觉自己如果本来一整天只能练习二三十遍健体三十六式的话，那现在有周天采气法的辅助，每天起码能练习五六十遍健体三十六式了。

0026.en: So, for the next few days, Zhang Yu planned to start grinding the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 于是接下来的时间，张羽就打算开始卷健体三十六式了。

0026.en: As these thoughts crossed his mind, a wave of emotion hit him.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 脑海中闪过这些想法的时候，张羽心中突然涌起一丝感慨。

0026.en: "I think I'm getting more and more used to the grind."
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “我好像越来越习惯卷了。”

0026.en: "Sigh, this broken Kunxu really turns people into monsters."
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “唉，这破昆墟真是把人变成了鬼啊。”

0026.en: But after practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms for 15 consecutive repetitions, Zhang Yu realized he was wrong.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 但在连续练习15遍健体三十六式后，张羽发现自己错了。

0026.en: He lay on the floor, drenched in so much sweat that you could almost see the outline of his body on the ground.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 只见他浑身是汗地躺在了地上，被汗水浸透的地板似乎都能看到一个隐约的人形。

0026.en: Even the PE teacher, Wang Hai, if he saw this diligent scene, would surely say: "Good work, take a rest."
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 即便是体育老师王海若看到这勤学苦练的一幕，也必然会说一句：辛苦了，休息会儿吧。

0026.en: But the one supervising Zhang Yu was not a person. It would only say... Ritual: You must continue training.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 但此刻监督张羽的却不是个人，只会发生……仪式：还得练。

0026.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement. Work hard to fulfill your wish. Do not deliberately slack off. 10."
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，10。”

0026.en: Zhang Yu sighed in despair, "You idiot! I'm at my limit."
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: 张羽哀叹道：“智障！我已经极限了。”

0026.en: This is torture!
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 苦也！

0026.en: This physical grind was so much more painful than meditation.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 这炼体牛马比起吐纳真是苦太多了。

0026.en: Zhang Yu felt like his lungs were working like a bellows, and every inch of his body screamed with a tearing pain.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 张羽此刻只觉得自己肺喘得像风箱一样，浑身上下的每一寸血肉都传来撕裂般的酸痛。

0026.en: "I was so naive to think I had already adapted to this broken world."
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “是我太年轻了，竟然以为自己已经适应了这破世界。”

0026.en: Hearing the constant countdown in his ear, Zhang Yu remained lying on the floor like a dead fish. Only when the countdown was about to end did he suddenly jump up, enduring the pain and exhaustion, and continue his training.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 听着耳边不断的倒计时，张羽却仍旧像条死鱼一样躺在地上，直到倒计时快要走向最后一刻的时候，他才猛地跳了起来，忍着浑身的酸痛和劳累，继续开始健体三十六式的锻炼。

0026.en: Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms Level 3 (22/30)
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 健体三十六式3级（22/30）

0026.en: After forcing himself through another repetition, Zhang Yu collapsed into his own puddle of sweat again, listening to the chilling countdown and feeling the ritual's power threatening to tear his body apart.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 好不容易又坚持完一遍，张羽再次躺倒在自己的汗水上，一边听着那满是寒意的倒计时，一边感受着那仪式力量那好似要将自己身体撕成粉碎的架势。

0026.en: "How can any human adapt to this world?"
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “这世界是人能适应的吗？”

0026.en: "Dammit... Before I'm driven to jump off a building, I have to break this stupid ritual!"
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “妈的……在我被逼得跳楼之前，一定要把这破仪式给解开！”

0026.en: That day at noon, Zhang Yu did something unusual. To the surprise of Bai Zhenzhen and Zhou Tianyi, he spent over 100 yuan on a huge bucket of food.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 而这天中午，张羽也一反常态，在白真真和周天翊意外的目光中，一口气花了100多块钱，点了一大桶饭菜。

0026.en: If the growth of mana required absorbing more spiritual energy,
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 如果说法力的增长，离不开吸收更多灵机的话。

0026.en: Then the improvement of physical training required eating more nutritious food.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 那么炼体效果的提升，就离不开更多、更营养的进食。

0026.en: "I'm going to eat ten pounds!"
0026.speaker: 张羽
0026.cn: “我要吃十斤！”

0026.en: Seeing the size of Zhang Yu's lunch, Bai Zhenzhen knew how hard he must have trained in PE class today.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 而看到张羽今天的午饭份量，白真真便知道对方今天体育课操练得有多狠。

0026.en: "Has he had enough of the mana competition and is now starting on physical strength?"
0026.speaker: 白真真
0026.cn: “是觉得法力暂时卷够了，又要开始卷肉体强度了吗？”

0026.en: When did this guy start trying so hard?
0026.speaker: 白真真
0026.cn: 这家伙到底是什么时候开始这么拼的？

0026.en: Could it be the extra competitiveness from not being neutered?
0026.speaker: 白真真
0026.cn: 难道是没绝育带来的额外胜负心？

0026.en: Watching Zhang Yu swallow a whole chicken leg and crunch the bones into pieces in a few bites, Bai Zhenzhen found herself eating faster too.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 看着张羽一口将整块鸡腿吞进嘴里，几口便将鸡骨头咬成粉碎吞下，白真真也不知不觉加快了吃饭的速度。

0026.en: Zhou Tianyi said helplessly, "Slow down, you two. No one is grading you on your eating speed."
0026.speaker: 周天翊
0026.cn: 周天翊无奈道：“你们吃慢点，吃饭速度又没人打分。”

0026.en: Not far away, Su Haifeng, also eating in the cafeteria, looked at some of the slow-eating students and thought, "The lunch break is still too long."
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 不远处同，样在食堂吃饭的苏海峰看着有些学生慢吞吞的样子，心中暗道：“午休还是太长了。”

0026.en: "I've been saying the school should install more security cameras in the cafeteria. Any student who takes more than 10 minutes to eat should be publicly criticized and fined."
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: “我就说学校里应该多在食堂加几个监控摄像头，吃饭时间超过10分钟的全部通报批评，再外加罚款。”

0026.en: With this in mind, he drafted a proposal to send to the principal, suggesting this valuable cafeteria improvement.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 想到这里，他便拟了一份计划书，打算发给校长，提出这份宝贵的食堂改造建议。

0026.en: For the next few days, besides his regular classes, Zhang Yu spent every free moment practicing the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms. When he reached his physical limit, he was forced to meditate and absorb spiritual energy.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 接下来的每一天里，张羽除了各门整课之外，有时间便练习健体三十六式，到达极限了练不了体，那便被逼着吐纳灵机。

0026.en: After days of this torture, the monthly exam finally arrived.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 就这么一天天被折磨过来，时间终于到了九天后的月考。

0027.en: Chapter 27: The Pre-Exam Sprint
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 第27章 考间冲刺

0027.en: Three in the morning.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 凌晨三点。

0027.en: Inside an office at Songyang High School.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 嵩阳高中的办公室内。

0027.en: Su Haifeng looked at the list on his computer screen and spoke into the phone, "Yes... his Dao Heart score hasn't changed."
0027.speaker: 苏海峰
0027.cn: 苏海峰一边看着电脑屏幕上的列表，一边朝着电话另一头说道：“嗯……道心成绩没有什么变化。”

0027.en: "His mana saw a rapid increase a while ago. It seems he spent most of his time and money on breathing exercises, which is how he broke into the top 10."
0027.speaker: 苏海峰
0027.cn: “法力前段时间提升很迅猛，看样子大部分时间和钱应该都用在吐纳上了，这才冲进了前10的水平。”

0027.en: "His Physical Strength hasn't been tested for three weeks because he's been isolated, but it had already dropped to 19th place. Now that he's focusing on mana, he'll be lucky to even stay at 19th."
0027.speaker: 苏海峰
0027.cn: “肉体强度虽然因为被孤立的关系，已经三周没测了，但之前就已经跌到了第19名，现在他又把重心放在法力上，能保持19都谢天谢地了。”

0027.en: "There's no obvious progress in martial arts or Dao techniques either. It's possible he'll drop below 30th place in these two subjects on this monthly exam."
0027.speaker: 苏海峰
0027.cn: “武功、道术也都没什么明显进步，这两门在这次月考跌到30名以后也有可能。”

0027.en: Looking at Zhang Yu's recent academic records, Su Haifeng shook his head. "In short, I'm not optimistic about him making any significant progress on this monthly exam."
0027.speaker: 苏海峰
0027.cn: 看着张羽最近的成绩记录，苏海峰摇了摇头：“总之，我不太看好他这次月考的成绩会有大幅度进步。”

0027.en: "The school will probably still offer him a Grade D contract."
0027.speaker: 苏海峰
0027.cn: “学校估计还是会给他丁级合同。”

0027.en: "I understand. I'll do my best to persuade him to sign the contract."
0027.speaker: 苏海峰
0027.cn: “我知道了，我会尽量劝说他签下合同的。”

0027.en: "I don't know how he managed to get Li Xuelian's approval, but after taking the exam, he should understand his own situation."
0027.speaker: 苏海峰
0027.cn: “虽然不知道他是怎么得到李雪莲的赏识，但考试也考了，他应该也认清楚自己的状况了。”

0027.en: After hanging up, Su Haifeng casually closed Zhang Yu's record and looked at the next document.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 挂了电话，苏海峰随手关闭了张羽的成绩记录，又看起了下一份文件。

0027.en: To him, Zhang Yu was just a minor issue among many. There were more important matters and more important students at Songyang High School that needed his attention.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 对他来说，张羽也不过是众多事情中的一小件罢了，嵩阳高中里有更多的事情，更重要的学生需要他关注。

0027.en: Four in the morning.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 凌晨四点。

0027.en: In the abandoned building.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 烂尾楼里。

0027.en: Today was the day of Songyang High School's monthly exam.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 今天便是嵩阳高中月考的日子。

0027.en: Although Zhang Yu's strength had improved significantly after nine days of torment, he was still seizing every moment to practice the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, trying to boost his power a little more before the exam officially began.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 虽然经过九日的折磨，张羽的实力再次有了大幅度的进步，但此刻的他还是在抓紧时间进行健体三十六式的练习，争取在考试正式开始之前，再提一提自己的实力。

0027.en: His panel in the Feather Book's prologue now looked like this:
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 而他此刻在羽书序章上的面板也变成了：

0027.en: Zhang Yu
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 张羽

0027.en: Dao Heart Level 1
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 道心1级

0027.en: Mana
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 法力

0027.en: Physical Strength Level 1.05
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 肉体强度1.05级

0027.en: His mana had increased from 10.5 to 11.7, thanks to his passive breathing exercises mixed with occasional active sessions.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 法力依靠着他的被动吐纳夹杂着不定时的主动吐纳，从10.5提升到了11.7。

0027.en: His Physical Strength, through his intense training, had risen from level 0.85 to 1.05.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 肉体强度更是在他的疯狂磨练下，从0.85级提升到了1.05级。

0027.en: Of course, the biggest improvement in these nine days was the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, which was now at Level 9 (89/90).
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 当然，这九天里进步最大的还是健体三十六式，此刻已经变成了健体三十六式9级（89/90）。

0027.en: As Zhang Yu threw his final punch, the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms finally reached Level 10, the maximum limit for the Qi Refining realm.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 而伴随着张羽此刻最后一拳打出，健体三十六式也终于冲到了10级，提升到了炼气境界所能达到的极限。

0027.en: The moment he raised the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms to Level 10, countless memories seemed to flow through his mind—images of him practicing the forms over and over, and his deeper, more profound understanding of his own body.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 也就在他将健体三十六式提升到10级的这一刻，脑海中似有无数记忆流淌而过，那是他一遍又一遍，一遍又一遍练习健体三十六式的身影，是他对自己肉身理解更深刻，更深入的思考。
