0027.en: After countless sessions of careful refinement, his body finally underwent a qualitative change and began to adjust itself in a more rational way.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 肉体在无数次的精心打磨后，终于迎来了某种质变，开始按照一种更合理的方式进行调整。

0027.en: A roaring sound seemed to echo in his mind!
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 脑海中似有一道轰鸣声响起！

0027.en: As his heart pumped waves of Qi and blood to his limbs, Zhang Yu's entire body felt like it was undergoing a transformation.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 随着心脏将一波波气血泵向他的四肢百骸，张羽的浑身上下仿佛是迎来了一场蜕变。

0027.en: His muscles contracted and expanded, and cracking sounds came from his joints. The outline of his body seemed to grow slightly larger.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 只见他浑身血肉一阵收缩又膨胀，骨头关节内更是发出一道道咔咔脆响，整个人的身体轮廓隐隐都变大了一些。

0027.en: His muscles were now better distributed for exerting force, and his bone structure became more solid and stable. His entire body seemed more balanced and coordinated.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 筋肉分布变得更加适合发力，骨骼结构变得更加坚固稳定，整个身体似乎也调整得更均衡，更协调。

0027.en: This was a physical optimization that should have happened gradually while leveling up the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms to Level 10, but now it was completed in an instant.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 这本是在将炼体三十六式提升到10级的过程中，一点一点完成的肉体结构优化，此刻却在瞬间得到完成。

0027.en: Physical Strength Level 1.05 → 1.25
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 肉体强度1.05级→1.25级

0027.en: With the optimization of his body structure, Zhang Yu's Physical Strength increased by 0.2 levels, a 20% jump.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 随着身体结构的调整优化，张羽的肉体强度一口气增长了0.2级，有了20%的大涨。

0027.en: More importantly, Zhang Yu could feel that this structural optimization was more than just a one-time boost. The more balanced and coordinated body he had now would help him progress faster and better on his body-refining path in the future.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 特别是张羽能感觉到，这种身体结构优化带来的提升，不仅仅是一次肉体强度的增长，而是有着更长远的效果，此刻更均衡更协调的肉体结构，会让他未来的炼体之路走得更好更快。

0027.en: Zhang Yu smiled, feeling a surge of excitement. "Reaching Level 10 in the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms actually optimized my body structure."
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: 张羽微微一笑，心中兴奋起来：“健体三十六式提升到10级，竟然能够主动优化一次我的身体结构。”

0027.en: "Does every skill give such a big boost when it reaches Level 10?"
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: “难道技能提升到10级，都会有这么大提升吗？”

0027.en: This was something the teachers had never taught in class.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 这是老师课上没有教过的信息。

0027.en: But Zhang Yu figured that Level 10 skills, even for a basic martial art like the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, were too far out of reach for first-year high school students. It was normal that the teachers wouldn't mention it.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 但张羽想也知道，技能10级……哪怕是健体三十六式这样的基础武学，对高一学生们也太遥远了，老师没提相关信息也很正常。

0027.en: "Next, I'll get the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method to Level 10 and see what happens."
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: “那接下来就把周天采气法也提升到10级，看看会有什么效果。”

0027.en: Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method Level 8 (3/160)
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 周天采气法8级（3/160）

0027.en: Zhang Yu estimated it would take him a week at most to get this breathing method to Level 10 as well.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 张羽估计自己最多花个一周时间，应该就能把这门吐纳法也提升到10级了。

0027.en: However, despite this thought, he didn't immediately switch the Feather Book's specialization to the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method, because he had other plans for today.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 不过虽然这么想着，他却没有急着将羽书的专精立刻切换到了周天采气法上，只因为他今天另有打算。

0027.en: "Please abide by the ritual's agreement. Work hard to fulfill the wish. Do not intentionally slack off or delay. 10."
0027.speaker: 邪神
0027.cn: “请遵守仪式约定，努力完成愿望，不要故意偷懒拖延，10。”

0027.en: Just as Zhang Yu was feeling excited and appreciating his progress, the damned countdown sounded again.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 就在张羽心中振奋，感受着自己的提升略微感慨的时候，那该死的倒计时又一次响了起来。

0027.en: Zhang Yu cursed a few times, but the thought that this thing had no will or intelligence left him with a feeling of emptiness, like punching cotton.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 张羽骂了几句，但想到这玩意连意志、智慧都没有，骂上几句也只剩下一种拳头打在棉花上的空虚感。

0027.en: So he sat down cross-legged, meditating and breathing while resting his body, which was exhausted from another night of work, to recover his stamina.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 于是他还是盘坐下来，打坐吐纳的同时，顺便休息一下又劳累了一夜的肉身，恢复恢复体力。

0027.en: Getting ready... to face the monthly exam.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 准备……迎接月考。

0027.en: Songyang High School.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 嵩阳高中。

0027.en: The hurrying students had a trace of anxiety on their faces.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 行色匆匆的学生们脸上带着一丝丝不安。

0027.en: The campus today seemed to be tinged with a grim atmosphere.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 今天的校园似乎也染上了一一股萧杀气息。

0027.en: Zhang Yu looked up and saw that the original banner, "Live to die, learn to die," had been replaced with an anti-suicide slogan: "If one person jumps, the whole family pays."
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 张羽抬头望去，原本“活到死，学到死”的横幅被换成了“一人跳楼，全家赔钱”的反自杀宣传语。

0027.en: Even the rooftop had been fenced off with barbed wire, making it harder for students to jump.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 就连天台外围也被圈上了一层铁丝网，增加了学生们的跳楼难度。

0027.en: Beside him, Bai Zhenzhen commented with approval, "Looks like those beastly school leaders finally care about the students. They know the monthly exam can lead to suicides, so they've taken some precautions."
0027.speaker: 白真真
0027.cn: 一旁的白真真赞道：“看样子那些人面兽心的校领导总算会关心学生了，知道月考容易引人跳楼，还特地做了点防护措施。”

0027.en: But as soon as she arrived at the cafeteria for breakfast and saw the notice that some food prices had increased, Bai Zhenzhen couldn't help but get angry.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 但刚刚来到食堂吃早饭，看到有一些饭菜价格上涨的通知，白真真就忍不住暴怒起来。

0027.en: "The prices went up again? How many times has it been since the semester started?"
0027.speaker: 白真真
0027.cn: “又涨价了？开学后第几次了？”

0027.en: "A bunch of parasites can't even run a cafeteria properly. How can they run a school?"
0027.speaker: 白真真
0027.cn: “一群虫豸连食堂都搞不好，怎么搞好学校？”

0027.en: Zhang Yu tried to calm her down. "Sigh, being inhuman is normal for them. Just stay calm and don't let it affect your exam today."
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: 张羽劝慰道：“唉，不当人对他们来说是正常操作，放平心态，不要影响了今天的月考。”

0027.en: But a moment later, after hearing the new rule from the cafeteria lady, Zhang Yu shouted angrily, "Why is the 5-yuan meal limited to one per person per day? I could buy ten yesterday! Why can't students even get a full meal?!"
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: 但片刻之后，听着食堂打菜阿姨口里的新规定，张羽怒道：“凭什么5元套餐一人一天只能打一份了？我昨天还能打十份呢！学生只是想吃饱为什么都不行！”

0027.en: "Alright, alright, Yu-zi." Bai Zhenzhen patted Zhang Yu's shoulder and comforted him, "Don't be rash, a teacher is looking over. I'll just buy an extra 'poor-man's meal' for you."
0027.speaker: 白真真
0027.cn: “好了好了羽子。”白真真拍了拍张羽的肩膀，安慰道：“不要冲动，有老师看过来了，我帮你多买一份穷鬼套餐就是了。”

0027.en: After getting their food and finding a seat, Zhang Yu checked his bank balance.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 端着饭菜找到位置坐下，张羽看了看自己的存款余额。

0027.en: Although he had received another 500-yuan reward for 0% distraction, his savings had dropped to 6,000 due to the high cost of food for his recent body training, continuous use and purchase of neuro-fillers, and other miscellaneous expenses like transportation.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 虽然又一次拿了0%走神率的500块奖励，但因为这段时间每天炼体所需的大量伙食消费，以及神经填充剂的连续使用和购买，还有交通出行等等杂费，张羽的存款降低到了6000。

0027.en: A new month was about to begin, which meant new loan payments, and new rent and utility bills to pay...
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 而时间则马上要迎来新的一个月，那便代表着新的贷款要还，新的房租、水电要付……

0027.en: And then there was the cost of food. After starting his high-intensity body training, Zhang Yu felt his appetite growing larger and larger. Eating ten pounds a day was normal, which meant his daily food expenses were several hundred yuan, adding up to over ten thousand a month.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 还有伙食费，开始高强度炼体之后，张羽就感觉到自己的胃口越来越大，一天吃个十斤都很正常，每天伙食费就得几百块，那一个月就得上万了。

0027.en: Zhang Yu felt more and more that cultivation was something that cost more money the further you went.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 张羽越发感觉到修仙这种事情，果然是越修越花钱。

0027.en: "I hope I can get a good score on the monthly exam and get a good contract."
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: “希望月考能考个好成绩，拿个好合同。”

0027.en: "Otherwise, I'll have to go back to working part-time."
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: “不然又得去打工了。”

0027.en: Just then, Zhou Tianyi sat down next to them with his food tray and shook his head helplessly. "Do you guys know why the cafeteria raised its prices?"
0027.speaker: 周天翊
0027.cn: 就在这时，周天翊端着饭菜坐到了两人身旁，只听他无奈地摇了摇头：“你们知道食堂为什么涨价吗？”

0027.en: Zhang Yu and Bai Zhenzhen both looked up sharply at Zhou Tianyi, waiting for him to continue.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 张羽和白真真猛地一同抬起头来，盯着周天翊，等待着他继续说下去。

0027.en: "The city government, in order to promote Oasis Company's synthetic food, has raised the tariffs on ingredients imported from other cities. In the future, the prices of all food in Songyang City, except for synthetic food, will probably keep rising."
0027.speaker: 周天翊
0027.cn: “市政府为了推广绿洲公司的合成食物，提高了其他城市进口过来的食材关税，未来恐怕整个嵩阳市除了合成食物之外的食品价格都会不断上涨。”

0027.en: "I heard the principal is also considering switching the cafeteria's pre-made meals to synthetic food."
0027.speaker: 周天翊
0027.cn: “听说校长也在考虑未来把食堂的预制菜换成合成食物。”

0027.en: Before he started cultivating, the original Zhang Yu had eaten a lot of synthetic food, since it was much cheaper.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 原身的张羽在修仙之前其实也吃过不少合成食物，毕竟合成食物的价格要便宜许多。

0027.en: Fried insects, plant-based protein, plus recycled water and oil—it tasted so bad that even a pig wouldn't eat it.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 油炸昆虫、植物蛋白再加上循环水和油，味道只能说猪都不吃。

0027.en: "We won't even be able to get pre-made meals anymore?"
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: “竟然吃不到预制菜了？”

0027.en: Hearing this, Zhang Yu and Bai Zhenzhen sighed again, cursing Oasis Company and the city government for being so inhuman.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 于是听到这番话的张羽、白真真又是一阵哀叹，怒骂绿洲公司和市政府全都不当人。

0027.en: After breakfast, because it was the monthly exam, the three of them didn't go back to the classroom as usual, but went to their respective exam halls.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 吃完早饭，因为今天是月考，三人没有像往常一样回到教室，而是前往了各自的考场。

0027.en: The morning consisted of the general education exam and the martial arts theory exam, both of which were written tests. The former was worth 50 points, the latter 20 points.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 上午是通识教育考试，以及武道课的理论考试，都是笔试答题，前者总分50分，后者总分20分。

0027.en: The afternoon was for the Dao techniques exam, worth 100 points, and the martial arts practical exam, worth 80 points.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 下午则是总分100分的道术考试，以及80分的武道实战考试。

0027.en: The 80 points from the practical exam, combined with the 20 from the theory exam, made up the 100 points for the martial arts course.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 这实战的80分加上上午武道理论的20分，正好便是武道课的100分。

0027.en: The morning exams were all written, and the original Zhang Yu had already mastered this material.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 上午都是笔试，原生的张羽在这方面早就学得滚瓜烂熟。

0027.en: After the exam, Zhang Yu didn't bother checking answers with other students. Instead, he quickly ate lunch and hurried to the small garden to start training.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 考完之后的张羽便也没有像其他同学一样忙着对答案，而是匆匆吃了午饭之后，就抓紧时间来到小花园里开始了锻炼。

0027.en: Sanshou Level 1 (0/10)
0027.speaker: 旁白

0027.en: Zhang Yu switched the Feather Book's specialization to Sanshou, which was why he hadn't switched to the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method earlier.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 张羽将羽书的专精切换成了散手，这也是他之前没有切换成周天采气法的原因。

0027.en: After maxing out the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms yesterday, no matter how much he practiced the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method, he couldn't make much progress in the remaining time.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 在昨天将健体三十六式冲到10级之后，剩下的时间不论他如何吐纳周天采气法，都不可能获得太大提升。

0027.en: But if he used the daytime break to improve his Level 1 Sanshou, Zhang Yu estimated he could at least raise it to Level 2.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 但若是抓紧白天的休息时间来提升只有1级的散手的话，张羽估计最少都能把这门武功提升到2级。

0027.en: This would surely give him a significant boost for the afternoon's martial arts practical exam.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 这对下午的武道实战考试来说，必然能有不小的提升。

0027.en: With this in mind, Zhang Yu practiced even more diligently.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 想到这里，张羽练习的更加认真了。

0027.en: As he moved, propelled by his Level 1.25 Physical Strength, his muscles and bones sang in unison. Each punch and palm strike carried the sound of wind and thunder.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 只见他出招之间，在1.25级肉体强度的推动下，浑身上下筋骨齐鸣，一拳一掌都带着阵阵风雷之声。

0027.en: At the same time, with each move, a trace of mana was circulated to different parts of his body, enhancing the power of the strike.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 与此同时，一丝丝的法力随着他每一招打出的同时，被运转到不同的身体部位，增强着这一招的威力。

0027.en: Sanshou was a basic practical martial art. Although it had only 15 moves, including punches, palms, kicks, and throws, it not only covered various combat situations but each move also had a corresponding mana circulation route.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 散手是一门基础的实战武学，虽然总共也只有15招，但其中或拳或掌，或腿或摔，不但能分别应对了各种不同的实战情况，每一招还有着对应的法力运转路线。

0027.en: Zhang Yu was now repeatedly practicing these 15 moves.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 张羽此刻便是反复练习着这15招。

0027.en: As a practical martial art, the training intensity of Sanshou was far lower than that of the Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 作为实战武学，散手的练习强度远低于健体三十六式。

0027.en: Coupled with his Level 1.25 Physical Strength, the mana circulation from his Level 8 Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method, and the body optimization from his Level 10 Body-Strengthening Thirty-Six Forms, he was able to practice the Sanshou moves at a rapid pace. After just over fifty minutes, he had raised Sanshou to Level 2.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 再加上张羽此刻1.25级肉体等级，以及8级周天采气法的法力循环，还有10级健体三十六式带来的身体优化，让他锻炼散手招数的速度更是迅猛，短短五十多分钟后，便将散手提升到了2级。

0027.en: Sanshou Level 1 (0/10) → Sanshou Level 2 (0/20)
0027.speaker: 旁白

0027.en: In an instant, Zhang Yu felt the 15 Sanshou moves flash through his mind, becoming deeply ingrained in his memory.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 刹那间，张羽只感觉到15招散手在他心中来回闪烁，转眼间便已经烂熟于心。

0027.en: But Zhang Yu didn't stop. Although he felt some fatigue, he decided to continue practicing this martial art.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 但张羽没有停下，虽然感觉到身体有些疲劳，但他还是决定继续练习这门武学。

0027.en: "There are two and a half hours until the afternoon exam starts."
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: “还有两个半小时开始下午的考试。”

0027.en: "I'll see if I can push Sanshou to Level 3 before the exam."
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: “试试看能不能在考试之前，把散手推到3级。”

0027.en: Zhang Yu continued to practice the 15 moves of Sanshou over and over, dripping with sweat.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 便见张羽反反复复，挥汗如雨地练习着散手的15招。

0027.en: His body grew more and more tired, his hands and feet gradually became sore, and his movements started to lose their form slightly.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 身体越来越疲劳，双手双脚逐渐开始变得酸软，动作也微微开始走形。

0027.en: But whenever Zhang Yu thought about the mountain of debt he was under and his ever-increasing expenses, he gritted his teeth and persevered.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 但张羽只要想到自己身上的一屁股债，想到日渐沉重的花费，便始终咬牙坚持了下去。

0027.en: Two hours later, a large drop of sweat splattered on the ground.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 两个多小时后，斗大的汗珠啪嗒一声滴在了地上。

0027.en: Steam was rising from Zhang Yu's body, and his muscles were intensely hot from more than three hours of high-intensity exercise.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 此刻的张羽浑身上下冒着热气，肌肉因为三个多小时的高强度运动而剧烈升温。

0027.en: But a smile appeared on Zhang Yu's face. He had finally succeeded in pushing this martial art to the third level.
0027.speaker: 张羽
0027.cn: 但张羽的脸上却露出一丝微笑，他终于顺利将这门武学推到了第三级。

0028.en: Chapter 28: Dao Arts and Combat
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 第28章 道术和实战

0028.en: Unarmed Combat Level 2 (0/20) → Unarmed Combat Level 3 (0/30)
0028.speaker: 旁白

0028.en: In an instant, the fifteen unarmed combat moves became much more familiar in his mind. Even the follow-up variations and connections between each move became incredibly clear.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 刹那间，十五招散手在他脑海中变得越发精熟，甚至就连每一招的后续变化、相互衔接也变得无比清晰明白。

0028.en: The mana flow for each move felt like instinct. Zhang Yu felt that if he were to execute a move now, the mana in his body would shift on its own, naturally flowing to his hands and feet.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 每一招的法力运转更变得像是本能一样，张羽感觉到自己此刻若是一招打出，体内法力便如自生变化，自然而然随之运转到手脚上。

0028.en: "The passive breathing of the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method also helped in this process."
0028.speaker: 张羽
0028.cn: “周天采气法的被动吐纳在这过程中也起到了效果。”

0028.en: Zhang Yu felt the mana circulating in his body. Because the mana was constantly flowing everywhere, it made channeling it for his unarmed combat techniques much smoother.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 张羽感觉着自己体内的法力循环，能感觉到因为时时刻刻法力都在体内各处游走的关系，这让他施展散手时，运转法力变得加得心应手。

0028.en: He was impressed by how much the Zhou Tian Qi-Gathering Method helped beginners. It wasn't just for breathing and body strengthening; even his combat skills benefited greatly.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他有些感慨周天采气法对初学者的帮助之大，不但在吐纳和炼体上，就连实战武学都受益匪浅。

0028.en: But the exams were about to start, so Zhang Yu didn't have much time to feel emotional.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 不过马上就要考试，没时间给张羽多做感慨。

0028.en: He did some breathing exercises to recover his stamina, then hurried to the examination hall.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他稍稍吐纳一会，恢复了一下体力之后，便赶往了考场。

0028.en: The first exam in the afternoon was Dao Arts, and the second was Martial Arts Combat.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 下午第一场是道术考试，第二场才是武道实战考试。

0028.en: The Dao Arts exam was mainly about recognizing and using talismans.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 道术考试的内容主要便是符箓的认识和使用。

0028.en: After all, at the Qi Refining realm, one couldn't master true Dao Arts yet. They could only use their knowledge and mana to activate talismans, so the three years of Dao Arts courses in high school were mostly about talismans.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 毕竟炼气境界尚未能掌握真正的道术，只能通过自己的知识和法力来催动符箓，所以高中三年的道术课程基本都和符箓相关。

0028.en: The "Fu" are incantations, and the "Lu" are registers. Talismans are the secret methods for communicating with deities and controlling divine power.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 其中符便是符咒，箓便是箓书，所谓符箓，便是指人沟通神灵，驾驭神力的秘法。

0028.en: Inside the computer lab.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 电脑机房内。

0028.en: Having arrived at the exam hall, Zhang Yu sat in front of a computer, mentally reviewing everything he knew about talismans.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 来到考场的张羽坐在一台电脑前，心里默默回忆着关于符箓的种种知识。

0028.en: Nearby, Zhao Tianxing was quickly flipping through his textbook, repeatedly memorizing key points he was afraid of forgetting.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 不远处的赵天行正抓紧翻阅教材，反复记忆着一些自己害怕忘记的知识点。

0028.en: Bai Zhenzhen was taking a short nap on her desk, seeming not at all nervous about the upcoming exam.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 白真真趴在桌上小憩，似乎对接下来的考试一点也不紧张。

0028.en: Just then, a bell rang. The students put everything not related to the exam on the table at the front of the classroom and returned to their seats.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 就在这时，伴随着一阵铃声响起，学生们纷纷将与考试无关的东西放到了教室前方的桌面上，然后回到了自己的考试座位。

0028.en: A moment later, the computer screens in front of them flickered, and the exam paper appeared.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 片刻之后，众人面前的电脑屏幕微微一闪，其中已经浮现出了他们这次的考卷。

0028.en: Question 1: Which of the following talismans belongs to the Great Deity of Universal Transport from the Ministry of Transportation.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 第一题：以下哪一种符箓隶属于交通部的万行四通大神之符咒。

0028.en: Relevant information instantly surfaced in Zhang Yu's memory.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 张羽脑海的记忆中瞬间浮现出相关资料。

0028.en: The Ministry of Transportation, one of Kunxu's eight divine departments, was in charge of all roads, aviation, and waterway traffic within Kunxu, holding the power to monitor all transportation.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 交通部，昆墟的八大神职部门之一，执掌昆墟内一切道路、航空、海河交通之处，有监查天下交通之权。

0028.en: The Great Deity of Universal Transport was a true god in the Ministry of Transportation responsible for city roads. Zhang Yu remembered that one of its powers was to record all surveillance data from city roads and vehicles...
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 而万行四通大神，便是交通部中负责城市道路的一位正神，张羽记得对方的权能之一，好像是记录了所有城市道路和车辆的监控资料……

0028.en: Through talismans, one could borrow the power of the Great Deity of Universal Transport to access various surveillance feeds within the city's road network, said to reveal every detail.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 通过符咒，便能够借用万行四通大神的力量，调用城市道路范围之内的种种监控，谓之前知三百年，巨细无遗。

0028.en: After the memory flashed through his mind, Zhang Yu looked at the options below.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 记忆在脑海中一闪而逝后，张羽便又继续看向了下面的选项。

0028.en: There were four options, looking something like this:
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 一共四个选项，大概类似这样：

0028.en: "All four options are the beginning of a talisman, and based on the style, they all belong to the true gods of the Ministry of Transportation... Heh, trying to mess with my head right from the start?"
0028.speaker: 张羽
0028.cn: “四个选项都是一段符咒的开头，从风格来看全都是交通部的正神……呵呵，上来就搞我心态？”

0028.en: "It should be option D, the vehicle surveillance talisman, right?"
0028.speaker: 张羽
0028.cn: “应该是D选项的车辆监控符吧？”

0028.en: Zhang Yu thought for a moment, chose D, and then the next multiple-choice question appeared.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 张羽想了想选择了D，接着又跳出了下一个选择题。

0028.en: "Among the following talismans, which one is not a Reporting Talisman?"
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: “请问以下符咒中，哪一个不属于举报符？”

0028.en: Zhang Yu was slightly taken aback. "A Reporting Talisman? I've never learned this. Another question that's beyond the curriculum?"
0028.speaker: 张羽
0028.cn: 张羽微微一愣：“举报符？没学过啊，又是超纲题？”

0028.en: He frowned, randomly picked one that looked plausible, and moved on to the next question.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 皱了皱眉，随便选了一个看着像的，张羽又看向了下一题。

0028.en: He went through all the multiple-choice questions like this, followed by fill-in-the-blanks and open-ended questions. The difficulty increased sharply.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 就这么一题题把选择题全部做完，接下来又是填空题和解答题，题目的难度也急剧提升。

0028.en: Questions like, "Please write a Health-Check Talisman to respectfully request the Great Deity of Health and Vitality from the Ministry of Health to check your intestines for any tumors."
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 像是什么“请编写一段体检符，恭请卫生部的健康春生大神检查你的肠胃是否出现肿块。”

0028.en: And, "What talisman can be used to quickly subdue three ordinary people without mana, located 30 meters to the north? Please draw the talisman. Here is the specific data for the three individuals and their surroundings..."
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 还有什么“使用什么符咒能快速制服正北方30米处的三名没有法力的凡人？请绘制符咒。以下是三名凡人和周围环境的具体数据……”

0028.en: "Damn it... If there are just three ordinary people, can't I just beat them up? Why do I need a talisman for that?"
0028.speaker: 张羽
0028.cn: “妈蛋……三个凡人我就不能直接把他们打趴下吗？用什么符咒啊。”

0028.en: Just as Zhang Yu was sweating over writing a detention talisman, he heard the sound of a chair scraping.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 而正当张羽满头大汗地编写着一段拘役符的时候，却听到一阵椅子拖动的声音响起。

0028.en: He looked up and saw that his classmate, He Dayou, had already finished the exam and was about to leave.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他抬头看去，便见同班同学的何大有已经完成试卷准备走了。

0028.en: Zhang Yu remembered that this He Dayou was third in the last monthly exam, another one of those filthy rich people like Qian Shen.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 张羽记得这位何大有是上个月月考的总分第三，是一位和钱深一样的死有钱人。

0028.en: But unlike Qian Shen, who focused on his scores, He Dayou loved to show off his wealth. He usually had very little interaction with Zhang Yu.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 只不过和钱深专注于分数不一样，这位何大有是个爱炫富的，平时和张羽基本没什么交集。

0028.en: Turning in his paper early like this was a way of showing off his wealth.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 像是此刻的提前交卷，便是一种炫富行为。

0028.en: This was because talismans were a subject where you needed to spend a lot of money to truly succeed. It was the exam that most clearly separated the rich from the poor.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 只因为符箓就是一门需要砸钱才能真正有成的课程，是穷人和富人之间分界线最明显的一门考试。

0028.en: Many people even called talismans the language of the rich.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 很多人甚至将符咒称之为富人的语言。

0028.en: Specifically, drawing talismans allowed one to command the power of the eight divine departments to achieve incredible things. These eight departments were often referred to as the Eight True Gods.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 具体来讲，所谓绘制符咒，便可以调动八大神职部门的力量，完成种种不可思议之事，其中八大神职部门也常被世人称之为八部正神。

0028.en: But the school only taught the most basic methods of drawing talismans. To learn more advanced ones, including many not taught in school, you had to buy registers.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 但学校里只会教导最基础的符咒绘制之法，想要学习更高级的，甚至很多学校里所没有的符咒，那就必须购买箓书。

0028.en: And besides the high cost of the registers, there were also membership fees, offerings to the gods, and faith level expenses, all of which were incredibly expensive.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 而箓书除了购买的昂贵费用之外，还有会员费，充值祭神，信仰等级等等花销巨大的事情。

0028.en: The talismans provided by the registers were not just divided by the cultivator's realm level; the most important factor was money.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 可以说箓书所提供的符咒，除了按修炼者的境界等级进行划分之外，最重要的凭依便是钱。

0028.en: Only by spending enough money on a register could you gain a high enough faith level to unlock more permissions, master more advanced talisman drawing techniques, and access different types of talismans.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 只有在箓书上花了足够多的钱，才能拥有足够的信仰等级，才能去解放更多权限，才能掌握更多高级的符咒绘制之法，以及各种不同类型的符咒。

0028.en: After meeting all these requirements, one was qualified to practice talismans diligently. This included one-on-one talisman conversations with the Eight True Gods, error corrections guided by the gods, and talisman optimization with divine guidance while practicing... Of course, this diligent practice was also very expensive.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 完成了以上前提之后，才有苦学苦练符咒的资格，比如和八部正神的一对一符咒对话，比如正神指导的符咒报错，又比如一边练习一边接受神灵指导的符咒优化……当然，这样苦练的过程同样价格昂贵。

0028.en: You could say that learning talismans outside of school was a process built entirely on money.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 可以说校园之外的符箓学习，整个过程就是要用钱堆出来的。

0028.en: And during this entire process, if you violated the rules set by the Eight True Gods, like sharing talismans privately or using them to break sect laws, you would be punished. The penalty could be a fine, or at worst, bankruptcy.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 而在这整个过程中，一旦违反八部正神定下的规矩，比如私传符咒，比如以符咒违反宗门律法，那便会遭到惩罚，轻则缴纳罚金，重则倾家荡产。

0028.en: Every time Zhang Yu had a Dao Arts class to learn talismans, he couldn't help but feel that this was a completely unfair subject. It was the best way for the rich to boost their scores in the college entrance exams and widen the gap with the poor. It truly deserved to be called the language of the rich.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 张羽每次上道术课学习符咒的时候，亦都不得不感慨，这是一门绝不公平不公正的课程，也是有钱人们在高考时最好的刷分点，最能和穷人们拉开差距的科目，不愧是被称为富人语言的东西。

0028.en: But Zhang Yu had heard from Zhou Tianyi that talismans weren't even the most expensive part of Dao Arts.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 但张羽也曾经听周天翊说过，符箓在道术之中还不是最贵的。

0028.en: Many of the Dao Arts that could only be learned after Foundation Establishment cost a fortune, enough to put a college student in massive debt.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 像是筑基之后才能学习的种种道术，有许多都要耗费巨资，足以让一个大学生都欠下巨债。

0028.en: After finally getting through the Dao Arts exam, Zhang Yu came out of the classroom and saw a large group of people crowded around He Dayou, checking their answers.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 好不容易挺完了这场道术考试，张羽一出教室，便看到一大群人正围着何大有对答案。

0028.en: He Dayou smiled faintly, took out a jade-like tablet, and scribbled on it.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 只见何大有微微一笑，掏出一张玉牌似的东西，接着在上面一阵鬼画符似的划动。

0028.en: As his mana fluctuated, a golden, ethereal figure slowly emerged from the jade tablet.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 伴随着他手中法力一阵波动，一道金色虚影便从玉牌中缓缓浮现了出来。

0028.en: He Dayou smiled and said, "This is the Answer Talisman from the Great Deity of Universal Knowledge. If you have any questions, just ask it."
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: 何大有笑道：“这是天知万问大神的解答符，你们有什么问题就问祂好了。”

0028.en: Many students gasped in amazement at this sight, looking at He Dayou with envy.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 看到这一幕的许多学生又是一阵惊呼，看向何大有的目光中全是艳羡之色。

0028.en: As Zhang Yu stared at the jade tablet in He Dayou's hand, he heard Bai Zhenzhen's voice from the side, "So that's a register, huh? He even got a jade-colored skin for it. That guy must have been planning to show off for a long time, right?"
0028.speaker: 白真真
0028.cn: 就在张羽的注视着何大有手中的玉牌时，一旁响起白真真的声音：“那就是箓书吧？还整个玉色的皮肤，这家伙一定准备装这个逼很久了吧？”

0028.en: Zhang Yu turned his head and saw Bai Zhenzhen beside him, seething with jealousy.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 张羽转过头，便看到了一旁愤愤不平，嫉妒得浑身扭曲的白真真。

0028.en: Zhang Yu asked, "How did you do on the exam?"
0028.speaker: 张羽
0028.cn: 张羽问道：“你考的怎么样？”

0028.en: Bai Zhenzhen said with dissatisfaction, "How else could I have done? At least a quarter of the talismans were ones we never learned."
0028.speaker: 白真真
0028.cn: 白真真不满地说道：“还能怎么样，起码四分之一都是没学过的符咒。”

0028.en: "Two years ago, the college entrance exam went 20% beyond the curriculum, and this year it's 25%? If this keeps up, by the time we take the exam, will half of it be stuff they never taught? They have no shame at all."
0028.speaker: 白真真
0028.cn: “前年高考超纲20%，今年就冲25%了？再这样下去，等我们高考的时候，是不是考卷上一半内容都是没教过的？真是一点脸都不要了。”

0028.en: "I just hope I don't run into those filthy rich guys in the combat exam. Otherwise, I'll beat them so hard they fail."
0028.speaker: 白真真
0028.cn: “实战考试最好别让我遇到那几个死有钱人，不然我打得他们不及格。”

0028.en: On the other side, He Dayou seemed to notice the stares from Bai Zhenzhen and Zhang Yu. He turned his head and gave them a slight smile.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 另一边的何大有似乎感觉到了白真真和张羽的目光，转过头来，朝着两人微微一笑。

0028.en: Bai Zhenzhen instantly put on a calm and composed expression and nodded back at him.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 白真真也瞬间换上一副风轻云淡的模样，朝着对方微微点头。

0028.en: A moment later, the next exam was about to begin. He Dayou and a few of his friends walked towards the martial arts combat examination hall.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 片刻后，下一场考试就要开始了，何大有和几名同伴们一同走向武道实战考场。

0028.en: He Dayou was the kind of person who could write a primary school essay titled "My Father, the School Director."
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 何大有就是那种小学作文可以写《我的校董爸爸》的人。

0028.en: Because his father really was a director of Songyang High School.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 因为他的父亲真的是嵩阳高中的校董。

0028.en: But despite his privileged upbringing, he didn't feel his life was easy. He was just one of his father's thirty-something children.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 但从小锦衣玉食的他并不觉得自己过得轻松，只因他亦不过是父亲这一批三十多名子女中的一个罢了。

0028.en: He had also gone through numerous assessments, competitions, and met family KPIs to become one of only two high school students, one of only two cultivators, among the thirty-plus siblings.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他也是在经过重重考核，一次次竞争，一次次完成家庭KPI之后，才成为了这三十多人之中唯二的高中生，唯二的修仙者。

0028.en: As for his other non-cultivator siblings, they had long since gone to work at their father's company to pay off their upbringing debts.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 至于其他的凡人兄弟姐妹们，为了还上养育欠债，都早就前往父亲的公司打工了。

0028.en: "Although I'm the child of a wealthy family, the most important reason I've gotten this far is my own effort and talent."
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: “虽然我是有钱人家的小孩，但我能够走到今天这一步，更重要的终究是我自身的努力和天赋。”

0028.en: "I earned my father's investment through my hard work. Why can't I show off my wealth?"
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: “我是凭我的努力获得了父亲的投资，我为什么不能炫富？”

0028.en: "Those poor people just complain all day, thinking I only got to this point because I have a rich dad. What a bunch of naive and ridiculous fools."
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: “那些穷鬼整天只知道怨天尤人，以为我就是有个富人爸爸才混到这一步？一群幼稚可笑的家伙。”

0028.en: With these thoughts in mind, He Dayou had always looked down on those who were poor and had bad grades.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 带着心中的这种想法，何大有一直以来都看不起那些又穷成绩又差的人。

0028.en: And after he entered Songyang High School as the son of a director and learned more about its unspoken rules, he gradually began to look down on the poor students with good grades as well.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 而当他作为校董之子进入嵩阳高中，对这高中里的许多潜规则了解更深后，他对成绩好的穷人也逐渐看不上了。

0028.en: "Good grades are only temporary. These poor people have no idea... from the moment they were born, they never had a chance to get ahead."
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: “成绩再好终究也只是一时的罢了，这些穷人根本不知道……他们从出生的那一刻开始，就根本没有出头的机会。”

0028.en: "Perhaps we and them can't even be considered the same species anymore."
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: “也许他们和我们早就算不上是一个物种了。”

0028.en: With this mindset, He Dayou maintained his rank as third in the grade, showed off his wealth from time to time, and lived a peaceful school life, waiting for the moment he would be admitted to a top university.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 带着这种想法的何大有一直维持着年级第三的总分排名，时不时炫个富，过着平静的校园生活，等待考入顶尖大学的那一刻来临。

0028.en: Until one person's change shattered his inner peace.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 直到一个人的变化，打破了他心中的平静。

0028.en: Seeing Zhang Yu's increasing efforts over the past half-month, which had even caused the entire class to become more competitive, disgusted him.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 看着张羽这半个多月的时间里那越来越努力，甚至引得全班上下都卷起来的模样，他感觉恶心。

0028.en: "This kind of poor person... counts his loan payments on his fingers every month, rushes off to a part-time job right after school to earn a few hundred or a thousand, saves every penny to cultivate, and dreams of getting rich overnight and achieving immortality."
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: “这种穷鬼……每个月掰着指头算欠贷，每天放了学还要急匆匆跑去打工，一次赚个几百上千的零钱，省吃俭用地想要修仙，妄想一朝暴富长生久视。”

0028.en: "They have no idea who their real competitors are in the college entrance exam."
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: “他们根本就不知道自己高考的竞争对手到底是什么人。”

0028.en: "And yet they still jump around at school."
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: “还在学校里上蹿下跳。”

0028.en: "So poor it's ugly."
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: “真是穷得丑陋。”

0028.en: He Dayou couldn't stand the sight of Zhang Yu working so desperately, as if his efforts could actually let him win against the rich.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 何大有看不惯张羽那副疯狂努力的样子，就好像能靠努力赢过他们这些有钱人一样。

0028.en: Especially after hearing the rumor that Zhang Yu had been accepted as a disciple by a Golden Core master, the director's son used his connections to confirm the news.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 特别是在听到张羽被金丹真人收为弟子的传闻后，这位校董之子特地动用自己的人脉确认了一下消息。

0028.en: After confirming that Zhang Yu had not been taken as a disciple by a Golden Core master, his dislike for him reached a new peak.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 在确认张羽并没有被金丹真人收为弟子之后，他心中对此人的厌恶达到了一种巅峰。

0028.en: "He's not clarifying it on purpose. Is he trying to ride on someone else's coattails?"
0028.speaker: 何大有
0028.cn: “故意不澄清，想要狐假虎威吗？”

0028.en: So he planned to use the combat exam as an opportunity to teach this poor guy a lesson and make him understand his true place.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 所以他打算在实战考试上借机教训一下这位穷鬼，让他认清自己真正的位置。
